{"1330573765552":{"articleUpdateDate":"","articleContent":"<p>经过几天不停的修改，博客终于正常了（这里所谓的正常就是在google有限的配额下，能正常访问一天）。<\/p>\r\n<p>前段时间，不知道在里面添加了什么鸟东东，导致read配额严重不足， 搞得我非常纠结，<\/p>\r\n<p>但是又不想花钱去购买那些配额，所以只能一个方法一个方法的找，看哪里调用太频繁，<\/p>\r\n<p>后来发现，在记录博客浏览量的时候，刷新一次博客，就会读取写入一次，我试着写一个cron，定时记录这个浏览数据，效果很好。<\/p>\r\n<p>还有就是博客的session数据，曾经有一次，居然有500M，而且读写频率很高，现在写加入到了cron中。<\/p>\r\n<p>&nbsp;<\/p>\r\n<p>总的来说，优化如下：<\/p>\r\n<p>开启memcache，把页面上的数据都放进去，对于那些很久都不会变化的数据，缓存时间稍微弄长一点。<\/p>\r\n<p>对于读写频繁的，可以考虑先存到内存中，然后定时处理。<\/p>\r\n<p>至于缓存怎么写，可以参考<a href=\"http:\/\/www.choujone.com\/blog\/1320929126095\" target=\"_blank\">http:\/\/www.choujone.com\/blog\/1320929126095<\/a><\/p>\r\n<p>&nbsp;<\/p>","articleTypeId":"1291858209643","articleTitle":"博客终于恢复正常了","articleIsPublished":"0","articleViewCount":"404","articleAbstract":"经过几天不停的修改，博客终于正常了（这里所谓的正常就是在google有限的配额下，能正常访问一天）。前段时间，不知道在里面添加了什么鸟东东，导致read配额严重不足，搞得我非常纠结，但是又不想花钱去购买那些配额，所以只能一个方法一个方法的找，看哪里调用太频繁，后来发现，在记录博客浏览量的时候，刷新一次博客，就会读取写入一次，我试着写一个cron，定时记录这个浏览数据，效果很好。还有就是博客的ses...","oId":"1330573765552","articleCreateDate":"2012年03月01日 11:49:25","articleTags":""},"1324884952376":{"articleUpdateDate":"","articleContent":"PHP&nbsp;危险函数解释<br \/>\r\n在编译&nbsp;PHP&nbsp;时，如无特殊需要，一定禁止编译生成&nbsp;CLI&nbsp;命令行模式的&nbsp;PHP&nbsp;解析支持。<br \/>\r\n可在编译时使用&nbsp;\u2013disable-cli。一旦编译生成&nbsp;CLI&nbsp;模式的&nbsp;PHP，则可能会被入侵者<br \/>\r\n利用该程序建立一个&nbsp;WEB&nbsp;Shell&nbsp;后门进程或通过&nbsp;PHP&nbsp;执行任意代码！<br \/>\r\nphpinfo()<br \/>\r\n功能描述：输出&nbsp;PHP&nbsp;环境信息以及相关的模块、WEB&nbsp;环境等信息。<br \/>\r\n危险等级：中<br \/>\r\npassthru()<br \/>\r\n功能描述：允许执行一个外部程序并回显输出，类似于&nbsp;exec()。<br \/>\r\n危险等级：高<br \/>\r\nexec()<br \/>\r\n功能描述：允许执行一个外部程序（如&nbsp;UNIX&nbsp;Shell&nbsp;或&nbsp;CMD&nbsp;命令等）。<br \/>\r\n危险等级：高<br \/>\r\nsystem()<br \/>\r\n功能描述：允许执行一个外部程序并回显输出，类似于&nbsp;passthru()。<br \/>\r\n危险等级：高<br \/>\r\nchroot()<br \/>\r\n功能描述：可改变当前&nbsp;PHP&nbsp;进程的工作根目录，仅当系统支持&nbsp;CLI&nbsp;模式<br \/>\r\nPHP&nbsp;时才能工作，且该函数不适用于&nbsp;Windows&nbsp;系统。<br \/>\r\n危险等级：高<br \/>\r\nscandir()<br \/>\r\n功能描述：列出指定路径中的文件和目录。<br \/>\r\n危险等级：中<br \/>\r\nchgrp()<br \/>\r\n功能描述：改变文件或目录所属的用户组。<br \/>\r\n危险等级：高<br \/>\r\nchown()<br \/>\r\n功能描述：改变文件或目录的所有者。<br \/>\r\n危险等级：高<br \/>\r\nshell_exec()<br \/>\r\n功能描述：通过&nbsp;Shell&nbsp;执行命令，并将执行结果作为字符串返回。<br \/>\r\n危险等级：高<br \/>\r\nproc_open()<br \/>\r\n功能描述：执行一个命令并打开文件指针用于读取以及写入。<br \/>\r\n危险等级：高<br \/>\r\nproc_get_status()<br \/>\r\n功能描述：获取使用&nbsp;proc_open()&nbsp;所打开进程的信息。<br \/>\r\n危险等级：高<br \/>\r\nerror_log()<br \/>\r\n功能描述：将错误信息发送到指定位置（文件）。<br \/>\r\n安全备注：在某些版本的&nbsp;PHP&nbsp;中，可使用&nbsp;error_log()&nbsp;绕过&nbsp;PHP&nbsp;safe&nbsp;mode，<br \/>\r\n执行任意命令。<br \/>\r\n危险等级：低<br \/>\r\nini_alter()<br \/>\r\n功能描述：是&nbsp;ini_set()&nbsp;函数的一个别名函数，功能与&nbsp;ini_set()&nbsp;相同。<br \/>\r\n具体参见&nbsp;ini_set()。<br \/>\r\n危险等级：高<br \/>\r\nini_set()<br \/>\r\n功能描述：可用于修改、设置&nbsp;PHP&nbsp;环境配置参数。<br \/>\r\n危险等级：高<br \/>\r\nini_restore()<br \/>\r\n功能描述：可用于恢复&nbsp;PHP&nbsp;环境配置参数到其初始值。<br \/>\r\n危险等级：高<br \/>\r\ndl()<br \/>\r\n功能描述：在&nbsp;PHP&nbsp;进行运行过程当中（而非启动时）加载一个&nbsp;PHP&nbsp;外部模块。<br \/>\r\n危险等级：高<br \/>\r\npfsockopen()<br \/>\r\n功能描述：建立一个&nbsp;Internet&nbsp;或&nbsp;UNIX&nbsp;域的&nbsp;socket&nbsp;持久连接。<br \/>\r\n危险等级：高<br \/>\r\nsyslog()<br \/>\r\n功能描述：可调用&nbsp;UNIX&nbsp;系统的系统层&nbsp;syslog()&nbsp;函数。<br \/>\r\n危险等级：中<br \/>\r\nreadlink()<br \/>\r\n功能描述：返回符号连接指向的目标文件内容。<br \/>\r\n危险等级：中<br \/>\r\nsymlink()<br \/>\r\n功能描述：在&nbsp;UNIX&nbsp;系统中建立一个符号链接。<br \/>\r\n危险等级：高<br \/>\r\npopen()<br \/>\r\n功能描述：可通过&nbsp;popen()&nbsp;的参数传递一条命令，并对&nbsp;popen()&nbsp;所打开的文件进行执行。<br \/>\r\n危险等级：高<br \/>\r\nstream_socket_server()<br \/>\r\n功能描述：建立一个&nbsp;Internet&nbsp;或&nbsp;UNIX&nbsp;服务器连接。<br \/>\r\n危险等级：中<br \/>\r\nputenv()<br \/>\r\n功能描述：用于在&nbsp;PHP&nbsp;运行时改变系统字符集环境。在低于&nbsp;5.2.6&nbsp;版本的&nbsp;PHP&nbsp;中，可利用该函数<br \/>\r\n修改系统字符集环境后，利用&nbsp;sendmail&nbsp;指令发送特殊参数执行系统&nbsp;SHELL&nbsp;命令。<br \/>\r\n危险等级：高","articleTypeId":"1318325201554","articleTitle":"PHP危险函数列表","articleIsPublished":"0","articleViewCount":"455","articleAbstract":"PHP危险函数解释在编译PHP时，如无特殊需要，一定禁止编译生成CLI命令行模式的PHP解析支持。可在编译时使用\u2013disable-cli。一旦编译生成CLI模式的PHP，则可能会被入侵者利用该程序建立一个WEBShell后门进程或通过PHP执行任意代码！phpinfo()功能描述：输出PHP环境信息以及相关的模块、WEB环境等信息。危险等级：中passthru()功能描述：允许执行一个外部程序并回...","oId":"1324884952376","articleCreateDate":"2011年12月26日 style=\"font-family:'Courier New';color:black;font-size:10pt;\">jQuery<\/span><span>插件的开发包括两种：<\/span><\/p>\r\n<p class=\"MsoNormal\" align=\"left\" style=\"margin-top:0cm;margin-right:0cm;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0cm;padding-top:0px;padding-right:0px;padding-bottom:0px;padding-left:0px;text-align:left;text-indent:21pt;\"><span>一种是类级别的插件开发，即给<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'Courier New';color:black;font-size:10pt;\">jQuery<\/span><span>添加新的全局函数，相当于给<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'Courier New';color:black;font-size:10pt;\">jQuery<\/span><span>类本身添加方法。<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'Courier New';color:black;font-size:10pt;\">jQuery<\/span><span>的全局函数就是属于<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'Courier New';color:black;font-size:10pt;\">jQuery<\/span><span>命名空间的函数，另一种是对象级别的插件开发，即给<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'Courier New';color:black;font-size:10pt;\">jQuery<\/span><span>对象添加方法。下面就两种函数的开发做详细的说明。<\/span><\/p>\r\n<p class=\"MsoNormal\" align=\"left\" style=\"margin-top:0cm;margin-right:0cm;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0cm;padding-top:0px;padding-right:0px;padding-bottom:0px;padding-left:0px;text-align:left;\"><strong style=\"font-family:'Courier New';color:black;font-size:10pt;\">jQuery<\/span><span>类添加类方法，可以理解为添加静态方法。典型的例子就是<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'Courier New';color:black;font-size:10pt;\">$.AJAX()<\/span><span>这个函数，将函数定义于<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'Courier New';color:black;font-size:10pt;\">jQuery<\/span><span>的命名空间中。关于类级别的插件开发可以采用如下几种形式进行扩展：<\/span><\/p>\r\n<p class=\"MsoNormal\" align=\"left\" style=\"color:black;\">})(jQuery);&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<\/span><\/li>\r\n<\/ol>\r\n<\/div>\r\n<span>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; 上面定义了一个<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'Courier New';color:black;font-size:10pt;\">jQuery<\/span><span>函数<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'Courier New';color:black;font-size:10pt;\">,<\/span><span>形参是<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'Courier New';color:black;font-size:10pt;\">$<\/span><span>，函数定义完成之后<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'Courier New';color:black;font-size:10pt;\">,<\/span><span>把<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'Courier New';color:black;font-size:10pt;\">jQuery<\/span><span>这个实参传递进去<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'Courier New';color:black;font-size:10pt;\">.<\/span><span>立即调用执行。这样的好处是<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'Courier New';color:black;font-size:10pt;\">,<\/span><span>我们在写<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'Courier New';color:black;font-size:10pt;\">jQuery<\/span><span>插件时<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'Courier New';color:black;font-size:10pt;\">,<\/span><span>也可以使用<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'Courier New';color:black;font-size:10pt;\">$<\/span><span>这个别名<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'Courier New';color:black;font-size:10pt;\">,<\/span><span>而不会与<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'Courier New';color:black;font-size:10pt;\">prototype<\/span><span>引起冲突<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'Courier New';color:black;font-size:10pt;\">.<\/span><\/div>\r\n<\/div>\r\n<p class=\"MsoNormal\" align=\"left\" style=\"margin-top:0cm;margin-right:0cm;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0cm;padding-top:0px;padding-right:0px;padding-bottom:0px;padding-left:0px;text-align:left;\"><strong style=\"font-weight:bold;\"><span style=\"font-family:'Courier New';color:black;font-size:10pt;\">2.1&nbsp;<\/span><\/strong><strong style=\"font-weight:bold;\"><span>在<\/span><\/strong><strong style=\"font-weight:bold;\"><span style=\"font-family:'Courier New';color:black;font-size:10pt;\">JQuery<\/span><\/strong><strong style=\"font-weight:bold;\"><span>名称空间下申明一个名字<\/span><\/strong><\/p>\r\n<p class=\"MsoNormal\" align=\"left\" style=\"margin-top:0cm;margin-right:0cm;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0cm;padding-top:0px;padding-right:0px;padding-bottom:0px;padding-left:0px;text-align:left;text-indent:20pt;\"><span>这是一个单一插件的脚本。如果你的脚本中包含多个插件，或者互逆的插件（例如：<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'Courier New';color:black;font-size:10pt;\">&nbsp;$.fn.doSomething()&nbsp;<\/span><span>和<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'Courier New';color:black;font-size:10pt;\">$.fn.undoSomething()<\/span><span>），那么你需要声明多个函数名字。但是，通常当我们编写一个插件时，力求仅使用一个名字来包含它的所有内容。我们的示例插件命名为\u201C<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'Courier New';color:black;font-size:10pt;\">highlight<\/span><span>\u201C<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'Courier New';color:black;font-size:10pt;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<\/span><\/p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top:0px;margin-right:0px;margin-bottom:0px;margin-left:0px;padding-top:0px;padding-right:0px;padding-bottom:0px;padding-left:0px;\">&nbsp;<\/p>\r\n<div class=\"dp-highlighter\" id=\"\" style=\"font-family:Monaco, 'DejaVu Sans Mono', 'Bitstream Vera Sans Mono', Consolas, 'Courier New', New';color:black;font-size:10pt;\">javascript<\/span><span>中最基本的类对象，我们可以这样做。就像其他对象一样，函数可以被指定为属性。因此我们已经声明<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'Courier style=\"font-family:'Courier New';color:black;font-size:10pt;\">\"format\"<\/span><span>的函数来格式化高亮文本。我们的插件现在看起来像这样，默认的<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'Courier style=\"color:black;\">};&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<\/span><\/li>\r\n<li style=\"font-size:1em;margin-top:0px;margin-right:0px;margin-bottom:0px;margin-left:38px;padding-top:0px;padding-right:0px;padding-bottom:0px;padding-left:10px;border-left-width:1px;border-left-style:solid;border-left-color:#d1d7dc;background-color:#fafafa;line-height:18px;\"><span style=\"color:black;\"><span class=\"comment\" style=\"color:#008200;\">\/\/&nbsp;define&nbsp;our&nbsp;format&nbsp;function&nbsp;&nbsp;<\/span><span style=\"color:black;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;<\/span><\/span><\/li>\r\n<li style=\"font-size:1em;margin-top:0px;margin-right:0px;margin-bottom:0px;margin-left:38px;padding-top:0px;padding-right:0px;padding-bottom:0px;padding-left:10px;border-left-width:1px;border-left-style:solid;border-left-color:#d1d7dc;background-color:#fafafa;line-height:18px;\"><span style=\"color:black;\">$.fn.hilight.format&nbsp;=&nbsp;function(txt)&nbsp;{&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<\/span><\/li>\r\n<li style=\"font-size:1em;margin-top:0px;margin-right:0px;margin-bottom:0px;margin-left:38px;padding-top:0px;padding-right:0px;padding-bottom:0px;padding-left:10px;border-left-width:1px;border-left-style:solid;border-left-color:#d1d7dc;background-color:#fafafa;line-height:18px;\"><span style=\"color:black;\"><span class=\"keyword\" style=\"color:#7f0055;font-weight:bold;\">return<\/span><span style=\"color:black;\">&nbsp;<\/span><span class=\"string\" style=\"color:blue;\">'&lt;strong&gt;'<\/span><span style=\"color:black;\">&nbsp;+&nbsp;txt&nbsp;+&nbsp;<\/span><span class=\"string\" style=\"color:blue;\">'&lt;\/strong&gt;'<\/span><span style=\"color:black;\">;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<\/span><\/span><\/li>\r\n<li style=\"font-size:1em;margin-top:0px;margin-right:0px;margin-bottom:0px;margin-left:38px;padding-top:0px;padding-right:0px;padding-bottom:0px;padding-left:10px;border-left-width:1px;border-left-style:solid;border-left-color:#d1d7dc;background-color:#fafafa;line-height:18px;\"><span style=\"color:black;\">};&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<\/span><\/li>\r\n<\/ol>\r\n<\/div>\r\n<span>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; 我们很容易的支持<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'Courier New';color:black;font-size:10pt;\">options<\/span><span>对象中的其他的属性通过允许一个回调函数来覆盖默认的设置。这是另外一个出色的方法来修改你的插件。这里展示的技巧是进一步有效的暴露<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'Courier New';color:black;font-size:10pt;\">format<\/span><span>函数进而让他能被重新定义。通过这技巧，是其他人能够传递他们自己设置来覆盖你的插件，换句话说，这样其他人也能够为你的插件写插件。<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'Courier New';color:black;font-size:10pt;\">&nbsp;<br \/>\r\n<\/span><span>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; 考虑到这个篇文章中我们建立的无用的插件，你也许想知道究竟什么时候这些会有用。一个真实的例子是<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'Courier New';color:black;font-size:10pt;\">Cycle<\/span><span>插件<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'Courier New';color:black;font-size:10pt;\">.<\/span><span>这个<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'Courier New';color:black;font-size:10pt;\">Cycle<\/span><span>插件是一个滑动显示插件，他能支持许多内部变换作用到滚动，滑动，渐变消失等。但是实际上，没有办法定义也许会应用到滑动变化上每种类型的效果。那是这种扩展性有用的地方。<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'Courier New';color:black;font-size:10pt;\">&nbsp;Cycle<\/span><span>插件对使用者暴露<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'Courier New';color:black;font-size:10pt;\">\"transitions\"<\/span><span>对象，使他们添加自己变换定义。插件中定义就像这样：<\/span><\/div>\r\n<\/div>\r\n<p class=\"MsoNormal\" align=\"left\" style=\"margin-top:0cm;margin-right:0cm;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0cm;padding-top:0px;padding-right:0px;padding-bottom:0px;padding-left:0px;text-align:left;text-indent:21pt;\"><span style=\"font-family:'Courier New';color:black;font-size:10pt;\">$.fn.cycle.transitions = {<span>&nbsp;<\/span><\/span><\/p>\r\n<p class=\"MsoNormal\" align=\"left\" style=\"margin-top:0cm;margin-right:0cm;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0cm;padding-top:0px;padding-right:0px;padding-bottom:0px;padding-left:0px;text-align:left;text-indent:21pt;\"><span style=\"font-family:'Courier New';color:black;font-size:10pt;\">\/\/ ...<span>&nbsp;<\/span><\/span><\/p>\r\n<p class=\"MsoNormal\" align=\"left\" style=\"margin-top:0cm;margin-right:0cm;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0cm;padding-top:0px;padding-right:0px;padding-bottom:0px;padding-left:0px;text-align:left;text-indent:21pt;\"><span style=\"font-family:'Courier New';color:black;font-size:10pt;\">};<span>&nbsp;<\/span><\/span><\/p>\r\n<p class=\"MsoNormal\" align=\"left\" style=\"margin-top:0cm;margin-right:0cm;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0cm;padding-top:0px;padding-right:0px;padding-bottom:0px;padding-left:0px;text-align:left;text-indent:21pt;\"><span>这个技巧使其他人能定义和传递变换设置到<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'Courier New';color:black;font-size:10pt;\">Cycle<\/span><span>插件。<\/span><\/p>\r\n<p class=\"MsoNormal\" align=\"left\" style=\"margin-top:0cm;margin-right:0cm;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0cm;padding-top:0px;padding-right:0px;padding-bottom:0px;padding-left:0px;text-align:left;\"><strong style=\"font-weight:bold;\"><span style=\"font-family:'Courier New';color:black;font-size:10pt;\">2.5&nbsp;<\/span><\/strong><strong style=\"font-weight:bold;\"><span>保持私有函数的私有性<\/span><\/strong><\/p>\r\n<p class=\"MsoNormal\" align=\"left\" style=\"margin-top:0cm;margin-right:0cm;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0cm;padding-top:0px;padding-right:0px;padding-bottom:0px;padding-left:0px;text-align:left;text-indent:25pt;\"><span>这种技巧暴露你插件一部分来被覆盖是非常强大的。但是你需要仔细思考你实现中暴露的部分。一但被暴露，你需要在头脑中保持任何对于参数或者语义的改动也许会破坏向后的兼容性。一个通理是，如果你不能肯定是否暴露特定的函数，那么你也许不需要那样做。<\/span><\/p>\r\n<p class=\"MsoNormal\" align=\"left\" style=\"margin-top:0cm;margin-right:0cm;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0cm;padding-top:0px;padding-right:0px;padding-bottom:0px;padding-left:0px;text-align:left;text-indent:25pt;\"><span>那么我们怎么定义更多的函数而不搅乱命名空间也不暴露实现呢？这就是闭包的功能。为了演示，我们将会添加另外一个<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'Courier New';color:black;font-size:10pt;\">\u201Cdebug\u201D<\/span><span>函数到我们的插件中。这个<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'Courier New';color:black;font-size:10pt;\">&nbsp;debug<\/span><span>函数将为输出被选中的元素格式到<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'Courier New';color:black;font-size:10pt;\">firebug<\/span><span>控制台。为了创建一个闭包，我们将包装整个插件定义在一个函数中。<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'Courier New';color:black;font-size:10pt;\">&nbsp;<\/span><\/p>\r\n<div style=\"color:black;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;$<span class=\"keyword\" style=\"color:#7f0055;font-weight:bold;\">this<\/span><span style=\"color:black;\">.html(markup);&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<\/span><\/span><\/li>\r\n<li style=\"font-size:1em;margin-top:0px;margin-right:0px;margin-bottom:0px;margin-left:38px;padding-top:0px;padding-right:0px;padding-bottom:0px;padding-left:10px;border-left-width:1px;border-left-style:solid;border-left-color:#d1d7dc;background-color:#fafafa;line-height:18px;\"><span style=\"color:black;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;};&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<\/span><\/li>\r\n<li style=\"font-size:1em;margin-top:0px;margin-right:0px;margin-bottom:0px;margin-left:38px;padding-top:0px;padding-right:0px;padding-bottom:0px;padding-left:10px;border-left-width:1px;border-left-style:solid;border-left-color:#d1d7dc;background-color:#fafafa;line-height:18px;\"><span style=\"color:black;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;<span class=\"comment\" style=\"color:#008200;\">\/\/&nbsp;私有函数：debugging&nbsp;&nbsp;<\/span><span style=\"color:black;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;<\/span><\/span><\/li>\r\n<li style=\"font-size:1em;margin-top:0px;margin-right:0px;margin-bottom:0px;margin-left:38px;padding-top:0px;padding-right:0px;padding-bottom:0px;padding-left:10px;border-left-width:1px;border-left-style:solid;border-left-color:#d1d7dc;background-color:#fafafa;line-height:18px;\"><span style=\"color:black;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;function&nbsp;debug($obj)&nbsp;{&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<\/span><\/li>\r\n<li style=\"color:black;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<span class=\"keyword\" style=\"color:#7f0055;font-weight:bold;\">if<\/span><span style=\"color:black;\">&nbsp;(window.console&nbsp;&amp;&amp;&nbsp;window.console.log)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<\/span><\/span><\/li>\r\n<li style=\"font-size:1em;margin-top:0px;margin-right:0px;margin-bottom:0px;margin-left:38px;padding-top:0px;padding-right:0px;padding-bottom:0px;padding-left:10px;border-left-width:1px;border-left-style:solid;border-left-color:#d1d7dc;background-color:#fafafa;line-height:18px;\"><span style=\"color:black;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;window.console.log(<span class=\"string\" style=\"color:blue;\">'hilight&nbsp;selection&nbsp;count:&nbsp;'<\/span><span style=\"color:black;\">&nbsp;+&nbsp;$obj.size());&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<\/span><\/span><\/li>\r\n<li style=\"font-size:1em;margin-top:0px;margin-right:0px;margin-bottom:0px;margin-left:38px;padding-top:0px;padding-right:0px;padding-bottom:0px;padding-left:10px;border-left-width:1px;border-left-style:solid;border-left-color:#d1d7dc;background-color:#fafafa;line-height:18px;\"><span style=\"color:black;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;};&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<\/span><\/li>\r\n<li style=\"color:black;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;<span class=\"comment\" style=\"color:#008200;\">\/\/&nbsp;定义暴露format函数&nbsp;&nbsp;<\/span><span style=\"color:black;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;<\/span><\/span><\/li>\r\n<li style=\"color:blue;\">'&lt;strong&gt;'<\/span><span style=\"color:black;\">&nbsp;+&nbsp;txt&nbsp;+&nbsp;<\/span><span class=\"string\" style=\"color:blue;\">'&lt;\/strong&gt;'<\/span><span style=\"color:black;\">;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<\/span><\/span><\/li>\r\n<li style=\"font-size:1em;margin-top:0px;margin-right:0px;margin-bottom:0px;margin-left:38px;padding-top:0px;padding-right:0px;padding-bottom:0px;padding-left:10px;border-left-width:1px;border-left-style:solid;border-left-color:#d1d7dc;background-color:#fafafa;line-height:18px;\"><span style=\"color:black;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;};&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<\/span><\/li>\r\n<li style=\"color:black;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;<span class=\"comment\" style=\"color:#008200;\">\/\/&nbsp;插件的defaults&nbsp;&nbsp;<\/span><span style=\"color:black;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;<\/span><\/span><\/li>\r\n<li style=\"color:black;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;$.fn.hilight.defaults&nbsp;=&nbsp;{&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<\/span><\/li>\r\n<li style=\"color:black;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;background:&nbsp;<span class=\"string\" style=\"color:blue;\">'yellow'<\/span><span style=\"color:black;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<\/span><\/span><\/li>\r\n<li style=\"color:black;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;};&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<\/span><\/li>\r\n<li style=\"font-size:1em;margin-top:0px;margin-right:0px;margin-bottom:0px;margin-left:38px;padding-top:0px;padding-right:0px;padding-bottom:0px;padding-left:10px;border-left-width:1px;border-left-style:solid;border-left-color:#d1d7dc;background-color:#fafafa;line-height:18px;\"><span style=\"color:black;\"><span class=\"comment\" style=\"color:#008200;\">\/\/&nbsp;闭包结束&nbsp;&nbsp;<\/span><span style=\"color:black;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;<\/span><\/span><\/li>\r\n<li style=\"font-size:1em;margin-top:0px;margin-right:0px;margin-bottom:0px;margin-left:38px;padding-top:0px;padding-right:0px;padding-bottom:0px;padding-left:10px;border-left-width:1px;border-left-style:solid;border-left-color:#d1d7dc;background-color:#fafafa;line-height:18px;\"><span style=\"color:black;\">})(jQuery);&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<\/span><\/li>\r\n<\/ol>\r\n<\/div>\r\n<p class=\"MsoNormal\" align=\"left\" style=\"margin-top:0cm;margin-right:0cm;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0cm;padding-top:0px;padding-right:0px;padding-bottom:0px;padding-left:0px;text-align:left;\">&nbsp;<\/p>\r\n<p class=\"MsoNormal\" align=\"left\" style=\"margin-top:0cm;margin-right:0cm;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0cm;padding-top:0px;padding-right:0px;padding-bottom:0px;padding-left:0px;text-align:left;text-indent:21pt;\"><span>这段设计已经让我创建了强大符合规范的插件。我希望它能让你也能做到。<\/span><\/p>\r\n<p class=\"MsoNormal\" align=\"left\" style=\"margin-top:0cm;margin-right:0cm;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0cm;padding-top:0px;padding-right:0px;padding-bottom:0px;padding-left:0px;text-align:left;\"><strong style=\"font-weight:bold;\"><span style=\"font-family:'Courier New';color:black;font-size:10pt;\">3<\/span><\/strong><strong style=\"font-weight:bold;\"><span>、总结<\/span><\/strong><\/p>\r\n<p class=\"MsoNormal\" align=\"left\" style=\"margin-top:0cm;margin-right:0cm;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0cm;padding-top:0px;padding-right:0px;padding-bottom:0px;padding-left:0px;text-align:left;text-indent:21pt;\"><span style=\"font-family:'Courier New';color:black;font-size:10pt;\">jQuery<\/span><span>为开发插件提拱了两个方法，分别是：<\/span><\/p>\r\n<p class=\"MsoNormal\" align=\"left\" style=\"margin-top:0cm;margin-right:0cm;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:21pt;padding-top:0px;padding-right:0px;padding-bottom:0px;padding-left:0px;text-align:left;\"><span style=\"font-family:'Courier New';color:black;font-size:10pt;\">jQuery.fn.extend(object);&nbsp;&nbsp;<\/span><span>给<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'Courier New';color:black;font-size:10pt;\">jQuery<\/span><span>对象添加方法。<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'Courier New';color:black;font-size:10pt;\"><br \/>\r\njQuery.extend(object); &nbsp;<\/span><span>为扩展<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'Courier New';color:black;font-size:10pt;\">jQuery<\/span><span>类本身<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'Courier New';color:black;font-size:10pt;\">.<\/span><span>为类添加新的方法。<\/span><\/p>\r\n<p class=\"MsoNormal\" align=\"left\" style=\"margin-top:0cm;margin-right:0cm;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0cm;padding-top:0px;padding-right:0px;padding-bottom:0px;padding-left:0px;text-align:left;\"><strong style=\"font-weight:bold;\"><span style=\"font-family:'Courier New';color:black;font-size:10pt;\">3.1 jQuery.fn.extend(object);<\/span><\/strong><\/p>\r\n<p class=\"MsoNormal\" align=\"left\" style=\"margin-top:0cm;margin-right:0cm;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0cm;padding-top:0px;padding-right:0px;padding-bottom:0px;padding-left:0px;text-align:left;text-indent:21pt;\"><span style=\"font-family:'Courier New';color:black;font-size:10pt;\">fn&nbsp;<\/span><span>是什么东西呢。查看<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'Courier New';color:black;font-size:10pt;\">jQuery<\/span><span>代码，就不难发现。<\/span><\/p>\r\n<p class=\"MsoNormal\" align=\"left\" style=\"margin-top:0cm;margin-right:0cm;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0cm;padding-top:0px;padding-right:0px;padding-bottom:0px;padding-left:0px;text-align:left;text-indent:21pt;\"><span style=\"font-family:'Courier New';color:black;font-size:10pt;\">jQuery.fn = jQuery.prototype = {&nbsp;&nbsp;<\/span><\/p>\r\n<p class=\"MsoNormal\" align=\"left\" style=\"margin-top:0cm;margin-right:0cm;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0cm;padding-top:0px;padding-right:0px;padding-bottom:0px;padding-left:0px;text-align:left;text-indent:21pt;\"><span style=\"font-family:'Courier New';color:black;font-size:10pt;\">init: function( selector, context ) {\/\/....<\/span><span>　<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'Courier New';color:black;font-size:10pt;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;<\/span><\/p>\r\n<p class=\"MsoNormal\" align=\"left\" style=\"margin-top:0cm;margin-right:0cm;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0cm;padding-top:0px;padding-right:0px;padding-bottom:0px;padding-left:0px;text-align:left;text-indent:21pt;\"><span style=\"font-family:'Courier New';color:black;font-size:10pt;\">\/\/......&nbsp;&nbsp;<\/span><\/p>\r\n<p class=\"MsoNormal\" align=\"left\" style=\"margin-top:0cm;margin-right:0cm;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0cm;padding-top:0px;padding-right:0px;padding-bottom:0px;padding-left:0px;text-align:left;text-indent:21pt;\"><span style=\"font-family:'Courier New';color:black;font-size:10pt;\">};&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<\/span><\/p>\r\n<p class=\"MsoNormal\" align=\"left\" style=\"margin-top:0cm;margin-right:0cm;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0cm;padding-top:0px;padding-right:0px;padding-bottom:0px;padding-left:0px;text-align:left;text-indent:21pt;\"><span>原来<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'Courier New';color:black;font-size:10pt;\">&nbsp;jQuery.fn = jQuery.prototype.<\/span><span>对<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'Courier New';color:black;font-size:10pt;\">prototype<\/span><span>肯定不会陌生啦。虽然<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'Courier New';color:black;font-size:10pt;\">&nbsp;javascript<\/span><span>　没有明确的类的概念，但是用类来理解它，会更方便。<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'Courier New';color:black;font-size:10pt;\">jQuery<\/span><span>便是一个封装得非常好的类，比如我们用<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'Courier New';color:black;font-size:10pt;\">&nbsp;<\/span><span>语句　<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'Courier New';color:black;font-size:10pt;\">$(\"#btn1\")&nbsp;<\/span><span>会生成一个<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'Courier New';color:black;font-size:10pt;\">&nbsp;jQuery<\/span><span>类的实例。<\/span><\/p>\r\n<p class=\"MsoNormal\" align=\"left\" style=\"margin-top:0cm;margin-right:0cm;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0cm;padding-top:0px;padding-right:0px;padding-bottom:0px;padding-left:0px;text-align:left;text-indent:21pt;\"><span style=\"font-family:'Courier New';color:black;font-size:10pt;\">jQuery.fn.extend(object);&nbsp;<\/span><span>对<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'Courier New';color:black;font-size:10pt;\">jQuery.prototype<\/span><span>进得扩展，就是为<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'Courier New';color:black;font-size:10pt;\">jQuery<\/span><span>类添加<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'Courier New';color:black;font-size:10pt;\">\u201C<\/span><span>成员函数<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'Courier New';color:black;font-size:10pt;\">\u201D<\/span><span>。<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'Courier New';color:black;font-size:10pt;\">jQuery<\/span><span>类的实例可以使用这个<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'Courier New';color:black;font-size:10pt;\">\u201C<\/span><span>成员函数<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'Courier New';color:black;font-size:10pt;\">\u201D<\/span><span>。<\/span><\/p>\r\n<p class=\"MsoNormal\" align=\"left\" style=\"margin-top:0cm;margin-right:0cm;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0cm;padding-top:0px;padding-right:0px;padding-bottom:0px;padding-left:0px;text-align:left;text-indent:21pt;\"><span>比如我们要开发一个插件，做一个特殊的编辑框，当它被点击时，便<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'Courier New';color:black;font-size:10pt;\">alert&nbsp;<\/span><span>当前编辑框里的内容。可以这么做：<\/span><\/p>\r\n<p class=\"MsoNormal\" align=\"left\" style=\"margin-top:0cm;margin-right:0cm;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0cm;padding-top:0px;padding-right:0px;padding-bottom:0px;padding-left:0px;text-align:left;text-indent:21pt;\"><span style=\"font-family:'Courier New';color:black;font-size:10pt;\">$.fn.extend({&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<span>&nbsp;<\/span><\/span><\/p>\r\n<p class=\"MsoNormal\" align=\"left\" style=\"margin-top:0cm;margin-right:0cm;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0cm;padding-top:0px;padding-right:0px;padding-bottom:0px;padding-left:0px;text-align:left;text-indent:21pt;\"><span style=\"font-family:'Courier New';color:black;font-size:10pt;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; alertWhileClick:function(){&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<\/span><\/p>\r\n<p class=\"MsoNormal\" align=\"left\" style=\"margin-top:0cm;margin-right:0cm;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0cm;padding-top:0px;padding-right:0px;padding-bottom:0px;padding-left:0px;text-align:left;text-indent:21pt;\"><span style=\"font-family:'Courier New';color:black;font-size:10pt;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; $(this).click(function(){&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<\/span><\/p>\r\n<p class=\"MsoNormal\" align=\"left\" style=\"margin-top:0cm;margin-right:0cm;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0cm;padding-top:0px;padding-right:0px;padding-bottom:0px;padding-left:0px;text-align:left;text-indent:21pt;\"><span style=\"font-family:'Courier New';color:black;font-size:10pt;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; alert($(this).val());&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<\/span><\/p>\r\n<p class=\"MsoNormal\" align=\"left\" style=\"margin-top:0cm;margin-right:0cm;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0cm;padding-top:0px;padding-right:0px;padding-bottom:0px;padding-left:0px;text-align:left;text-indent:21pt;\"><span style=\"font-family:'Courier New';color:black;font-size:10pt;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; });&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<\/span><\/p>\r\n<p class=\"MsoNormal\" align=\"left\" style=\"margin-top:0cm;margin-right:0cm;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0cm;padding-top:0px;padding-right:0px;padding-bottom:0px;padding-left:0px;text-align:left;text-indent:21pt;\"><span style=\"font-family:'Courier New';color:black;font-size:10pt;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; }&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<\/span><\/p>\r\n<p class=\"MsoNormal\" align=\"left\" style=\"margin-top:0cm;margin-right:0cm;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0cm;padding-top:0px;padding-right:0px;padding-bottom:0px;padding-left:0px;text-align:left;text-indent:21pt;\"><span style=\"font-family:'Courier New';color:black;font-size:10pt;\">});&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<\/span><\/p>\r\n<p class=\"MsoNormal\" align=\"left\" style=\"margin-top:0cm;margin-right:0cm;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0cm;padding-top:0px;padding-right:0px;padding-bottom:0px;padding-left:0px;text-align:left;text-indent:21pt;\"><span style=\"font-family:'Courier New';color:black;font-size:10pt;\">$(\"#input1\").alertWhileClick(); \/\/<\/span><span>页面上为：<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'Courier New';color:black;font-size:10pt;\">&lt;input id=\"input1\" type=\"text\"\/&gt;<\/span><\/p>\r\n<p class=\"MsoNormal\" align=\"left\" style=\"margin-top:0cm;margin-right:0cm;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0cm;padding-top:0px;padding-right:0px;padding-bottom:0px;padding-left:0px;text-align:left;text-indent:21pt;\"><span style=\"font-family:'Courier New';color:black;font-size:10pt;\">$(\"#input1\")<\/span><span>　为一个<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'Courier New';color:black;font-size:10pt;\">jQuery<\/span><span>实例，当它调用成员方法<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'Courier New';color:black;font-size:10pt;\">&nbsp;alertWhileClick<\/span><span>后，便实现了扩展，每次被点击时它会先弹出目前编辑里的内容。<\/span><\/p>\r\n<p class=\"MsoNormal\" align=\"left\" style=\"margin-top:0cm;margin-right:0cm;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0cm;padding-top:0px;padding-right:0px;padding-bottom:0px;padding-left:0px;text-align:left;\"><strong style=\"font-weight:bold;\"><span style=\"font-family:'Courier New';color:black;font-size:10pt;\">3.2 jQuery.extend(object);<\/span><\/strong><strong style=\"font-weight:bold;\"><span>　<\/span><\/strong><\/p>\r\n<p class=\"MsoNormal\" align=\"left\" style=\"margin-top:0cm;margin-right:0cm;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0cm;padding-top:0px;padding-right:0px;padding-bottom:0px;padding-left:0px;text-align:left;text-indent:21pt;\"><span>为<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'Courier New';color:black;font-size:10pt;\">jQuery<\/span><span>类添加添加类方法，可以理解为添加静态方法。如：<\/span><\/p>\r\n<p class=\"MsoNormal\" align=\"left\" style=\"margin-top:0cm;margin-right:0cm;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0cm;padding-top:0px;padding-right:0px;padding-bottom:0px;padding-left:0px;text-align:left;text-indent:21pt;\"><span style=\"font-family:'Courier New';color:black;font-size:10pt;\">$.extend({&nbsp;&nbsp;<\/span><\/p>\r\n<p class=\"MsoNormal\" align=\"left\" style=\"margin-top:0cm;margin-right:0cm;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0cm;padding-top:0px;padding-right:0px;padding-bottom:0px;padding-left:0px;text-align:left;text-indent:21pt;\"><span style=\"font-family:'Courier New';color:black;font-size:10pt;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; add:function(a,b){return a+b;}&nbsp;&nbsp;<\/span><\/p>\r\n<p class=\"MsoNormal\" align=\"left\" style=\"margin-top:0cm;margin-right:0cm;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0cm;padding-top:0px;padding-right:0px;padding-bottom:0px;padding-left:0px;text-align:left;text-indent:21pt;\"><span style=\"font-family:'Courier New';color:black;font-size:10pt;\">});&nbsp;&nbsp;<\/span><\/p>\r\n<p class=\"MsoNormal\" align=\"left\" style=\"margin-top:0cm;margin-right:0cm;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0cm;padding-top:0px;padding-right:0px;padding-bottom:0px;padding-left:0px;text-align:left;text-indent:21pt;\"><span>便为　<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'Courier New';color:black;font-size:10pt;\">jQuery<\/span><span>　添加一个为<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'Courier New';color:black;font-size:10pt;\">&nbsp;add<\/span><span>　的　<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'Courier New';color:black;font-size:10pt;\">\u201C<\/span><span>静态方法<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'Courier New';color:black;font-size:10pt;\">\u201D<\/span><span>，之后便可以在引入<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'Courier New';color:black;font-size:10pt;\">&nbsp;jQuery<\/span><span>　的地方，使用这个方法了，<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'Courier New';color:black;font-size:10pt;\">$.add(3,4); \/\/return 7<\/span><\/p>\r\n<\/span>","articleTypeId":"1294482154040","articleTitle":"jQuery插件开发全解析","articleIsPublished":"0","articleViewCount":"561","articleAbstract":"jQuery插件的开发包括两种：一种是类级别的插件开发，即给jQuery添加新的全局函数，相当于给jQuery类本身添加方法。jQuery的全局函数就是属于jQuery命名空间的函数，另一种是对象级别的插件开发，即给jQuery对象添加方法。下面就两种函数的开发做详细的说明。1、类级别的插件开发类级别的插件开发最直接的理解就是给jQuery类添加类方法，可以理解为添加静态方法。典型的例子就是$.A...","oId":"1312174888697","articleCreateDate":"2011年08月01日 05:01:28","articleTags":"jquery 插件"},"1378436877971":{"articleUpdateDate":"2013年09月06日 11:33:47","articleContent":"<p style=\"font-family:微软雅黑, 'Microsoft YaHei', Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;vertical-align:baseline;color:#3F5051;background-color:#FFFFFF;\">\r\n\t强制不换行&nbsp;<br \/>\r\ndiv{<br \/>\r\nwhite-space:nowrap;<br \/>\r\n}\r\n<\/p>\r\n<p style=\"font-family:微软雅黑, 'Microsoft YaHei', Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;vertical-align:baseline;color:#3F5051;background-color:#FFFFFF;\">\r\n\t自动换行\r\n<\/p>\r\n<p style=\"font-family:微软雅黑, 'Microsoft YaHei', Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;vertical-align:baseline;color:#3F5051;background-color:#FFFFFF;\">\r\n\tdiv{&nbsp;<br \/>\r\nword-wrap: break-word;&nbsp;<br \/>\r\nword-break: normal;&nbsp;<br \/>\r\n}\r\n<\/p>\r\n<p style=\"font-family:微软雅黑, 'Microsoft YaHei', Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;vertical-align:baseline;color:#3F5051;background-color:#FFFFFF;\">\r\n\t强制英文单词断行\r\n<\/p>\r\n<p style=\"font-family:微软雅黑, 'Microsoft YaHei', Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;vertical-align:baseline;color:#3F5051;background-color:#FFFFFF;\">\r\n\tdiv{<br \/>\r\nword-break:break-all;<br \/>\r\n}\r\n<\/p>\r\n<p style=\"font-family:微软雅黑, 'Microsoft YaHei', Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;vertical-align:baseline;color:#3F5051;background-color:#FFFFFF;\">\r\n\t<br \/>\r\n<\/p>\r\n<p style=\"font-family:微软雅黑, 'Microsoft YaHei', Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;vertical-align:baseline;color:#3F5051;background-color:#FFFFFF;\">\r\n\tCSS设置不转行：\r\n<\/p>\r\n<p style=\"font-family:微软雅黑, 'Microsoft YaHei', Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;vertical-align:baseline;color:#3F5051;background-color:#FFFFFF;\">\r\n\t<br \/>\r\noverflow:hidden 隐藏<br \/>\r\nwhite-space：normal 默认&nbsp;<br \/>\r\npre 换行和其他空白字符都将受到保护<br \/>\r\nnowrap 强制在同一行内显示所有文本，直到文本结束或者遭遇 br 对象\r\n<\/p>\r\n<p style=\"font-family:微软雅黑, 'Microsoft YaHei', Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;vertical-align:baseline;color:#3F5051;background-color:#FFFFFF;\">\r\n\t<br \/>\r\n设置强行换行：<br \/>\r\nword-break:&nbsp;<br \/>\r\nnormal ; 依照亚洲语言和非亚洲语言的文本规则，允许在字内换行<br \/>\r\nbreak-all : 　该行为与亚洲语言的normal相同。也允许非亚洲语言文本行的任意字内断开。该值适合包含一些非亚洲文本的亚洲文本<br \/>\r\nkeep-all : 　与所有非亚洲语言的normal相同。对于中文，韩文，日文，不允许字断开。适合包含少量亚洲文本的非亚洲文本与之间的高度解决办法\r\n<\/p>\r\n<p style=\"font-family:微软雅黑, 'Microsoft YaHei', Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;vertical-align:baseline;color:#3F5051;background-color:#FFFFFF;\">\r\n\t<br \/>\r\n<\/p>\r\n<p style=\"font-family:微软雅黑, 'Microsoft YaHei', Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;vertical-align:baseline;color:#3F5051;background-color:#FFFFFF;\">\r\n\t英文不换行\r\n<\/p>\r\n<p style=\"font-family:微软雅黑, 'Microsoft YaHei', Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;vertical-align:baseline;color:#3F5051;background-color:#FFFFFF;\">\r\n\tCSS里加上 word-break: break-all; 问题解决。这个问题只有IE才有，在FF下测试,FF可以自己加滚动条，这样也不影响效果\r\n<\/p>\r\n<p style=\"font-family:微软雅黑, 'Microsoft YaHei', Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;vertical-align:baseline;color:#3F5051;background-color:#FFFFFF;\">\r\n\t建议大家做Skin时，记得在body里加 word-break: break-all; 这样可以解决IE的框架被英文撑开的问题\r\n<\/p>\r\n<p style=\"font-family:微软雅黑, 'Microsoft YaHei', Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;vertical-align:baseline;color:#3F5051;background-color:#FFFFFF;\">\r\n\t以下引用word-break的说明, 注意word-break 是IE5+专有属性\r\n<\/p>\r\n<p style=\"font-family:微软雅黑, 'Microsoft YaHei', Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;vertical-align:baseline;color:#3F5051;background-color:#FFFFFF;\">\r\n\t语法：\r\n<\/p>\r\n<p style=\"font-family:微软雅黑, 'Microsoft YaHei', Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;vertical-align:baseline;color:#3F5051;background-color:#FFFFFF;\">\r\n\tword-break : normal | break-all | keep-all\r\n<\/p>\r\n<p style=\"font-family:微软雅黑, 'Microsoft YaHei', Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;vertical-align:baseline;color:#3F5051;background-color:#FFFFFF;\">\r\n\t参数：\r\n<\/p>\r\n<p style=\"font-family:微软雅黑, 'Microsoft YaHei', Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;vertical-align:baseline;color:#3F5051;background-color:#FFFFFF;\">\r\n\tnormal : 　依照亚洲语言和非亚洲语言的文本规则，允许在字内换行<br \/>\r\nbreak-all : 　该行为与亚洲语言的normal相同。也允许非亚洲语言文本行的任意字内断开。该值适合包含一些非亚洲文本的亚洲文本<br \/>\r\nkeep-all : 　与所有非亚洲语言的normal相同。对于中文，韩文，日文，不允许字断开。适合包含少量亚洲文本的非亚洲文本\r\n<\/p>\r\n<p style=\"font-family:微软雅黑, 'Microsoft YaHei', Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;vertical-align:baseline;color:#3F5051;background-color:#FFFFFF;\">\r\n\t说明：\r\n<\/p>\r\n<p style=\"font-family:微软雅黑, 'Microsoft YaHei', Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;vertical-align:baseline;color:#3F5051;background-color:#FFFFFF;\">\r\n\t设置或检索对象内文本的字内换行行为。尤其在出现多种语言时。<br \/>\r\n对于中文，应该使用break-all 。<br \/>\r\n对应的脚本特性为wordBreak。请参阅我编写的其他书目。\r\n<\/p>\r\n<p style=\"font-family:微软雅黑, 'Microsoft YaHei', Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;vertical-align:baseline;color:#3F5051;background-color:#FFFFFF;\">\r\n\t示例：\r\n<\/p>\r\n<p style=\"font-family:微软雅黑, 'Microsoft YaHei', Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;vertical-align:baseline;color:#3F5051;background-color:#FFFFFF;\">\r\n\tdiv {word-break : break-all; }\r\n<\/p>\r\n<p style=\"font-family:微软雅黑, 'Microsoft YaHei', Arial, Helvetica, 11:07:57","articleTags":"CSS"},"1319001901931":{"articleUpdateDate":"","articleContent":"<span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family:Arial, Helvetica, simsun, u5b8bu4f53;font-size:14px;line-height:25px;\"><div style=\"line-height:25px;\">一:什么是RSS<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;RSS(really simple syndication) :网页内容聚合器。RSS的格式是XML。必须符合XML 1.0规范。<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;RSS的作用：订阅BLOG,订阅新闻<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n二:RSS的历史版本:<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;<a rel=\"nofollow\" href=\"http:\/\/blogs.law.harvard.edu\/tech\/rssVersionHistory\" style=\"line-height:25px;text-decoration:none;color:#189a0f;\">http:\/\/blogs.law.harvard.edu\/tech\/rssVersionHistory<\/a><br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;RSS的版本有很多个，0.90、0.91、0.92、0.93、0.94、1.0 和 2.0。与RSS相对的还有ATOM。<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;国内主要是RSS2.0,国外主要用ATOM0.3.<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;由于RSS出现2派，导致混乱场面。其中RSS2.0规范由哈佛大学定义并锁定。<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;地址:http:\/\/blogs.law.harvard.edu\/tech\/rss<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n三：RSS 文件形式<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; 1:例子：<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;&lt;?xml version=\"1.0\"?&gt;<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;&lt;rss version=\"2.0\"&gt;<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &lt;channel&gt;<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &lt;title&gt;The channel's name goes here&lt;\/title&gt;<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &lt;link&gt;http:\/\/www.urlofthechannel.com\/&lt;\/link&gt;<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &lt;description&gt;This channel is an example channel for an article.<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &lt;\/description&gt;<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &lt;language&gt;en-us&lt;\/language&gt;<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &lt;image&gt;<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &lt;title&gt;The image title goes here&lt;\/title&gt;<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &lt;url&gt;http:\/\/www.urlofthechannel.com\/images\/logo.gif&lt;\/url&gt;<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &lt;link&gt;http:\/\/www.urlofthechannel.com\/&lt;\/link&gt;<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &lt;\/image&gt;<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &lt;item&gt;<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &lt;title&gt;The Future of content&lt;\/title&gt;<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &lt;link&gt;http:\/\/www.itworld.com\/nl\/ecom_in_act\/11122003\/&lt;\/link&gt;<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &lt;description&gt; The issue of people distributing and reusing<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; digital media is a problem for many businesses. It may also be<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; a hidden opportunity. Just as open source licensing has opened<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; up new possibilities in the world of technology, it promises to do<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; the same in the area of creative content.&lt;\/description&gt;<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &lt;\/item&gt;<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &lt;item&gt;<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &lt;title&gt;Online Music Services - Better than free?&lt;\/title&gt;<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &lt;link&gt;http:\/\/www.itworld.com\/nl\/ecom_in_act\/08202003\/&lt;\/link&gt;<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &lt;description&gt;More people than ever are downloading music from&nbsp;<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; the Internet. Many use person-to-person file sharing programs like&nbsp;<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Kazaa to share and download music in MP3 format, paying nothing.&nbsp;<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; This has made it difficult for companies to setup online music&nbsp;<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; businesses. How can companies compete against free?&lt;\/description&gt;<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &lt;\/item&gt;<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp; &lt;\/channel&gt;<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;&lt;\/rss&gt;<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; 2:RSS文件由一个 &lt;channel&gt; 元素及其子元素组成。除了频道内容本身之外，&lt;channel&gt;&nbsp;<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;还以项的形式包含表示频道元数据的元素 \u2014\u2014 比如 &lt;title&gt;、&lt;link&gt; 和 &lt;description&gt;。<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;项通常是频道的主要部分，包含经常变化的内容。<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; 3:频道(channel)用&lt;channel&gt;表示<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;频道一般有三个元素，提供关于频道本身的信息：<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;&lt;title&gt;：频道或提要的名称。&nbsp;<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;&lt;link&gt;：与该频道关联的 Web 站点或者站点区域的 URL。&nbsp;<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;&lt;description&gt;：简要介绍该频道是做什么的。&nbsp;<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;许多频道子元素都是可选的。常用的 &lt;image&gt; 元素包含三个必需的子元素：<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;&lt;url&gt;：表示该频道的 GIF、JPEG 或 PNG 图像的 URL。&nbsp;<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;&lt;title&gt;：图象的描述。当频道以 HTML 呈现时，用作 HTML &lt;image&gt; 标签的 ALT 属性。&nbsp;<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;&lt;link&gt;：站点的 URL。如果频道以 HTML 呈现，该图像作为到这个站点的链接。&nbsp;<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;&lt;image&gt; 还有三个可选的子元素：<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;&lt;width&gt;：数字，表示图象的像素宽度，最大值是 188，默认值为 88。&nbsp;<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;&lt;height&gt;：数字，表示图象的像素高度。最大值是 400，默认值为 31。&nbsp;<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;&lt;description&gt;：包含文本，在呈现时可以作为围绕着该图像形成的链接元素的 title 属性。&nbsp;<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;此外还可以使用许多其他可选的频道元素。多数都是不言自明的：<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;&lt;language&gt;：en-us&nbsp;<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;&lt;copyright&gt;：Copyright 2003, James Lewin&nbsp;<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;&lt;cloud&gt;：允许进程注册为\u201Ccloud\u201D，频道更新时通知它，为 RSS 提要实现了一种轻量级的发布-订阅协议。&nbsp;<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;&lt;ttl&gt;：存活时间 是一个数字，表示提要在刷新之前缓冲的分钟数。&nbsp;<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;&lt;rating&gt;：关于该频道的 PICS 评价。&nbsp;<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;&lt;textInput&gt;：定义可与频道一起显示的输入框。&nbsp;<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;&lt;skipHours&gt;：告诉聚集器哪些小时的更新可以忽略。&nbsp;<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;&lt;skipDays&gt;：告诉聚集器那一天的更新可以忽略。&nbsp;<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; 4:摘要(feed)用&lt;item&gt;表示,&lt;item&gt;的格式如下：<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;每个摘要通常包含三个元素：<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;&lt;title&gt;：这是项的名称，在标准应用中被转换成 HTML 中的标题。&nbsp;<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;&lt;link&gt;：这是该项的 URL。title 通常作为一个链接，指向包含在 &lt;link&gt; 元素中的 URL。&nbsp;<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;&lt;description&gt;：通常作为 link 中所指向的 URL 的摘要或者补充。&nbsp;<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;所有的元素都是可选的，但是一个项至少要么 包含一个 &lt;title&gt;，要么包含一个 &lt;description&gt;。<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;项还有其他一些可选的元素：<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;&lt;author&gt;：作者的 e-mail 地址。&nbsp;<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;&lt;category&gt;：支持有组织的记录。&nbsp;<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;&lt;comments&gt;：关于项的注释页的 URL。&nbsp;<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;&lt;enclosure&gt;：支持和该项有关的媒体对象。&nbsp;<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;&lt;guid&gt;：唯一与该项联系在一起的永久性链接。&nbsp;<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;&lt;pubDate&gt;：该项是什么时候发布的。&nbsp;<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;&lt;source&gt;：该项来自哪个 RSS 频道，当<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n四:主流java rss lib及其评测:<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;主要有一下几种:<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; 1:Rome:&nbsp;<a rel=\"nofollow\" href=\"http:\/\/wiki.java.net\/bin\/view\/Javawsxml\/Rome\" style=\"line-height:25px;text-decoration:none;color:#189a0f;\">http:\/\/wiki.java.net\/bin\/view\/Javawsxml\/Rome<\/a><br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;Rome是 java.net 上的一个开源项目，现在的版本是0.5。为什么叫Rome呢,按它的介绍上的说法，有个\u201C条条大路通罗马\u201D的意思，有些RSS的意味。Rome可能是 sun 公司从自己某个子项目中抽离出来的，package和类的命名就象j2sdk一样感觉规范。功能上支持RSS的所有版本及 Atom 0.3(Atom是和RSS类似的一种内容聚合的方式)。Rome 本身是提供API和功能实现.<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; 2:rssutils:&nbsp;<a rel=\"nofollow\" href=\"http:\/\/gceclub.sun.com.cn\/staticcontent\/html\/2004-04-22\/rss.html\" style=\"line-height:25px;text-decoration:none;color:#189a0f;\">http:\/\/gceclub.sun.com.cn\/staticcontent\/html\/2004-04-22\/rss.html<\/a><br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;rssutils是一个工具包，sun 的 develope站点上有文章 RSS Utilities: A Tutorial 专门介绍用taglib 显示RSS内容，附带的可以下载这个工具包，但我从网上搜索不到它的出处，自然也无法看到它的源码。但从反编译的代码来看，也是sun公司内部高手所做，设计精巧，代码简练。实现一个handler，用sax的方式解析xml内容，handler内部用反射和javabean的机制构造RSS元素对象并赋值。<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; 3rsslib4j:&nbsp;<a rel=\"nofollow\" href=\"http:\/\/sourceforge.net\/projects\/rsslib4j\" style=\"line-height:25px;text-decoration:none;color:#189a0f;\">http:\/\/sourceforge.net\/projects\/rsslib4j<\/a><br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;rsslib4j 是 sourceforget 上的项目，同样支持所有RSS版本。&nbsp;<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; 4:rsslibj:http:\/\/enigmastation.com\/rsslibj\/<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; 5:总结<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;Rome:&nbsp;<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;优 - 1）可扩展性好，有前途。2）功能强大，除了用来解析RSS，还可以聚合和构造RSS。<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;劣 - 1）兼容性待加强，2）绑定jdom。<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;rssutils:&nbsp;<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;优 - 1）代码设计精妙，值得学习。2）附带 taglib 实现，直接可在 jsp 中应用。<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;劣 - 1）没有源码。 2）兼容性有待加强。 3）功能较弱，只能用来解析RSS，没有聚合和构造RSS功能。<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;rsslib4j:<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;优 - 1）简单有效，体积小。2）兼容性不错。<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;劣 - 1）有小bug。2）功能较弱，只能用来解析RSS，没有聚合和构造RSS功能。<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;rsslibj:<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;优 - 1）简单有效，体积小,才25K。2）能解析和生成RSS(动态和静态)<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;劣 - 1）有小bug。2）版本很久没有更新了，陈旧.<\/div>\r\n<div style=\"line-height:25px;\">五:选择ROME作为RSS实现工具<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;在官网<a rel=\"nofollow\" href=\"http:\/\/wiki.java.net\/bin\/view\/Javawsxml\/Rome\" style=\"line-height:25px;text-decoration:none;color:#189a0f;\">http:\/\/wiki.java.net\/bin\/view\/Javawsxml\/Rome<\/a>下载rome-0.8.jar,<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;rome用到了jdom1.0,下载地址:http:\/\/www.jdom.org<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;rome支持:rss_0.9&nbsp;<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp; rss_0.91&nbsp;<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp; rss_0.92&nbsp;<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp; rss_0.93&nbsp;<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp; rss_0.94&nbsp;<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp; rss_1.0&nbsp;<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp; rss_2.0&nbsp;<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp; atom_0.3&nbsp;<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp; atom_1.0&nbsp;<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;生成RSS类新需要在程序中指定，如：rss_2.0<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n六:包结构<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;com.sun.syndication.feed&nbsp;提供RSS and Atom beans的父类<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;com.sun.syndication.feed.atom&nbsp;提供实现Atom feeds核心元素的beans<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;com.sun.syndication.feed.module 提供处理聚合modules的beans<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;com.sun.syndication.feed.rss&nbsp;提供实现Rss feeds核心元素的beans<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;com.sun.syndication.feed.synd&nbsp;我们主要用的就是这个包，SyndFeed and SyndEntryImpl&nbsp;<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;com.sun.syndication.io&nbsp;&nbsp;提供对读取和分析feeds的输入和输出<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n七:实例：<\/div>\r\n<div style=\"line-height:25px;\">1:读取远端url的rss,然后输出到控制台:<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n\/**<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;* 关键代码：<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;* SyndFeedInput input = new SyndFeedInput();<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;* SyndFeed feed = input.build(new XmlReader(feedUrl));<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;*\/<\/div>\r\n<div style=\"line-height:25px;\">package com.sun.syndication.samples;<\/div>\r\n<div style=\"line-height:25px;\">import com.sun.syndication.feed.synd.SyndFeed;<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\nimport com.sun.syndication.io.SyndFeedInput;<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\nimport com.sun.syndication.io.XmlReader;<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\nimport java.net.URL;<\/div>\r\n<div style=\"line-height:25px;\">\/**<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;* It Reads and prints any RSS\/Atom feed type.<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;*\/<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\npublic class FeedReader {<\/div>\r\n<div style=\"line-height:25px;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; public static void main(String[] args) {<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; boolean ok = false;<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; if (args.length==0) {<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; try {<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; URL feedUrl = new URL(\"<a rel=\"nofollow\" href=\"http:\/\/seu.org.cn\/bbs\/rss.php\" style=\"line-height:25px;text-decoration:none;color:#189a0f;\">http:\/\/seu.org.cn\/bbs\/rss.php<\/a>\");<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;\/\/SyndFeedInput:从远程读到xml结构的内容转成SyndFeedImpl实例<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; SyndFeedInput input = new SyndFeedInput();<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;\/\/rome按SyndFeed类型生成rss和atom的实例,<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;\/\/SyndFeed是rss和atom实现类SyndFeedImpl的接口<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; SyndFeed feed = input.build(new XmlReader(feedUrl));<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;\/\/打印到控制台<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; System.out.println(feed);<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; ok = true;<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; }<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; catch (Exception ex) {<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; ex.printStackTrace();<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; System.out.println(\"ERROR: \"+ex.getMessage());<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; }<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; }<\/div>\r\n<div style=\"line-height:25px;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; if (!ok) {<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; System.out.println();<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; System.out.println(\"FeedReader reads and prints any RSS\/Atom feed type.\");<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; System.out.println(\"The first parameter must be the URL of the feed to read.\");<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; System.out.println();<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; }<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; }<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n}<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n2:将多个远程RSS在本地聚集成一个RSS<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\npackage com.sun.syndication.samples;<\/div>\r\n<div style=\"line-height:25px;\">import java.net.URL;<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\nimport java.io.InputStreamReader;<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\nimport java.io.PrintWriter;<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\nimport java.util.List;<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\nimport java.util.ArrayList;<\/div>\r\n<div style=\"line-height:25px;\">import com.sun.syndication.feed.synd.SyndFeed;<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\nimport com.sun.syndication.feed.synd.SyndFeedImpl;<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\nimport com.sun.syndication.io.SyndFeedOutput;<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\nimport com.sun.syndication.io.SyndFeedInput;<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\nimport com.sun.syndication.io.XmlReader;<\/div>\r\n<div style=\"line-height:25px;\">\/**<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;* It aggregates a list of RSS\/Atom feeds (they can be of different types)<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;* into a single feed of the specified type.<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;* &lt;p&gt;<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;* @author Alejandro Abdelnur<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;*<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;*\/<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\npublic class FeedAggregator {<\/div>\r\n<div style=\"line-height:25px;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; public static void main(String[] args) {<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; boolean ok = false;<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; if (args.length&gt;=2) {<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; try {<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; String outputType = args[0];<\/div>\r\n<div style=\"line-height:25px;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; SyndFeed feed = new SyndFeedImpl();<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; feed.setFeedType(outputType);<\/div>\r\n<div style=\"line-height:25px;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; feed.setTitle(\"Aggregated Feed\");<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; feed.setDescription(\"Anonymous Aggregated Feed\");<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; feed.setAuthor(\"anonymous\");<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; feed.setLink(\"<a rel=\"nofollow\" href=\"http:\/\/www.anonymous.com\/\" style=\"line-height:25px;text-decoration:none;color:#189a0f;\">http:\/\/www.anonymous.com<\/a>\");<\/div>\r\n<div style=\"line-height:25px;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; List entries = new ArrayList();<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; feed.setEntries(entries);<\/div>\r\n<div style=\"line-height:25px;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; for (int i=1;i&lt;args.length;i++) {<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; URL inputUrl = new URL(args[i]);<\/div>\r\n<div style=\"line-height:25px;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; SyndFeedInput input = new SyndFeedInput();<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; SyndFeed inFeed = input.build(new XmlReader(inputUrl));<\/div>\r\n<div style=\"line-height:25px;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; entries.addAll(inFeed.getEntries());<\/div>\r\n<div style=\"line-height:25px;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&amp;nbp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; }<\/div>\r\n<div style=\"line-height:25px;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; SyndFeedOutput output = new SyndFeedOutput();<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; output.output(feed,new PrintWriter(System.out));<\/div>\r\n<div style=\"line-height:25px;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; ok = true;<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; }<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; catch (Exception ex) {<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; System.out.println(\"ERROR: \"+ex.getMessage());<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; }<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; }<\/div>\r\n<div style=\"line-height:25px;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; if (!ok) {<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; System.out.println();<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; System.out.println(\"FeedAggregator aggregates different feeds into a single one.\");<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; System.out.println(\"The first parameter must be the feed type for the aggregated feed.\");<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; System.out.println(\" [valid values are: rss_0.9, rss_0.91U, rss_0.91N, rss_0.92, rss_0.93, ]\");<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; System.out.println(\" [&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; rss_0.94, rss_1.0, rss_2.0 &amp; atom_0.3&nbsp; ]\");<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; System.out.println(\"The second to last parameters are the URLs of feeds to aggregate.\");<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; System.out.println();<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; }<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; }<\/div>\r\n<div style=\"line-height:25px;\">}<br private static final String COULD_NOT_GENERATE_FEED_ERROR = \"Could not generate feed\";<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp; private static final String _defaultFeedType=\"rss_2.0\";<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp; private static final String DATE_FORMAT = \"yyyy-MM-dd\";<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp; \/\/controller starts<br websiteManager;&nbsp;\/\/spring依赖注入<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;\/\/spring依赖注入<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp; public void setWeblogEntryManager(WeblogEntryManager weblogEntryManager) {<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;this.weblogEntryManager = weblogEntryManager;<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp; }<br
