\/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;this.websiteManager = websiteManager;<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp; }<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;protected ModelAndView handleRequestInternal(HttpServletRequest request,HttpServletResponse response) throws Exception {<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;try {<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; SyndFeed feed = getFeed(request);<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; String feedType = request.getParameter(FEED_TYPE);\/\/null<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; feedType = (feedType!=null) ? feedType : _defaultFeedType;<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; feed.setFeedType(feedType);\/\/rss_2.0<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; response.setContentType(MIME_TYPE);<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; SyndFeedOutput output = new SyndFeedOutput();<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; output.output(feed,response.getWriter());\/\/向发出请求的用户输出该RSS(xml格式)<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; }<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; catch (FedException ex) {<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; String msg = COULD_NOT_GENERATE_FEED_ERROR;<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; log(msg,ex);<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; response.sendError(HttpServletResponse.SC_INTERNAL_SERVER_ERROR,msg);<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; }<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;return null;<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;}<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;<\/div>\r\n<div style=\"line-height:25px;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; \/**<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; * 请求的类型如下:<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; * siteRss.htm?websiteId=21&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;|ID=66的个人站点最新20条文章<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; * siteRss.htm?websiteId=21&amp;entryType=hot&nbsp;|ID=66的个人站点最热20条文章<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; *<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; * @param request<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; *\/<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; protected SyndFeed getFeed(HttpServletRequest request) throws IOException,FeedException {<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; DateFormat dateParser = new SimpleDateFormat(DATE_FORMAT);<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; \/\/feed就是channel<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; SyndFeed feed = new SyndFeedImpl();<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; \/\/item集合<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; List entries = new ArrayList();<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; \/\/一个entry就是代表一个item<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; SyndEntry entry;<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; SyndContent description;<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; setFeed(request,feed);<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Iterator iterator = setIterator(request);<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;\/\/将文章的20记录转成20个item<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; while(iterator.hasNext()){<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;entry = new SyndEntryImpl();<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;WeblogEntry weblogEntry = (WeblogEntry)iterator.next();<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;entry.setTitle(weblogEntry.getTitle());<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;entry.setLink(feed.getLink()+\"?weblogEntryId=\"+weblogEntry.getId());<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;try {<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;entry.setPublishedDate(dateParser.parse(weblogEntry.getPubTime().toString()));<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;}<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;catch (ParseException ex) {<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;ex.printStackTrace();<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;}<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;\/\/该item的description<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;description = new SyndContentImpl();<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;description.setType(\"text\/plain\");<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;String text=null;<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;if(weblogEntry.getText().length()&gt;500){<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;text = weblogEntry.getText().substring(0, 500);<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;}else{<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;text = weblogEntry.getText();<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;}<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;description.setValue(text);<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;entry.setDescription(description);<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;addFooter(entry);<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;entries.add(entry);<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; }<\/div>\r\n<div style=\"line-height:25px;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; \/\/将所有的item存入channel<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; feed.setEntries(entries);<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; return feed;<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp; }<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;private SyndFeed setFeed(HttpServletRequest request,SyndFeed feed){<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; \/\/blog中的website&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Website website = websiteManager.getWebsite(request.getParameter(\"websiteId\"));<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; 设置当前website的channel属性<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; feed.setTitle(website.getName());<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; feed.setAuthor(website.getCreator());<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; feed.setCopyright(website.getEmailAddress());<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; feed.setLink(\"<a websitegethandle=\"\" rel=\"nofollow\" href=\"http:\/\/wxz.vaga.com.cn:8080\/blog\/weblog\/\" style=\"line-height:25px;text-decoration:none;color:#189a0f;\">http:\/\/wxz.vaga.com.cn:8080\/blog\/weblog\/\"+website.getHandle<\/a>());<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; feed.setDescription(website.getDescription());<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; return feed;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;}<\/div>\r\n<div style=\"line-height:25px;\">&nbsp;\/\/从数据库中获得20条该website的文章<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;private Iterator setIterator(HttpServletRequest request){<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;if(request.getParameter(\"entryType\")==null){<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;return weblogEntryManager.getRecentWeblogEntriesForRss(request.getParameter(\"websiteId\"), null, \"PUBLISHED\", 21).iterator();<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;}else{<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;return weblogEntryManager.getHotWeblogEntriesForRss(request.getParameter(\"websiteId\"), null, 21).iterator();<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;}<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;}<\/div>\r\n<div style=\"line-height:25px;\"><br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; \/**<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; * Add footer to an entry.给每个文章摘要添加页脚<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; * @param entry<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; *\/<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; public static void addFooter(SyndEntry entry)<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; {<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; \/\/ Prep variables used in loops<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; String title = entry.getTitle();<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; String link = entry.getLink();<\/div>\r\n<div style=\"line-height:25px;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; \/\/ Use the add-on ContentModule to handle<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; \/\/ &lt;content:encoded\/&gt; elments within the feed<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; ContentModule module =((ContentModule) entry.getModule(CONTENT_NS));<\/div>\r\n<div style=\"line-height:25px;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; \/\/ If content:encoded is found, use that.<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; if(module!=null)<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; {<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; \/\/ Container for footer-appended HTML strings<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; List newStringList = new ArrayList();<\/div>\r\n<div style=\"line-height:25px;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; \/\/ Iterate through encoded HTML, creating footers<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Iterator oldStringIter =module.getEncodeds().iterator();<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; while (oldStringIter.hasNext())<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; {<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; String original = (String) oldStringIter.next();<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; newStringList.add(createFooter(original,link, title));<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; }<\/div>\r\n<div style=\"line-height:25px;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; \/\/ Set new encoded HTML strings on entry<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; module.setEncodeds(newStringList);<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; }<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; else<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; {<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; \/\/ Fall back to adding footer in &lt;description\/&gt;<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; \/\/ This results in escaped HTML.&nbsp; Ugly, but common.<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;\/\/Target the description node<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;SyndContent content = entry.getDescription();<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; \/\/ Create and set a footer-appended description<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; String original = content.getValue();<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; content.setValue(createFooter(original,link, title));<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; }<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; }<\/div>\r\n<div style=\"line-height:25px;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; \/**<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; * Create a feed item footer of immediate actions<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; * by using information from the feed item itself<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; * @param original&nbsp; The original text of the feed item<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; * @param link&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; The link for the feed item<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; * @param title&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; The title of the feed item<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; * @return<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; *\/<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; private static String createFooter(String original, String link,String title)<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; {&nbsp;<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;\/\/ Use StringBuffer to create a sb<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;StringBuffer sb;<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;if(original==null){<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;sb=new StringBuffer(\"&lt;br \/&gt;\");<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;}else{<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;sb= new StringBuffer(original);<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;}&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; sb.append(\"\\n\\n&lt;div class='feedwarmer'&gt;&lt;hr\/&gt;\");<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; sb.append(\"&lt;i&gt;相关操作:&lt;\/i&gt; \");<\/div>\r\n<div style=\"line-height:25px;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; \/\/ Add email link using title and item link<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; sb.append(\"&lt;a href='mailto:?body=Check this out: \");<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; sb.append(link).append(\"'&gt;推荐该链接&lt;\/a&gt; | \");<\/div>\r\n<div style=\"line-height:25px;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; \/\/ Add delicious link using item title link<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; sb.append(\"&lt;a href='http:\/\/del.icio.us\/post\/?url=\");<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; sb.append(link).append(\"&amp;title=\").append(title);<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; sb.append(\"'&gt;添加到delicious&lt;\/a&gt; | \");<\/div>\r\n<div style=\"line-height:25px;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; \/\/ Add Google Blogs Search link using item title<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; sb.append(\"&lt;a href='http:\/\/blogsearch.google.com\/\");<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; sb.append(\"blogsearch?hl=en&amp;q=\").append(title);<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; sb.append(\"'&gt;搜索相关内容&lt;\/a&gt;\");<\/div>\r\n<div style=\"line-height:25px;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; \/\/ Finish and return the sb<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; sb.append(\"&lt;\/div&gt;\\n\");<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; return sb.toString();<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; }<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n}<\/div>\r\n<\/span><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family:Arial, Helvetica, simsun, \/>\r\n<\/div>\r\n<\/span>","articleTypeId":"1295610713745","articleTitle":"java的RSS处理","articleIsPublished":"0","articleViewCount":"1490","articleAbstract":"一:什么是RSSRSS(reallysimplesyndication):网页内容聚合器。RSS的格式是XML。必须符合XML1.0规范。RSS的作用：订阅BLOG,订阅新闻二:RSS的历史版本:http:\/\/blogs.law.harvard.edu\/tech\/rssVersionHistoryRSS的版本有很多个，0.90、0.91、0.92、0.93、0.94、1.0和2.0。与RSS相对的...","oId":"1319001901931","articleCreateDate":"2011年10月19日 05:25:01","articleTags":"java"},"1328885416494":{"articleUpdateDate":"","articleContent":"<span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family:Arial, Helvetica, simsun, u5b8bu4f53;line-height:25px;font-size:14px;color:#4e4e4e;\"><p style=\"line-height:25px;margin-top:0px;margin-right:0px;margin-bottom:10px;margin-left:0px;padding-top:0px;padding-right:0px;padding-bottom:0px;padding-left:0px;\">&nbsp;\/\/ 在HTML中取&lt;a&gt;到&lt;\/a&gt;&nbsp;<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; \/\/ String regex =&nbsp;<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n\/\/\"(&lt;a\\\\s+([^&gt;h]|h(?!ref\\\\s))*href[\\\\s+]?=[\\\\s+]?('|\\\"))([^(\\\\s+|'|\\\")]*)([^&gt;]*&gt;)(.*?)&lt;\/a&gt;\";&nbsp;<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; \/\/ 在&lt;a&gt;&lt;\/a&gt;中取href&nbsp;<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; \/\/ String&nbsp;<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; \/\/ regex=\"(?&lt;=[\\\\s+]?href[\\\\s+]?=[\\\\s+]?('|\\\")?)[^(\\\"|')&gt;]+?(?=\\\"|')\";&nbsp;<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; \/\/ 在&lt;a&gt;&lt;\/a&gt;中同时取href与名称，使用group(4)与group(1)&nbsp;<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; \/\/ String regex=\"((?&lt;=[\\\\s+]?href[\\\\s+]?=[\\\\s+]?('|\\\")?)[^\\\"|'&gt;]+?(?=\\\"|'))(.+?)?((?&lt;=&gt;)(.+?)?(?=&lt;\/a&gt;))\";&nbsp;<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; \/\/ 在&lt;a&gt;&lt;\/a&gt;中取包含'登录'的链接&nbsp;<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; \/\/String regex = \"((?&lt;=[\\\\s+]?href[\\\\s+]?=[\\\\s+]?('|\\\")?)[^\\\"|'&gt;]+?(?=\\\"|'))(.+?)?((?&lt;=&gt;).*登录.*(?=&lt;\/a&gt;))\";&nbsp;<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; \/\/在html中同时取href与名称，使用group(3)与 group(5)&nbsp;<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; String regex=\"&lt;a\\\\s+([^&gt;h]|h(?!ref\\\\s))*(?&lt;=[\\\\s+]?href[\\\\s+]?=[\\\\s+]?('|\\\")?)([^\\\"|'&gt;]+?(?=\\\"|'))(.+?)?((?&lt;=&gt;)(.+?)?(?=&lt;\/a&gt;))\";&nbsp;<br style=\"line-height:25px;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<\/p>\r\n<p \r\n<\/p>\r\n<p>\r\n\tRaphaël，不仅可以创建图片的倒影，制作图表，还可以画画。\r\n<\/p>\r\n<p>\r\n\t<br \/>\r\n<\/p>\r\n<p>\r\n\tRaphaël is a small JavaScript library that should simplify your work with vector graphics on the web. If you want to create your own specific chart or image crop and rotate widget, for example, you can achieve it simply and easily with this library.\r\n<\/p>\r\n<p>\r\n\tRaphaël ['ræfeɪəl] uses the SVG W3C Recommendation and VML as a base for creating graphics. This means every graphical object you create is also a DOM object, so you can attach JavaScript event handlers or modify them later. Raphaël\u2019s goal is to provide an adapter that will make drawing vector art compatible cross-browser and easy.\r\n<\/p>\r\n<p>\r\n\tRaphaël currently supports Firefox 3.0+, Safari 3.0+, Chrome 5.0+, Opera 9.5+ and Internet Explorer 6.0+.\r\n<\/p>\r\n<p>\r\n\t<br \/>\r\n<\/p>\r\n<p>\r\n\t<span><\/span> \r\n<\/p>\r\n<p>\r\n\t例如：\r\n<\/p>\r\n<pre class=\"prettyprint lang-js\">\/\/ Creates attribute of the circle to red (#f00)\r\ncircle.attr(\"fill\", \"#f00\");\r\n\r\n\/\/ Sets the stroke attribute of the circle to white\r\ncircle.attr(\"stroke\", style=\"color:#000000;font-family:'sans serif', tahoma, verdana, helvetica;line-height:18px;-webkit-border-horizontal-spacing:0px;-webkit-border-vertical-spacing:0px;font-size:12px;\"><a href=\"http:\/\/www.jhost.cn\/a\/tech\/qiyejiyingyong\/2010\/0526\/177.html\">http:\/\/www.jhost.cn\/a\/tech\/qiyejiyingyong\/2010\/0526\/177.html<\/a><\/span><\/div>\r\n<\/span>","articleTypeId":"1295610713745","articleTitle":"Dom4j递归遍历XML所有元素","articleIsPublished":"0","articleViewCount":"3636","articleAbstract":"做一个递归遍历XML的例子，为更为复杂的解析工作做基础。目标：遍历所有的元素节点，并且取出来其中的值，结果打印到控制台。源代码如下：本程序依赖DOM4j包。importorg.dom4j.Document;importorg.dom4j.DocumentHelper;importorg.dom4j.DocumentException;importorg.dom4j.Element;importja...","oId":"1295610976565","articleCreateDate":"2011年01月21日 11:56:16","articleTags":"java dom4j"},"1320388370123":{"articleUpdateDate":"2011年11月05日 08:34:35","articleContent":"<div style=\"text-align:center;text-indent:28px;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"color:#333333;font-family:宋体;font-size:medium;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-size:14px;line-height:28px;\"><b><div class=\"Section0\" style=\"layout-grid:15.6000pt;\"><p class=\"p0\" style=\"text-indent:21.0000pt;margin-bottom:7.5000pt;margin-top:7.5000pt;text-autospace:ideograph-other;line-height:21.0000pt;\"><span style=\"mso-spacerun:'yes';color:#333333;font-weight:bold;font-style:normal;font-size:10.5000pt;font-family:'sans serif';\">方法一：在<span style=\"font-family:'sans serif';\">servlet<\/span><span style=\"font-family:宋体;\">的<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'sans serif';\">init()<\/span><span style=\"font-family:宋体;\">方法中缓存数据<\/span><\/span><span style=\"mso-spacerun:'yes';color:#333333;font-style:normal;font-size:10.5000pt;font-family:'sans serif';\"><o:p><\/o:p><\/span><\/p>\r\n<p class=\"p0\" style=\"text-indent:21.0000pt;margin-bottom:7.5000pt;margin-top:7.5000pt;text-autospace:ideograph-other;line-height:21.0000pt;\"><span style=\"mso-spacerun:'yes';color:#333333;font-style:normal;font-size:10.5000pt;font-family:'sans serif';\">当应用服务器初始化<span style=\"font-family:'sans serif';\">servlet<\/span><span style=\"font-family:宋体;\">实例之后，为客户端请求提供服务之前，他会调用这个<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'sans serif';\">servlet<\/span><span style=\"font-family:宋体;\">的<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'sans serif';\">init()<\/span><span style=\"font-family:宋体;\">方法。在一个<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'sans serif';\">servlet<\/span><span style=\"font-family:宋体;\">的生命周期中，<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'sans serif';\">init()<\/span><span style=\"font-family:宋体;\">方法只会被调用一次。通过在<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'sans serif';\">init()<\/span><span style=\"font-family:宋体;\">方法中缓存一些静态的数据或完成一些只需要执行一次的、耗时的操作，就可大大地提高系统性能。<\/span><\/span><span style=\"mso-spacerun:'yes';color:#333333;font-style:normal;font-size:10.5000pt;font-family:'sans serif';\"><o:p><\/o:p><\/span><\/p>\r\n<p class=\"p0\" style=\"text-indent:21.0000pt;margin-bottom:7.5000pt;margin-top:7.5000pt;text-autospace:ideograph-other;line-height:21.0000pt;\"><span style=\"mso-spacerun:'yes';color:#333333;font-style:normal;font-size:10.5000pt;font-family:'sans serif';\">例如，通过在<span style=\"font-family:'sans serif';\">init()<\/span><span style=\"font-family:宋体;\">方法中建立一个<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'sans serif';\">JDBC<\/span><span style=\"font-family:宋体;\">连接池是个最好例子，假设我们是用<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'sans serif';\">jdbc2.0<\/span><span style=\"font-family:宋体;\">的<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'sans serif';\">DataSource<\/span><span style=\"font-family:宋体;\">接口来取得数据库连接，在通常的情况下，我们需要通过<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'sans serif';\">JNDI<\/span><span style=\"font-family:宋体;\">来取得具体的数据源。我们能够想象在一个具体的应用中，假如每次<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'sans serif';\">SQL<\/span><span style=\"font-family:宋体;\">请求都要执行一次<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'sans serif';\">JNDI<\/span><span style=\"font-family:宋体;\">查询的话，那系统性能将会急剧下降。解决方法是如下代码，他通过缓存<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'sans serif';\">DataSource<\/span><span style=\"font-family:宋体;\">，使得下一次<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'sans serif';\">SQL<\/span><span style=\"font-family:宋体;\">调用时仍然能够继续利用他：<\/span><\/span><span style=\"mso-spacerun:'yes';color:#333333;font-style:normal;font-size:10.5000pt;font-family:'sans serif';\"><o:p><\/o:p><\/span><\/p>\r\n<table align=\"center\" style=\"border-collapse:collapse;mso-table-layout-alt:fixed;padding:0.0000pt 5.4000pt 0.0000pt 5.4000pt;\"><tbody><tr><td width=\"495\" valign=\"center\" style=\"width:371.7500pt;padding:0.0000pt 0.0000pt 0.0000pt 0.0000pt;border-left:0.7500pt inset #000000;mso-border-left-alt:0.7500pt inset #000000;border-right:0.7500pt inset #000000;mso-border-right-alt:0.7500pt inset #000000;border-top:0.7500pt inset #000000;mso-border-top-alt:0.7500pt inset #000000;border-bottom:0.7500pt inset #000000;mso-border-bottom-alt:0.7500pt inset #000000;\"><p class=\"p0\" style=\"margin-bottom:10.5000pt;margin-top:0pt;text-autospace:ideograph-other;line-height:21.0000pt;\"><span style=\"font-family:宋体;\">　<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'Courier New';\">{&nbsp;<\/span><\/span><span style=\"color:#333333;font-style:normal;font-size:9.0000pt;font-family:'Courier New';\"><o:p><\/o:p><\/span><\/p>\r\n<p class=\"p0\" style=\"margin-bottom:10.5000pt;margin-top:0pt;text-autospace:ideograph-other;line-height:21.0000pt;\"><span style=\"margin-bottom:10.5000pt;margin-top:0pt;text-autospace:ideograph-other;line-height:21.0000pt;\"><span style=\"mso-spacerun:'yes';color:#333333;font-style:normal;font-size:9.0000pt;font-family:'Courier New';\">testDS&nbsp;=&nbsp;(javax.sql.DataSource)ctx.lookup(\"jdbc\/testDS\");&nbsp;<\/span><span style=\"color:#333333;font-style:normal;font-size:9.0000pt;font-family:'Courier New';\"><o:p><\/o:p><\/span><\/p>\r\n<p class=\"p0\" style=\"margin-bottom:10.5000pt;margin-top:0pt;text-autospace:ideograph-other;line-height:21.0000pt;\"><span style=\"mso-spacerun:'yes';color:#333333;font-style:normal;font-size:9.0000pt;font-family:'Courier New';\">}catch(NamingException&nbsp;ne){ne.printStackTrace();}&nbsp;<\/span><span style=\"color:#333333;font-style:normal;font-size:9.0000pt;font-family:'Courier New';\"><o:p><\/o:p><\/span><\/p>\r\n<p class=\"p0\" style=\"margin-bottom:10.5000pt;margin-top:0pt;text-autospace:ideograph-other;line-height:21.0000pt;\"><span style=\"mso-spacerun:'yes';color:#333333;font-style:normal;font-size:9.0000pt;font-family:'Courier New';\">}catch(Exception&nbsp;e){e.printStackTrace();}&nbsp;<\/span><span style=\"color:#333333;font-style:normal;font-size:9.0000pt;font-family:'Courier New';\"><o:p><\/o:p><\/span><\/p>\r\n<p class=\"p0\" style=\"margin-bottom:10.5000pt;margin-top:0pt;text-autospace:ideograph-other;line-height:21.0000pt;\"><span style=\"mso-spacerun:'yes';color:#333333;font-style:normal;font-size:9.0000pt;font-family:'Courier New';\">}<span style=\"font-family:宋体;\">　&nbsp;<\/span><\/span><span style=\"color:#333333;font-style:normal;font-size:9.0000pt;font-family:'Courier New';\"><o:p><\/o:p><\/span><\/p>\r\n<p class=\"p0\" style=\"margin-bottom:10.5000pt;margin-top:0pt;text-autospace:ideograph-other;line-height:21.0000pt;\"><span style=\"mso-spacerun:'yes';color:#333333;font-style:normal;font-size:9.0000pt;font-family:'Courier New';\">public&nbsp;javax.sql.DataSource&nbsp;getTestDS(){<span style=\"font-family:宋体;\">　&nbsp;<\/span><\/span><span style=\"color:#333333;font-style:normal;font-size:9.0000pt;font-family:'Courier New';\"><o:p><\/o:p><\/span><\/p>\r\n<p class=\"p0\" style=\"margin-bottom:10.5000pt;margin-top:0pt;text-autospace:ideograph-other;line-height:21.0000pt;\"><span style=\"mso-spacerun:'yes';color:#333333;font-style:normal;font-size:9.0000pt;font-family:'Courier New';\">　<span style=\"font-family:'Courier New';\">return&nbsp;testDS;<\/span><span style=\"font-family:宋体;\">　&nbsp;<\/span><\/span><span style=\"color:#333333;font-style:normal;font-size:9.0000pt;font-family:'Courier New';\"><o:p><\/o:p><\/span><\/p>\r\n<p class=\"p0\" style=\"margin-bottom:10.5000pt;margin-top:0pt;text-autospace:ideograph-other;line-height:21.0000pt;\"><span style=\"mso-spacerun:'yes';color:#333333;font-style:normal;font-size:9.0000pt;font-family:'Courier New';\">}<span style=\"font-family:宋体;\">　&nbsp;<\/span><\/span><span style=\"color:#333333;font-style:normal;font-size:9.0000pt;font-family:'Courier New';\"><o:p><\/o:p><\/span><\/p>\r\n<p class=\"p0\" style=\"margin-bottom:10.5000pt;margin-top:0pt;text-autospace:ideograph-other;line-height:21.0000pt;\"><span style=\"mso-spacerun:'yes';color:#333333;font-style:normal;font-size:9.0000pt;font-family:'Courier New';\">...&nbsp;<\/span><span style=\"color:#333333;font-style:normal;font-size:9.0000pt;font-family:'Courier New';\"><o:p><\/o:p><\/span><\/p>\r\n<p class=\"p0\" style=\"margin-bottom:10.5000pt;margin-top:0pt;text-autospace:ideograph-other;line-height:21.0000pt;\"><span style=\"mso-spacerun:'yes';color:#333333;font-style:normal;font-size:9.0000pt;font-family:'Courier New';\">...&nbsp;&nbsp;<\/span><span style=\"color:#333333;font-style:normal;font-size:9.0000pt;font-family:'Courier New';\"><o:p><\/o:p><\/span><\/p>\r\n<p class=\"p0\" style=\"margin-bottom:10.5000pt;margin-top:0pt;text-autospace:ideograph-other;line-height:21.0000pt;\"><span style=\"color:#333333;font-style:normal;font-size:9.0000pt;font-family:'Courier New';\">}<\/span><span style=\"color:#333333;font-style:normal;font-size:9.0000pt;font-family:'sans serif';\"><o:p><\/o:p><\/span><\/p>\r\n<\/td>\r\n<\/tr>\r\n<\/tbody>\r\n<\/table>\r\n<p class=\"p0\" style=\"text-indent:21.0000pt;margin-bottom:7.5000pt;margin-top:7.5000pt;text-autospace:ideograph-other;line-height:21.0000pt;\"><span style=\"mso-spacerun:'yes';color:#333333;font-weight:bold;font-style:normal;font-size:10.5000pt;font-family:'sans serif';\">方法&nbsp;<span style=\"font-family:'sans serif';\">2:<\/span><span style=\"font-family:宋体;\">禁止<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'sans serif';\">servlet<\/span><span style=\"font-family:宋体;\">和<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'sans serif';\">JSP&nbsp;<\/span><span style=\"font-family:宋体;\">自动重载<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'sans serif';\">(auto-reloading)<\/span><\/span><span style=\"mso-spacerun:'yes';color:#333333;font-style:normal;font-size:10.5000pt;font-family:'sans serif';\"><o:p><\/o:p><\/span><\/p>\r\n<p class=\"p0\" style=\"text-indent:21.0000pt;margin-bottom:7.5000pt;margin-top:7.5000pt;text-autospace:ideograph-other;line-height:21.0000pt;\"><span style=\"mso-spacerun:'yes';color:#333333;font-style:normal;font-size:10.5000pt;font-family:'sans serif';\">Servlet\/JSP<span style=\"font-family:宋体;\">提供了一个实用的技术，即自动重载技术，他为研发人员提供了一个好的研发环境，当您改变<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'sans serif';\">servlet<\/span><span style=\"font-family:宋体;\">和<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'sans serif';\">JSP<\/span><span style=\"font-family:宋体;\">页面后而不必重启应用服务器。然而，这种技术在产品运行阶段对系统的资源是个极大的损耗，因为他会给<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'sans serif';\">JSP<\/span><span style=\"font-family:宋体;\">引擎的类装载器<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'sans serif';\">(classloader)<\/span><span style=\"font-family:宋体;\">带来极大的负担。因此关闭自动重载功能对系统性能的提升是个极大的帮助。<\/span><\/span><span style=\"mso-spacerun:'yes';color:#333333;font-style:normal;font-size:10.5000pt;font-family:'sans serif';\"><o:p><\/o:p><\/span><\/p>\r\n<p class=\"p0\" style=\"text-indent:21.0000pt;margin-bottom:7.5000pt;margin-top:7.5000pt;text-autospace:ideograph-other;line-height:21.0000pt;\"><span style=\"mso-spacerun:'yes';color:#333333;font-weight:bold;font-style:normal;font-size:10.5000pt;font-family:'sans serif';\">方法&nbsp;<span style=\"font-family:'sans serif';\">3:&nbsp;<\/span><span style=\"font-family:宋体;\">不要滥用<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'sans serif';\">HttpSession<\/span><\/span><span style=\"mso-spacerun:'yes';color:#333333;font-style:normal;font-size:10.5000pt;font-family:'sans serif';\"><o:p><\/o:p><\/span><\/p>\r\n<p class=\"p0\" style=\"text-indent:21.0000pt;margin-bottom:7.5000pt;margin-top:7.5000pt;text-autospace:ideograph-other;line-height:21.0000pt;\"><span style=\"mso-spacerun:'yes';color:#333333;font-style:normal;font-size:10.5000pt;font-family:'sans serif';\">在很多应用中，我们的程式需要保持客户端的状态，以便页面之间能够相互联系。但不幸的是由于<span style=\"font-family:'sans serif';\">HTTP<\/span><span style=\"font-family:宋体;\">具备天生无状态性，从而无法保存客户端的状态。因此一般的应用服务器都提供了<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'sans serif';\">session<\/span><span style=\"font-family:宋体;\">来保存客户的状态。在<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'sans serif';\">JSP<\/span><span style=\"font-family:宋体;\">应用服务器中，是通过<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'sans serif';\">HttpSession<\/span><span style=\"font-family:宋体;\">对像来实现<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'sans serif';\">session<\/span><span style=\"font-family:宋体;\">的功能的，但在方便的同时，他也给系统带来了不小的负担。因为每当您获得或更新<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'sans serif';\">session<\/span><span style=\"font-family:宋体;\">时，系统者要对他进行费时的序列化操作。您能够通过对<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'sans serif';\">HttpSession<\/span><span style=\"font-family:宋体;\">的以下几种处理方式来提升系统的性能。<\/span><\/span><span style=\"mso-spacerun:'yes';color:#333333;font-style:normal;font-size:10.5000pt;font-family:'sans serif';\"><o:p><\/o:p><\/span><\/p>\r\n<p class=\"p0\" style=\"text-indent:21.0000pt;margin-bottom:7.5000pt;margin-top:7.5000pt;text-autospace:ideograph-other;line-height:21.0000pt;\"><span style=\"mso-spacerun:'yes';color:#333333;font-style:normal;font-size:10.5000pt;font-family:'sans serif';\">假如没有必要，就应该关闭<span style=\"font-family:'sans serif';\">JSP<\/span><span style=\"font-family:宋体;\">页面中对<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'sans serif';\">HttpSession<\/span><span style=\"font-family:宋体;\">的缺省配置。&nbsp;假如您没有明确指定的话，每个<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'sans serif';\">JSP<\/span><span style=\"font-family:宋体;\">页面都会缺省地创建一个<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'sans serif';\">HttpSession<\/span><span style=\"font-family:宋体;\">。假如您的<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'sans serif';\">JSP<\/span><span style=\"font-family:宋体;\">中无需使用<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'sans serif';\">session<\/span><span style=\"font-family:宋体;\">的话，那能够通过如下的<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'sans serif';\">JSP<\/span><span style=\"font-family:宋体;\">页面指示符来禁止他：<\/span><\/span><span style=\"mso-spacerun:'yes';color:#333333;font-style:normal;font-size:10.5000pt;font-family:'sans serif';\"><o:p><\/o:p><\/span><\/p>\r\n<table align=\"center\" style=\"border-collapse:collapse;mso-table-layout-alt:fixed;padding:0.0000pt 5.4000pt 0.0000pt 5.4000pt;\"><tbody><tr><td width=\"400\" valign=\"center\" style=\"width:300.0000pt;padding:0.0000pt 0.0000pt 0.0000pt 0.0000pt;border-left:0.7500pt inset #000000;mso-border-left-alt:0.7500pt inset #000000;border-right:0.7500pt inset #000000;mso-border-right-alt:0.7500pt inset #000000;border-top:0.7500pt inset #000000;mso-border-top-alt:0.7500pt inset #000000;border-bottom:0.7500pt inset #000000;mso-border-bottom-alt:0.7500pt inset #000000;\"><p class=\"p0\" style=\"margin-bottom:10.5000pt;margin-top:0pt;text-autospace:ideograph-other;line-height:21.0000pt;\"><span style=\"mso-spacerun:'yes';color:#333333;font-style:normal;font-size:9.0000pt;font-family:'Courier New';\">＜<span style=\"font-family:'Courier New';\">%@&nbsp;page&nbsp;session=\"false\"%<\/span><span style=\"font-family:宋体;\">＞<\/span><\/span><span style=\"color:#333333;font-style:normal;font-size:9.0000pt;font-family:'sans serif';\"><o:p><\/o:p><\/span><\/p>\r\n<\/td>\r\n<\/tr>\r\n<\/tbody>\r\n<\/table>\r\n<p class=\"p0\" style=\"text-indent:21.0000pt;margin-bottom:7.5000pt;margin-top:7.5000pt;text-autospace:ideograph-other;line-height:21.0000pt;\"><span style=\"mso-spacerun:'yes';color:#333333;font-style:normal;font-size:10.5000pt;font-family:'sans serif';\">不要在<span style=\"font-family:'sans serif';\">HttpSession<\/span><span style=\"font-family:宋体;\">中存放大的数据对像：假如您在<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'sans serif';\">HttpSession<\/span><span style=\"font-family:宋体;\">中存放大的数据对像的话，每当对他进行读写时，应用服务器都将对其进行序列化，从而增加了系统的额外负担。您在<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'sans serif';\">HttpSession<\/span><span style=\"font-family:宋体;\">中存放的数据对像越大，那系统的性能就下降得越快。<\/span><\/span><span style=\"mso-spacerun:'yes';color:#333333;font-style:normal;font-size:10.5000pt;font-family:'sans serif';\"><o:p><\/o:p><\/span><\/p>\r\n<p class=\"p0\" style=\"text-indent:21.0000pt;margin-bottom:7.5000pt;margin-top:7.5000pt;text-autospace:ideograph-other;line-height:21.0000pt;\"><span style=\"mso-spacerun:'yes';color:#333333;font-style:normal;font-size:10.5000pt;font-family:'sans serif';\">当您无需<span style=\"font-family:'sans serif';\">HttpSession<\/span><span style=\"font-family:宋体;\">时，尽快地释放他：当您不再需要<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'sans serif';\">session<\/span><span style=\"font-family:宋体;\">时，您能够通过调用<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'sans serif';\">HttpSession.invalidate()<\/span><span style=\"font-family:宋体;\">方法来释放他。尽量将<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'sans serif';\">session<\/span><span style=\"font-family:宋体;\">的超时时间设得短一点：在<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'sans serif';\">JSP<\/span><span style=\"font-family:宋体;\">应用服务器中，有一个缺省的<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'sans serif';\">session<\/span><span style=\"font-family:宋体;\">的超时时间。当客户在这个时间之后没有进行任何操作的话，系统会将相关的<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'sans serif';\">session<\/span><span style=\"font-family:宋体;\">自动从内存中释放。超时时间设得越大，系统的性能就会越低，因此最好的方法就是尽量使得他的值保持在一个较低的水平。<\/span><\/span><span style=\"mso-spacerun:'yes';color:#333333;font-style:normal;font-size:10.5000pt;font-family:'sans serif';\"><o:p><\/o:p><\/span><\/p>\r\n<p class=\"p0\" style=\"text-indent:21.0000pt;margin-bottom:7.5000pt;margin-top:7.5000pt;text-autospace:ideograph-other;\"><span style=\"mso-spacerun:'yes';color:#333333;font-weight:bold;font-style:normal;font-size:9.0000pt;font-family:'sans serif';\">方法&nbsp;<span style=\"font-family:'sans serif';\">4:&nbsp;<\/span><span style=\"font-family:宋体;\">将页面输出进行压缩<\/span><\/span><span style=\"mso-spacerun:'yes';color:#333333;font-style:normal;font-size:9.0000pt;font-family:'sans serif';\"><o:p><\/o:p><\/span><\/p>\r\n<p class=\"p0\" style=\"text-indent:21.0000pt;margin-bottom:7.5000pt;margin-top:7.5000pt;text-autospace:ideograph-other;\"><span style=\"mso-spacerun:'yes';color:#333333;font-style:normal;font-size:9.0000pt;font-family:'sans serif';\">压缩是解决数据冗余的一个好的方法，特别是在网络带宽不够发达的今天。有的浏览器支持<span style=\"font-family:'sans serif';\">gzip(GNU&nbsp;zip)<\/span><span style=\"font-family:宋体;\">进行来对<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'sans serif';\">HTML<\/span><span style=\"font-family:宋体;\">文档进行压缩，这种方法能够戏剧性地减少<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'sans serif';\">HTML<\/span><span style=\"font-family:宋体;\">文档的下载时间。因此，假如您将<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'sans serif';\">servlet<\/span><span style=\"font-family:宋体;\">或<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'sans serif';\">JSP<\/span><span style=\"font-family:宋体;\">页面生成的<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'sans serif';\">HTML<\/span><span style=\"font-family:宋体;\">页面进行压缩的话，那用户就会觉得页面浏览速度会很快。但不幸的是，不是任何的浏览器都支持<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'sans serif';\">gzip<\/span><span style=\"font-family:宋体;\">压缩，但您能够通过在您的程式中检查客户的浏览器是否支持他。下面就是关于这种方法实现的一个代码片段：<\/span><\/span><span style=\"mso-spacerun:'yes';color:#333333;font-style:normal;font-size:9.0000pt;font-family:'sans serif';\"><o:p><\/o:p><\/span><\/p>\r\n<table align=\"center\" style=\"border-collapse:collapse;mso-table-layout-alt:fixed;padding:0.0000pt 5.4000pt 0.0000pt 5.4000pt;\"><tbody><tr><td width=\"556\" valign=\"center\" style=\"width:417.3500pt;padding:0.0000pt 0.0000pt 0.0000pt 0.0000pt;border-left:0.7500pt inset #000000;mso-border-left-alt:0.7500pt inset #000000;border-right:0.7500pt inset #000000;mso-border-right-alt:0.7500pt inset #000000;border-top:0.7500pt inset #000000;mso-border-top-alt:0.7500pt inset #000000;border-bottom:0.7500pt inset #000000;mso-border-bottom-alt:0.7500pt inset #000000;background:#e6e6e6;\"><p class=\"p0\" style=\"margin-bottom:10.5000pt;margin-top:0pt;text-autospace:ideograph-other;\"><span style=\"mso-spacerun:'yes';color:#333333;font-style:normal;font-size:9.0000pt;font-family:'Courier New';\">public&nbsp;void&nbsp;doGet(HttpServletRequest&nbsp;request,&nbsp;HttpServletResponse&nbsp;response)&nbsp;<\/span><span style=\"color:#333333;font-style:normal;font-size:9.0000pt;font-family:'Courier New';\"><o:p><\/o:p><\/span><\/p>\r\n<p class=\"p0\" style=\"margin-bottom:10.5000pt;margin-top:0pt;text-autospace:ideograph-other;\"><span style=\"mso-spacerun:'yes';color:#333333;font-style:normal;font-size:9.0000pt;font-family:'Courier New';\">throws&nbsp;IOException,&nbsp;ServletException&nbsp;{&nbsp;<\/span><span style=\"color:#333333;font-style:normal;font-size:9.0000pt;font-family:'Courier New';\"><o:p><\/o:p><\/span><\/p>\r\n<p class=\"p0\" style=\"margin-bottom:10.5000pt;margin-top:0pt;text-autospace:ideograph-other;\"><span style=\"mso-spacerun:'yes';color:#333333;font-style:normal;font-size:9.0000pt;font-family:'Courier New';\">OutputStream&nbsp;out&nbsp;=&nbsp;null;&nbsp;<\/span><span style=\"color:#333333;font-style:normal;font-size:9.0000pt;font-family:'Courier New';\"><o:p><\/o:p><\/span><\/p>\r\n<p class=\"p0\" style=\"margin-bottom:10.5000pt;margin-top:0pt;text-autospace:ideograph-other;\"><span style=\"mso-spacerun:'yes';color:#333333;font-style:normal;font-size:9.0000pt;font-family:'Courier New';\">String&nbsp;encoding&nbsp;=&nbsp;request.getHeader(\"Accept-Encoding\");&nbsp;<span style=\"font-family:宋体;\">　&nbsp;<\/span><\/span><span style=\"color:#333333;font-style:normal;font-size:9.0000pt;font-family:'Courier New';\"><o:p><\/o:p><\/span><\/p>\r\n<p class=\"p0\" style=\"margin-bottom:10.5000pt;margin-top:0pt;text-autospace:ideograph-other;\"><span style=\"mso-spacerun:'yes';color:#333333;font-style:normal;font-size:9.0000pt;font-family:'Courier New';\">if&nbsp;(encoding&nbsp;!=&nbsp;null&nbsp;&amp;&amp;&nbsp;encoding.indexOf(\"gzip\")&nbsp;!=&nbsp;-1){&nbsp;<\/span><span style=\"color:#333333;font-style:normal;font-size:9.0000pt;font-family:'Courier New';\"><o:p><\/o:p><\/span><\/p>\r\n<p class=\"p0\" style=\"margin-bottom:10.5000pt;margin-top:0pt;text-autospace:ideograph-other;\"><span style=\"mso-spacerun:'yes';color:#333333;font-style:normal;font-size:9.0000pt;font-family:'Courier New';\">request.setHeader(\"Content-Encoding\"&nbsp;,&nbsp;\"gzip\");&nbsp;<\/span><span style=\"color:#333333;font-style:normal;font-size:9.0000pt;font-family:'Courier New';\"><o:p><\/o:p><\/span><\/p>\r\n<p class=\"p0\" style=\"margin-bottom:10.5000pt;margin-top:0pt;text-autospace:ideograph-other;\"><span style=\"mso-spacerun:'yes';color:#333333;font-style:normal;font-size:9.0000pt;font-family:'Courier New';\">out&nbsp;=&nbsp;new&nbsp;GZIPOutputStream(request.getOutputStream());&nbsp;<\/span><span style=\"color:#333333;font-style:normal;font-size:9.0000pt;font-family:'Courier New';\"><o:p><\/o:p><\/span><\/p>\r\n<p class=\"p0\" style=\"margin-bottom:10.5000pt;margin-top:0pt;text-autospace:ideograph-other;\"><span style=\"mso-spacerun:'yes';color:#333333;font-style:normal;font-size:9.0000pt;font-family:'Courier New';\">}<span style=\"font-family:宋体;\">　&nbsp;<\/span><\/span><span style=\"color:#333333;font-style:normal;font-size:9.0000pt;font-family:'Courier New';\"><o:p><\/o:p><\/span><\/p>\r\n<p class=\"p0\" style=\"margin-bottom:10.5000pt;margin-top:0pt;text-autospace:ideograph-other;\"><span style=\"mso-spacerun:'yes';color:#333333;font-style:normal;font-size:9.0000pt;font-family:'Courier New';\">else&nbsp;if&nbsp;(encoding&nbsp;!=&nbsp;null&nbsp;&amp;&amp;&nbsp;encoding.indexOf(\"comdivss\")&nbsp;!=&nbsp;-1){&nbsp;<\/span><span style=\"color:#333333;font-style:normal;font-size:9.0000pt;font-family:'Courier New';\"><o:p><\/o:p><\/span><\/p>\r\n<p class=\"p0\" style=\"margin-bottom:10.5000pt;margin-top:0pt;text-autospace:ideograph-other;\"><span style=\"mso-spacerun:'yes';color:#333333;font-style:normal;font-size:9.0000pt;font-family:'Courier New';\">request.setHeader(\"Content-Encoding\"&nbsp;,&nbsp;\"comdivss\");&nbsp;<\/span><span style=\"color:#333333;font-style:normal;font-size:9.0000pt;font-family:'Courier New';\"><o:p><\/o:p><\/span><\/p>\r\n<p class=\"p0\" style=\"margin-bottom:10.5000pt;margin-top:0pt;text-autospace:ideograph-other;\"><span style=\"mso-spacerun:'yes';color:#333333;font-style:normal;font-size:9.0000pt;font-family:'Courier New';\">out&nbsp;=&nbsp;new&nbsp;ZIPOutputStream(request.getOutputStream());&nbsp;<\/span><span style=\"color:#333333;font-style:normal;font-size:9.0000pt;font-family:'Courier New';\"><o:p><\/o:p><\/span><\/p>\r\n<p class=\"p0\" style=\"margin-bottom:10.5000pt;margin-top:0pt;text-autospace:ideograph-other;\"><span style=\"mso-spacerun:'yes';color:#333333;font-style:normal;font-size:9.0000pt;font-family:'Courier New';\">}else{&nbsp;<\/span><span style=\"color:#333333;font-style:normal;font-size:9.0000pt;font-family:'Courier New';\"><o:p><\/o:p><\/span><\/p>\r\n<p class=\"p0\" style=\"margin-bottom:10.5000pt;margin-top:0pt;text-autospace:ideograph-other;\"><span style=\"mso-spacerun:'yes';color:#333333;font-style:normal;font-size:9.0000pt;font-family:'Courier New';\">out&nbsp;=&nbsp;request.getOutputStream();&nbsp;<\/span><span style=\"color:#333333;font-style:normal;font-size:9.0000pt;font-family:'Courier New';\"><o:p><\/o:p><\/span><\/p>\r\n<p class=\"p0\" style=\"margin-bottom:10.5000pt;margin-top:0pt;text-autospace:ideograph-other;\"><span style=\"mso-spacerun:'yes';color:#333333;font-style:normal;font-size:9.0000pt;font-family:'Courier New';\">}<span style=\"font-family:宋体;\">　&nbsp;<\/span><\/span><span style=\"color:#333333;font-style:normal;font-size:9.0000pt;font-family:'Courier New';\"><o:p><\/o:p><\/span><\/p>\r\n<p class=\"p0\" style=\"margin-bottom:10.5000pt;margin-top:0pt;text-autospace:ideograph-other;\"><span style=\"mso-spacerun:'yes';color:#333333;font-style:normal;font-size:9.0000pt;font-family:'Courier New';\">...<span style=\"font-family:宋体;\">　&nbsp;<\/span><\/span><span style=\"color:#333333;font-style:normal;font-size:9.0000pt;font-family:'Courier New';\"><o:p><\/o:p><\/span><\/p>\r\n<p class=\"p0\" style=\"margin-bottom:10.5000pt;margin-top:0pt;text-autospace:ideograph-other;\"><span style=\"mso-spacerun:'yes';color:#333333;font-style:normal;font-size:9.0000pt;font-family:'Courier New';\">...&nbsp;&nbsp;<\/span><span style=\"color:#333333;font-style:normal;font-size:9.0000pt;font-family:'Courier New';\"><o:p><\/o:p><\/span><\/p>\r\n<p class=\"p0\" style=\"margin-bottom:10.5000pt;margin-top:0pt;text-autospace:ideograph-other;\"><span style=\"color:#333333;font-style:normal;font-size:9.0000pt;font-family:'Courier New';\">}<\/span><span style=\"color:#333333;font-style:normal;font-size:9.0000pt;font-family:'sans serif';background:#e6e6e6;mso-shading:#e6e6e6;\"><o:p><\/o:p><\/span><\/p>\r\n<\/td>\r\n<\/tr>\r\n<\/tbody>\r\n<\/table>\r\n<p class=\"p0\" style=\"text-indent:21.0000pt;margin-bottom:7.5000pt;margin-top:7.5000pt;text-autospace:ideograph-other;\"><span style=\"mso-spacerun:'yes';color:#333333;font-weight:bold;font-style:normal;font-size:9.0000pt;font-family:'sans serif';\">方法&nbsp;<span style=\"font-family:'sans serif';\">5:&nbsp;<\/span><span style=\"font-family:宋体;\">使用线程池<\/span><\/span><span style=\"mso-spacerun:'yes';color:#333333;font-style:normal;font-size:9.0000pt;font-family:'sans serif';\"><o:p><\/o:p><\/span><\/p>\r\n<p class=\"p0\" style=\"text-indent:21.0000pt;margin-bottom:7.5000pt;margin-top:7.5000pt;text-autospace:ideograph-other;\"><span style=\"mso-spacerun:'yes';color:#333333;font-style:normal;font-size:9.0000pt;font-family:'sans serif';\"><br \/>\r\n<\/span><span style=\"mso-spacerun:'yes';color:#333333;font-style:normal;font-size:9.0000pt;font-family:'sans serif';\">应用服务器缺省地为每个不同的客户端请求创建一个线程进行处理，并为他们分派<span style=\"font-family:'sans serif';\">service()<\/span><span style=\"font-family:宋体;\">方法，当<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'sans serif';\">service()<\/span><span style=\"font-family:宋体;\">方法调用完成后，和之相应的线程也随之撤消。由于创建和撤消线程会耗费一定的系统资源，这种缺省模式降低了系统的性能。但所幸的是我们能够通过创建一个线程池来改变这种状况。<\/span><\/span><span style=\"mso-spacerun:'yes';color:#333333;font-style:normal;font-size:9.0000pt;font-family:'sans serif';\"><o:p><\/o:p><\/span><\/p>\r\n<p class=\"p0\" style=\"text-indent:21.0000pt;margin-bottom:7.5000pt;margin-top:7.5000pt;text-autospace:ideograph-other;\"><span style=\"mso-spacerun:'yes';color:#333333;font-style:normal;font-size:9.0000pt;font-family:'sans serif';\">另外，我们还要为这个线程池配置一个最小线程数和一个最大线程数。在应用服务器启动时，他会创建数量等于最小线程数的一个线程池，当客户有请求时，相应地从池从取出一个线程来进行处理，当处理完成后，再将线程重新放入到池中。假如池中的线程不够地话，系统会自动地增加池中线程的数量，但总量不能超过最大线程数。通过使用线程池，当客户端请求急剧增加时，系统的负载就会呈现的平滑的上升曲线，从而提高的系统的可伸缩性。<\/span><span style=\"mso-spacerun:'yes';color:#333333;font-style:normal;font-size:9.0000pt;font-family:'sans serif';\"><o:p><\/o:p><\/span><\/p>\r\n<p class=\"p0\" style=\"text-indent:21.0000pt;margin-bottom:7.5000pt;margin-top:7.5000pt;text-autospace:ideograph-other;\"><span style=\"mso-spacerun:'yes';color:#333333;font-weight:bold;font-style:normal;font-size:9.0000pt;font-family:'sans serif';\">方法&nbsp;<span style=\"font-family:'sans serif';\">6:&nbsp;<\/span><span style=\"font-family:宋体;\">选择正确的页面包含机制<\/span><\/span><span style=\"mso-spacerun:'yes';color:#333333;font-style:normal;font-size:9.0000pt;font-family:'sans serif';\"><o:p><\/o:p><\/span><\/p>\r\n<p class=\"p0\" style=\"text-indent:21.0000pt;margin-bottom:7.5000pt;margin-top:7.5000pt;text-autospace:ideograph-other;\"><span style=\"mso-spacerun:'yes';color:#333333;font-style:normal;font-size:9.0000pt;font-family:'sans serif';\">在<span style=\"font-family:'sans serif';\">JSP<\/span><span style=\"font-family:宋体;\">中有两种方法能够用来包含另一个页面：<\/span><\/span><span style=\"mso-spacerun:'yes';color:#333333;font-style:normal;font-size:9.0000pt;font-family:'sans serif';\"><o:p><\/o:p><\/span><\/p>\r\n<p class=\"p0\" style=\"text-indent:21.0000pt;margin-bottom:7.5000pt;margin-top:7.5000pt;text-autospace:ideograph-other;\"><span style=\"mso-spacerun:'yes';color:#333333;font-style:normal;font-size:9.0000pt;font-family:'sans serif';\">1<span style=\"font-family:宋体;\">、使用<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'sans serif';\">include<\/span><span style=\"font-family:宋体;\">指示符<\/span><\/span><span style=\"mso-spacerun:'yes';color:#333333;font-style:normal;font-size:9.0000pt;font-family:'sans serif';\"><o:p><\/o:p><\/span><\/p>\r\n<table align=\"center\" style=\"border-collapse:collapse;mso-table-layout-alt:fixed;padding:0.0000pt 5.4000pt 0.0000pt 5.4000pt;\"><tbody><tr><td width=\"400\" valign=\"center\" style=\"width:300.0000pt;padding:0.0000pt 0.0000pt 0.0000pt 0.0000pt;border-left:0.7500pt inset #000000;mso-border-left-alt:0.7500pt inset #000000;border-right:0.7500pt inset #000000;mso-border-right-alt:0.7500pt inset #000000;border-top:0.7500pt inset #000000;mso-border-top-alt:0.7500pt inset #000000;border-bottom:0.7500pt inset #000000;mso-border-bottom-alt:0.7500pt inset #000000;background:#e6e6e6;\"><p class=\"p0\" style=\"margin-bottom:10.5000pt;margin-top:0pt;text-autospace:ideograph-other;\"><span style=\"mso-spacerun:'yes';color:#333333;font-style:normal;font-size:9.0000pt;font-family:'Courier New';\">＜<span style=\"font-family:'Courier New';\">%@&nbsp;includee&nbsp;file=<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';\">\u201D<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'Courier New';\">test.jsp<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';\">\u201D&nbsp;<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'Courier New';\">%<\/span><span style=\"font-family:宋体;\">＞<\/span><\/span><span style=\"color:#333333;font-style:normal;font-size:9.0000pt;font-family:'sans serif';background:#e6e6e6;mso-shading:#e6e6e6;\"><o:p><\/o:p><\/span><\/p>\r\n<\/td>\r\n<\/tr>\r\n<\/tbody>\r\n<\/table>\r\n<p class=\"p0\" style=\"text-indent:21.0000pt;margin-bottom:7.5000pt;margin-top:7.5000pt;text-autospace:ideograph-other;\"><span style=\"mso-spacerun:'yes';color:#333333;font-style:normal;font-size:9.0000pt;font-family:'sans serif';\">2<span style=\"font-family:宋体;\">、使用<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'sans serif';\">jsp<\/span><span style=\"font-family:宋体;\">指示符<\/span><\/span><span style=\"mso-spacerun:'yes';color:#333333;font-style:normal;font-size:9.0000pt;font-family:'sans serif';\"><o:p><\/o:p><\/span><\/p>\r\n<table align=\"center\" style=\"border-collapse:collapse;mso-table-layout-alt:fixed;padding:0.0000pt 5.4000pt 0.0000pt 5.4000pt;\"><tbody><tr><td width=\"400\" valign=\"center\" style=\"width:300.0000pt;padding:0.0000pt 0.0000pt 0.0000pt 0.0000pt;border-left:0.7500pt inset #000000;mso-border-left-alt:0.7500pt inset #000000;border-right:0.7500pt inset #000000;mso-border-right-alt:0.7500pt inset #000000;border-top:0.7500pt inset #000000;mso-border-top-alt:0.7500pt inset #000000;border-bottom:0.7500pt inset #000000;mso-border-bottom-alt:0.7500pt inset #000000;background:#e6e6e6;\"><p class=\"p0\" style=\"margin-bottom:10.5000pt;margin-top:0pt;text-autospace:ideograph-other;\"><span style=\"mso-spacerun:'yes';color:#333333;font-style:normal;font-size:9.0000pt;font-family:'Courier New';\">＜<span style=\"font-family:'Courier New';\">jsp:includee&nbsp;page=<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';\">\u201D<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'Courier New';\">test.jsp<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';\">\u201D&nbsp;<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'Courier New';\">flush=<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';\">\u201D<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'Courier New';\">true<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';\">\u201D<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'Courier New';\">\/<\/span><span style=\"font-family:宋体;\">＞<\/span><\/span><span style=\"color:#333333;font-style:normal;font-size:9.0000pt;font-family:'sans serif';background:#e6e6e6;mso-shading:#e6e6e6;\"><o:p><\/o:p><\/span><\/p>\r\n<\/td>\r\n<\/tr>\r\n<\/tbody>\r\n<\/table>\r\n<p class=\"p0\" style=\"text-indent:21.0000pt;margin-bottom:7.5000pt;margin-top:7.5000pt;text-autospace:ideograph-other;\"><span style=\"mso-spacerun:'yes';color:#333333;font-style:normal;font-size:9.0000pt;font-family:'sans serif';\">在实际中发现，假如使用第一种方法的话，能够使得系统性能更高。<\/span><span style=\"mso-spacerun:'yes';color:#333333;font-style:normal;font-size:9.0000pt;font-family:'sans serif';\"><o:p><\/o:p><\/span><\/p>\r\n<p class=\"p0\" style=\"text-indent:21.0000pt;margin-bottom:7.5000pt;margin-top:7.5000pt;text-autospace:ideograph-other;\"><span style=\"mso-spacerun:'yes';color:#333333;font-weight:bold;font-style:normal;font-size:9.0000pt;font-family:'sans serif';\">方法&nbsp;<span style=\"font-family:'sans serif';\">7:<\/span><span style=\"font-family:宋体;\">正确地确定<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'sans serif';\">javabean<\/span><span style=\"font-family:宋体;\">的生命周期<\/span><\/span><span style=\"mso-spacerun:'yes';color:#333333;font-style:normal;font-size:9.0000pt;font-family:'sans serif';\"><o:p><\/o:p><\/span><\/p>\r\n<p class=\"p0\" style=\"text-indent:21.0000pt;margin-bottom:7.5000pt;margin-top:7.5000pt;text-autospace:ideograph-other;\"><span style=\"mso-spacerun:'yes';color:#333333;font-style:normal;font-size:9.0000pt;font-family:'sans serif';\">JSP<span style=\"font-family:宋体;\">的一个强大的地方就是对<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'sans serif';\">javabean<\/span><span style=\"font-family:宋体;\">的支持。通过在<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'sans serif';\">JSP<\/span><span style=\"font-family:宋体;\">页面中使用<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'sans serif';\">jsp:useBean<\/span><span style=\"font-family:宋体;\">标签，能够将<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'sans serif';\">javabean<\/span><span style=\"font-family:宋体;\">直接插入到一个<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'sans serif';\">JSP<\/span><span style=\"font-family:宋体;\">页面中。他的使用方法如下：<\/span><\/span><span style=\"mso-spacerun:'yes';color:#333333;font-style:normal;font-size:9.0000pt;font-family:'sans serif';\"><o:p><\/o:p><\/span><\/p>\r\n<table align=\"center\" style=\"border-collapse:collapse;mso-table-layout-alt:fixed;padding:0.0000pt 5.4000pt 0.0000pt 5.4000pt;\"><tbody><tr><td width=\"483\" valign=\"center\" style=\"width:362.4500pt;padding:0.0000pt 0.0000pt 0.0000pt 0.0000pt;border-left:0.7500pt inset #000000;mso-border-left-alt:0.7500pt inset #000000;border-right:0.7500pt inset #000000;mso-border-right-alt:0.7500pt inset #000000;border-top:0.7500pt inset #000000;mso-border-top-alt:0.7500pt inset #000000;border-bottom:0.7500pt inset #000000;mso-border-bottom-alt:0.7500pt inset #000000;background:#e6e6e6;\"><p class=\"p0\" style=\"margin-bottom:10.5000pt;margin-top:0pt;text-autospace:ideograph-other;\"><span style=\"mso-spacerun:'yes';color:#333333;font-style:normal;font-size:9.0000pt;font-family:'Courier New';\">＜<span style=\"font-family:'Courier New';\">jsp:useBean&nbsp;id=\"name\"&nbsp;scope=\"page|request|session|application\"&nbsp;&nbsp;<\/span><\/span><span style=\"color:#333333;font-style:normal;font-size:9.0000pt;font-family:'Courier New';\"><o:p><\/o:p><\/span><\/p>\r\n<p class=\"p0\" style=\"margin-bottom:10.5000pt;margin-top:0pt;text-autospace:ideograph-other;\"><span style=\"mso-spacerun:'yes';color:#333333;font-style:normal;font-size:9.0000pt;font-family:'Courier New';\">class=\"package.className\"&nbsp;type=\"typeName\"<span style=\"font-family:宋体;\">＞&nbsp;<\/span><\/span><span style=\"color:#333333;font-style:normal;font-size:9.0000pt;font-family:'Courier New';\"><o:p><\/o:p><\/span><\/p>\r\n<p class=\"p0\" style=\"margin-bottom:10.5000pt;margin-top:0pt;text-autospace:ideograph-other;\"><span style=\"mso-spacerun:'yes';color:#333333;font-style:normal;font-size:9.0000pt;font-family:'Courier New';\">＜<span style=\"font-family:'Courier New';\">\/jsp:useBean<\/span><span style=\"font-family:宋体;\">＞<\/span><\/span><span style=\"color:#333333;font-style:normal;font-size:9.0000pt;font-family:'sans serif';background:#e6e6e6;mso-shading:#e6e6e6;\"><o:p><\/o:p><\/span><\/p>\r\n<\/td>\r\n<\/tr>\r\n<\/tbody>\r\n<\/table>\r\n<p class=\"p0\" style=\"text-indent:21.0000pt;margin-bottom:7.5000pt;margin-top:7.5000pt;text-autospace:ideograph-other;\"><span style=\"mso-spacerun:'yes';color:#333333;font-style:normal;font-size:9.0000pt;font-family:'sans serif';\">其中<span style=\"font-family:'sans serif';\">scope<\/span><span style=\"font-family:宋体;\">属性指出了这个<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'sans serif';\">bean<\/span><span style=\"font-family:宋体;\">的生命周期。缺省的生命周期为<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'sans serif';\">page<\/span><span style=\"font-family:宋体;\">。假如您没有正确地选择<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'sans serif';\">bean<\/span><span style=\"font-family:宋体;\">的生命周期的话，他将影响系统的性能。<\/span><\/span><span style=\"mso-spacerun:'yes';color:#333333;font-style:normal;font-size:9.0000pt;font-family:'sans serif';\"><o:p><\/o:p><\/span><\/p>\r\n<p class=\"p0\" style=\"text-indent:21.0000pt;margin-bottom:7.5000pt;margin-top:7.5000pt;text-autospace:ideograph-other;\"><span style=\"mso-spacerun:'yes';color:#333333;font-style:normal;font-size:9.0000pt;font-family:'sans serif';\">举例来说，假如您只想在一次请求中使用某个<span style=\"font-family:'sans serif';\">bean<\/span><span style=\"font-family:宋体;\">，但您却将这个<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'sans serif';\">bean<\/span><span style=\"font-family:宋体;\">的生命周期配置成了<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'sans serif';\">session<\/span><span style=\"font-family:宋体;\">，那当这次请求结束后，这个<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'sans serif';\">bean<\/span><span style=\"font-family:宋体;\">将仍然保留在内存中，除非<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'sans serif';\">session<\/span><span style=\"font-family:宋体;\">超时或用户关闭浏览器。这样会耗费一定的内存，并无谓的增加了<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'sans serif';\">JVM<\/span><span style=\"font-family:宋体;\">垃圾收集器的工作量。因此为<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'sans serif';\">bean<\/span><span style=\"font-family:宋体;\">配置正确的生命周期，并在<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'sans serif';\">bean<\/span><span style=\"font-family:宋体;\">的使命结束后尽快地清理他们，会使用系统性能有一个提高。<\/span><\/span><span style=\"mso-spacerun:'yes';color:#333333;font-style:normal;font-size:9.0000pt;font-family:'sans serif';\"><o:p><\/o:p><\/span><\/p>\r\n<p class=\"p0\" style=\"text-indent:21.0000pt;margin-bottom:7.5000pt;margin-top:7.5000pt;text-autospace:ideograph-other;\"><span style=\"mso-spacerun:'yes';color:#333333;font-weight:bold;font-style:normal;font-size:9.0000pt;font-family:'sans serif';\">其他一些有用的方法<\/span><span style=\"mso-spacerun:'yes';color:#333333;font-style:normal;font-size:9.0000pt;font-family:'sans serif';\"><o:p><\/o:p><\/span><\/p>\r\n<p class=\"p0\" style=\"text-indent:21.0000pt;margin-bottom:7.5000pt;margin-top:7.5000pt;text-autospace:ideograph-other;\"><span style=\"mso-spacerun:'yes';color:#333333;font-style:normal;font-size:9.0000pt;font-family:'sans serif';\">1<span style=\"font-family:宋体;\">、在字符串连接操作中尽量不使用<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';\">\u201C<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'sans serif';\">+<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';\">\u201D<\/span><span style=\"font-family:宋体;\">操作符：在<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'sans serif';\">java<\/span><span style=\"font-family:宋体;\">编程中，我们常常使用<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';\">\u201C<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'sans serif';\">+<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';\">\u201D<\/span><span style=\"font-family:宋体;\">操作符来将几个字符串连接起来，但您或许从来没有想到过他居然会对系统性能造成影响吧<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'sans serif';\">?<\/span><span style=\"font-family:宋体;\">由于字符串是常量，因此<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'sans serif';\">JVM<\/span><span style=\"font-family:宋体;\">会产生一些临时的对像。您使用的<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';\">\u201C<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'sans serif';\">+<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';\">\u201D<\/span><span style=\"font-family:宋体;\">越多，生成的临时对像就越多，这样也会给系统性能带来一些影响。解决的方法是用<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'sans serif';\">StringBuffer<\/span><span style=\"font-family:宋体;\">对像来代替<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';\">\u201C<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'sans serif';\">+<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';\">\u201D<\/span><span style=\"font-family:宋体;\">操作符。<\/span><\/span><span style=\"mso-spacerun:'yes';color:#333333;font-style:normal;font-size:9.0000pt;font-family:'sans serif';\"><o:p><\/o:p><\/span><\/p>\r\n<p class=\"p0\" style=\"text-indent:21.0000pt;margin-bottom:7.5000pt;margin-top:7.5000pt;text-autospace:ideograph-other;\"><span style=\"mso-spacerun:'yes';color:#333333;font-style:normal;font-size:9.0000pt;font-family:'sans serif';\">2<span style=\"font-family:宋体;\">、避免使用<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'sans serif';\">System.out.println()<\/span><span style=\"font-family:宋体;\">方法：由于<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'sans serif';\">System.out.println()<\/span><span style=\"font-family:宋体;\">是一种同步调用，即在调用他时，磁盘<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'sans serif';\">I\/O<\/span><span style=\"font-family:宋体;\">操作必须等待他的完成，因此我们要尽量避免对他的调用。但我们在调试程式时他又是个必不可少的方便工具，为了解决这个矛盾，我建议您最好使用<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'sans serif';\">Log4j<\/span><span style=\"font-family:宋体;\">工具<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'sans serif';\">(<\/span><\/span><span><a href=\"http:\/\/jakarta.apache.org\/\"><span style=\"mso-spacerun:'yes';color:#0000ff;text-decoration:underline;font-style:normal;font-size:9.0000pt;font-family:'sans serif';\">http:\/\/Jakarta.apache.org<\/span><\/a><\/span><span style=\"mso-spacerun:'yes';color:#333333;font-style:normal;font-size:9.0000pt;font-family:'sans serif';\">&nbsp;)<span style=\"font-family:宋体;\">，他既能够方便调试，而不会产生<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'sans serif';\">System.out.println()<\/span><span style=\"font-family:宋体;\">这样的方法。<\/span><\/span><span style=\"mso-spacerun:'yes';color:#333333;font-style:normal;font-size:9.0000pt;font-family:'sans serif';\"><o:p><\/o:p><\/span><\/p>\r\n<p class=\"p0\" style=\"text-indent:21.0000pt;margin-bottom:7.5000pt;margin-top:7.5000pt;text-autospace:ideograph-other;\"><span style=\"mso-spacerun:'yes';color:#333333;font-style:normal;font-size:9.0000pt;font-family:'sans serif';\">3<span style=\"font-family:宋体;\">、<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'sans serif';\">ServletOutputStream&nbsp;<\/span><span style=\"font-family:宋体;\">和&nbsp;<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'sans serif';\">PrintWriter<\/span><span style=\"font-family:宋体;\">的权衡：使用<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'sans serif';\">PrintWriter<\/span><span style=\"font-family:宋体;\">可能会带来一些小的开销，因为他将任何的原始输出都转换为字符流来输出，因此假如使用他来作为页面输出的话，系统要负担一个转换过程。而使用<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'sans serif';\">ServletOutputStream<\/span><span style=\"font-family:宋体;\">作为页面输出的话就不存在一个问题，但他是以二进制进行输出的。因此在实际应用中要权衡两者的利弊。<\/span><\/span><span style=\"mso-spacerun:'yes';color:#333333;font-style:normal;font-size:9.0000pt;font-family:'sans serif';\"><o:p><\/o:p><\/span><\/p>\r\n<p class=\"p0\" style=\"text-indent:21.0000pt;margin-bottom:7.5000pt;margin-top:7.5000pt;text-autospace:ideograph-other;\"><span style=\"mso-spacerun:'yes';color:#333333;font-weight:bold;font-style:normal;font-size:9.0000pt;font-family:'sans serif';\">总结<\/span><span style=\"mso-spacerun:'yes';color:#333333;font-style:normal;font-size:9.0000pt;font-family:'sans serif';\"><o:p><\/o:p><\/span><\/p>\r\n<p class=\"p0\" style=\"text-indent:21.0000pt;margin-bottom:7.5000pt;margin-top:7.5000pt;text-autospace:ideograph-other;\"><span style=\"mso-spacerun:'yes';color:#333333;font-style:normal;font-size:9.0000pt;font-family:'sans serif';\">本文的目的是通过对<span style=\"font-family:'sans serif';\">servlet<\/span><span style=\"font-family:宋体;\">和<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'sans serif';\">JSP<\/span><span style=\"font-family:宋体;\">的一些调优技术来极大地提高您的应用程式的性能，并因此提升整个<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'sans serif';\">J2EE<\/span><span style=\"font-family:宋体;\">应用的性能。通过这些调优技术，您能够发现其实并不是某种技术平台<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'sans serif';\">(<\/span><span style=\"font-family:宋体;\">比如<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'sans serif';\">J2EE<\/span><span style=\"font-family:宋体;\">和<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'sans serif';\">.NET<\/span><span style=\"font-family:宋体;\">之争<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'sans serif';\">)<\/span><span style=\"font-family:宋体;\">决定了您的应用程式的性能，重要是您要对这种平台有一个较为深入的了解，这样您才能从根本上对自己的应用程式做一个优化。<\/span><\/span><span style=\"mso-spacerun:'yes';color:#333333;font-style:normal;font-size:9.0000pt;font-family:'sans serif';\"><o:p><\/o:p><\/span><\/p>\r\n<p class=\"p0\" style=\"margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;\"><span style=\"mso-spacerun:'yes';font-size:10.5000pt;font-family:'Times New Roman';\"><o:p><\/o:p><\/span><\/p>\r\n<\/div>\r\n<\/b><\/span><\/span><\/div>\r\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"color:#333333;font-family:宋体;font-size:14px;line-height:28px;background-color:#f8f8f8;\"> helvetica;\"><\/span><\/pre>\r\n<p>\r\n\t<br \/>\r\n<\/p>\r\n<pre>平台介绍：\r\n水质检测管理平台，核心功能主要分为三部分：权限管理、水质报告管理、库存管理、趋势图管理。\r\n平台致力于提升公司整体的管理水平和工作效率。平台全面替代手工录入和生成水质检测报告的方式，用户可在平台上完成报告的生成、填写和导出工作，大大节约用户时间，提升工作效率。平台全面替代手工登记的出入库信息的工作方式，用户可在平台上管理物品的出入库，并导出物品出入库清单，大大提升工作效率和数据的准确性。\r\n\r\n平台特点：\r\n1、平台采用B\/S架构，完美支持多用户操作，提升用户体验。\r\n2、平台采用全新界面设计，用户易用性得到全面提升。\r\n3、平台采用J2EE企业级成熟架构，稳定性和健壮性非常好。\r\n4、平台支持Windows、Linux服务端部署。\r\n5、平台全面引入页面无刷新技术。\r\n\r\n功能描述：\r\n1.角色管理\t         管理平台角色，支持新增、删除、修改、查看。\r\n2.操作员管理       管理平台操作员，支持操作员的新增、删除、修改、查看、修改密码、分配角色、分配登陆策略。\r\n3.密码策略配置    管理平台的密码策略，密码过期、密码规则、密码有效期等。\r\n4.操作员解锁       提供管理员释放被锁操作员。\r\n5.个人密码修改    支持操作员个人密码修改。\r\n6.系统日志\t        提供管理员查询平台的登陆、登出日志、平台操作日志。\r\n7.维护检测项目    提供操作员增加、删除、修改、查看检测项目。\r\n8.维护水样类型      提供操作员增加、删除、修改、查看水样类型，水样类型绑定检测项目。\r\n9.维护操作员检测项目\t维护操作员填写的检测项目。\r\n10.维护受检单位\t提供增加、删除、修改、查看维护受检单位功能\r\n11.新建水样报告\t提供向导，新建一个或多个水样报告。\r\n12.维护水样报告\t修改、删除、查看水样报告\r\n13.填写检测结果\t提供操作员填写自己负责的检测项目。\r\n14.趋势图导出配置\t用于配置趋势图需要导出的数据\r\n15.趋势图导出\t根据配置导出检测结果趋势图\r\n16.药品耗材管理\t管理药品耗材的入库，出库，以及入库和出库的维护。\r\n17.标准物质管理\t管理标准物质的入库，出库，以及入库和出库的维护。\r\n18.剧毒物质管理\t管理剧毒物质的入库，出库，以及入库和出库的维护。<\/pre>\r\n<pre><\/pre>\r\n<pre style=\"color:#60d978;\">站点统计==》文章总数需要排除不显示的<\/span><\/li>\r\n<li><span style=\"color:#60d978;\">登录后台有问题，无法注销<\/span><\/li>\r\n<li><span style=\"color:#60d978;\">文章详细页面，无法显示下一条数据，可以显示上一条<\/span><\/li>\r\n<li>左边添加一个申请友情链接<\/li>\r\n<li><span style=\"color:#60d978;\">博文分类<\/span><\/li>\r\n<li><span style=\"color:#60d978;\">后台页面添加一个照片墙<\/span><a href=\"http:\/\/jpuzi.com\/index.asp\"><span style=\"color:#60d978;\">http:\/\/jpuzi.com\/index.asp<\/span><\/a><\/li>\r\n<li>左侧显示博客分类（并能点击，实现模糊查询）<\/li>\r\n<\/ol>\r\n<p><\/p>","articleTypeId":"1291207692656","articleTitle":"博客新增功能","articleIsPublished":"1","articleViewCount":"682","articleAbstract":"站点统计==》文章总数需要排除不显示的登录后台有问题，无法注销文章详细页面，无法显示下一条数据，可以显示上一条左边添加一个申请友情链接博文分类后台页面添加一个照片墙http:\/\/jpuzi.com\/index.asp左侧显示博客分类（并能点击，实现模糊查询）...","oId":"1290386865314","articleCreateDate":"2010年11月22日 00:47:45","articleTags":"功能"},"1326437547807":{"articleUpdateDate":"","articleContent":"<div class=\"entrybody\" style=\"font-family:'Hiragino Sans GB', 'Microsoft YaHei', Simsun, Mingliu, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;font-size:14px;line-height:21px;\"><p>学CSS布局的同学应该多少知道CSS Sprites（图片合并）技术，简单的说就是利用CSS的background-position属性，控制显示一张大图片的显示区域。例子可以看这里《&nbsp;<a href=\"http:\/\/www.alistapart.com\/articles\/sprites\/\" style=\"color:#3990e7;-webkit-transition-property:color;-webkit-transition-duration:0.25s;-webkit-transition-timing-function:linear;-webkit-transition-delay:initial;text-decoration:none;\"><span class=\"caps\">CSS<\/span>&nbsp;Sprites: Image Slicing\u2019s Kiss of Death<\/a>》。<\/p>\r\n<p>对于经常使用CSS Sprites的同学，不知道是否有跟我一样的烦恼，在写定位的时候，先在<acronym title=\"Photoshop\">PS<\/acronym>里量出大概的位置，然后再在FF里用<a href=\"http:\/\/getfirebug.com\/\" style=\"color:#3990e7;-webkit-transition-property:color;-webkit-transition-duration:0.25s;-webkit-transition-timing-function:linear;-webkit-transition-delay:initial;text-decoration:none;\">Firebug<\/a>&nbsp;进行微调，以达到实际需要的效果。<\/p>\r\n<p>效率方面的问题比较严重，虽然在做合并图的时候大概的位置都已经心里有数，不过在写样式的时候也不太可能每次都能记得住正确的位置，特别是像我这种没啥记性的人，总免不了开着PS，时不时的量一下。更让我烦恼的是，原本性能就不高的电脑，开着个PS后运行起来就更慢了（至少一半内存被PS占用），而这时的PS只是用来量位置，真是有点大才小用了。<\/p>\r\n<p>很巧在网上逛的时候看到了&nbsp;<a href=\"http:\/\/www.cnblogs.com\/yukaizhao\" style=\"color:#3990e7;-webkit-transition-property:color;-webkit-transition-duration:0.25s;-webkit-transition-timing-function:linear;-webkit-transition-delay:initial;text-decoration:none;\">赵玉开<\/a>&nbsp;写的一个&nbsp;<a href=\"http:\/\/www.cnblogs.com\/yukaizhao\/archive\/2008\/12\/15\/css_background_image_merge_tool.html\" style=\"color:#3990e7;-webkit-transition-property:color;-webkit-transition-duration:0.25s;-webkit-transition-timing-function:linear;-webkit-transition-delay:initial;text-decoration:none;\">Css背景图合并工具<\/a>&nbsp;，这个工具可以把许多的小图片合并成一张大图并生成样式，蛮不错的想法，只是并不真正实用。为什么这么说呢？因为一般情况下我们不会先切出小图再合并，这不符合工作习惯，我们大多数是在PS里直接保存合并后的图片，因为还有一个图片质量的问题。<\/p>\r\n<p>受此启发，我写了下面这个工具&nbsp;<a href=\"http:\/\/www.cssforest.org\/blog\/index.php?s=file_download&amp;id=6\" style=\"color:#3990e7;-webkit-transition-property:color;-webkit-transition-duration:0.25s;-webkit-transition-timing-function:linear;-webkit-transition-delay:initial;text-decoration:none;\">bg2css_1.4.1.air<\/a><\/p>\r\n<p><img src=\"http:\/\/img.skitch.com\/20090321-p64mq4ki4uk2ebjd1hy8u13m8m.jpg\" alt=\"CSS Sprites 68375F0F751F62105DE55177 v1.4.1\" style=\"border-top-width:0px;border-right-width:0px;border-bottom-width:0px;border-left-width:0px;border-top-style:none;border-right-style:none;border-bottom-style:none;border-left-style:none;border-color:initial;border-image:initial;max-width:80%;\" \/><\/p>\r\n<p>目前版本是1.4.1，基本上已经可以正常使用，主要是想减少使用CSS Sprites技术时测量坐标及填写background-position定位这部分重复而枯燥的时间，提高工作效率。<\/p>\r\n<p>程序名称：CSS Sprites 样式生成工具(bg2css)<br \/>\r\n版本信息：<br \/>\r\nv1.4.1 2009-3-21<br \/>\r\n=====================<br \/>\r\n+双击添加层<br \/>\r\n+拖动层、修改层大小<br \/>\r\n+显示层相关信息<br \/>\r\n+编辑层信息、删除层<br \/>\r\n+生成样式<br \/>\r\n+保存样式文件到桌面<br \/>\r\n+在线更新<br \/>\r\n+输出样式时可选是否输出宽高<br \/>\r\n+重置层<br \/>\r\n+层位置和大小微调<br \/>\r\n+修正了已知的一些bug<\/p>\r\n<p><ins datetime=\"2009-3-23\">需要AIR环境，可到&nbsp;<a href=\"http:\/\/get.adobe.com\/cn\/air\" style=\"color:#3990e7;-webkit-transition-property:color;-webkit-transition-duration:0.25s;-webkit-transition-timing-function:linear;-webkit-transition-delay:initial;text-decoration:none;\">Adobe站点<\/a>&nbsp;下载安装。<\/ins><\/p>\r\n<p>还有很多的想法没在这个版本中实现，后续再做更新，如果使用中有什么意见或建议，欢迎与我联系，我尽可能的改善这个工具。<\/p>\r\n<p><strong style=\"color:#ff0000;\">如何获取最新版本：下载安装1.4.1版本后点击\u201C检查更新\u201D即可。<\/strong><\/p>\r\n<p>版本更新信息：<\/p>\r\n<p><ins datetime=\"2009-3-25\">bg2css v1.5.0 2009-3-25<br \/>\r\n+图片放大预览<br target=\"_blank\"
