true;\r\n\t}\r\n}<\/pre>\r\n<p>\r\n\t<br \/>\r\n<\/p>\r\n<p>\r\n\t然后在其他controller或者Component中调用这个类\r\n<\/p>\r\n<p>\r\n\tpublic $components = array (<br \/>\r\n\"FFmpeg\"&nbsp;<br \/>\r\n);\r\n<\/p>\r\n<p>\r\n\t$movieinfo = $this-&gt;FFmpeg-&gt;getMoveInfo ( $fileFullPath, $file_url );<br \/>\r\n获取到视频\/音频的播放时长，或者视频的第一帧截图.\r\n<\/p>\r\n<p>\r\n\t<br \/>\r\n<\/p>\r\n<p>\r\n\t<br \/>\r\n<\/p>","articleTypeId":"1318325201554","articleTitle":"cakephp 使用FFmpeg","articleIsPublished":"0","articleViewCount":"287","articleAbstract":"利用ffmpeg和ffmpeg-php，获取视频的截图和播放时长，或者音频的播放时长，并把代码整合到cakephpzhongffmpegFFmpeg是一个开源免费跨平台的视频和音频流方案，属于自由软件，采用LGPL或GPL许可证（依据你选择的组件）。它提供了录制、转换以及流化音视频的完整解决方案。它包含了非常先进的音频\/视频编解码库libavcodec，为了保证高可移植性和编解码质量，libavc...","oId":"1380006771978","articleCreateDate":"2013年09月24日 15:12:51","articleTags":"cakephp FFmpeg"},"1356591438758":{"articleUpdateDate":"2012年12月27日 14:57:35","articleContent":"<p>\r\n\t<span style=\"font-size:14px;\">php的serialize\/unserialize，方便把一个数组序列化和反序列化，但是要和java交互，就比较麻烦了。<\/span> \r\n<\/p>\r\n<p>\r\n\t<span><\/span> \r\n<\/p>\r\n<p>\r\n\t<span style=\"font-size:14px;\">java的serialize，序列化之后，会把java.util....包名都放进去了，而且格式也不同于php，<\/span> \r\n<\/p>\r\n<p>\r\n\t<br \/>\r\n<\/p>\r\n<p style=\"color:#333333;font-family:Verdana, Tahoma, sans-serif;font-size:14px;background-color:#FFFFFF;\">\r\n\t<span style=\"font-size:14px;\">这个版本目前实现了对各种基本类型、数组、ArrayList、HashMap、和其它可序列化对象的序列化。实现了 PHP 5 中的 Serializable 接口的支持。实现了 PHP 中的 __sleep 和 __wakeup 魔术方法的支持。实现了对所有标示（N、b、i、d、s、a、O、R、r、U、C）的反序列化，在对标示 a 反序列化时，可以根据下标和值来自动判断是 ArrayList 还是 HashMap。并且在反序列化时可以强制指定反序列化的类型。<\/span> \r\n<\/p>\r\n<p style=\"color:#333333;font-family:Verdana, Tahoma, sans-serif;font-size:14px;background-color:#FFFFFF;\">\r\n\t<span style=\"font-size:14px;\">该类是静态类，无需也不能被实例化。除了包含了 serialize 和 unserialize 方法以外，还增加了一个 cast 方法，用来进行反序列化后的类型转换，该方法主要用于将反序列化后的 ArrayList 转化为数组或者 HashMap。<\/span> \r\n<\/p>\r\n<p style=\"color:#333333;font-family:Verdana, Tahoma, sans-serif;font-size:14px;background-color:#FFFFFF;\">\r\n\t<span style=\"font-size:14px;\">该类在 J2SE SDK 1.3.1 和更高版本上编译通过，更低版本的未做测试。<\/span> \r\n<\/p>\r\n<p>\r\n\t<br \/>\r\n<\/p>\r\n<p>\r\n\t<strong>这是测试代码<\/strong> \r\n<\/p>\r\n<pre class=\"prettyprint lang-java\">package org.phprpc.util;\r\n\r\nimport java.util.HashMap;\r\nimport java.util.Map;\r\n\r\npublic class Test {\r\n\tpublic static void main(String[] args) {\r\n\t\tMap<string, string=\"\"> map= new HashMap<string, string=\"\">();\r\n\t\tmap.put(\"title\", \"这是标题1\");\r\n\t\tmap.put(\"title2\", \"这是标题2\");\r\n\t\tmap.put(\"title3\", \"这是标题3\");\r\n\t\tmap.put(\"title4\", \"这是标题4\");\r\n\t\tbyte[] b =PHPSerializer.serialize(map);\r\n\t\tSystem.out.println(new String(b));\r\n\t\t\r\n\t\tString str=\"a:4:{s:8:\\\"fileName\\\";s:53:\\\"api_app\/upload_Images\/201211\/22\/1353546060_3801_1.png\\\";s:8:\\\"pic_size\\\";i:155997;s:5:\\\"width\\\";i:480;s:6:\\\"height\\\";i:240;}\";\r\n\t\ttry {\r\n\t\t\tMap<string, object=\"\"> map2 =(Map<string, object=\"\">)PHPSerializer.unserialize(str.getBytes());\r\n\t\t\tfor (String s : map2.keySet()) {\r\n\t\t\t\tSystem.out.println(\"key:\"+s+\" \\t value:\"+map2.get(s));\r\n\t\t\t}\r\n\t\t} catch (IllegalAccessException e) {\r\n\t\t\t\/\/ TODO Auto-generated catch block\r\n\t\t\te.printStackTrace();\r\n\t\t}\r\n\t}\r\n}\r\n<\/string,><\/string,><\/string,><\/string,><\/pre>\r\n<p>\r\n\t说明一下，PHPSerializer.unserialize会根据序列化的实际内容，转换数据类型，所以上面的数据中有数字的，就被转换了。所以用Object比较保险。<span><\/span> \r\n<\/p>\r\n<p>\r\n\t<br \/>\r\n<\/p>\r\n<p>\r\n\t下面是coolcode的处理类\r\n<\/p>\r\n<p>\r\n\t<strong>Serializable.java<\/strong> \r\n<\/p>\r\n<p>\r\n\t<br \/>\r\n<\/p>\r\n<pre class=\"prettyprint lang-java\">package org.phprpc.util;\r\n\/* Serializable.java\r\n*\r\n* Author:       Ma Bingyao <andot@ujn.edu.cn>\r\n* Copyright:    CoolCode.CN\r\n* Version:      2.1\r\n* LastModified: 2006-08-09\r\n* This library is free.  You can redistribute it and\/or modify it.\r\n* http:\/\/www.coolcode.cn\/?p=202\r\n* http:\/\/www.coolcode.org\/?action=show&amp;id=202\r\n*\/\r\ninterface Serializable {\r\n    byte[] serialize();\r\n    void unserialize(byte[] ss);\r\n}<\/andot@ujn.edu.cn><\/pre>\r\n<p>\r\n\t<br \/>\r\n<\/p>\r\n<p>\r\n\t<span><br \/>\r\n<\/span> \r\n<\/p>\r\n<p>\r\n\t<span><strong>PHPSeri<\/strong><\/span><span><strong>alizer.java<\/strong><\/span> \r\n<\/p>\r\n<p>\r\n\t<span> <\/span> \r\n<\/p>\r\n<pre class=\"prettyprint lang-java\">\/* PHPSerializer.java\r\n*\r\n* Author:       Ma Bingyao <andot@ujn.edu.cn>\r\n* Copyright:    CoolCode.CN\r\n* Version:      2.1\r\n* LastModified: 2006-08-09\r\n* This library is free.  You can redistribute it and\/or modify it.\r\n* http:\/\/www.coolcode.cn\/?p=202\r\n* http:\/\/www.coolcode.org\/?action=show&amp;id=202\r\n*\/\r\npackage org.phprpc.util;\r\n \r\n \r\nimport java.io.*;\r\nimport java.util.*;\r\nimport java.lang.reflect.*;\r\n \r\n \r\nclass UnSerializeResult {\r\n    public Object value;\r\n    public int hv;\r\n    public UnSerializeResult() {}\r\n \r\n    public UnSerializeResult(Object value, int hv) {\r\n        this.value = value;\r\n        this.hv = hv;\r\n    }\r\n}\r\n \r\n \r\npublic class PHPSerializer {\r\n    private static Package[] __packages = Package.getPackages();\r\n    private static final byte __Quote = 34;\r\n    private static final byte __0 = 48;\r\n    private static final byte __1 = 49;\r\n    private static final byte __Colon = 58;\r\n    private static final byte __Semicolon = 59;\r\n    private static final byte __C = 67;\r\n    private static final byte __N = 78;\r\n    private static final byte __O = 79;\r\n    private static final byte __R = 82;\r\n    private static final byte __U = 85;\r\n    private static final byte __Slash = 92;\r\n    private static final byte __a = 97;\r\n    private static final byte __b = 98;\r\n    private static final byte __d = 100;\r\n    private static final byte __i = 105;\r\n    private static final byte __r = 114;\r\n    private static final byte __s = 115;\r\n    private static final byte __LeftB = 123;\r\n    private static final byte __RightB = 125;\r\n    private static final String __NAN = new String(\"NAN\");\r\n    private static final String __INF = new String(\"INF\");\r\n    private static final String __NINF = new String(\"-INF\");\r\n    private PHPSerializer() {}\r\n \r\n    public static byte[] serialize(Object obj) {\r\n        return serialize(obj, \"UTF-8\");\r\n    }\r\n \r\n    public static byte[] serialize(Object obj, String charset) {\r\n        HashMap ht = new HashMap();\r\n        int hv = 1;\r\n        ByteArrayOutputStream stream = new ByteArrayOutputStream();\r\n \r\n        hv = serialize(stream, obj, ht, hv, charset);\r\n        byte[] result = stream.toByteArray();\r\n \r\n        try {\r\n            stream.close();\r\n        } catch (Exception e) {}\r\n        return result;\r\n    }\r\n \r\n    public static int serialize(ByteArrayOutputStream stream, Object obj, HashMap ht, int hv, String charset) {\r\n        if (obj == null) {\r\n            hv++;\r\n            writeNull(stream);\r\n        } else {\r\n            if (obj instanceof Boolean) {\r\n                hv++;\r\n                writeBoolean(stream, ((Boolean) obj).booleanValue() ? __1 : __0);\r\n            } else if ((obj instanceof Byte) || (obj instanceof Short)\r\n                    || (obj instanceof Integer)) {\r\n                hv++;\r\n                writeInteger(stream, getBytes(obj));\r\n            } else if (obj instanceof Long) {\r\n                hv++;\r\n                writeDouble(stream, getBytes(obj));\r\n            } else if (obj instanceof Float) {\r\n                hv++;\r\n                Float f = (Float) obj;\r\n \r\n                if (f.isNaN()) {\r\n                    writeDouble(stream, getBytes(__NAN));\r\n                } else if (f.isInfinite()) {\r\n                    if (f.floatValue() &gt; 0) {\r\n                        writeDouble(stream, getBytes(__INF));\r\n                    } else {\r\n                        writeDouble(stream, getBytes(__NINF));\r\n                    }\r\n                } else {\r\n                    writeDouble(stream, getBytes(f));\r\n                }\r\n            } else if (obj instanceof Double) {\r\n                hv++;\r\n                Double d = (Double) obj;\r\n \r\n                if (d.isNaN()) {\r\n                    writeDouble(stream, getBytes(__NAN));\r\n                } else if (d.isInfinite()) {\r\n                    if (d.doubleValue() &gt; 0) {\r\n                        writeDouble(stream, getBytes(__INF));\r\n                    } else {\r\n                        writeDouble(stream, getBytes(__NINF));\r\n                    }\r\n                } else {\r\n                    writeDouble(stream, getBytes(d));\r\n                }\r\n            } else if ((obj instanceof Character) || (obj instanceof String)) {\r\n                hv++;\r\n                writeString(stream, getBytes(obj, charset));\r\n            } else if (obj.getClass().isArray()) {\r\n                if (ht.containsKey(new Integer(obj.hashCode()))) {\r\n                    writePointRef(stream, getBytes(ht.get(new Integer(obj.hashCode()))));\r\n                } else {\r\n                    ht.put(new Integer(obj.hashCode()), new Integer(hv++));\r\n                    hv = writeArray(stream, obj, ht, hv, charset);\r\n                }\r\n            } else if (obj instanceof ArrayList) {\r\n                if (ht.containsKey(new Integer(obj.hashCode()))) {\r\n                    writePointRef(stream, getBytes(ht.get(new Integer(obj.hashCode()))));\r\n                } else {\r\n                    ht.put(new Integer(obj.hashCode()), new Integer(hv++));\r\n                    hv = writeArrayList(stream, (ArrayList) obj, ht, hv, charset);\r\n                }\r\n            } else if (obj instanceof HashMap) {\r\n                if (ht.containsKey(new Integer(obj.hashCode()))) {\r\n                    writePointRef(stream, getBytes(ht.get(new Integer(obj.hashCode()))));\r\n                } else {\r\n                    ht.put(new Integer(obj.hashCode()), new Integer(hv++));\r\n                    hv = writeHashMap(stream, (HashMap) obj, ht, hv, charset);\r\n                }\r\n            } else {\r\n                if (ht.containsKey(new Integer(obj.hashCode()))) {\r\n                    hv++;\r\n                    writeRef(stream, getBytes(ht.get(new Integer(obj.hashCode()))));\r\n                } else {\r\n                    ht.put(new Integer(obj.hashCode()), new Integer(hv++));\r\n                    hv = writeObject(stream, obj, ht, hv, charset);\r\n                }\r\n            }\r\n        }\r\n        return hv;\r\n    }\r\n \r\n    private static void writeNull(ByteArrayOutputStream stream) {\r\n        stream.write(__N);\r\n        stream.write(__Semicolon);\r\n    }\r\n \r\n    private static void writeRef(ByteArrayOutputStream stream, byte[] r) {\r\n        stream.write(__r);\r\n        stream.write(__Colon);\r\n        stream.write(r, 0, r.length);\r\n        stream.write(__Semicolon);\r\n    }\r\n \r\n    private static void writePointRef(ByteArrayOutputStream stream, byte[] p) {\r\n        stream.write(__R);\r\n        stream.write(__Colon);\r\n        stream.write(p, 0, p.length);\r\n        stream.write(__Semicolon);\r\n    }\r\n \r\n    private static void writeBoolean(ByteArrayOutputStream stream, byte b) {\r\n        stream.write(__b);\r\n        stream.write(__Colon);\r\n        stream.write(b);\r\n        stream.write(__Semicolon);\r\n    }\r\n \r\n    private static void writeInteger(ByteArrayOutputStream stream, byte[] i) {\r\n        stream.write(__i);\r\n        stream.write(__Colon);\r\n        stream.write(i, 0, i.length);\r\n        stream.write(__Semicolon);\r\n    }\r\n \r\n    private static void writeDouble(ByteArrayOutputStream stream, byte[] d) {\r\n        stream.write(__d);\r\n        stream.write(__Colon);\r\n        stream.write(d, 0, d.length);\r\n        stream.write(__Semicolon);\r\n    }\r\n \r\n    private static void writeString(ByteArrayOutputStream stream, byte[] s) {\r\n        byte[] slen = getBytes(new Integer(s.length));\r\n \r\n        stream.write(__s);\r\n        stream.write(__Colon);\r\n        stream.write(slen, 0, slen.length);\r\n        stream.write(__Colon);\r\n        stream.write(__Quote);\r\n        stream.write(s, 0, s.length);\r\n        stream.write(__Quote);\r\n        stream.write(__Semicolon);\r\n    }\r\n \r\n    private static int writeArray(ByteArrayOutputStream stream, Object a, HashMap ht, int hv, String charset) {\r\n        int len = Array.getLength(a);\r\n        byte[] alen = getBytes(new Integer(len));\r\n \r\n        stream.write(__a);\r\n        stream.write(__Colon);\r\n        stream.write(alen, 0, alen.length);\r\n        stream.write(__Colon);\r\n        stream.write(__LeftB);\r\n        for (int i = 0; i &lt; len; i++) {\r\n            writeInteger(stream, getBytes(new Integer(i)));\r\n            hv = serialize(stream, Array.get(a, i), ht, hv, charset);\r\n        }\r\n        stream.write(__RightB);\r\n        return hv;\r\n    }\r\n \r\n    private static int writeArrayList(ByteArrayOutputStream stream, ArrayList a, HashMap ht, int hv, String charset) {\r\n        int len = a.size();\r\n        byte[] alen = getBytes(new Integer(len));\r\n \r\n        stream.write(__a);\r\n        stream.write(__Colon);\r\n        stream.write(alen, 0, alen.length);\r\n        stream.write(__Colon);\r\n        stream.write(__LeftB);\r\n        for (int i = 0; i &lt; len; i++) {\r\n            writeInteger(stream, getBytes(new Integer(i)));\r\n            hv = serialize(stream, a.get(i), ht, hv, charset);\r\n        }\r\n        stream.write(__RightB);\r\n        return hv;\r\n    }\r\n \r\n    private static int writeHashMap(ByteArrayOutputStream stream, HashMap h, HashMap ht, int hv, String charset) {\r\n        int len = h.size();\r\n        byte[] hlen = getBytes(new Integer(len));\r\n \r\n        stream.write(__a);\r\n        stream.write(__Colon);\r\n        stream.write(hlen, 0, hlen.length);\r\n        stream.write(__Colon);\r\n        stream.write(__LeftB);\r\n        for (Iterator keys = h.keySet().iterator(); keys.hasNext();) {\r\n            Object key = keys.next();\r\n \r\n            if ((key instanceof Byte) || (key instanceof Short)\r\n                    || (key instanceof Integer)) {\r\n                writeInteger(stream, getBytes(key));\r\n            } else if (key instanceof Boolean) {\r\n                writeInteger(stream, new byte[] { ((Boolean) key).booleanValue() ? __1 : __0 });\r\n            } else {\r\n                writeString(stream, getBytes(key, charset));\r\n            }\r\n            hv = serialize(stream, h.get(key), ht, hv, charset);\r\n        }\r\n        stream.write(__RightB);\r\n        return hv;\r\n    }\r\n \r\n    private static int writeObject(ByteArrayOutputStream stream, Object obj, HashMap ht, int hv, String charset) {\r\n        Class cls = obj.getClass();\r\n \r\n        if (obj instanceof java.io.Serializable) {\r\n            byte[] className = getBytes(getClassName(cls), charset);\r\n            byte[] classNameLen = getBytes(new Integer(className.length));\r\n \r\n            if (obj instanceof org.phprpc.util.Serializable) {\r\n                byte[] cs = ((org.phprpc.util.Serializable) obj).serialize();\r\n                byte[] cslen = getBytes(new Integer(cs.length));\r\n \r\n                stream.write(__C);\r\n                stream.write(__Colon);\r\n                stream.write(classNameLen, 0, classNameLen.length);\r\n                stream.write(__Colon);\r\n                stream.write(__Quote);\r\n                stream.write(className, 0, className.length);\r\n                stream.write(__Quote);\r\n                stream.write(__Colon);\r\n                stream.write(cslen, 0, cslen.length);\r\n                stream.write(__Colon);\r\n                stream.write(__LeftB);\r\n                stream.write(cs, 0, cs.length);\r\n                stream.write(__RightB);\r\n            } else {\r\n                Method __sleep;\r\n \r\n                try {\r\n                    __sleep = cls.getMethod(\"__sleep\", new Class[0]);\r\n                } catch (Exception e) {\r\n                    __sleep = null;\r\n                }\r\n                int fl = 0;\r\n                Field[] f;\r\n \r\n                if (__sleep != null) {\r\n                    String[] fieldNames;\r\n \r\n                    try {\r\n                        __sleep.setAccessible(true);\r\n                        fieldNames = (String[]) __sleep.invoke(obj, new Object[0]);\r\n                    } catch (Exception e) {\r\n                        fieldNames = null;\r\n                    }\r\n                    f = getFields(obj, fieldNames);\r\n                } else {\r\n                    f = getFields(obj);\r\n                }\r\n                AccessibleObject.setAccessible(f, true);\r\n                byte[] flen = getBytes(new Integer(f.length));\r\n \r\n                stream.write(__O);\r\n                stream.write(__Colon);\r\n                stream.write(classNameLen, 0, classNameLen.length);\r\n                stream.write(__Colon);\r\n                stream.write(__Quote);\r\n                stream.write(className, 0, className.length);\r\n                stream.write(__Quote);\r\n                stream.write(__Colon);\r\n                stream.write(flen, 0, flen.length);\r\n                stream.write(__Colon);\r\n                stream.write(__LeftB);\r\n                for (int i = 0, len = f.length; i &lt; len; i++) {\r\n                    int mod = f[i].getModifiers();\r\n \r\n                    if (Modifier.isPublic(mod)) {\r\n                        writeString(stream, getBytes(f[i].getName(), charset));\r\n                    } else if (Modifier.isProtected(mod)) {\r\n                        writeString(stream,\r\n                                getBytes(\"\\0*\\0\" + f[i].getName(), charset));\r\n                    } else {\r\n                        writeString(stream,\r\n                                getBytes(\r\n                                \"\\0\" + getClassName(f[i].getDeclaringClass())\r\n                                + \"\\0\" + f[i].getName(),\r\n                                charset));\r\n                    }\r\n                    Object o;\r\n \r\n                    try {\r\n                        o = f[i].get(obj);\r\n                    } catch (Exception e) {\r\n                        o = null;\r\n                    }\r\n                    hv = serialize(stream, o, ht, hv, charset);\r\n                }\r\n                stream.write(__RightB);\r\n            }\r\n        } else {\r\n            writeNull(stream);\r\n        }\r\n        return hv;\r\n    }\r\n \r\n    private static byte[] getBytes(Object obj) {\r\n        try {\r\n            return obj.toString().getBytes(\"US-ASCII\");\r\n        } catch (Exception e) {\r\n            return obj.toString().getBytes();\r\n        }\r\n    }\r\n \r\n    private static byte[] getBytes(Object obj, String charset) {\r\n        try {\r\n            return obj.toString().getBytes(charset);\r\n        } catch (Exception e) {\r\n            return obj.toString().getBytes();\r\n        }\r\n    }\r\n \r\n    private static String getString(byte[] data, String charset) {\r\n        try {\r\n            return new String(data, charset);\r\n        } catch (Exception e) {\r\n            return new String(data);\r\n        }\r\n    }\r\n \r\n    private static Class getClass(String className) {\r\n        try {\r\n            Class cls = Class.forName(className);\r\n \r\n            return cls;\r\n        } catch (Exception e) {}\r\n        for (int i = 0; i &lt; __packages.length; i++) {\r\n            try {\r\n                Class cls = Class.forName(\r\n                        __packages[i].getName() + \".\" + className);\r\n \r\n                return cls;\r\n            } catch (Exception e) {}\r\n        }\r\n        return null;\r\n    }\r\n \r\n    private static String getClassName(Class cls) {\r\n        return cls.getName().substring(cls.getPackage().getName().length() + 1);\r\n    }\r\n \r\n    private static Field getField(Object obj, String fieldName) {\r\n        Class cls = obj.getClass();\r\n \r\n        while (cls != null) {\r\n            try {\r\n                Field result = cls.getDeclaredField(fieldName);\r\n                int mod = result.getModifiers();\r\n \r\n                if (Modifier.isFinal(mod) || Modifier.isStatic(mod)) {\r\n                    return null;\r\n                }\r\n                return result;\r\n            } catch (Exception e) {}\r\n            cls = cls.getSuperclass();\r\n        }\r\n        return null;\r\n    }\r\n \r\n    private static Field[] getFields(Object obj, String[] fieldNames) {\r\n        if (fieldNames == null) {\r\n            return getFields(obj);\r\n        }\r\n        int n = fieldNames.length;\r\n        ArrayList fields = new ArrayList(n);\r\n \r\n        for (int i = 0; i &lt; n; i++) {\r\n            Field f = getField(obj, fieldNames[i]);\r\n \r\n            if (f != null) {\r\n                fields.add(f);\r\n            }\r\n        }\r\n        return (Field[]) fields.toArray(new Field[0]);\r\n    }\r\n \r\n    private static Field[] getFields(Object obj) {\r\n        ArrayList fields = new ArrayList();\r\n        Class cls = obj.getClass();\r\n \r\n        while (cls != null) {\r\n            Field[] fs = cls.getDeclaredFields();\r\n \r\n            for (int i = 0; i &lt; fs.length; i++) {\r\n                int mod = fs[i].getModifiers();\r\n \r\n                if (!Modifier.isFinal(mod) &amp;&amp; !Modifier.isStatic(mod)) {\r\n                    fields.add(fs[i]);\r\n                }\r\n            }\r\n            cls = cls.getSuperclass();\r\n        }\r\n        return (Field[]) fields.toArray(new Field[0]);\r\n    }\r\n \r\n    public static Object newInstance(Class cls) {\r\n        try {\r\n            Constructor ctor = cls.getConstructor(new Class[0]);\r\n            int mod = ctor.getModifiers();\r\n \r\n            if (Modifier.isPublic(mod)) {\r\n                return ctor.newInstance(new Object[0]);\r\n            }\r\n        } catch (Exception e) {}\r\n        try {\r\n            Constructor ctor = cls.getConstructor(new Class[] { Integer.TYPE });\r\n            int mod = ctor.getModifiers();\r\n \r\n            if (Modifier.isPublic(mod)) {\r\n                return ctor.newInstance(new Object[] { new Integer(0) });\r\n            }\r\n        } catch (Exception e) {}\r\n        try {\r\n            Constructor ctor = cls.getConstructor(new Class[] { Boolean.TYPE });\r\n            int mod = ctor.getModifiers();\r\n \r\n            if (Modifier.isPublic(mod)) {\r\n                return ctor.newInstance(new Object[] { new Boolean(false) });\r\n            }\r\n        } catch (Exception e) {}\r\n        try {\r\n            Constructor ctor = cls.getConstructor(new Class[] { String.class });\r\n            int mod = ctor.getModifiers();\r\n \r\n            if (Modifier.isPublic(mod)) {\r\n                return ctor.newInstance(new Object[] { \"\" });\r\n            }\r\n        } catch (Exception e) {}\r\n        Field[] f = cls.getFields();\r\n \r\n        for (int i = 0; i &lt; f.length; i++) {\r\n            if (f[i].getType() == cls &amp;&amp; Modifier.isStatic(f[i].getModifiers())) {\r\n                try {\r\n                    return f[i].get(null);\r\n                } catch (Exception e) {}\r\n            }\r\n        }\r\n        Method[] m = cls.getMethods();\r\n \r\n        for (int i = 0; i &lt; m.length; i++) {\r\n            if (m[i].getReturnType() == cls\r\n                    &amp;&amp; Modifier.isStatic(m[i].getModifiers())) {\r\n                try {\r\n                    return m[i].invoke(null, new Object[0]);\r\n                } catch (Exception e) {}\r\n                try {\r\n                    return m[i].invoke(null, new Object[] { new Integer(0) });\r\n                } catch (Exception e) {}\r\n                try {\r\n                    return m[i].invoke(null, new Object[] { new Boolean(false) });\r\n                } catch (Exception e) {}\r\n                try {\r\n                    return m[i].invoke(null, new Object[] { \"\" });\r\n                } catch (Exception e) {}\r\n            }\r\n        }\r\n        return null;\r\n    }\r\n \r\n    public static Number cast(Number n, Class destClass) {\r\n        if (destClass == Byte.class) {\r\n            return new Byte(n.byteValue());\r\n        }\r\n        if (destClass == Short.class) {\r\n            return new Short(n.shortValue());\r\n        }\r\n        if (destClass == Integer.class) {\r\n            return new Integer(n.intValue());\r\n        }\r\n        if (destClass == Long.class) {\r\n            return new Long(n.longValue());\r\n        }\r\n        if (destClass == Float.class) {\r\n            return new Float(n.floatValue());\r\n        }\r\n        if (destClass == Double.class) {\r\n            return new Double(n.doubleValue());\r\n        }\r\n        return n;\r\n    }\r\n \r\n    public static Object cast(Object obj, Class destClass) {\r\n        if (obj == null || destClass == null) {\r\n            return obj;\r\n        } else if (obj.getClass() == destClass) {\r\n            return obj;\r\n        } else if (obj instanceof Number) {\r\n            return cast((Number) obj, destClass);\r\n        } else if ((obj instanceof String) &amp;&amp; destClass == Character.class) {\r\n            return new Character(((String)obj).charAt(0));\r\n        } else if ((obj instanceof ArrayList) &amp;&amp; destClass.isArray()) {\r\n            return toArray((ArrayList) obj, destClass.getComponentType());\r\n        } else if ((obj instanceof ArrayList) &amp;&amp; destClass == HashMap.class) {\r\n            return toHashMap((ArrayList) obj);\r\n        } else {\r\n            return obj;\r\n        }\r\n    }\r\n \r\n    private static HashMap toHashMap(ArrayList a) {\r\n        int n = a.size();\r\n        HashMap h = new HashMap(n);\r\n \r\n        for (int i = 0; i &lt; n; i++) {\r\n            h.put(new Integer(i), a.get(i));\r\n        }\r\n        return h;\r\n    }\r\n \r\n    private static Object toArray(ArrayList obj, Class componentType) {\r\n        int n = obj.size();\r\n        Object a = Array.newInstance(componentType, n);\r\n \r\n        for (int i = 0; i &lt; n; i++) {\r\n            Array.set(a, i, cast(obj.get(i), componentType));\r\n        }\r\n        return a;\r\n    }\r\n \r\n    private static int getPos(ByteArrayInputStream stream) {\r\n        try {\r\n            Field pos = stream.getClass().getDeclaredField(\"pos\");\r\n \r\n            pos.setAccessible(true);\r\n            return pos.getInt(stream);\r\n        } catch (Exception e) {\r\n            return 0;\r\n        }\r\n    }\r\n \r\n    private static void setPos(ByteArrayInputStream stream, int p) {\r\n        try {\r\n            Field pos = stream.getClass().getDeclaredField(\"pos\");\r\n \r\n            pos.setAccessible(true);\r\n            pos.setInt(stream, p);\r\n        } catch (Exception e) {}\r\n    }\r\n \r\n    public static Object unserialize(byte[] ss) throws IllegalAccessException {\r\n        return unserialize(ss, null, \"UTF-8\");\r\n    }\r\n \r\n    public static Object unserialize(byte[] ss, String charset) throws IllegalAccessException {\r\n        return unserialize(ss, null, charset);\r\n    }\r\n \r\n    public static Object unserialize(byte[] ss, Class cls) throws IllegalAccessException {\r\n        return unserialize(ss, cls, \"UTF-8\");\r\n    }\r\n \r\n    public static Object unserialize(byte[] ss, Class cls, String charset) throws IllegalAccessException {\r\n        int hv = 1;\r\n        ByteArrayInputStream stream = new ByteArrayInputStream(ss);\r\n        Object result = unserialize(stream, new HashMap(), hv, new HashMap(), charset).value;\r\n \r\n        try {\r\n            stream.close();\r\n        } catch (Exception e) {}\r\n        return cast(result, cls);\r\n    }\r\n \r\n    private static UnSerializeResult unserialize(ByteArrayInputStream stream, HashMap ht, int hv, HashMap rt, String charset) throws IllegalAccessException {\r\n        Object obj;\r\n \r\n        switch (stream.read()) {\r\n        case __N:\r\n            obj = readNull(stream);\r\n            ht.put(new Integer(hv++), obj);\r\n            return new UnSerializeResult(obj, hv);\r\n \r\n        case __b:\r\n            obj = readBoolean(stream);\r\n            ht.put(new Integer(hv++), obj);\r\n            return new UnSerializeResult(obj, hv);\r\n \r\n        case __i:\r\n            obj = readInteger(stream);\r\n            ht.put(new Integer(hv++), obj);\r\n            return new UnSerializeResult(obj, hv);\r\n \r\n        case __d:\r\n            obj = readDouble(stream);\r\n            ht.put(new Integer(hv++), obj);\r\n            return new UnSerializeResult(obj, hv);\r\n \r\n        case __s:\r\n            obj = readString(stream, charset);\r\n            ht.put(new Integer(hv++), obj);\r\n            return new UnSerializeResult(obj, hv);\r\n \r\n        case __U:\r\n            obj = readUnicodeString(stream);\r\n            ht.put(new Integer(hv++), obj);\r\n            return new UnSerializeResult(obj, hv);\r\n \r\n        case __r:\r\n            return readRef(stream, ht, hv, rt);\r\n \r\n        case __a:\r\n            return readArray(stream, ht, hv, rt, charset);\r\n \r\n        case __O:\r\n            return readObject(stream, ht, hv, rt, charset);\r\n \r\n        case __C:\r\n            return readCustomObject(stream, ht, hv, charset);\r\n \r\n        case __R:\r\n            return readPointRef(stream, ht, hv, rt);\r\n \r\n        default:\r\n            return null;\r\n        }\r\n    }\r\n \r\n    private static String readNumber(ByteArrayInputStream stream) {\r\n        StringBuffer sb = new StringBuffer();\r\n        int i = stream.read();\r\n \r\n        while ((i != __Semicolon) &amp;&amp; (i != __Colon)) {\r\n            sb.append((char) i);\r\n            i = stream.read();\r\n        }\r\n        return sb.toString();\r\n    }\r\n \r\n    private static Object readNull(ByteArrayInputStream stream) {\r\n        stream.skip(1);\r\n        return null;\r\n    }\r\n \r\n    private static Boolean readBoolean(ByteArrayInputStream stream) {\r\n        stream.skip(1);\r\n        Boolean b = new Boolean(stream.read() == __1);\r\n \r\n        stream.skip(1);\r\n        return b;\r\n    }\r\n \r\n    private static Number readInteger(ByteArrayInputStream stream) {\r\n        stream.skip(1);\r\n        String i = readNumber(stream);\r\n \r\n        try {\r\n            return new Byte(i);\r\n        } catch (Exception e1) {\r\n            try {\r\n                return new Short(i);\r\n            } catch (Exception e2) {\r\n                return new Integer(i);\r\n            }\r\n        }\r\n    }\r\n \r\n    private static Number readDouble(ByteArrayInputStream stream) {\r\n        stream.skip(1);\r\n        String d = readNumber(stream);\r\n \r\n        if (d.equals(__NAN)) {\r\n            return new Double(Double.NaN);\r\n        }\r\n        if (d.equals(__INF)) {\r\n            return new Double(Double.POSITIVE_INFINITY);\r\n        }\r\n        if (d.equals(__NINF)) {\r\n            return new Double(Double.NEGATIVE_INFINITY);\r\n        }\r\n        try {\r\n            return new Long(d);\r\n        } catch (Exception e1) {\r\n            try {\r\n                Float f = new Float(d);\r\n \r\n                if (f.isInfinite()) {\r\n                    return new Double(d);\r\n                } else {\r\n                    return f;\r\n                }\r\n            } catch (Exception e2) {\r\n                return new Float(0);\r\n            }\r\n        }\r\n    }\r\n \r\n    private static String readString(ByteArrayInputStream stream, String charset) {\r\n        stream.skip(1);\r\n        int len = Integer.parseInt(readNumber(stream));\r\n \r\n        stream.skip(1);\r\n        byte[] buf = new byte[len];\r\n \r\n        stream.read(buf, 0, len);\r\n        String s = getString(buf, charset);\r\n \r\n        stream.skip(2);\r\n        return s;\r\n    }\r\n \r\n    private static String readUnicodeString(ByteArrayInputStream stream) {\r\n        stream.skip(1);\r\n        int l = Integer.parseInt(readNumber(stream));\r\n \r\n        stream.skip(1);\r\n        StringBuffer sb = new StringBuffer(l);\r\n        int c;\r\n \r\n        for (int i = 0; i &lt; l; i++) {\r\n            if ((c = stream.read()) == __Slash) {\r\n                char c1 = (char) stream.read();\r\n                char c2 = (char) stream.read();\r\n                char c3 = (char) stream.read();\r\n                char c4 = (char) stream.read();\r\n \r\n                sb.append(\r\n                        (char) (Integer.parseInt(\r\n                                new String(new char[] { c1, c2, c3, c4 }), 16)));\r\n            } else {\r\n                sb.append((char) c);\r\n            }\r\n        }\r\n        stream.skip(2);\r\n        return sb.toString();\r\n    }\r\n \r\n    private static UnSerializeResult readRef(ByteArrayInputStream stream, HashMap ht, int hv, HashMap rt) {\r\n        stream.skip(1);\r\n        Integer r = new Integer(readNumber(stream));\r\n \r\n        if (rt.containsKey(r)) {\r\n            rt.put(r, new Boolean(true));\r\n        }\r\n        Object obj = ht.get(r);\r\n \r\n        ht.put(new Integer(hv++), obj);\r\n        return new UnSerializeResult(obj, hv);\r\n    }\r\n \r\n    private static UnSerializeResult readPointRef(ByteArrayInputStream stream, HashMap ht, int hv, HashMap rt) {\r\n        stream.skip(1);\r\n        Integer r = new Integer(readNumber(stream));\r\n \r\n        if (rt.containsKey(r)) {\r\n            rt.put(r, new Boolean(true));\r\n        }\r\n        Object obj = ht.get(r);\r\n \r\n        return new UnSerializeResult(obj, hv);\r\n    }\r\n \r\n    private static UnSerializeResult readArray(ByteArrayInputStream stream, HashMap ht, int hv, HashMap rt, String charset) throws IllegalAccessException {\r\n        stream.skip(1);\r\n        int n = Integer.parseInt(readNumber(stream));\r\n \r\n        stream.skip(1);\r\n        HashMap h = new HashMap(n);\r\n        ArrayList al = new ArrayList(n);\r\n        Integer r = new Integer(hv);\r\n \r\n        rt.put(r, new Boolean(false));\r\n        int p = getPos(stream);\r\n \r\n        ht.put(new Integer(hv++), h);\r\n        for (int i = 0; i &lt; n; i++) {\r\n            Object key;\r\n \r\n            switch (stream.read()) {\r\n            case __i:\r\n                key = cast(readInteger(stream), Integer.class);\r\n                break;\r\n \r\n            case __s:\r\n                key = readString(stream, charset);\r\n                break;\r\n \r\n            case __U:\r\n                key = readUnicodeString(stream);\r\n                break;\r\n \r\n            default:\r\n                return null;\r\n            }\r\n            UnSerializeResult result = unserialize(stream, ht, hv, rt, charset);\r\n \r\n            hv = result.hv;\r\n            if (al != null) {\r\n                if ((key instanceof Integer) &amp;&amp; (((Integer) key).intValue() == i)) {\r\n                    al.add(result.value);\r\n                } else {\r\n                    al = null;\r\n                }\r\n            }\r\n            h.put(key, result.value);\r\n        }\r\n        if (al != null) {\r\n            ht.put(r, al);\r\n            if (((Boolean) (rt.get(r))).booleanValue()) {\r\n                hv = r.intValue() + 1;\r\n                setPos(stream, p);\r\n                for (int i = 0; i &lt; n; i++) {\r\n                    int key;\r\n \r\n                    switch (stream.read()) {\r\n                    case __i:\r\n                        key = ((Integer) cast(readInteger(stream), Integer.class)).intValue();\r\n                        break;\r\n \r\n                    default:\r\n                        return null;\r\n                    }\r\n                    UnSerializeResult result = unserialize(stream, ht, hv, rt,\r\n                            charset);\r\n \r\n                    hv = result.hv;\r\n                    al.set(key, result.value);\r\n                }\r\n            }\r\n        }\r\n        rt.remove(r);\r\n        stream.skip(1);\r\n        return new UnSerializeResult(ht.get(r), hv);\r\n    }\r\n \r\n    private static UnSerializeResult readObject(ByteArrayInputStream stream, HashMap ht, int hv, HashMap rt, String charset) throws IllegalAccessException {\r\n        stream.skip(1);\r\n        int len = Integer.parseInt(readNumber(stream));\r\n \r\n        stream.skip(1);\r\n        byte[] buf = new byte[len];\r\n \r\n        stream.read(buf, 0, len);\r\n        String cn = getString(buf, charset);\r\n \r\n        stream.skip(2);\r\n        int n = Integer.parseInt(readNumber(stream));\r\n \r\n        stream.skip(1);\r\n        Class cls = getClass(cn);\r\n        Object o;\r\n \r\n        if (cls != null) {\r\n            if ((o = newInstance(cls)) == null) {\r\n                o = new HashMap(n);\r\n            }\r\n        } else {\r\n            o = new HashMap(n);\r\n        }\r\n        ht.put(new Integer(hv++), o);\r\n        for (int i = 0; i &lt; n; i++) {\r\n            String key;\r\n \r\n            switch (stream.read()) {\r\n            case __s:\r\n                key = readString(stream, charset);\r\n                break;\r\n \r\n            case __U:\r\n                key = readUnicodeString(stream);\r\n                break;\r\n \r\n            default:\r\n                return null;\r\n            }\r\n            if (key.charAt(0) == (char) 0) {\r\n                key = key.substring(key.indexOf(\"\\0\", 1) + 1);\r\n            }\r\n            UnSerializeResult result = unserialize(stream, ht, hv, rt, charset);\r\n \r\n            hv = result.hv;\r\n            if (o instanceof HashMap) {\r\n                ((HashMap) o).put(key, result.value);\r\n            } else {\r\n                Field f = getField(o, key);\r\n \r\n                f.setAccessible(true);\r\n                f.set(o, result.value);\r\n            }\r\n        }\r\n        stream.skip(1);\r\n        Method __wakeup = null;\r\n \r\n        try {\r\n            __wakeup = o.getClass().getMethod(\"__wakeup\", new Class[0]);\r\n            __wakeup.invoke(o, new Object[0]);\r\n        } catch (Exception e) {}\r\n        return new UnSerializeResult(o, hv);\r\n    }\r\n \r\n    private static UnSerializeResult readCustomObject(ByteArrayInputStream stream, HashMap ht, int hv, String charset) {\r\n        stream.skip(1);\r\n        int len = Integer.parseInt(readNumber(stream));\r\n \r\n        stream.skip(1);\r\n        byte[] buf = new byte[len];\r\n \r\n        stream.read(buf, 0, len);\r\n        String cn = getString(buf, charset);\r\n \r\n        stream.skip(2);\r\n        int n = Integer.parseInt(readNumber(stream));\r\n \r\n        stream.skip(1);\r\n        Class cls = getClass(cn);\r\n        Object o;\r\n \r\n        if (cls != null) {\r\n            o = newInstance(cls);\r\n        } else {\r\n            o = null;\r\n        }\r\n        ht.put(new Integer(hv++), o);\r\n        if (o == null) {\r\n            stream.skip(n);\r\n        } else if (o instanceof org.phprpc.util.Serializable) {\r\n            byte[] b = new byte[n];\r\n \r\n            stream.read(b, 0, n);\r\n            ((org.phprpc.util.Serializable) o).unserialize(b);\r\n        } else {\r\n            stream.skip(n);\r\n        }\r\n        stream.skip(1);\r\n        return new UnSerializeResult(o, hv);\r\n    }\r\n}<\/andot@ujn.edu.cn><\/pre>\r\n<br \/>\r\n<p>\r\n\t<br \/>\r\n<\/p>\r\n<p>\r\n\t在此非常感谢coolcode.org\r\n<\/p>\r\n<p>\r\n\t核心代码地址http:\/\/www.coolcode.org\/?action=show&amp;id=202\r\n<\/p>\r\n<p>\r\n\t<span><\/span> \r\n<\/p>","articleTypeId":"1295610713745","articleTitle":"java\/php 通用serialize\/unserialize","articleIsPublished":"0","articleViewCount":"497","articleAbstract":"php的serialize\/unserialize，方便把一个数组序列化和反序列化，但是要和java交互，就比较麻烦了。java的serialize，序列化之后，会把java.util....包名都放进去了，而且格式也不同于php，这个版本目前实现了对各种基本类型、数组、ArrayList、HashMap、和其它可序列化对象的序列化。实现了PHP5中的Serializable接口的支持。实现了PH...","oId":"1356591438758","articleCreateDate":"2012年12月27日 14:57:18","articleTags":"java serialize unserialize"},"1294553756759":{"articleUpdateDate":"","articleContent":"<div style=\"layout-grid:15.6pt none;\" class=\"Section0\">\r\n<p style=\"margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;\" class=\"p0\"><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.5pt;mso-spacerun:'yes';\">一：更改你的<span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';\">meta<\/span><span style=\"font-family:宋体;\">元标签中关于<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';\">Keywords,Description<\/span><span style=\"font-family:宋体;\">部份<\/span><\/span><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.5pt;mso-spacerun:'yes';\"><?xml:namespace prefix = o ns = \"urn:schemas-microsoft-com:office:office\" \/><o:p><\/o:p><\/span><\/p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;\" class=\"p0\"><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.5pt;mso-spacerun:'yes';\">&lt;meta&nbsp;name=\"Keywords\"&nbsp;content=\"<span style=\"font-family:宋体;\">关键词<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';\">\"\/&gt;<\/span><\/span><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.5pt;mso-spacerun:'yes';\"><o:p><\/o:p><\/span><\/p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;\" class=\"p0\"><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.5pt;mso-spacerun:'yes';\">&lt;meta&nbsp;name=\"Description\"&nbsp;content=\"<span style=\"font-family:宋体;\">描述<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';\">\"\/&gt;<\/span><\/span><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.5pt;mso-spacerun:'yes';\"><o:p><\/o:p><\/span><\/p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;\" class=\"p0\"><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.5pt;mso-spacerun:'yes';\"><o:p><\/o:p><\/span><\/p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;\" class=\"p0\"><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.5pt;mso-spacerun:'yes';\">二：不要滥用<span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';\">&lt;iframe&gt;<\/span><span style=\"font-family:宋体;\">标签<\/span><\/span><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.5pt;mso-spacerun:'yes';\"><o:p><\/o:p><\/span><\/p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;\" class=\"p0\"><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.5pt;mso-spacerun:'yes';\"><o:p><\/o:p><\/span><\/p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;\" class=\"p0\"><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.5pt;mso-spacerun:'yes';\">三：应该检查程序生成结果的合理性，拿你的首页来说吧。首页下方的<span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';\">\u201C<\/span><span style=\"font-family:宋体;\">珠宝常识<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';\">\u201D<\/span><span style=\"font-family:宋体;\">上方有一栏滚动图片，链接地址居然有：<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';\">http:\/\/127.0.0.1\/<\/span><span style=\"font-family:宋体;\">。这是极度不合理的嘛，怎么会出现在页面中呢？？<\/span><\/span><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.5pt;mso-spacerun:'yes';\"><o:p><\/o:p><\/span><\/p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;\" class=\"p0\"><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.5pt;mso-spacerun:'yes';\"><o:p><\/o:p><\/span><\/p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;\" class=\"p0\"><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.5pt;mso-spacerun:'yes';\">四：更改你的所有站内资源和页面地址链接方式，将类似于：<span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';\">..\/..\/..\/index.htm<\/span><span style=\"font-family:宋体;\">的相对路径改为<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';\">\/index.htm<\/span><span style=\"font-family:宋体;\">绝对路径<\/span><\/span><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.5pt;mso-spacerun:'yes';\"><o:p><\/o:p><\/span><\/p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;\" class=\"p0\"><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.5pt;mso-spacerun:'yes';\"><o:p><\/o:p><\/span><\/p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;\" class=\"p0\"><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.5pt;mso-spacerun:'yes';\">五：所有链回首页的链接一律采用<span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';\">\u201C\/\u201D<\/span><span style=\"font-family:宋体;\">，而不要额外的添加<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';\">\/index.htm<\/span><\/span><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.5pt;mso-spacerun:'yes';\"><o:p><\/o:p><\/span><\/p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;\" class=\"p0\"><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.5pt;mso-spacerun:'yes';\"><o:p><\/o:p><\/span><\/p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;\" class=\"p0\"><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.5pt;mso-spacerun:'yes';\">六：页面结构实在是太差了，大量的<span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';\">javascript<\/span><span style=\"font-family:宋体;\">与<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';\">html<\/span><span style=\"font-family:宋体;\">的标签夹杂着使用，就连超链接的悬浮样式也采用了类似于：<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';\">onMouseOut=\"this.style.backgroundColor=''\"&nbsp;onMouseOver=\"this.style.backgroundColor='#e6e6e6'\"<\/span><span style=\"font-family:宋体;\">。像这种效果，使用<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';\">html<\/span><span style=\"font-family:宋体;\">中<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';\">a<\/span><span style=\"font-family:宋体;\">标签的<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';\">A:hover&nbsp;{color:&nbsp;#e6e6e6;&nbsp;text-decoration:&nbsp;none}<\/span><span style=\"font-family:宋体;\">在<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';\">css<\/span><span style=\"font-family:宋体;\">中申明就可以达到效果了<\/span><\/span><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.5pt;mso-spacerun:'yes';\"><o:p><\/o:p><\/span><\/p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;\" class=\"p0\"><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.5pt;mso-spacerun:'yes';\"><o:p><\/o:p><\/span><\/p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;\" class=\"p0\"><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.5pt;mso-spacerun:'yes';\">七：还是关于<span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';\">javascript<\/span><span style=\"font-family:宋体;\">脚本的问题：<\/span><\/span><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.5pt;mso-spacerun:'yes';\"><o:p><\/o:p><\/span><\/p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;\" class=\"p0\"><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.5pt;mso-spacerun:'yes';\">&lt;td&nbsp;width=\"70\"&gt;&lt;a&nbsp;href=\"..\/..\/..\/index.htm\"&nbsp;onClick=\"MM_nbGroup('down','group1','index_1','..\/..\/..\/eve\/image\/index\/index_01.jpg',1)\"&nbsp;onMouseOver=\"MM_nbGroup('over','index_1','..\/..\/..\/eve\/image\/index\/index_01.jpg','',1)\"&nbsp;onMouseOut=\"MM_nbGroup('out')\"&gt;&lt;img&nbsp;src=\"..\/..\/..\/eve\/image\/index\/index_1.jpg\"&nbsp;name=\"index_1\"&nbsp;border=\"0\"&nbsp;onLoad=\"\"&nbsp;alt=\"<span style=\"font-family:宋体;\">首页<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';\">\"&gt;&lt;\/a&gt;&lt;\/td&gt;<\/span><\/span><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.5pt;mso-spacerun:'yes';\"><o:p><\/o:p><\/span><\/p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;\" class=\"p0\"><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.5pt;mso-spacerun:'yes';\"><o:p><\/o:p><\/span><\/p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;\" class=\"p0\"><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.5pt;mso-spacerun:'yes';\">要达到这样的效果，只需要在<span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';\">css<\/span><span style=\"font-family:宋体;\">中定义即可，根本没必要就这么一大堆的<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';\">javascript<\/span><span style=\"font-family:宋体;\">脚本去产生作用，即便是你没办法要这个样子，你也完全可以将效果写入一个<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';\">javascript<\/span><span style=\"font-family:宋体;\">的<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';\">function<\/span><span style=\"font-family:宋体;\">中以便调用，或者是在页面底部直接调用一个函数去初始化所有的效果即可<\/span><\/span><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.5pt;mso-spacerun:'yes';\"><o:p><\/o:p><\/span><\/p>\r\n<p IP:留空即可<\/p>\r\n<p>通信密钥:随便写一个,比如123abcdkjhh<\/p>\r\n<p>应用类型:选择'其它<\/p>\r\n<p>应用的物理路径:留空即可<\/p>\r\n<p>查看个人资料页面地址:留空即可<\/p>\r\n<p>应用接口文件名称:uc.php<\/p>\r\n<p>标签单条显示模板:留空即可<\/p>\r\n<p>标签模板标记说明:留空即可<\/p>\r\n<p>是否开启同步登录:选择'是'<\/p>\r\n<p>是否接受通知:选择'是'<\/p>\r\n<p>&nbsp;<\/p>\r\n<p>最后提交,提交之后,再返回到应用列表.然后再选择刚刚提交那个应用,点击编辑.<\/p>\r\n<p>&nbsp;<\/p>\r\n<p>把'应用的 \r\n<\/p>\r\n<p>\r\n\t<span>然后通过函数sprintf ( \"%u\", ip2long ( $ip ) );得到int类型的ip：&nbsp;<span>1885497755<\/span>。<\/span> \r\n<\/p>\r\n<p>\r\n\t<span>这里说明一下，为什么ip2<\/span>long就已经转换了，还要用sprintf，因为仅仅用ip2long 有可能产生负数。\r\n<\/p>\r\n<p>\r\n\t反之，则用long2ip($ip)得到<span>112.98.105.155这种格式的ip<\/span> \r\n<\/p>\r\n<p>\r\n\t<span><br style=\"line-height:1.5;\">给出一个作为字符串的网络地址的点地址表示，返回一个代表该地址数值的整数。地址可以是4或8比特地址。<\/span> \r\n<\/p>\r\n<p style=\"font-size:13px;font-family:Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;\">\r\n\t<span 224×<span style=\"line-height:1.5;\">256 + 40&nbsp;<\/span>进行计算。<\/span> \r\n<\/p>\r\n<p style=\"font-size:13px;font-family:Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;\">\r\n\t<span sans-serif;vertical-align:baseline;color:#3F5051;text-indent:2em;background-color:#FFFFFF;\">\r\n\t如果要想在IE浏览器中实现圆角的效果，我们一般都会采用圆角图片的方式。用图片的话，基本就跟浏览器没有多大关系了，因为任何浏览器都支持这种方式。\r\n<\/p>\r\n<p style=\"font-family:微软雅黑, 'Microsoft YaHei', Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;vertical-align:baseline;color:#3F5051;text-indent:2em;background-color:#FFFFFF;\">\r\n\t本文我们主要是讲解如果用CSS 3样式表来实现圆角效果，值得注意的是，IE6\/7\/8这三个IE浏览器版本都不支持CSS 3的解析，只有还不太主流的IE 9支持CSS 3和HTML 5的标准。让IE支持CSS 3的解析方法有很多种，下面介绍一种实用的让IE支持CSS 3解析的方法\u2014\u2014IE利用VML矢量可标记语言作为画笔绘出圆角：\r\n<\/p>\r\n<p style=\"font-family:微软雅黑, 'Microsoft YaHei', Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;vertical-align:baseline;color:#3F5051;text-indent:2em;background-color:#FFFFFF;\">\r\n\t1、下载一个压缩包，里面有一个微软的脚本文件(11KB)和一个用来测试服务器是否有正确的Content-Type的HTML文件：iecss3.rar;.htc文件是IE内核支持Web行为后用来描述此类行为的脚本文件。它们定义了一套方法和属性，程序员几乎可以把这些方法和属性应用到HTML页面上的任何元素上去。Web 行为是非常伟大的因为它们允许程序员把自定义的功能\u201C连接\u201D到现有的元素和控件，而不是必须让用户下载二进制文件(例如ActiveX 控件)来完成这个功能。\r\n<\/p>\r\n<p style=\"font-family:微软雅黑, 'Microsoft YaHei', Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;vertical-align:baseline;color:#3F5051;text-indent:2em;background-color:#FFFFFF;\">\r\n\t下载地址：<a href=\"http:\/\/z-yang.com\/download\/iecss3.rar\">http:\/\/z-yang.com\/download\/iecss3.rar<\/a>\r\n<\/p>\r\n<p style=\"font-family:微软雅黑, 'Microsoft YaHei', Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;vertical-align:baseline;color:#3F5051;text-indent:2em;background-color:#FFFFFF;\">\r\n\t解压后，打开test.html，如果显示效果是圆角，则可以继续。\r\n<\/p>\r\n<p style=\"font-family:微软雅黑, 'Microsoft YaHei', Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;vertical-align:baseline;color:#3F5051;text-indent:2em;background-color:#FFFFFF;\">\r\n\t<br \/>\r\n<strong>使用演示：<\/strong>\r\n<\/p>\r\n<p style=\"font-family:微软雅黑, 'Microsoft YaHei', Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;vertical-align:baseline;color:#FFFFFF;background-color:#1CBDC5;\">\r\n\t<strong>.main<\/strong>{&nbsp;<br \/>\r\nborder: 2px solid #C0C0C0;&nbsp;<br \/>\r\n-moz-border-radius: 10px;&nbsp;<br \/>\r\n-webkit-border-radius: 10px;&nbsp;<br \/>\r\nborder-radius: 10px;&nbsp;<br \/>\r\nposition:relative;&nbsp;<br \/>\r\nz-index:2;&nbsp;<br \/>\r\nbehavior: url(此处为ie-css3.htc文件的绝对路径);&nbsp;<br \/>\r\n}\r\n<\/p>\r\n<p style=\"font-family:微软雅黑, 'Microsoft YaHei', Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;vertical-align:baseline;color:#3F5051;text-indent:2em;background-color:#FFFFFF;\">\r\n\tWebkit内核的浏览器支持\u201C-webkit-border-radius: 10px;\u201D属性(10px是圆角半径)，可以直接解析出圆角;Firefox浏览器支持\u201C-moz-border-radius: 10px;\u201D属性，也是可以直接解析出圆角;IE系浏览器则需要加上\u201Cborder-radius: 15px;\u201D的属性。\r\n<\/p>\r\n<p style=\"font-family:微软雅黑, 'Microsoft YaHei', Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;vertical-align:baseline;color:#3F5051;text-indent:2em;background-color:#FFFFFF;\">\r\n\t注意：\r\n<\/p>\r\n<p style=\"font-family:微软雅黑, 'Microsoft YaHei', Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;vertical-align:baseline;color:#3F5051;text-indent:2em;background-color:#FFFFFF;\">\r\n\t1、behavior的url里一定要填写ie-css3.htc的绝对路径，因为 IE浏览器找该文件是相对当前html文件路径来找的，所以对于Wordpress等动态程序生成的页面一定要填写绝对路径。\r\n<\/p>\r\n<p style=\"font-family:微软雅黑, 'Microsoft YaHei', Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;vertical-align:baseline;color:#3F5051;text-indent:2em;background-color:#FFFFFF;\">\r\n\t2、一定要有定位属性：position:relative;\r\n<\/p>\r\n<p style=\"font-family:微软雅黑, 'Microsoft YaHei', Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;vertical-align:baseline;color:#3F5051;text-indent:2em;background-color:#FFFFFF;\">\r\n\t3、因为在IE浏览器下这些CSS 3效果的实现是要借助于VML，由VML绘制圆角或是投影效果，所以还需要一个z-index属性。z-index属性最好设置得比较大，如2。\r\n<\/p>\r\n<p style=\"font-family:微软雅黑, 'Microsoft YaHei', Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;vertical-align:baseline;color:#3F5051;text-indent:2em;background-color:#FFFFFF;\">\r\n\t4、如果在IE浏览器下某些模块无法用此渲染，可以试着绝对定位相应的层，即加上\u201C width: 400px; height:400px;\u201D属性。\r\n<\/p>\r\n<p style=\"font-family:微软雅黑, 'Microsoft YaHei', Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;vertical-align:baseline;color:#3F5051;text-indent:2em;background-color:#FFFFFF;\">\r\n\t5、radius属性的10px是圆角半径，还可以给两个值如\u201Cborder-radius: 10px 5px;\u201D，这样则左上角与右下角半径为10px，右上角与左下角半径为5px。也可以赋4个值，为\u201C上 右 下 左\u201D。\r\n<\/p>\r\n<p style=\"font-family:微软雅黑, 'Microsoft YaHei', Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;vertical-align:baseline;color:#3F5051;text-indent:2em;background-color:#FFFFFF;\">\r\n\t<br \/>\r\n<\/p>\r\n<p style=\"font-family:微软雅黑, 'Microsoft YaHei', Arial, Helvetica, style=\"color:#ffcc00;font-size:9pt;\" lang=\"EN-US\"><?XML:NAMESPACE PREFIX = O \/><o:p><\/o:p><\/span><\/strong><\/p>\r\n<p style=\"text-align:left;margin:0cm 0cm 0pt;mso-pagination:widow-orphan;\" class=\"MsoNormal\" align=\"left\"><span style=\"font-family:宋体;color:#000000;font-size:9pt;mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;\" lang=\"EN-US\">Datastore <\/span><span style=\"font-family:宋体;color:#000000;font-size:9pt;mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;\">可能是整个<span style=\"color:#000000;\" lang=\"EN-US\">gae <\/span>开发环境中最重要的一部分<span style=\"color:#000000;\" lang=\"EN-US\"> , <\/span>因为任何应用程序都有持久化存储的需要<span style=\"color:#000000;\" lang=\"EN-US\">,<\/span>而在<span style=\"color:#000000;\" lang=\"EN-US\">gae<\/span>下<span style=\"color:#000000;\" lang=\"EN-US\">,datastore<\/span>是实现持久存储的唯一的手段<span style=\"color:#000000;\" lang=\"EN-US\">.<o:p><\/o:p><\/span><\/span><\/p>\r\n<p style=\"text-align:left;margin:0cm 0cm 0pt;mso-pagination:widow-orphan;\" class=\"MsoNormal\" align=\"left\"><span style=\"font-family:宋体;color:#000000;font-size:9pt;mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;\" lang=\"EN-US\">datastore <\/span><span style=\"font-family:宋体;color:#000000;font-size:9pt;mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;\">的优点在于它构建在<span style=\"color:#000000;\" lang=\"EN-US\">google <\/span>的<span style=\"color:#000000;\" lang=\"EN-US\">bigtable <\/span>实现基础之上<span style=\"color:#000000;\" lang=\"EN-US\">,<\/span>能够自动分布式存储<span style=\"color:#000000;\" lang=\"EN-US\">,<\/span>伸缩性很好<span style=\"color:#000000;\" lang=\"EN-US\">; <\/span>另一方面它的编程接口非常简单<span style=\"color:#000000;\" lang=\"EN-US\">, <\/span>主要用到的就是<span style=\"color:#000000;\" lang=\"EN-US\"> get,put,delete<\/span>这几个函数以及<span style=\"color:#000000;\" lang=\"EN-US\">Query, &nbsp;GqlQuery<\/span>这两个查询接口对象<span style=\"color:#000000;\" lang=\"EN-US\">.<\/span>但实际使用中发现它有一些弱点和限制<span style=\"color:#000000;\" lang=\"EN-US\">:<o:p><\/o:p><\/span><\/span><\/p>\r\n<p style=\"text-align:left;text-indent:-18pt;margin:0cm 0cm 0pt 36pt;mso-pagination:widow-orphan;mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto;mso-list:l0 level1 lfo1;tab-stops:list 36.0pt;\" class=\"MsoNormal\" align=\"left\"><span style=\"font-family:宋体;color:#ffcc00;font-size:9pt;mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;\" lang=\"EN-US\"><span style=\"color:#000000;mso-list:Ignore;\">1.<span style=\"font:7pt 'Times New Roman';color:#000000;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; <\/span><\/span><\/span><span style=\"font-family:宋体;color:#000000;font-size:9pt;mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;\">不支持模糊查询或者说关键字查询<span style=\"color:#000000;\" lang=\"EN-US\"> , <\/span>一般关系数据库服务器都支持 \u2018<span style=\"color:#000000;\" lang=\"EN-US\">like<\/span>\u2019<span style=\"color:#000000;\" lang=\"EN-US\">&nbsp;<\/span>查询<span style=\"color:#000000;\" lang=\"EN-US\">,<\/span>并且现在也有和关系数据库集成的全文索引解决方案<span style=\"color:#000000;\" lang=\"EN-US\">. <\/span>但以<span style=\"color:#000000;\" lang=\"EN-US\">google <\/span>这么强的搜索功力<span style=\"color:#000000;\" lang=\"EN-US\">,<\/span>直到现在也没把搜索功能放到<span style=\"color:#000000;\" lang=\"EN-US\">datastore api<\/span>中<span style=\"color:#000000;\" lang=\"EN-US\">. <\/span>虽然在<span style=\"color:#000000;\" lang=\"EN-US\">sdk <\/span>源码中有一些\u2019<span style=\"color:#000000;\" lang=\"EN-US\">search<\/span>\u2019 的影子出现<span style=\"color:#000000;\" lang=\"EN-US\">,<\/span>但官方的文档中未有提及<span style=\"color:#000000;\" lang=\"EN-US\">. <\/span>没有这个特性大大降低了<span style=\"color:#000000;\" lang=\"EN-US\">datastore <\/span>的使用价值<span style=\"color:#000000;\" lang=\"EN-US\">. <o:p><\/o:p><\/span><\/span><\/p>\r\n<p style=\"text-align:left;text-indent:-18pt;margin:0cm 0cm 0pt 36pt;mso-pagination:widow-orphan;mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto;mso-list:l0 level1 lfo1;tab-stops:list 36.0pt;\" class=\"MsoNormal\" align=\"left\"><span style=\"font-family:宋体;color:#ffcc00;font-size:9pt;mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;\" lang=\"EN-US\"><span style=\"color:#000000;mso-list:Ignore;\">2.<span style=\"font:7pt 'Times New Roman';color:#000000;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; <\/span><\/span><\/span><span style=\"font-family:宋体;color:#000000;font-size:9pt;mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;\" lang=\"EN-US\">datastore <\/span><span style=\"font-family:宋体;color:#000000;font-size:9pt;mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;\">中无法获得某种<span style=\"color:#000000;\" lang=\"EN-US\">entity<\/span>的数量 <span style=\"color:#000000;\" lang=\"EN-US\">. <\/span>具体来说如果有一个<span style=\"color:#000000;\" lang=\"EN-US\">class A(db.Model). <\/span>在运行时是无法得知到底<span style=\"color:#000000;\" lang=\"EN-US\">datastore <\/span>中存储了多少<span style=\"color:#000000;\" lang=\"EN-US\">A <\/span>的实例<span style=\"color:#000000;\" lang=\"EN-US\">, Query <\/span>对象有一个<span style=\"color:#000000;\" lang=\"EN-US\"> count <\/span>方法可以获得查询数量<span style=\"color:#000000;\" lang=\"EN-US\">,<\/span>但上限是<span style=\"color:#000000;\" lang=\"EN-US\">1000. <\/span>也就是说如果现在有<span style=\"color:#000000;\" lang=\"EN-US\"> 10000<\/span>个<span style=\"color:#000000;\" lang=\"EN-US\"> A <\/span>的实例<span style=\"color:#000000;\" lang=\"EN-US\">,<\/span>我用<span style=\"color:#000000;\" lang=\"EN-US\"> query = A.all()&nbsp; query.count() <\/span>得到的数字是<span style=\"color:#000000;\" lang=\"EN-US\">1000.<o:p><\/o:p><\/span><\/span><\/p>\r\n<p><span style=\"color:#ffcc00;font-size:9pt;\"><span style=\"font-family:宋体;color:#000000;\">对于第一个问题<span style=\"color:#000000;\" lang=\"EN-US\">, Google App Engine<\/span>官方文档在<span lang=\"EN-US\"><a href=\"http:\/\/code.google.com\/intl\/zh-CN\/appengine\/docs\/python\/datastore\/queriesandindexes.html\"><span style=\"color:#ffcc00;\" lang=\"EN-US\"><span style=\"color:#000000;\" lang=\"EN-US\">查询和搜索部分<\/span><\/span><\/a><\/span>给出了提示<span style=\"color:#000000;\" lang=\"EN-US\">:<o:p><\/o:p><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/p>\r\n<p><strong><span style=\"font-family:宋体;color:#000000;font-size:9pt;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;\">提示：<\/span><\/strong><span style=\"color:#ffcc00;font-size:9pt;\"><span style=\"font-family:宋体;color:#000000;\">查询过滤条件没有明确的方法可以仅与一部分字符串值进行匹配，然而您可以使用以下不等式过滤条件仿造一个前缀匹配：<span lang=\"EN-US\"><o:p><\/o:p><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/p>\r\n<p><\/p>\r\n<table style=\"border-bottom:medium none;border-left:medium none;border-collapse:collapse;border-top:medium none;border-right:medium none;mso-border-alt:solid #FFCC00 .5pt;mso-yfti-tbllook:480;mso-padding-alt:0cm 5.4pt 0cm 5.4pt;\" class=\"MsoTableGrid\" border=\"1\" cellspacing=\"0\" cellpadding=\"0\">\r\n<tbody>\r\n<tr style=\"mso-yfti-irow:0;mso-yfti-firstrow:yes;mso-yfti-lastrow:yes;\">\r\n<td style=\"border-bottom:#ffcc00 1pt solid;border-left:#ffcc00 1pt solid;padding-bottom:0cm;background-color:transparent;padding-left:5.4pt;width:426.1pt;padding-right:5.4pt;border-top:#ffcc00 1pt solid;border-right:#ffcc00 1pt solid;padding-top:0cm;mso-border-alt:solid #FFCC00 .5pt;\" valign=\"top\" width=\"568\">\r\n<p style=\"text-align:left;line-height:150%;margin:0cm 0cm 0pt;mso-pagination:widow-orphan;\" class=\"MsoNormal\" align=\"left\"><span style=\"line-height:150%;font-family:'Courier New';color:#000000;font-size:9pt;mso-font-kerning:0pt;\" lang=\"EN-US\">db.GqlQuery(\"SELECT * FROM MyModel WHERE prop &gt;= :1 AND prop &lt; :2\", \"abc\", u\"abc\" + u\"\\ufffd\")<o:p><\/o:p><\/span><\/p>\r\n<\/td>\r\n<\/tr>\r\n<\/tbody>\r\n<\/table>\r\n<p><\/p>\r\n<p><span style=\"color:#ffcc00;font-size:9pt;\"><span style=\"font-family:宋体;color:#000000;\">这样便可以将每个<span style=\"color:#000000;\" lang=\"EN-US\"> MyModel&nbsp;<\/span>实体与以<span style=\"color:#000000;\" lang=\"EN-US\"> abc&nbsp;<\/span>字符开头的字符串属性<span style=\"color:#000000;\" lang=\"EN-US\"> prop&nbsp;<\/span>进行匹配。<span style=\"color:#000000;\" lang=\"EN-US\">unicode <\/span>字符串<span style=\"color:#000000;\" lang=\"EN-US\"> u<\/span>\u201D<span style=\"color:#000000;\" lang=\"EN-US\">\\ufffd<\/span>\u201D<span style=\"color:#000000;\" lang=\"EN-US\">&nbsp;<\/span>表示可能存在的最大<span style=\"color:#000000;\" lang=\"EN-US\"> Unicode <\/span>字符。当属性值在索引中进行排序时，属于此范围的值便是所有以指定的前缀开头的值。<span lang=\"EN-US\"><o:p><\/o:p><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/p>\r\n<p style=\"margin:0cm 0cm 0pt;\" class=\"MsoNormal\"><span style=\"font-family:宋体;color:#000000;font-size:9pt;mso-ascii-font-family:'Times New Roman';mso-hansi-font-family:'Times New Roman';\">但是以上提示只能完成字符串前缀匹配<\/span><span style=\"color:#ffcc00;font-size:9pt;\" lang=\"EN-US\"><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';color:#000000;\">, <\/span><\/span><span style=\"font-family:宋体;color:#000000;font-size:9pt;mso-ascii-font-family:'Times New Roman';mso-hansi-font-family:'Times New Roman';\">对于像这样的<\/span><span style=\"color:#ffcc00;font-size:9pt;\" lang=\"EN-US\"><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';color:#000000;\">sql<\/span><\/span><span style=\"font-family:宋体;color:#000000;font-size:9pt;mso-ascii-font-family:'Times New Roman';mso-hansi-font-family:'Times New Roman';\">查询<\/span><span style=\"color:#ffcc00;font-size:9pt;\" lang=\"EN-US\"><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';color:#000000;\">like <\/span><\/span><span style=\"font-family:宋体;color:#000000;font-size:9pt;mso-ascii-font-family:'Times New Roman';mso-hansi-font-family:'Times New Roman';\">\u2018<\/span><span style=\"color:#ffcc00;font-size:9pt;\" lang=\"EN-US\"><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';color:#000000;\">%str%<\/span><\/span><span style=\"font-family:宋体;color:#000000;font-size:9pt;mso-ascii-font-family:'Times New Roman';mso-hansi-font-family:'Times New Roman';\">\u2019依然不好写<\/span><span style=\"color:#ffcc00;font-size:9pt;\" lang=\"EN-US\"><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';color:#000000;\">, <\/span><\/span><span style=\"font-family:宋体;color:#000000;font-size:9pt;mso-ascii-font-family:'Times New Roman';mso-hansi-font-family:'Times New Roman';\">这样一来很多应用可能会因此变得很难实现<\/span><span style=\"color:#ffcc00;font-size:9pt;\" lang=\"EN-US\"><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';color:#000000;\">, <\/span><\/span><span style=\"font-family:宋体;color:#000000;font-size:9pt;mso-ascii-font-family:'Times New Roman';mso-hansi-font-family:'Times New Roman';\">或者必须为一个很简单的查询而绞尽脑汁<\/span><span style=\"color:#ffcc00;font-size:9pt;\" lang=\"EN-US\"><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';color:#000000;\">, <\/span><\/span><span style=\"font-family:宋体;color:#000000;font-size:9pt;mso-ascii-font-family:'Times New Roman';mso-hansi-font-family:'Times New Roman';\">或者被迫放弃一些查询<\/span><span style=\"color:#ffcc00;font-size:9pt;\" lang=\"EN-US\"><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';color:#000000;\">. <\/span><\/span><span style=\"font-family:宋体;color:#000000;font-size:9pt;mso-ascii-font-family:'Times New Roman';mso-hansi-font-family:'Times New Roman';\">期待<\/span><span style=\"color:#ffcc00;font-size:9pt;\" lang=\"EN-US\"><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';color:#000000;\">Google<\/span><\/span><span style=\"font-family:宋体;color:#000000;font-size:9pt;mso-ascii-font-family:'Times New Roman';mso-hansi-font-family:'Times New Roman';\">在下一个<\/span><span style=\"color:#ffcc00;font-size:9pt;\" lang=\"EN-US\"><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';color:#000000;\">gae api<\/span><\/span><span style=\"font-family:宋体;color:#000000;font-size:9pt;mso-ascii-font-family:'Times New Roman';mso-hansi-font-family:'Times New Roman';\">的更新中增加这部分的内容<\/span><span style=\"color:#ffcc00;font-size:9pt;\" lang=\"EN-US\"><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';color:#000000;\">.<o:p><\/o:p><\/span><\/span><\/p>\r\n<p style=\"margin:0cm 0cm 0pt;\" class=\"MsoNormal\"><strong><span style=\"font-family:宋体;color:#000000;font-size:9pt;mso-ascii-font-family:'Times New Roman';mso-hansi-font-family:'Times New Roman';\">从<\/span><\/strong><strong><span style=\"color:#ffcc00;font-size:9pt;\" lang=\"EN-US\"><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';color:#000000;\">:<o:p><\/o:p><\/span><\/span><\/strong><\/p>\r\n<p><span style=\"color:#ffcc00;font-size:9pt;\"><span style=\"font-family:宋体;color:#000000;\">刚才在用<span style=\"color:#000000;\" lang=\"EN-US\">GAE<\/span>实现获取多个同名的复选框的值的操作时<span style=\"color:#000000;\" \/>\r\n{$title|count_characters:true}{*字符串的长度加true字符空格,不加true不计算空格*}&lt;br\/&gt;<br \/>\r\n{$title|cat:'字符串后加入字符'}{*拼接字符串*}&lt;br\/&gt;<br \/>\r\n{$title|count_words}{*计算字符数量*}&lt;br\/&gt;<br \/>\r\n{$title2|default:\"dsgadsgds\"};{*如果变量不存在就输出默认值*}&lt;br\/&gt;<br \/>\r\n{$english_word|escape:html}{*将字符串中的HTML转换为HTML编码方式*}&lt;br\/&gt;<br \/>\r\n{$english_word|escape:htmlall}{*将字符串中的HTML转换为HTML编码方式*}&lt;br\/&gt;<br \/>\r\n{$english_word|escape:url}{*将字符串中的HTML转换为URL编码方式*}&lt;br\/&gt;<br \/>\r\n{$english_word|escape:quotes}{*将字符串中的HTML转换为HTML编码方式*}&lt;br\/&gt;<br \/>\r\n{$title|indent:100}{*缩进指定宽度*}&lt;br\/&gt;<br \/>\r\n{$title|regex_replace:\"\/要\/\":\"爱\"}{*正则表达式替换字符*}&lt;br\/&gt;<br \/>\r\n{$title|replace:\"要\":\"爱\"}{*Replace替换字符*}&lt;br\/&gt;<br \/>\r\n{$english_word|spacify:\"||\"}{*分隔字符串*}&lt;br\/&gt;<br \/>\r\n{$money|string_format:\"%.2f\"}{*格式化数字为Float数*}&lt;br\/&gt;<br \/>\r\n{$money|string_format:\"%d\"}{*格式化数字为INT数*}&lt;br\/&gt;<br \/>\r\n{$english_word|strip:\"&nbsp;\"}{*替换空格*}&lt;br\/&gt;<br \/>\r\n{$english_word|strip_tags:false}{*替换标签*}&lt;br\/&gt;<br \/>\r\n{$english_word|truncate:10:\"...\"}{*截取指定长度字符,默认截取80字符长度*}&lt;br\/&gt;<br \/>\r\n{$english_word|wordwrap:10}{*多长后字符串换行,默认换行长度为80*}&lt;br\/&gt;<br \/>\r\n<p>{$english_word|upper|spacify|truncate:30:\"...\"}{*Smarty支持多个函数的组合,<\/p>\r\n<p>此组合为字符串先大写然后分隔然后截取指定长度*}&lt;br\/&gt;<\/p>\r\n{foreach&nbsp;name=outer&nbsp;item=contact&nbsp;from=$contacts}{*foreach循环数组*}<br \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;{foreach&nbsp;key=key&nbsp;item=item&nbsp;from=$contact}<br \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;{$key}:{$item}&lt;br\/&gt;<br \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;{\/foreach}<br \/>\r\n{\/foreach}<br \/>\r\n{foreach&nbsp;name=outer&nbsp;item=contact2&nbsp;from=$contacts2}<br \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;{foreach&nbsp;key=key&nbsp;item=item&nbsp;from=$contact2}<br \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;{$key}:{$item}&lt;br\/&gt;<br \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;{\/foreach}<br \/>\r\n{\/foreach}<br \/>\r\n{include_php&nbsp;file=\"function.php\"}{*包含指定的PHP文件*}<br \/>\r\n{insert&nbsp;name=\"top\"&nbsp;lid=\"toplid\"&nbsp;sid=\"topsid\"}{*调用insert_top&nbsp;PHP函数,函数参数为lid和sid的值*}<br \/>\r\n{if&nbsp;1&nbsp;eq&nbsp;1}{*条件判断语句*}<br \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;1=1<br \/>\r\n{elseif&nbsp;1&nbsp;ne&nbsp;1}<br \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;1!=1<br \/>\r\n{elseif&nbsp;1&nbsp;gt&nbsp;1}<br \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;1&gt;1<br \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;{elseif&nbsp;1&nbsp;lt&nbsp;1}<br \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;1&lt;1<br \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;{elseif&nbsp;1&nbsp;gte&nbsp;1}<br \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;1&gt;=1<br \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;{elseif&nbsp;1&nbsp;lte&nbsp;1}<br \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;1&lt;=1<br \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&lt;font&nbsp;color=\"red\"&gt;1%1=1&lt;\/font&gt;<br \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;{else}<br \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;你的人品真不好<br \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;{\/if}<br \/>\r\n{ldelim}function&nbsp;insert_top&nbsp;{rdelim}&nbsp;is&nbsp;insert_top&nbsp;{*输出中括号*}<br \/>\r\n{literal}{*加入一段HTML,脚本代码等*}<br \/>\r\n&lt;script&nbsp;language=\"javascript\"&nbsp;type=\"text\/css\"&gt;<br \/>\r\n&lt;!--<br \/>\r\nfunction&nbsp;load()<br \/>\r\n{<br \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;alert('页面加载....');<br \/>\r\n}<br \/>\r\n\/\/--&gt;<br \/>\r\n&lt;\/script&gt;<br \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;{\/literal}<br \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;{*包含一段PHP语句*}<br \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;{php}<br \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;echo&nbsp;\"php代码运行\";<br \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;{\/php}<br \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;{section&nbsp;name=member&nbsp;loop=$contacts3&nbsp;show=true}{*while循环&nbsp;show是否SHOW&nbsp;section中的循环内容*}<br \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;{if&nbsp;$smarty.section.member.first}<br \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;first<br \/>\r\n{\/if}<br \/>\r\n{if&nbsp;$smarty.section.member.last}<br \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;last<br \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;memberchild:{$contacts4[member][memberchild]}<br \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;{\/section}<br \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;total:{$smarty.section.member.total}{*数据长度或总记录数*}<br \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;{\/section}<br \/>\r\n&nbsp;<br \/>\r\n&lt;\/BODY&gt;<br \/>\r\n&lt;\/HTML&gt;","articleTypeId":"1318325201554","articleTitle":"smarty、smarty格式化、smarty整数、smarty float、smarty各种转换方式、smarty日期转换等等","articleIsPublished":"0","articleViewCount":"441","articleAbstract":"&lt;?require(setup.php);define(PAGETITLE,pagtitle);functioninsert_top($lid,$sid){echoinsertfunction;}$smarty=newSmartyRebuild();$smarty-&gt;assign(name,Linux);$smarty-&gt;assign(title,在线有有要有和蔼是是非非要要);...","oId":"1333715416789","articleCreateDate":"2012年04月06日 20:30:16","articleTags":""},"1347412746189":{"articleUpdateDate":"2012年09月12日 09:36:53","articleContent":"<p>\r\n\t<p style=\"text-indent:21.0000pt;\">\r\n\t\t<br \/>\r\n\t<\/p>\r\n\t<p style=\"text-indent:21.0000pt;\">\r\n\t\t经常看到朋友们在写一些或多或少的心情文字，我忽然发现文字是一种软弱感情的抒发，心情失落、惆怅、悲愤、感动的时候，文字尤为迸发的快一些、多一些，不知道朋友们是否有这样的同感，高中大学那会儿写了很多的文字，都是关于悲伤的，觉得任何人都不懂自己的心情，原来那个时候的孩子们都是感情作家，我甚至尝试过写小说，但是在写完几千字之后最终不了了之，后来在墙角发现它再翻看时，我已经忘记了那时候想到的故事的发展应该是如何的了，只是依稀记得我原本是想将其中的人物关系写的很复杂的，可笑的是我后来看起里面的人物关系的确很复杂，因为作为一个原著作者的我都已经搞不清楚谁跟谁是什么关系了。那时候看过很多感情作家的小说，故事都不太记得了，大约都是一些关于青春时候的爱情的，很清澈透亮的那种感觉，但是后来回想起来会觉得比童话故事更加天真。\r\n\t<\/p>\r\n\t<p style=\"text-indent:21.0000pt;\">\r\n\t\t<br \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;不知道幸福是什么感觉，是不是两个人在一起不说话都会望着对方傻笑，笑过之后还会笑着说对方很傻呢？现在不太爱写字也应该是因为这样的吧<span>?<\/span><span>因为太多的事情很琐碎所以不愿意记录，花着大把的时间都是幸福着的所以不愿意再花时间去写字，因为悲伤所以写字，所以文字都是柔软的，亦或是激昂的，而幸福生活都是琐碎的不值一提，因为太多太多类似的情景了。<\/span> \r\n\t<\/p>\r\n\t<p style=\"text-indent:21.0000pt;\">\r\n\t\t<br \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;关注微博时候无意间关注了张小娴，以前看到她的文字会不由自主的被感动，但是现在看来却没有心情了，任何女子都是会有梦想的雌性动物，但是不是所有的女子都自始至终拥有这种美好的心情，当生活到自然而然的时候，心情也是自然而然的了，也就是没有什么可以写下来的时候了。高中的时候很多同学觉得我以后可以当<span>\u201C<\/span><span>作家<\/span><span>\u201D<\/span><span>，那时候还真是挺当真，只是后来觉得很可笑，文字后来就不自觉的成为了自己喜欢的一部分，再后来，自己不愿意写了，看到漂亮的文字会想起曾经自己也写过的很多漂亮的文字，而且还感动过不少人，没谈过感情的人似乎比常人更懂感情，因为想象的空间比较大，色彩斑斓的样子都是可以写下来的，又在无意间触碰到了一些人柔软的心房，所以得到了这些人的默许，或许是极好的鼓励吧，我也是这样坚持下来的。不喜欢看书，或者应该说是不喜欢长篇大论，只字片语的细腻反倒是更能打动我一些，始终觉得文字是拼凑起来的音符，每一句的完整才觉得是真正的给文字赋予了另一个生命。<\/span> \r\n\t<\/p>\r\n\t<p style=\"text-indent:18.0000pt;\">\r\n\t\t朋友的固执都是那么的可爱，笔尖下的音符在我们的心情上唱歌，一遍一遍的时候，幸福地忘记了写字。\r\n\t<\/p>\r\n\t<p style=\"text-indent:18.0000pt;\">\r\n\t\t<br \/>\r\n\t<\/p>\r\n\t<p style=\"text-indent:18.0000pt;\">\r\n\t\t<br \/>\r\n\t<\/p>\r\n\t<p style=\"text-indent:18.0000pt;\">\r\n\t\t<br \/>\r\n\t<\/p>\r\n\t<p style=\"text-indent:18.0000pt;\">\r\n\t\t<br \/>\r\n\t<\/p>\r\n\t<p style=\"text-indent:18.0000pt;\">\r\n\t\t<br \/>\r\n\t<\/p>\r\n\t<p style=\"text-indent:18.0000pt;\">\r\n\t\t<br \/>\r\n\t<\/p>\r\n\t<p>\r\n\t\t<strong>[<\/strong><span><strong>特别声明<\/strong><\/span><span><strong>:<\/strong><\/span><span><strong>本文章为好友提供<\/strong><\/span><span><strong>]<\/strong><\/span> \r\n\t<\/p>\r\n\t<p>\r\n\t\t<br
