Helvetica, STHeiti;color:#454545;\">\r\n\t<strong>dede后台空白，PHP文件不能运行，登录空白--解决方案<\/strong> \r\n<\/p>\r\n<p style=\"font-size:14px;background-color:#FFFFFF;font-family:'Microsoft Yahei', 微软雅黑, Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti;color:#454545;\">\r\n\t这个纠结了一上午的事情，就因为用记事本修改了下data\/common.inc.php，导致登陆dedecms后台就空白，运行不了php\r\n<\/p>\r\n<p style=\"font-size:14px;background-color:#FFFFFF;font-family:'Microsoft Yahei', 微软雅黑, Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti;color:#454545;\">\r\n\t这需要刚刚安装好的全新的dedecms的data\/common.inc.php文件，用dw改数据库连接信息\r\n<\/p>\r\n<p style=\"font-size:14px;background-color:#FFFFFF;font-family:'Microsoft Yahei', 微软雅黑, Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti;color:#454545;\">\r\n\t&nbsp;\r\n<\/p>\r\n<p style=\"font-size:14px;background-color:#FFFFFF;font-family:'Microsoft Yahei', 微软雅黑, Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti;color:#454545;\">\r\n\tDEDE安装后，后台页面空白，后台栏目链接空白，而且还不能注销后台。进入后台，也只能通过\/dede\/login.php文件。我被这问题困扰了几个小时呢。当时真想把网站删除了，重新安装。在网上找了好久也没找到什么好的方法解决这个问题，后来我想起PHP代码很忌讳用记事本修改的，你是不是也用记事本修改了数据库配置文件(\/data\/common.inc.php)呢？\r\n<\/p>\r\n<p style=\"font-size:14px;background-color:#FFFFFF;font-family:'Microsoft Yahei', 微软雅黑, Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti;color:#454545;\">\r\n\t<br \/>\r\n<\/p>\r\n<p style=\"font-size:14px;background-color:#FFFFFF;font-family:'Microsoft Yahei', 微软雅黑, Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti;color:#454545;\">\r\n\t用记事本修改了数据库配置文件进后台就会出面空白页面的.<br \/>\r\n<br \/>\r\n解决方法也很简单：你只要把DEDE 初始安装的data\/common.inc.php 用Dreamweaver 或者Notepad++打开,保存为无BOM格式文件即可。\r\n<\/p>\r\n<p style=\"font-size:14px;background-color:#FFFFFF;font-family:'Microsoft Yahei', 微软雅黑, Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti;color:#454545;\">\r\n\t<br \/>\r\n<\/p>\r\n<p style=\"font-size:14px;background-color:#FFFFFF;font-family:'Microsoft Yahei', 微软雅黑, Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti;color:#454545;\">\r\n\t<br \/>\r\n<\/p>\r\n<p style=\"font-size:14px;background-color:#FFFFFF;font-family:'Microsoft Yahei', 微软雅黑, Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti;color:#454545;\">\r\n\t<strong>修改espcms后台标题版权&nbsp;<\/strong> \r\n<\/p>\r\n<p style=\"font-size:14px;background-color:#FFFFFF;font-family:'Microsoft Yahei', 微软雅黑, Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti;color:#454545;\">\r\n\t<br \/>\r\n<\/p>\r\n<p style=\"font-size:14px;background-color:#FFFFFF;font-family:'Microsoft Yahei', 微软雅黑, Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti;color:#454545;\">\r\n\t<br \/>\r\n<\/p>\r\n<p style=\"color:#545454;font-family:Tahoma, 'Microsoft Yahei';font-size:14px;background-color:#FFFFFF;\">\r\n\t项目---后台文件夹----js---treemenu.js\r\n<\/p>\r\n<p style=\"color:#545454;font-family:Tahoma, 'Microsoft Yahei';font-size:14px;background-color:#FFFFFF;\">\r\n\t找到第28行，删除以下内容\r\n<\/p>\r\n<p style=\"color:#545454;font-family:Tahoma, 'Microsoft Yahei';font-size:14px;background-color:#FFFFFF;\">\r\n\tESPCMS|typeid|Array|push|verecisp|mdelink|modelinkkey||break|Date|setTime|u5546|getTime|uFF0C|u7F16|u53F7|uFF1A|01|1000|current|join|onclick|expires|init|toGMTString|path|powerstr|u514D|location|u8D39|freshid|exec|parentNode|div|return|softupdate|expandAll|authentication|RegExp|random|\r\n<\/p>\r\n<p style=\"color:#545454;font-family:Tahoma, 'Microsoft Yahei';font-size:14px;background-color:#FFFFFF;\">\r\n\t或将以上代码修改成想要的内容\r\n<\/p>\r\n<p style=\"font-size:14px;background-color:#FFFFFF;font-family:'Microsoft Yahei', 微软雅黑, Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti;color:#454545;\">\r\n\t<br \/>\r\n<\/p>\r\n<p style=\"font-size:14px;background-color:#FFFFFF;font-family:'Microsoft Yahei', 微软雅黑, Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti;color:#454545;\">\r\n\t<br \/>\r\n<\/p>\r\n<strong><span><span><strong><span><span>destoon修改购买商品需卖家确认才能付款<\/span><\/span><\/strong><\/span><\/span><\/strong> \r\n<p>\r\n\t<br \/>\r\n<\/p>\r\n<p style=\"font-size:14px;background-color:#FFFFFF;font-family:'Microsoft Yahei', 微软雅黑, Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti;color:#454545;\">\r\n\t<strong><span><span><strong><span><span><br \/>\r\n<\/span><\/span><\/strong><\/span><\/span><\/strong> \r\n<\/p>\r\n<p style=\"font-size:14px;background-color:#FFFFFF;font-family:'Microsoft Yahei', 微软雅黑, Tahoma, Arial, Helvetica, STHeiti;color:#454545;\">\r\n\t<strong><span><span><strong><span><span><\/span><\/span><\/strong><\/span><\/span><\/strong> \r\n<\/p>\r\n<p style=\"color:#545454;font-family:Tahoma, 'Microsoft Yahei';font-size:14px;background-color:#FFFFFF;\">\r\n\t<span><\/span> \r\n<\/p>\r\n<p style=\"color:#545454;font-family:Tahoma, 'Microsoft Yahei';font-size:14px;background-color:#FFFFFF;\">\r\n\t项目---module---member---trade.inc.php\r\n<\/p>\r\n<p style=\"color:#545454;font-family:Tahoma, 'Microsoft Yahei';font-size:14px;background-color:#FFFFFF;\">\r\n\t找到大约310行的样子，\r\n<\/p>\r\n<p style=\"color:#545454;font-family:Tahoma, 'Microsoft Yahei';font-size:14px;background-color:#FFFFFF;\">\r\n\t$db-&gt;query(\"INSERT INTO {$DT_PRE}finance_trade (buyer,seller,title,linkurl,thumb,amount,addtime,updatetime,note, buyer_postcode,buyer_address,buyer_name,buyer_phone,buyer_receive<strong><span><span style=\"color:#E53333;\">,<\/span><span><\/span><span style=\"color:#E53333;\">statu<\/span><span style=\"color:#E53333;\">s<\/span><\/span><\/strong>) VALUES ('$_username','$seller','$title','$linkurl','$thumb','$amount','$DT_TIME','$DT_TIME','$note','$buyer_postcode','$buyer_address','$buyer_name','$buyer_phone','$buyer_receive'<strong><span><span style=\"color:#E53333;\">,<\/span><span style=\"color:#E53333;\">1<\/span><\/span><\/strong>)\");\r\n<\/p>\r\n<p style=\"color:#545454;font-family:Tahoma, 'Microsoft Yahei';font-size:14px;background-color:#FFFFFF;\">\r\n\t将红色加粗的代码加入进去，OK！\r\n<\/p>\r\n<p>\r\n\t<br \/>\r\n<\/p>\r\n<span><\/span> \r\n<p>\r\n\t<br \/>\r\n<\/p>","articleTypeId":"1305101026515","articleTitle":"cms 问题以及解决办法","articleIsPublished":"0","articleViewCount":"330","articleAbstract":"dede后台空白，PHP文件不能运行，登录空白--解决方案这个纠结了一上午的事情，就因为用记事本修改了下data\/common.inc.php，导致登陆dedecms后台就空白，运行不了php这需要刚刚安装好的全新的dedecms的data\/common.inc.php文件，用dw改数据库连接信息DEDE安装后，后台页面空白，后台栏目链接空白，而且还不能注销后台。进入后台，也只能通过\/dede\/l...","oId":"1348036442993","articleCreateDate":"2012年09月19日 New Roman';font-size:10.5pt;mso-spacerun:'yes';\">&nbsp;网络推广是伴随着互联网发展以及搜索引擎技术的成熟而出现的一种网络时代需求。互联网的发展给众多靠网站盈利的企业带来了生机，同时也激起了更多的企业投身互联网市场瓜分属于自己的那份地盘。然而，搜索引擎技术是在与需求的交互中发展起来的，于是才有了搜索引擎优化（<span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';\">SEO<\/span><span style=\"font-family:宋体;\">）技术，同时搜索引擎和搜索引擎优化更是一对双刃剑，在网络推广优化的操作过程中，一定要本着严谨<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';\">:<\/span><span style=\"font-family:宋体;\">客观的态度，否则很容易玩火烧身。&nbsp;<\/span><\/span><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.5pt;mso-spacerun:'yes';\"><?xml:namespace prefix = o ns = \"urn:schemas-microsoft-com:office:office\" \/><o:p><\/o:p><\/span><\/p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;\" class=\"p0\"><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.5pt;mso-spacerun:'yes';\"><o:p><\/o:p><\/span><\/p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;\" class=\"p0\"><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.5pt;mso-spacerun:'yes';\">&nbsp;<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.5pt;mso-spacerun:'yes';\"><o:p><\/o:p><\/span><\/p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;\" class=\"p0\"><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.5pt;mso-spacerun:'yes';\"><o:p><\/o:p><\/span><\/p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;\" class=\"p0\"><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.5pt;mso-spacerun:'yes';\">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;中国<span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';\">8U<\/span><span style=\"font-family:宋体;\">网络推广团队在长期进行网络推广和企业网站推广的实践中得出了诸多经验和心得，就此与大家分享：如何才能更好更快更正确的执行网络推广，以及决定网络推广成败的几大关键因素。<\/span><\/span><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.5pt;mso-spacerun:'yes';\"><o:p><\/o:p><\/span><\/p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;\" class=\"p0\"><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.5pt;mso-spacerun:'yes';\"><o:p><\/o:p><\/span><\/p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;\" class=\"p0\"><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.5pt;mso-spacerun:'yes';\">&nbsp;<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.5pt;mso-spacerun:'yes';\"><o:p><\/o:p><\/span><\/p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;\" class=\"p0\"><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.5pt;mso-spacerun:'yes';\"><o:p><\/o:p><\/span><\/p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;\" class=\"p0\"><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.5pt;mso-spacerun:'yes';\">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;关键之一<span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';\">:<\/span><span style=\"font-family:宋体;\">网站建设第一步，推广成功有近路<\/span><\/span><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.5pt;mso-spacerun:'yes';\"><o:p><\/o:p><\/span><\/p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;\" class=\"p0\"><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.5pt;mso-spacerun:'yes';\"><o:p><\/o:p><\/span><\/p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;\" class=\"p0\"><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.5pt;mso-spacerun:'yes';\">&nbsp;<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.5pt;mso-spacerun:'yes';\"><o:p><\/o:p><\/span><\/p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;\" class=\"p0\"><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.5pt;mso-spacerun:'yes';\"><o:p><\/o:p><\/span><\/p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;\" class=\"p0\"><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.5pt;mso-spacerun:'yes';\">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;对于网站推广，如果没有把网站建设成功，那么推广也是白费力气的。一个网站，在建设的时候，就要把<span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';\">SEO<\/span><span style=\"font-family:宋体;\">（搜索引擎优化）优化技术运用到其中。这样建设出来的网站，才能达到一个搜索引擎友好度，这样推广起来，才会更省力，更有效果。现在<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';\">SEO<\/span><span style=\"font-family:宋体;\">技术已经作为网站建设和网站推广工作的重要环节和技术指导。所以，在推广之前，要把网站优化工作做好。<\/span><\/span><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.5pt;mso-spacerun:'yes';\"><o:p><\/o:p><\/span><\/p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;\" class=\"p0\"><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.5pt;mso-spacerun:'yes';\"><o:p><\/o:p><\/span><\/p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;\" class=\"p0\"><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.5pt;mso-spacerun:'yes';\">&nbsp;<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.5pt;mso-spacerun:'yes';\"><o:p><\/o:p><\/span><\/p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;\" class=\"p0\"><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.5pt;mso-spacerun:'yes';\"><o:p><\/o:p><\/span><\/p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;\" class=\"p0\"><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.5pt;mso-spacerun:'yes';\">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;关键之二<span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';\">:<\/span><span style=\"font-family:宋体;\">网站推广莫盲目，把握时机很重要<\/span><\/span><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.5pt;mso-spacerun:'yes';\"><o:p><\/o:p><\/span><\/p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;\" class=\"p0\"><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.5pt;mso-spacerun:'yes';\"><o:p><\/o:p><\/span><\/p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;\" class=\"p0\"><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.5pt;mso-spacerun:'yes';\">&nbsp;<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.5pt;mso-spacerun:'yes';\"><o:p><\/o:p><\/span><\/p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;\" class=\"p0\"><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.5pt;mso-spacerun:'yes';\"><o:p><\/o:p><\/span><\/p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;\" class=\"p0\"><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.5pt;mso-spacerun:'yes';\">成功者之所以成功，并不是他们比我们聪明多少，而是在对的时间做了对的选择，这就是时机。做任何事情都要讲究时机，企业做网络推广也要选择恰当的时机，在时机这个因素当中很重要的一点就是重大事件，企业把产品和当前大众最关注的重大事情联系起来，利用人们关注的焦点来推广自己往往会取得非常好的效果。所谓<span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';\">\u201C<\/span><span style=\"font-family:宋体;\">机不可失，时不再来<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';\">\u201D<\/span><span style=\"font-family:宋体;\">，把握住了时机就成功了一大步，接下来的就看你怎么去做了。<\/span><\/span><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.5pt;mso-spacerun:'yes';\"><o:p><\/o:p><\/span><\/p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;\" class=\"p0\"><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.5pt;mso-spacerun:'yes';\"><o:p><\/o:p><\/span><\/p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;\" class=\"p0\"><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.5pt;mso-spacerun:'yes';\">&nbsp;<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.5pt;mso-spacerun:'yes';\"><o:p><\/o:p><\/span><\/p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;\" class=\"p0\"><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.5pt;mso-spacerun:'yes';\"><o:p><\/o:p><\/span><\/p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;\" class=\"p0\"><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.5pt;mso-spacerun:'yes';\">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;关键之三<span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';\">:<\/span><span style=\"font-family:宋体;\">推广途径要选好，按部就班最牢靠<\/span><\/span><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.5pt;mso-spacerun:'yes';\"><o:p><\/o:p><\/span><\/p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;\" class=\"p0\"><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.5pt;mso-spacerun:'yes';\"><o:p><\/o:p><\/span><\/p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;\" class=\"p0\"><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.5pt;mso-spacerun:'yes';\">&nbsp;<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.5pt;mso-spacerun:'yes';\"><o:p><\/o:p><\/span><\/p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;\" class=\"p0\"><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.5pt;mso-spacerun:'yes';\"><o:p><\/o:p><\/span><\/p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;\" class=\"p0\"><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.5pt;mso-spacerun:'yes';\">做任何事情，都有着一个大概的操作范围和应用渠道，那么对于网站推广，也是有很多途径可选，在选择途径的时候必须要考虑哪些媒体是目标用户经常访问的，有些网络平台虽然用户量非常的大，但是不要被表面现象所蒙蔽，数量是一方面，更重要的是质量。<span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';\">1000<\/span><span style=\"font-family:宋体;\">个非目标群体点击的价值比不上一个目标群体点击的价值，企业推广的目的是带来客户不是做秀，我们需要的是产生实实在在的经济收益。选择目标群体相对集中的网络平台是网络推广取得效果的基本保障。在这里建议大家，在选择推广途径的时候先做一次目标客户群体调查，不要凭感觉盲目的去做。<\/span><\/span><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.5pt;mso-spacerun:'yes';\"><o:p><\/o:p><\/span><\/p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;\" class=\"p0\"><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.5pt;mso-spacerun:'yes';\"><o:p><\/o:p><\/span><\/p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;\" class=\"p0\"><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.5pt;mso-spacerun:'yes';\">&nbsp;<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.5pt;mso-spacerun:'yes';\"><o:p><\/o:p><\/span><\/p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;\" class=\"p0\"><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.5pt;mso-spacerun:'yes';\"><o:p><\/o:p><\/span><\/p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;\" class=\"p0\"><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.5pt;mso-spacerun:'yes';\">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;关键之四<span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';\">:<\/span><span style=\"font-family:宋体;\">推广策略提前定，心中有数定制胜<\/span><\/span><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.5pt;mso-spacerun:'yes';\"><o:p><\/o:p><\/span><\/p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;\" class=\"p0\"><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.5pt;mso-spacerun:'yes';\"><o:p><\/o:p><\/span><\/p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;\" class=\"p0\"><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.5pt;mso-spacerun:'yes';\">&nbsp;<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.5pt;mso-spacerun:'yes';\"><o:p><\/o:p><\/span><\/p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;\" class=\"p0\"><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.5pt;mso-spacerun:'yes';\"><o:p><\/o:p><\/span><\/p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;\" class=\"p0\"><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.5pt;mso-spacerun:'yes';\">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;对于推广策略问题，就是我们在操作网站推广工作的执行之前，是不是已经有了一个完好的计划作为参考。凡是我们不能盲目去做，只有完整的计划，才能做到心中有数，临阵不乱。推广选择好途径，就需要按照推广策略进行工作执行。并且，在执行的时候，要有合理有效的效果检验配合，才能做好事半功倍的效果。<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.5pt;mso-spacerun:'yes';\"><o:p><\/o:p><\/span><\/p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;\" class=\"p0\"><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.5pt;mso-spacerun:'yes';\"><o:p><\/o:p><\/span><\/p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;\" class=\"p0\"><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.5pt;mso-spacerun:'yes';\">&nbsp;<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.5pt;mso-spacerun:'yes';\"><o:p><\/o:p><\/span><\/p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;\" class=\"p0\"><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.5pt;mso-spacerun:'yes';\"><o:p><\/o:p><\/span><\/p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;\" class=\"p0\"><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.5pt;mso-spacerun:'yes';\">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;关键之五<span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';\">:<\/span><span style=\"font-family:宋体;\">广告策划有门道，媒体选择不可少<\/span><\/span><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.5pt;mso-spacerun:'yes';\"><o:p><\/o:p><\/span><\/p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;\" class=\"p0\"><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.5pt;mso-spacerun:'yes';\"><o:p><\/o:p><\/span><\/p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;\" class=\"p0\"><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.5pt;mso-spacerun:'yes';\">&nbsp;<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.5pt;mso-spacerun:'yes';\"><o:p><\/o:p><\/span><\/p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;\" class=\"p0\"><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.5pt;mso-spacerun:'yes';\"><o:p><\/o:p><\/span><\/p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;\" class=\"p0\"><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.5pt;mso-spacerun:'yes';\">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;自从有了人类，广告就无处不在。尤其是我们当前生存的这个社会环境，更是广告处处感动人，处处广告人感动。所以现在人们面对铺天盖地的广告早已麻木，那么怎么样选择你需要推广采取的广告途径和渠道，是决定你广告成败的一个关键。选择什么媒体？选择什么形式？这些都需要有一个精心的挑选。<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.5pt;mso-spacerun:'yes';\"><o:p><\/o:p><\/span><\/p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;\" class=\"p0\"><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.5pt;mso-spacerun:'yes';\"><o:p><\/o:p><\/span><\/p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;\" class=\"p0\"><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.5pt;mso-spacerun:'yes';\">&nbsp;<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.5pt;mso-spacerun:'yes';\"><o:p><\/o:p><\/span><\/p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;\" class=\"p0\"><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.5pt;mso-spacerun:'yes';\"><o:p><\/o:p><\/span><\/p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;\" class=\"p0\"><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.5pt;mso-spacerun:'yes';\">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;关键之六<span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';\">:<\/span><span style=\"font-family:宋体;\">网站速度很关键，访问页面莫怠慢<\/span><\/span><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.5pt;mso-spacerun:'yes';\"><o:p><\/o:p><\/span><\/p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;\" class=\"p0\"><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.5pt;mso-spacerun:'yes';\"><o:p><\/o:p><\/span><\/p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;\" class=\"p0\"><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.5pt;mso-spacerun:'yes';\">&nbsp;<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.5pt;mso-spacerun:'yes';\"><o:p><\/o:p><\/span><\/p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;\" class=\"p0\"><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.5pt;mso-spacerun:'yes';\"><o:p><\/o:p><\/span><\/p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;\" class=\"p0\"><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.5pt;mso-spacerun:'yes';\">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;一个网站，如果打开速度非常慢，那么这个网站肯定是不会受人欢迎的。一般情况下，一个网站打开是速度应该在三秒到五秒之间，如果超过八秒，那么就会让客户等的不耐烦，最终可能舍门而去。由于中国存在南电信北网通的情况，北方用户访问南方的电信服务器速度会比较慢，所以在选择服务器机房的时候应该注意针对目标群体所在区域选择他们打开速度快的机房。如果你的客户是全国的那么最好选择电信<span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';\">:<\/span><span style=\"font-family:宋体;\">网通双<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';\">IP<\/span><span style=\"font-family:宋体;\">的服务器。很多企业都在使用虚拟主机，在选择的时候往往喜欢找大的虚拟主机服务商，殊不知他们的一台服务器要供成百上千的网站使用，速度慢是必然的，建议企业选择虚拟主机时找一下口碑好的小服务商，他们的服务器负荷没有那么大，速度会快一些。<\/span><\/span><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.5pt;mso-spacerun:'yes';\"><o:p><\/o:p><\/span><\/p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;\" class=\"p0\"><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.5pt;mso-spacerun:'yes';\"><o:p><\/o:p><\/span><\/p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;\" class=\"p0\"><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.5pt;mso-spacerun:'yes';\"><o:p><\/o:p><\/span><\/p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;\" class=\"p0\"><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.5pt;mso-spacerun:'yes';\">&nbsp;<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.5pt;mso-spacerun:'yes';\"><o:p><\/o:p><\/span><\/p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;\" class=\"p0\"><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.5pt;mso-spacerun:'yes';\"><o:p><\/o:p><\/span><\/p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;\" class=\"p0\"><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.5pt;mso-spacerun:'yes';\">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;关键之七<span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';\">:<\/span><span style=\"font-family:宋体;\">网站导航要醒目，帮助客户来指路<\/span><\/span><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.5pt;mso-spacerun:'yes';\"><o:p><\/o:p><\/span><\/p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;\" class=\"p0\"><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.5pt;mso-spacerun:'yes';\"><o:p><\/o:p><\/span><\/p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;\" class=\"p0\"><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.5pt;mso-spacerun:'yes';\">&nbsp;<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.5pt;mso-spacerun:'yes';\"><o:p><\/o:p><\/span><\/p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;\" class=\"p0\"><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.5pt;mso-spacerun:'yes';\"><o:p><\/o:p><\/span><\/p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;\" class=\"p0\"><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.5pt;mso-spacerun:'yes';\">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;网站是用来宣传公司业务的，不是让人欣赏的花瓶，实用<span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';\">:<\/span><span style=\"font-family:宋体;\">易用是最重要的，当然也不能太难看，否则也没有几个人愿意继续看下去。有些企业网站做的非常漂亮，但是要找一个产品需要点击好几次，有时候还找不到，要知道每增加一次点击就要失去大约<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';\">30%<\/span><span style=\"font-family:宋体;\">的客户，企业的网站应该调理清晰的展示企业的产品和服务，而不是和客户玩寻宝游戏，那样吃亏的只能是企业自己。还有一些企业在做推广的时候，无论什么宣传产品都链接到网站首页，我甚至见到过一些网站首页是一个很炫的动画，但是没有跳过按钮，也就是说每一个对他们产品感兴趣的客户都要先看半分站<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';\">Flash<\/span><span style=\"font-family:宋体;\">，这样是在把找上门的客户往门外推呀。最好的方法就是企业宣传什么产品就链接到介绍相应产品的页面，让客户打开直接就能看的感兴趣的产品，为客户提供方便就是给自己赢得成交机会！<\/span><\/span><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.5pt;mso-spacerun:'yes';\"><o:p><\/o:p><\/span><\/p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;\" class=\"p0\"><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.5pt;mso-spacerun:'yes';\"><o:p><\/o:p><\/span><\/p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;\" class=\"p0\"><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.5pt;mso-spacerun:'yes';\">&nbsp;<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.5pt;mso-spacerun:'yes';\"><o:p><\/o:p><\/span><\/p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;\" class=\"p0\"><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.5pt;mso-spacerun:'yes';\"><o:p><\/o:p><\/span><\/p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;\" class=\"p0\"><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.5pt;mso-spacerun:'yes';\">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;关键之八<span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';\">:<\/span><span style=\"font-family:宋体;\">联系方式要明细，沟通方便很必须<\/span><\/span><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.5pt;mso-spacerun:'yes';\"><o:p><\/o:p><\/span><\/p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;\" class=\"p0\"><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.5pt;mso-spacerun:'yes';\"><o:p><\/o:p><\/span><\/p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;\" class=\"p0\"><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.5pt;mso-spacerun:'yes';\">&nbsp;<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.5pt;mso-spacerun:'yes';\"><o:p><\/o:p><\/span><\/p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;\" class=\"p0\"><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.5pt;mso-spacerun:'yes';\"><o:p><\/o:p><\/span><\/p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;\" class=\"p0\"><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.5pt;mso-spacerun:'yes';\">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;前面的工作都是让更多的潜在客户看的企业的产品和服务，并对产生兴趣。相信绝大部分人都不会通过网络看了产品介绍就决定向企业购买，更多的是与企业取得联系并且回去进一步的资料和商谈价格。这个时候企业应该提供电话<span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';\">:<\/span><span style=\"font-family:宋体;\">详细地址<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';\">:<\/span><span style=\"font-family:宋体;\">邮件等联系方式，也可以增加<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';\">QQ:MSN<\/span><span style=\"font-family:宋体;\">等，以便潜在客户选择自己方便的方式与企业联系。我曾经看的有些企业在网址上只留了一部电话，并且占线率极高，这样的话客户难以和企业取得联系，等于前面的工作都是在浪费资源。<\/span><\/span><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.5pt;mso-spacerun:'yes';\"><o:p><\/o:p><\/span><\/p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;\" class=\"p0\"><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.5pt;mso-spacerun:'yes';\"><o:p><\/o:p><\/span><\/p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;\" class=\"p0\"><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.5pt;mso-spacerun:'yes';\">&nbsp;<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.5pt;mso-spacerun:'yes';\"><o:p><\/o:p><\/span><\/p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;\" class=\"p0\"><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.5pt;mso-spacerun:'yes';\"><o:p><\/o:p><\/span><\/p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;\" class=\"p0\"><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.5pt;mso-spacerun:'yes';\">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;关键之九<span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';\">:<\/span><span style=\"font-family:宋体;\">人员素质要提高，以德制胜是高招<\/span><\/span><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.5pt;mso-spacerun:'yes';\"><o:p><\/o:p><\/span><\/p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;\" class=\"p0\"><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.5pt;mso-spacerun:'yes';\"><o:p><\/o:p><\/span><\/p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;\" class=\"p0\"><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.5pt;mso-spacerun:'yes';\">&nbsp;<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.5pt;mso-spacerun:'yes';\"><o:p><\/o:p><\/span><\/p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;\" class=\"p0\"><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.5pt;mso-spacerun:'yes';\"><o:p><\/o:p><\/span><\/p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;\" class=\"p0\"><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.5pt;mso-spacerun:'yes';\">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;这里指的是客服人员和销售人员的谈判能力，问题处理速度等。做营销的人都知道客户购买一个产品，销售人员的因素占了七成以上。产品再好，销售人员不能抓住产品买点<span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';\">:<\/span><span style=\"font-family:宋体;\">不能掌握客户心理，成交的几率也会很低，除非是客户对你的产品已经非常了解和信赖，就是要和你购买。安排有实力的客服和销售人员接待主动咨询的客户是提高成交率的重要保障。<\/span><\/span><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.5pt;mso-spacerun:'yes';\"><o:p><\/o:p><\/span><\/p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;\" class=\"p0\"><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.5pt;mso-spacerun:'yes';\"><o:p><\/o:p><\/span><\/p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;\" class=\"p0\"><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.5pt;mso-spacerun:'yes';\">&nbsp;<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.5pt;mso-spacerun:'yes';\"><o:p><\/o:p><\/span><\/p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;\" class=\"p0\"><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.5pt;mso-spacerun:'yes';\"><o:p><\/o:p><\/span><\/p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;\" class=\"p0\"><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.5pt;mso-spacerun:'yes';\">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;关键之十<span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';\">:<\/span><span style=\"font-family:宋体;\">企业竞争莫嬉闹，三分天下要知晓<\/span><\/span><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.5pt;mso-spacerun:'yes';\"><o:p><\/o:p><\/span><\/p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;\" class=\"p0\"><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.5pt;mso-spacerun:'yes';\"><o:p><\/o:p><\/span><\/p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;\" class=\"p0\"><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.5pt;mso-spacerun:'yes';\">&nbsp;<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.5pt;mso-spacerun:'yes';\"><o:p><\/o:p><\/span><\/p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;\" class=\"p0\"><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.5pt;mso-spacerun:'yes';\"><o:p><\/o:p><\/span><\/p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;\" class=\"p0\"><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.5pt;mso-spacerun:'yes';\">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;大部分人在做出购买决策之前都会货比三家，如果你企业的产品与同类产品相比品牌<span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';\">:<\/span><span style=\"font-family:宋体;\">性能<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';\">:<\/span><span style=\"font-family:宋体;\">价格<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';\">:<\/span><span style=\"font-family:宋体;\">服务等都处于弱势，那么即时你的销售人员再好，最终成交的几率也会降低很多，除非用一些欺骗手段蒙那些比较外行而又头脑容易发热的客户。<\/span><\/span><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.5pt;mso-spacerun:'yes';\"><o:p><\/o:p><\/span><\/p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;\" class=\"p0\"><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.5pt;mso-spacerun:'yes';\"><o:p><\/o:p><\/span><\/p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;\" class=\"p0\"><span style=\"font-family:'Times New 同时解析多个项目，但是我又不想每次添加之后，都重启apache，所以就想到如下方法<\/p>\r\n<p>这个方法，只需要启动apache，然后把项目文件夹放到web下面，然后用这个服务器绑定的域名访问，<\/p>\r\n<p>例如：<\/p>\r\n<p>服务器绑定域名choujone.com<\/p>\r\n<p>项目文件夹叫demo，<\/p>\r\n<p>然后我们就访问demo.choujone.com<\/p>\r\n<p>这个二级域名就可以定位到demo文件夹下面，<\/p>\r\n<p>当然，默认访问的文件可以修改DirectoryIndex<\/p>\r\n<p>修改httpd-vhosts.conf<\/p>\r\n<p>&lt;VirtualHost *:80&gt; <br \/>\r\n&nbsp;UseCanonicalName Off <br \/>\r\n&nbsp;ServerAdmin <a href=\"support@choujone.com\" target=\"_blank\">support@choujone.com<\/a> <br \/>\r\n&nbsp;VirtualDocumentRoot E:\/wwwroot\/web\/%-3 <br \/>\r\n&nbsp;VirtualScriptAlias E:\/wwwroot\/web\/%-3\/cgi-bin\/ <br \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;DirectoryIndex index.htm index.html index.php<br \/>\r\n&nbsp;&lt;Directory \"E:\/wwwroot\/web\"&gt;\/\/这里设置整个文件夹的访问权限<br \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Options Indexes FollowSymLinks MultiViews ExecCGI<br \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;AllowOverride All<br \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;Order allow,deny<br \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;Allow from all<br \/>\r\n&nbsp;&lt;\/Directory&gt;<br \/>\r\n&lt;\/VirtualHost&gt; <\/p>\r\n<p>然后把每一个项目<\/p>\r\n<p>其他如果想单独配置，也可以写在下面<\/p>\r\n<p>&lt;VirtualHost *:80&gt;<br \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; ServerAdmin <a href=\"support@choujone.com\" googleapis-ajax.l.google.com<\/p>\r\n<p>&nbsp;<\/p>\r\n<p>#Modules<\/p>\r\n<p>74.125.39.132 &nbsp; 1.ig.gmodules.com<\/p>\r\n<p>74.125.39.132 &nbsp; 2.ig.gmodules.com<\/p>\r\n<p>74.125.39.132 &nbsp; &nbsp;buttons.googlesyndication.com<\/p>\r\n<\/p>","articleTypeId":"1292813431889","articleTitle":"想访问google的产品，现在不用翻墙啦","articleIsPublished":"0","articleViewCount":"657","articleAbstract":"想访问google的产品，现在不用翻墙啦，只需要修改一下本地的host文件就可以了操作：打开C:\\WINDOWS\\system32\\drivers\\etc下的hosts文件，在最后添加下面的内容保存即可测试地址：https:\/\/picasaweb.google.com\/lh\/myphotos（这个是google的网络相册）如果可以正常访问，则表示你安装成功啦~~不过google的appspot.c...","oId":"1311916468865","articleCreateDate":"2011年07月29日 05:14:28","articleTags":"google 翻墙"},"1317195664402":{"articleUpdateDate":"","articleContent":"<span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family:宋体;font-size:14px;line-height:22px;\"><p style=\"margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px;padding-top:5px;padding-right:0px;padding-bottom:5px;padding-left:0px;font-size:14px;\">首先把原理大致的描述一下，我们把phpsso作为uc的一个应用来处理。UCenter 作服务端；phpsso 与 Discuz! 分别作 UCenter 的客户端应用；phpsso 与 Discuz! 通过 UCenter 发生交互。phpcms 通过 phpsso 与 Discuz! 发生交互。<\/p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px;padding-top:5px;padding-right:0px;padding-bottom:5px;padding-left:0px;font-size:14px;\">　　从 phpcms 注册后，同步注册到 UCenter （这个过程需要在后台开启uc，并且保证通信成功才行），这是因为 phpcms 实际上是与 UCenter 进行通信。用该帐号从 Discuz! 登录，实际上是从 UCenter 登录。<span id=\"more-134\">而在 Discuz! 中，是没有这个帐号的，所以要把 UCenter 中的这个帐号信息注册到 Discuz! 中（即所谓的\u201C激活\u201D）。这是康盛创想设计的 UCenter 与 Discuz! 帐号转移机制，我们是无法改变的（除非把 Discuz! 从 UCenter 中分离！）反之，从 Discuz! 注册后，同步注册到 phpsso 。但 phpsso 同时注册到 phpcms ，所以就不需要\u201C激活\u201D了。<\/span><\/p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px;padding-top:5px;padding-right:0px;padding-bottom:5px;padding-left:0px;font-size:14px;\">第一步、安装 Phpcms V9.0.8 Release 20110413 版。全新安装 Discuz! X1.5 或全新安装 Discuz! X2 RC 版 20110505发布（同时安装 UCenter）。<\/p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px;padding-top:5px;padding-right:0px;padding-bottom:5px;padding-left:0px;font-size:14px;\">第二步、在 UCenter 中添加\u201Cphpsso 应用\u201D。<\/p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px;padding-top:5px;padding-right:0px;padding-bottom:5px;padding-left:0px;font-size:14px;\">1、管理员登录 Discuz! X2 管理中心，进入\u201CUCenter\u201D，点击\u201C应用管理\u201D。<\/p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px;padding-top:5px;padding-right:0px;padding-bottom:5px;padding-left:0px;font-size:14px;\">2、点击\u201C添加新应用\u201D按钮，选择安装方式为\u201D自定义安装\u201C。在展开的\u201D添加新应用\u201C参数配置表中，各项参数配置如下：<\/p>\r\n<ul style=\"margin-top:0px;margin-right:0px;margin-bottom:0px;margin-left:0px;padding-top:0px;padding-right:40px;padding-bottom:0px;padding-left:40px;font-size:14px;list-style-type:disc;list-style-position:initial;list-style-image:initial;\"><li>应用类型:其它<\/li>\r\n<li>应用名称：phpsso<\/li>\r\n<li>应用的主 URL：http：\/\/localhost\/phpcms\/phpsso_server （必填，最后不要带斜线）<\/li>\r\n<li>应用 IP：（选填。）<\/li>\r\n<li>通信密钥：（自动生成。并把这个cookie复制下来。粘贴到phpsso中。否则 phpsso 将无法与 UCenter 正常通信。）<\/li>\r\n<li>应用的物理路径：（选填，默认留空）<\/li>\r\n<li>查看个人资料页面地址：（选填，URL中域名后面的部分，如：\/space.php?uid=%s 这里的 %s 代表uid）<\/li>\r\n<li>应用接口文件名称：（选填，默认为uc.php）<\/li>\r\n<li>标签单条显示模板：（选填，默认留空）<\/li>\r\n<li>标签模板标记说明：（选填，默认留空）<\/li>\r\n<li>是否开启同步登录：是<\/li>\r\n<li>是否接受通知：是（可选）<\/li>\r\n<\/ul>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px;padding-top:5px;padding-right:0px;padding-bottom:5px;padding-left:0px;font-size:14px;\">3、提交后，生成新的应用ID。（记住这个应用ID，在\u201D第三步\u201C中将用到它。）<\/p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px;padding-top:5px;padding-right:0px;padding-bottom:5px;padding-left:0px;font-size:14px;\">第三步、配置 phpsso 。<\/p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px;padding-top:5px;padding-right:0px;padding-bottom:5px;padding-left:0px;font-size:14px;\">1、管理员登录 phpcms V9 后台管理中心，进入\u201Cphpsso\u201D，点击\u201C系统设置\u201D。<\/p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px;padding-top:5px;padding-right:0px;padding-bottom:5px;padding-left:0px;font-size:14px;\">2、在\u201C系统设置\u201D下的\u201CUCenter配置\u201D一栏中，各项参数配置如下：<\/p>\r\n<ul style=\"margin-top:0px;margin-right:0px;margin-bottom:0px;margin-left:0px;padding-top:0px;padding-right:40px;padding-bottom:0px;padding-left:40px;font-size:14px;list-style-type:disc;list-style-position:initial;list-style-image:initial;\"><li>是否启用：是<\/li>\r\n<li>Ucenter api 地址：http：\/\/localhost\/ucenter （必填，最后不要带斜线）<\/li>\r\n<li>Ucenter api IP：（选填，一般不用填写，遇到无法同步时，请填写 UCenter 主机的IP地址）<\/li>\r\n<li>Ucenter 数据库主机名：localhost （必填，视实际情况而定）<\/li>\r\n<li>Ucenter 数据库用户名：root （必填，视实际情况而定）<\/li>\r\n<li>Ucenter 数据库密码：root （视实际情况而定）<\/li>\r\n<li>Ucenter 数据库名：discuz （必填，视实际情况而定）<\/li>\r\n<li>Ucenter 数据库表前缀：pre_ucenter_ （必填，视实际情况而定。如果此项填写错误，将导致 phpcms 无法注册新会员！）<\/li>\r\n<li>Ucenter 数据库字符集：UTF-8 （必选，视实际情况而定）<\/li>\r\n<li>应用id(APP ID)：（必填，该值来在\u201C第二步\u201D中 UCenter 创建的 phpsso 应用时自动生成。）<\/li>\r\n<li>Ucenter 通信密钥：（必填，直接去uc后台复制就行了。一定确保该值与在\u201C第二步\u201D中 UCenter 创建的 phpsso 应用密钥相同。）<\/li>\r\n<\/ul>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px;padding-top:5px;padding-right:0px;padding-bottom:5px;padding-left:0px;font-size:14px;\">3、提交。<\/p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px;padding-top:5px;padding-right:0px;padding-bottom:5px;padding-left:0px;font-size:14px;\">　　查看在 UCenter 中创建的 phpsso 应用与 UCenter 通信是否成功。如果通信成功，则进行下一步。如果通信失败，请检查\u201C第二步\u201D与\u201C第三步\u201D中的各项参数配置是否正确。<\/p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px;padding-top:5px;padding-right:0px;padding-bottom:5px;padding-left:0px;font-size:14px;\">第四步、修改 Discuz! x2 会员登录相关<\/p>\r\n<p 圆角插件，兼容ie6","articleIsPublished":"0","articleViewCount":"752","articleAbstract":"W3C很早就已经在CSS3中加入了圆角属性border-radius，但是由于某些流行浏览器的不支持，使得其还是没能被广泛使用，所以我们会想尽办法去进行更好的补充，包括背景图片的圆角实现、js圆角实现等等。但是这些方法在实现的过程中，总是会增加很多无谓的工作任务，而且还有可能无法做到浏览器之间的兼容性，那么就介绍一个非常简单的jQuery圆角实现效果吧，说是圆角有点小看它了，因为它可以实现的不止是...","oId":"1329269852668","articleCreateDate":"2012年02月15日 &nbsp;可是。。。我总是还觉得有那么一点点区别。\r\n<\/blockquote>\r\n<br \/>\r\n<br \/>\r\n&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;很多的时候，我们总是说\u2014\u2014不要被别人抑或环境的影响，要做好自己。 &nbsp; &nbsp;可是在这个时代，或者说不是时代的问题，而是其他的一些更深层次的东西吧！就当是时代的因素吧。。。因为有人已经开始恨这个时代了，反正有人不喜欢她，那我再落井下石一次也无所谓吧（就当是接了一万次客的J女，再来一次又能有什么？！）反正她也不会有意见。。。<br \/>\r\n<br \/>\r\n<br \/>\r\n&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;先来个烟，可惜无酒。。。<br \/>\r\n<br \/>\r\n<br \/>\r\n&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;还是从现实开始说起吧，总觉得从以前的思维里走不出来了，不止一遍的提醒自己：注意身份，注意身份，你不再是那个谁了。。。<br \/>\r\n<br \/>\r\n<br \/>\r\n&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;这段时间有个词一直跟这我\u2014\u2014参加工作。按理说，在这个就业及其内什么的年代，轻松的工作，拿点小钱。<br \/>\r\n<br \/>\r\n<br \/>\r\n再也写不下去了，太痛苦了。。。<br \/>\r\n<br \/>\r\n<br \/>\r\n&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; 有时候枯燥无味的生活真的可以毁掉一个人。<br \/>\r\n<br \/>\r\n<br \/>\r\n&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;再也想不起来以前我是怎样，就连我想要什么都开始弄不清楚，有时候你真的会羡慕内个谁，拿的起就放的下，真的很勇敢，还记得那时候，一边喝酒一边吹，说的都是那样信誓旦旦，可是真开始实施的时候就只剩下你一人独自战斗。。。有时候发呆的时候总是会想一个画面：渺小的背影，坚定的表情，面对现实的残酷从牙缝里挤出那个回荡耳边的\u2014\u2014fire！（或者是Fighting？！）<br \/>\r\n<br \/>\r\n<br \/>\r\n&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;要是我，哎。。。也许只会在自我的世界里意淫而已吧。你说呢？<br \/>\r\n<br \/>\r\n<br \/>\r\n&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; 时代总是给我们标榜些东西，或许我就是被标榜了吧，总是想自己冲上去，然后拿回别人想让你拥有的，有时候想想，我怎么就那么2B？不要说是时代的躁动。。。或许我们早就比她更甚之。。。<br \/>\r\n<br \/>\r\n<br \/>\r\n&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; 前些时候听说心理学上有个斯德哥尔摩效应，就是说很多被绑架的人往往都会爱上劫匪而不是爱上拯救她的JC。。。听起来是不是那样的讽刺？哈！这个时代有着那么多既充当绑匪又充当被绑2B的人啊？就像瘾君子一样，深深爱上了这种堕落的感觉，就是喜欢被标榜，喜欢特英勇的冲上去，拿回别人想让你拥有的，然后换回一个欣赏的眼神。仅此而已吧。。。<br \/>\r\n<br \/>\r\n<br \/>\r\n&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;那个卞什么的诗说你在看风景，看风景的人在看你。其实就是说，螳螂和黄雀的故事，你在充当\u201C绑匪\u201D的时候，有没有想过，你后边还有人绑架着你呢？不要怂恿，不要蛊惑，不要赞赏，甚至不要说，不要听，不要看。<br \/>\r\n<br \/>\r\n<br \/>\r\n&nbsp; &nbsp; 就像别人要告诉你个劲爆的消息，你要忍住你那小小的骚动告诉他不要说出来，要做到不说不听不看，只是想，不是想知道的想，是思考，这个想才是你唯一区别于行尸走肉的途径。<br \/>\r\n<br \/>\r\n<br \/>\r\n&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;在追求的路上任重而道远啊。。。<br \/>\r\n<p>\r\n\t<br \/>\r\n<\/p>\r\n<p>\r\n\t<br Roman';\">&gt;]&nbsp;<\/span><\/span><span style=\"mso-spacerun:'yes';font-size:10.5000pt;font-family:'Times New Roman';\"><br \/>\r\n<\/span><span style=\"mso-spacerun:'yes';font-size:10.5000pt;font-family:'Times New Roman';\">补充说明：<span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';\">zip<\/span><span style=\"font-family:宋体;\">是个使用广泛的压缩程序，文件经它压缩后会另外产生具有<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';\">\".zip\"<\/span><span style=\"font-family:宋体;\">扩展名的压缩文件。&nbsp;<\/span><\/span><span style=\"mso-spacerun:'yes';font-size:10.5000pt;font-family:'Times New Roman';\"><br \/>\r\n<\/span><span style=\"mso-spacerun:'yes';font-size:10.5000pt;font-family:'Times New Roman';\">参&nbsp;数：&nbsp;<\/span><span style=\"mso-spacerun:'yes';font-size:10.5000pt;font-family:'Times New Roman';\"><br \/>\r\n<\/span><span style=\"mso-spacerun:'yes';font-size:10.5000pt;font-family:'Times New Roman';\">-A&nbsp;<span style=\"font-family:宋体;\">调整可执行的自动解压缩文件。&nbsp;<\/span><\/span><span style=\"mso-spacerun:'yes';font-size:10.5000pt;font-family:'Times New Roman';\"><br \/>\r\n<\/span><span style=\"mso-spacerun:'yes';font-size:10.5000pt;font-family:'Times New Roman';\">-b&lt;<span style=\"font-family:宋体;\">工作目录<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';\">&gt;&nbsp;<\/span><span style=\"font-family:宋体;\">指定暂时存放文件的目录。&nbsp;<\/span><\/span><span style=\"mso-spacerun:'yes';font-size:10.5000pt;font-family:'Times New Roman';\"><br \/>\r\n<\/span><span style=\"mso-spacerun:'yes';font-size:10.5000pt;font-family:'Times New Roman';\">-c&nbsp;<span style=\"font-family:宋体;\">替每个被压缩的文件加上注释。&nbsp;<\/span><\/span><span style=\"mso-spacerun:'yes';font-size:10.5000pt;font-family:'Times New Roman';\"><br \/>\r\n<\/span><span style=\"mso-spacerun:'yes';font-size:10.5000pt;font-family:'Times New Roman';\">-d&nbsp;<span style=\"font-family:宋体;\">从压缩文件内删除指定的文件。&nbsp;<\/span><\/span><span style=\"mso-spacerun:'yes';font-size:10.5000pt;font-family:'Times New Roman';\"><br \/>\r\n<\/span><span style=\"mso-spacerun:'yes';font-size:10.5000pt;font-family:'Times New Roman';\">-D&nbsp;<span style=\"font-family:宋体;\">压缩文件内不建立目录名称。&nbsp;<\/span><\/span><span style=\"mso-spacerun:'yes';font-size:10.5000pt;font-family:'Times New Roman';\"><br \/>\r\n<\/span><span style=\"mso-spacerun:'yes';font-size:10.5000pt;font-family:'Times New Roman';\">-f&nbsp;<span style=\"font-family:宋体;\">此参数的效果和指定<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';\">\"-u\"<\/span><span style=\"font-family:宋体;\">参数类似，但不仅更新既有文件，如果某些文件原本不存在于压缩文件内，使用本参数会一并将其加入压缩文件中。&nbsp;<\/span><\/span><span style=\"mso-spacerun:'yes';font-size:10.5000pt;font-family:'Times New Roman';\"><br \/>\r\n<\/span><span style=\"mso-spacerun:'yes';font-size:10.5000pt;font-family:'Times New Roman';\">-F&nbsp;<span style=\"font-family:宋体;\">尝试修复已损坏的压缩文件。&nbsp;<\/span><\/span><span style=\"mso-spacerun:'yes';font-size:10.5000pt;font-family:'Times New Roman';\"><br \/>\r\n<\/span><span style=\"mso-spacerun:'yes';font-size:10.5000pt;font-family:'Times New Roman';\">-g&nbsp;<span style=\"font-family:宋体;\">将文件压缩后附加在既有的压缩文件之后，而非另行建立新的压缩文件。&nbsp;<\/span><\/span><span style=\"mso-spacerun:'yes';font-size:10.5000pt;font-family:'Times New Roman';\"><br \/>\r\n<\/span><span style=\"mso-spacerun:'yes';font-size:10.5000pt;font-family:'Times New Roman';\">-h&nbsp;<span style=\"font-family:宋体;\">在线帮助。&nbsp;<\/span><\/span><span style=\"mso-spacerun:'yes';font-size:10.5000pt;font-family:'Times New Roman';\"><br \/>\r\n<\/span><span style=\"mso-spacerun:'yes';font-size:10.5000pt;font-family:'Times New Roman';\">-i&lt;<span style=\"font-family:宋体;\">范本样式<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';\">&gt;&nbsp;<\/span><span style=\"font-family:宋体;\">只压缩符合条件的文件。&nbsp;<\/span><\/span><span style=\"mso-spacerun:'yes';font-size:10.5000pt;font-family:'Times New Roman';\"><br \/>\r\n<\/span><span style=\"mso-spacerun:'yes';font-size:10.5000pt;font-family:'Times New Roman';\">-j&nbsp;<span style=\"font-family:宋体;\">只保存文件名称及其内容，而不存放任何目录名称。&nbsp;<\/span><\/span><span style=\"mso-spacerun:'yes';font-size:10.5000pt;font-family:'Times New Roman';\"><br \/>\r\n<\/span><span style=\"mso-spacerun:'yes';font-size:10.5000pt;font-family:'Times New Roman';\">-J&nbsp;<span style=\"font-family:宋体;\">删除压缩文件前面不必要的数据。&nbsp;<\/span><\/span><span style=\"mso-spacerun:'yes';font-size:10.5000pt;font-family:'Times New Roman';\"><br \/>\r\n<\/span><span style=\"mso-spacerun:'yes';font-size:10.5000pt;font-family:'Times New Roman';\">-k&nbsp;<span style=\"font-family:宋体;\">使用<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';\">MS-DOS<\/span><span style=\"font-family:宋体;\">兼容格式的文件名称。&nbsp;<\/span><\/span><span style=\"mso-spacerun:'yes';font-size:10.5000pt;font-family:'Times New Roman';\"><br \/>\r\n<\/span><span style=\"mso-spacerun:'yes';font-size:10.5000pt;font-family:'Times New Roman';\">-l&nbsp;<span style=\"font-family:宋体;\">压缩文件时，把<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';\">LF<\/span><span style=\"font-family:宋体;\">字符置换成<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';\">LF+CR<\/span><span style=\"font-family:宋体;\">字符。&nbsp;<\/span><\/span><span style=\"mso-spacerun:'yes';font-size:10.5000pt;font-family:'Times New Roman';\"><br \/>\r\n<\/span><span style=\"mso-spacerun:'yes';font-size:10.5000pt;font-family:'Times New Roman';\">-ll&nbsp;<span style=\"font-family:宋体;\">压缩文件时，把<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';\">LF+CR<\/span><span style=\"font-family:宋体;\">字符置换成<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';\">LF<\/span><span style=\"font-family:宋体;\">字符。&nbsp;<\/span><\/span><span style=\"mso-spacerun:'yes';font-size:10.5000pt;font-family:'Times New Roman';\"><br \/>\r\n<\/span><span style=\"mso-spacerun:'yes';font-size:10.5000pt;font-family:'Times New Roman';\">-L&nbsp;<span style=\"font-family:宋体;\">显示版权信息。&nbsp;<\/span><\/span><span style=\"mso-spacerun:'yes';font-size:10.5000pt;font-family:'Times New Roman';\"><br \/>\r\n<\/span><span style=\"mso-spacerun:'yes';font-size:10.5000pt;font-family:'Times New Roman';\">-m&nbsp;<span style=\"font-family:宋体;\">将文件压缩并加入压缩文件后，删除原始文件，即把文件移到压缩文件中。&nbsp;<\/span><\/span><span style=\"mso-spacerun:'yes';font-size:10.5000pt;font-family:'Times New Roman';\"><br \/>\r\n<\/span><span style=\"mso-spacerun:'yes';font-size:10.5000pt;font-family:'Times New Roman';\">-n&lt;<span style=\"font-family:宋体;\">字尾字符串<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';\">&gt;&nbsp;<\/span><span style=\"font-family:宋体;\">不压缩具有特定字尾字符串的文件。&nbsp;<\/span><\/span><span style=\"mso-spacerun:'yes';font-size:10.5000pt;font-family:'Times New Roman';\"><br \/>\r\n<\/span><span style=\"mso-spacerun:'yes';font-size:10.5000pt;font-family:'Times New Roman';\">-o&nbsp;<span style=\"font-family:宋体;\">以压缩文件内拥有最新更改时间的文件为准，将压缩文件的更改时间设成和该文件相同。&nbsp;<\/span><\/span><span style=\"mso-spacerun:'yes';font-size:10.5000pt;font-family:'Times New Roman';\"><br \/>\r\n<\/span><span style=\"mso-spacerun:'yes';font-size:10.5000pt;font-family:'Times New Roman';\">-q&nbsp;<span style=\"font-family:宋体;\">不显示指令执行过程。&nbsp;<\/span><\/span><span style=\"mso-spacerun:'yes';font-size:10.5000pt;font-family:'Times New Roman';\"><br \/>\r\n<\/span><span style=\"mso-spacerun:'yes';font-size:10.5000pt;font-family:'Times New Roman';\">-r&nbsp;<span style=\"font-family:宋体;\">递归处理，将指定目录下的所有文件和子目录一并处理。&nbsp;<\/span><\/span><span style=\"mso-spacerun:'yes';font-size:10.5000pt;font-family:'Times New Roman';\"><br \/>\r\n<\/span><span style=\"mso-spacerun:'yes';font-size:10.5000pt;font-family:'Times New Roman';\">-S&nbsp;<span style=\"font-family:宋体;\">包含系统和隐藏文件。&nbsp;<\/span><\/span><span style=\"mso-spacerun:'yes';font-size:10.5000pt;font-family:'Times New Roman';\"><br \/>\r\n<\/span><span style=\"mso-spacerun:'yes';font-size:10.5000pt;font-family:'Times New Roman';\">-t&lt;<span style=\"font-family:宋体;\">日期时间<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';\">&gt;&nbsp;<\/span><span style=\"font-family:宋体;\">把压缩文件的日期设成指定的日期。&nbsp;<\/span><\/span><span style=\"mso-spacerun:'yes';font-size:10.5000pt;font-family:'Times New Roman';\"><br \/>\r\n<\/span><span style=\"mso-spacerun:'yes';font-size:10.5000pt;font-family:'Times New Roman';\">-T&nbsp;<span style=\"font-family:宋体;\">检查备份文件内的每个文件是否正确无误。&nbsp;<\/span><\/span><span style=\"mso-spacerun:'yes';font-size:10.5000pt;font-family:'Times New Roman';\"><br \/>\r\n<\/span><span style=\"mso-spacerun:'yes';font-size:10.5000pt;font-family:'Times New Roman';\">-u&nbsp;<span style=\"font-family:宋体;\">更换较新的文件到压缩文件内。&nbsp;<\/span><\/span><span style=\"mso-spacerun:'yes';font-size:10.5000pt;font-family:'Times New Roman';\"><br \/>\r\n<\/span><span style=\"mso-spacerun:'yes';font-size:10.5000pt;font-family:'Times New Roman';\">-v&nbsp;<span style=\"font-family:宋体;\">显示指令执行过程或显示版本信息。&nbsp;<\/span><\/span><span style=\"mso-spacerun:'yes';font-size:10.5000pt;font-family:'Times New Roman';\"><br \/>\r\n<\/span><span style=\"mso-spacerun:'yes';font-size:10.5000pt;font-family:'Times New Roman';\">-V&nbsp;<span style=\"font-family:宋体;\">保存<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';\">VMS<\/span><span style=\"mso-spacerun:'yes';font-size:10.5000pt;font-family:'Times New Roman';\">-w&nbsp;<span style=\"font-family:宋体;\">在文件名称里假如版本编号，本参数仅在<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';\">VMS<\/span><span style=\"font-family:宋体;\">操作系统下有效。&nbsp;<\/span><\/span><span style=\"mso-spacerun:'yes';font-size:10.5000pt;font-family:'Times New Roman';\"><br \/>\r\n<\/span><span style=\"mso-spacerun:'yes';font-size:10.5000pt;font-family:'Times New Roman';\">-x&lt;<span style=\"font-family:宋体;\">范本样式<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';\">&gt;&nbsp;<\/span><span style=\"font-family:宋体;\">压缩时排除符合条件的文件。&nbsp;<\/span><\/span><span style=\"mso-spacerun:'yes';font-size:10.5000pt;font-family:'Times New Roman';\"><br \/>\r\n<\/span><span style=\"mso-spacerun:'yes';font-size:10.5000pt;font-family:'Times New Roman';\">-X&nbsp;<span style=\"font-family:宋体;\">不保存额外的文件属性。&nbsp;<\/span><\/span><span style=\"mso-spacerun:'yes';font-size:10.5000pt;font-family:'Times New Roman';\"><br \/>\r\n<\/span><span style=\"mso-spacerun:'yes';font-size:10.5000pt;font-family:'Times New Roman';\">-y&nbsp;<span style=\"font-family:宋体;\">直接保存符号连接，而非该连接所指向的文件，本参数仅在<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';\">UNIX<\/span><span style=\"font-family:宋体;\">之类的系统下有效。&nbsp;<\/span><\/span><span style=\"mso-spacerun:'yes';font-size:10.5000pt;font-family:'Times New Roman';\"><br \/>\r\n<\/span><span style=\"mso-spacerun:'yes';font-size:10.5000pt;font-family:'Times New Roman';\">-z&nbsp;<span style=\"mso-spacerun:'yes';font-size:10.5000pt;font-family:'Times New Roman';\">-$&nbsp;<span style=\"font-family:宋体;\">保存第一个被压缩文件所在磁盘的卷册名称。&nbsp;<\/span><\/span><span style=\"mso-spacerun:'yes';font-size:10.5000pt;font-family:'Times New Roman';\"><o:p><\/o:p><\/span><\/p>\r\n<p class=\"p0\" style=\"margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;\"><span style=\"mso-spacerun:'yes';font-size:10.5000pt;font-family:'Times New Roman';\">补充说明：<span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';\">unzip<\/span><span style=\"font-family:宋体;\">为<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';\">.zip<\/span><span style=\"font-family:宋体;\">压缩文件的解压缩程序。<\/span><\/span><span style=\"mso-spacerun:'yes';font-size:10.5000pt;font-family:'Times New Roman';\"><o:p><\/o:p><\/span><\/p>\r\n<p class=\"p0\" style=\"margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;\"><span style=\"mso-spacerun:'yes';font-size:10.5000pt;font-family:'Times New Roman';\">参&nbsp;数：<\/span><span style=\"mso-spacerun:'yes';font-size:10.5000pt;font-family:'Times New Roman';\"><o:p><\/o:p><\/span><\/p>\r\n<p class=\"p0\" style=\"margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;\"><span style=\"mso-spacerun:'yes';font-size:10.5000pt;font-family:'Times New Roman';\">-c&nbsp;<span style=\"font-family:宋体;\">将解压缩的结果显示到屏幕上，并对字符做适当的转换。<\/span><\/span><span style=\"mso-spacerun:'yes';font-size:10.5000pt;font-family:'Times New Roman';\"><o:p><\/o:p><\/span><\/p>\r\n<p class=\"p0\" style=\"margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;\"><span style=\"mso-spacerun:'yes';font-size:10.5000pt;font-family:'Times New Roman';\">-f&nbsp;<span style=\"font-family:宋体;\">更新现有的文件。<\/span><\/span><span style=\"mso-spacerun:'yes';font-size:10.5000pt;font-family:'Times New Roman';\"><o:p><\/o:p><\/span><\/p>\r\n<p class=\"p0\" style=\"margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;\"><span style=\"mso-spacerun:'yes';font-size:10.5000pt;font-family:'Times New Roman';\">-l&nbsp;<span style=\"font-family:宋体;\">显示压缩文件内所包含的文件。<\/span><\/span><span style=\"mso-spacerun:'yes';font-size:10.5000pt;font-family:'Times New Roman';\"><o:p><\/o:p><\/span><\/p>\r\n<p class=\"p0\" style=\"margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;\"><span style=\"mso-spacerun:'yes';font-size:10.5000pt;font-family:'Times New Roman';\">-p&nbsp;<span style=\"font-family:宋体;\">与<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';\">-c<\/span><span style=\"font-family:宋体;\">参数类似，会将解压缩的结果显示到屏幕上，但不会执行任何的转换。<\/span><\/span><span style=\"mso-spacerun:'yes';font-size:10.5000pt;font-family:'Times New Roman';\"><o:p><\/o:p><\/span><\/p>\r\n<p class=\"p0\" style=\"margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;\"><span style=\"mso-spacerun:'yes';font-size:10.5000pt;font-family:'Times New Roman';\">-t&nbsp;<span style=\"font-family:宋体;\">检查压缩文件是否正确。<\/span><\/span><span style=\"mso-spacerun:'yes';font-size:10.5000pt;font-family:'Times New Roman';\"><o:p><\/o:p><\/span><\/p>\r\n<p class=\"p0\" style=\"margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;\"><span style=\"mso-spacerun:'yes';font-size:10.5000pt;font-family:'Times New Roman';\">-u&nbsp;<span style=\"font-family:宋体;\">与<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';\">-f<\/span><span style=\"font-family:宋体;\">参数类似，但是除了更新现有的文件外，也会将压缩文件中的其他文件解压缩到目录中。<\/span><\/span><span style=\"mso-spacerun:'yes';font-size:10.5000pt;font-family:'Times New Roman';\"><o:p><\/o:p><\/span><\/p>\r\n<p class=\"p0\" style=\"margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;\"><span style=\"mso-spacerun:'yes';font-size:10.5000pt;font-family:'Times New Roman';\">-v&nbsp;<span style=\"font-family:宋体;\">执行是时显示详细的信息。<\/span><\/span><span style=\"mso-spacerun:'yes';font-size:10.5000pt;font-family:'Times New Roman';\"><o:p><\/o:p><\/span><\/p>\r\n<p class=\"p0\" style=\"margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;\"><span style=\"mso-spacerun:'yes';font-size:10.5000pt;font-family:'Times New Roman';\">-z&nbsp;<span style=\"font-family:宋体;\">仅显示压缩文件的备注文字。<\/span><\/span><span style=\"mso-spacerun:'yes';font-size:10.5000pt;font-family:'Times New Roman';\"><o:p><\/o:p><\/span><\/p>\r\n<p class=\"p0\" style=\"margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;\"><span style=\"mso-spacerun:'yes';font-size:10.5000pt;font-family:'Times New Roman';\">-a&nbsp;<span style=\"font-family:宋体;\">对文本文件进行必要的字符转换。<\/span><\/span><span style=\"mso-spacerun:'yes';font-size:10.5000pt;font-family:'Times New Roman';\"><o:p><\/o:p><\/span><\/p>\r\n<p class=\"p0\" style=\"margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;\"><span style=\"mso-spacerun:'yes';font-size:10.5000pt;font-family:'Times New Roman';\">-b&nbsp;<span style=\"font-family:宋体;\">不要对文本文件进行字符转换。<\/span><\/span><span style=\"mso-spacerun:'yes';font-size:10.5000pt;font-family:'Times New Roman';\"><o:p><\/o:p><\/span><\/p>\r\n<p class=\"p0\" style=\"margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;\"><span style=\"mso-spacerun:'yes';font-size:10.5000pt;font-family:'Times New Roman';\">-C&nbsp;<span style=\"font-family:宋体;\">压缩文件中的文件名称区分大小写。<\/span><\/span><span style=\"mso-spacerun:'yes';font-size:10.5000pt;font-family:'Times New Roman';\"><o:p><\/o:p><\/span><\/p>\r\n<p class=\"p0\" style=\"margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;\"><span style=\"mso-spacerun:'yes';font-size:10.5000pt;font-family:'Times New Roman';\">-j&nbsp;<span style=\"font-family:宋体;\">不处理压缩文件中原有的目录路径。<\/span><\/span><span style=\"mso-spacerun:'yes';font-size:10.5000pt;font-family:'Times New Roman';\"><o:p><\/o:p><\/span><\/p>\r\n<p class=\"p0\" style=\"margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;\"><span style=\"mso-spacerun:'yes';font-size:10.5000pt;font-family:'Times New Roman';\">-L&nbsp;<span style=\"font-family:宋体;\">将压缩文件中的全部文件名改为小写。<\/span><\/span><span style=\"mso-spacerun:'yes';font-size:10.5000pt;font-family:'Times New Roman';\"><o:p><\/o:p><\/span><\/p>\r\n<p class=\"p0\" style=\"margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;\"><span style=\"mso-spacerun:'yes';font-size:10.5000pt;font-family:'Times New Roman';\">-M&nbsp;<span style=\"font-family:宋体;\">将输出结果送到<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';\">more<\/span><span style=\"font-family:宋体;\">程序处理。<\/span><\/span><span style=\"mso-spacerun:'yes';font-size:10.5000pt;font-family:'Times New Roman';\"><o:p><\/o:p><\/span><\/p>\r\n<p class=\"p0\" style=\"margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;\"><span style=\"mso-spacerun:'yes';font-size:10.5000pt;font-family:'Times New Roman';\">-n&nbsp;<span style=\"font-family:宋体;\">解压缩时不要覆盖原有的文件。<\/span><\/span><span style=\"mso-spacerun:'yes';font-size:10.5000pt;font-family:'Times New Roman';\"><o:p><\/o:p><\/span><\/p>\r\n<p class=\"p0\" style=\"margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;\"><span style=\"mso-spacerun:'yes';font-size:10.5000pt;font-family:'Times New Roman';\">-o&nbsp;<span style=\"font-family:宋体;\">不必先询问用户，<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';\">unzip<\/span><span style=\"font-family:宋体;\">执行后覆盖原有文件。<\/span><\/span><span style=\"mso-spacerun:'yes';font-size:10.5000pt;font-family:'Times New Roman';\"><o:p><\/o:p><\/span><\/p>\r\n<p class=\"p0\" style=\"margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;\"><span style=\"mso-spacerun:'yes';font-size:10.5000pt;font-family:'Times New Roman';\">-P&lt;<span style=\"font-family:宋体;\">密码<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';\">&gt;&nbsp;<\/span><span style=\"font-family:宋体;\">使用<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';\">zip<\/span><span style=\"font-family:宋体;\">的密码选项。<\/span><\/span><span style=\"mso-spacerun:'yes';font-size:10.5000pt;font-family:'Times New Roman';\"><o:p><\/o:p><\/span><\/p>\r\n<p class=\"p0\" style=\"margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;\"><span style=\"mso-spacerun:'yes';font-size:10.5000pt;font-family:'Times New Roman';\">-q&nbsp;<span style=\"font-family:宋体;\">执行时不显示任何信息。<\/span><\/span><span style=\"mso-spacerun:'yes';font-size:10.5000pt;font-family:'Times New Roman';\"><o:p><\/o:p><\/span><\/p>\r\n<p class=\"p0\" style=\"margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;\"><span style=\"mso-spacerun:'yes';font-size:10.5000pt;font-family:'Times New Roman';\">-s&nbsp;<span style=\"font-family:宋体;\">将文件名中的空白字符转换为底线字符。<\/span><\/span><span style=\"mso-spacerun:'yes';font-size:10.5000pt;font-family:'Times New Roman';\"><o:p><\/o:p><\/span><\/p>\r\n<p class=\"p0\" style=\"margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;\"><span style=\"mso-spacerun:'yes';font-size:10.5000pt;font-family:'Times New Roman';\">-V&nbsp;<span style=\"font-family:宋体;\">保留<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';\">VMS<\/span><span style=\"font-family:宋体;\">的文件版本信息。<\/span><\/span><span style=\"mso-spacerun:'yes';font-size:10.5000pt;font-family:'Times New Roman';\"><o:p><\/o:p><\/span><\/p>\r\n<p class=\"p0\" style=\"margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;\"><span style=\"mso-spacerun:'yes';font-size:10.5000pt;font-family:'Times New Roman';\">-X&nbsp;<span style=\"font-family:宋体;\">解压缩时同时回存文件原来的<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';\">UID\/GID<\/span><span style=\"font-family:宋体;\">。<\/span><\/span><span style=\"mso-spacerun:'yes';font-size:10.5000pt;font-family:'Times New Roman';\"><o:p><\/o:p><\/span><\/p>\r\n<p class=\"p0\" style=\"margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;\"><span style=\"mso-spacerun:'yes';font-size:10.5000pt;font-family:'Times New Roman';\">[.zip<span style=\"font-family:宋体;\">文件<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';\">]&nbsp;<\/span><span style=\"font-family:宋体;\">指定<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';\">.zip<\/span><span style=\"font-family:宋体;\">压缩文件。<\/span><\/span><span style=\"mso-spacerun:'yes';font-size:10.5000pt;font-family:'Times New Roman';\"><o:p><\/o:p><\/span><\/p>\r\n<p class=\"p0\" style=\"margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;\"><span style=\"mso-spacerun:'yes';font-size:10.5000pt;font-family:'Times New Roman';\">[<span style=\"font-family:宋体;\">文件<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';\">]&nbsp;<\/span><span style=\"font-family:宋体;\">指定要处理<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';\">.zip<\/span><span style=\"font-family:宋体;\">压缩文件中的哪些文件。<\/span><\/span><span style=\"mso-spacerun:'yes';font-size:10.5000pt;font-family:'Times New Roman';\"><o:p><\/o:p><\/span><\/p>\r\n<p class=\"p0\" style=\"margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;\"><span style=\"mso-spacerun:'yes';font-size:10.5000pt;font-family:'Times New Roman';\">-d&lt;<span style=\"font-family:宋体;\">目录<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';\">&gt;&nbsp;<\/span><span style=\"font-family:宋体;\">指定文件解压缩后所要存储的目录。<\/span><\/span><span style=\"mso-spacerun:'yes';font-size:10.5000pt;font-family:'Times New Roman';\"><o:p><\/o:p><\/span><\/p>\r\n<p class=\"p0\" style=\"margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;\"><span style=\"mso-spacerun:'yes';font-size:10.5000pt;font-family:'Times New Roman';\">-x&lt;<span style=\"font-family:宋体;\">文件<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';\">&gt;&nbsp;<\/span><span style=\"font-family:宋体;\">指定不要处理<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';\">.zip<\/span><span style=\"font-family:宋体;\">压缩文件中的哪些文件。<\/span><\/span><span style=\"mso-spacerun:'yes';font-size:10.5000pt;font-family:'Times New Roman';\"><o:p><\/o:p><\/span><\/p>\r\n<p class=\"p0\" style=\"margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;\"><span style=\"mso-spacerun:'yes';font-size:10.5000pt;font-family:'Times New Roman';\">-Z&nbsp;unzip&nbsp;-Z<span style=\"font-family:宋体;\">等于执行<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';\">zipinfo<\/span><span style=\"font-family:宋体;\">指令<\/span><\/span><\/p>\r\n<p class=\"p0\" style=\"margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;\"><span style=\"color:#ee33ee;font-family:宋体;font-size:14px;line-height:21px;\">======================================================================================<\/span> <\/p>\r\n<p class=\"p0\" style=\"margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;\"><span style=\"mso-spacerun:'yes';font-size:10.5000pt;font-family:'Times New Roman';\"><o:p><\/o:p><\/span><\/p>\r\n<p class=\"p0\" style=\"margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;\"><span style=\"mso-spacerun:'yes';font-size:10.5000pt;font-family:'Times New Roman';\"><b><span style=\"color:#e53333;\">范例：<\/span><\/b><\/span><span style=\"mso-spacerun:'yes';font-size:10.5000pt;font-family:'Times New Roman';\"><o:p><\/o:p><\/span><\/p>\r\n<p class=\"p0\" style=\"margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;\"><span style=\"font-size:10.5pt;font-family:'Times New Roman';\">zip<span style=\"font-family:宋体;\">命令可以用来将文件压缩成为常用的<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';\">zip<\/span><span style=\"font-family:宋体;\">格式。<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';\">unzip<\/span><span style=\"font-family:宋体;\">命令则用来解压缩<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';\">zip<\/span><span style=\"font-family:宋体;\">文件。<\/span><\/span><span style=\"mso-spacerun:'yes';font-size:10.5000pt;font-family:'Times New Roman';\"><o:p><\/o:p><\/span><\/p>\r\n<p class=\"p0\" style=\"margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;\"><span style=\"mso-spacerun:'yes';font-size:10.5000pt;font-family:'Times New Roman';\">1.&nbsp;<span style=\"font-family:宋体;\">我想把一个文件<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';\">abc.txt<\/span><span style=\"font-family:宋体;\">和一个目录<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';\">dir1<\/span><span style=\"font-family:宋体;\">压缩成为<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';\">yasuo.zip<\/span><span style=\"font-family:宋体;\">：<\/span><\/span><span style=\"mso-spacerun:'yes';font-size:10.5000pt;font-family:'Times New Roman';\"><o:p><\/o:p><\/span><\/p>\r\n<p class=\"p0\" style=\"margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;\"><span style=\"mso-spacerun:'yes';font-size:10.5000pt;font-family:'Times New Roman';\">＃&nbsp;<span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';\">zip&nbsp;-r&nbsp;yasuo.zip&nbsp;abc.txt&nbsp;dir1<\/span><\/span><span style=\"mso-spacerun:'yes';font-size:10.5000pt;font-family:'Times New Roman';\"><o:p><\/o:p><\/span><\/p>\r\n<p class=\"p0\" style=\"margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;\"><span style=\"mso-spacerun:'yes';font-size:10.5000pt;font-family:'Times New Roman';\">2.<span style=\"font-family:宋体;\">我下载了一个<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';\">yasuo.zip<\/span><span style=\"font-family:宋体;\">文件，想解压缩：<\/span><\/span><span style=\"mso-spacerun:'yes';font-size:10.5000pt;font-family:'Times New Roman';\"><o:p><\/o:p><\/span><\/p>\r\n<p class=\"p0\" style=\"margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;\"><span style=\"mso-spacerun:'yes';font-size:10.5000pt;font-family:'Times New Roman';\">#&nbsp;unzip&nbsp;yasuo.zip<\/span><span style=\"mso-spacerun:'yes';font-size:10.5000pt;font-family:'Times New Roman';\"><o:p><\/o:p><\/span><\/p>\r\n<p class=\"p0\" style=\"margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;\"><span style=\"mso-spacerun:'yes';font-size:10.5000pt;font-family:'Times New Roman';\">3.<span style=\"font-family:宋体;\">我当前目录下有<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';\">abc1.zip<\/span><span style=\"font-family:宋体;\">，<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';\">abc2.zip<\/span><span style=\"font-family:宋体;\">和<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';\">abc3.zip<\/span><span style=\"font-family:宋体;\">，我想一起解压缩它们：<\/span><\/span><span style=\"mso-spacerun:'yes';font-size:10.5000pt;font-family:'Times New Roman';\"><o:p><\/o:p><\/span><\/p>\r\n<p class=\"p0\" style=\"margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;\"><span style=\"mso-spacerun:'yes';font-size:10.5000pt;font-family:'Times New Roman';\">＃&nbsp;<span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';\">unzip&nbsp;abc\\?.zip<\/span><\/span><span style=\"mso-spacerun:'yes';font-size:10.5000pt;font-family:'Times New Roman';\"><o:p><\/o:p><\/span><\/p>\r\n<p class=\"p0\" style=\"margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;\"><span style=\"mso-spacerun:'yes';font-size:10.5000pt;font-family:'Times New Roman';\">注释：<span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';\">?<\/span><span style=\"font-family:宋体;\">表示一个字符，如果用<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';\">*<\/span><span style=\"font-family:宋体;\">表示任意多个字符。<\/span><\/span><span style=\"mso-spacerun:'yes';font-size:10.5000pt;font-family:'Times New Roman';\"><o:p><\/o:p><\/span><\/p>\r\n<p class=\"p0\" style=\"margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;\"><span style=\"mso-spacerun:'yes';font-size:10.5000pt;font-family:'Times New Roman';\">4.<span style=\"font-family:宋体;\">我有一个很大的压缩文件<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';\">large.zip<\/span><span style=\"font-family:宋体;\">，我不想解压缩，只想看看它里面有什么：<\/span><\/span><span style=\"mso-spacerun:'yes';font-size:10.5000pt;font-family:'Times New Roman';\"><o:p><\/o:p><\/span><\/p>\r\n<p class=\"p0\" style=\"margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;\"><span style=\"mso-spacerun:'yes';font-size:10.5000pt;font-family:'Times New Roman';\">#&nbsp;unzip&nbsp;-v&nbsp;large.zip<\/span><span style=\"mso-spacerun:'yes';font-size:10.5000pt;font-family:'Times New Roman';\"><o:p><\/o:p><\/span><\/p>\r\n<p class=\"p0\" style=\"margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;\"><span style=\"mso-spacerun:'yes';font-size:10.5000pt;font-family:'Times New Roman';\">5.<span style=\"font-family:宋体;\">我下载了一个压缩文件<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';\">large.zip<\/span><span style=\"font-family:宋体;\">，想验证一下这个压缩文件是否下载完全了<\/span><\/span><span style=\"mso-spacerun:'yes';font-size:10.5000pt;font-family:'Times New Roman';\"><o:p><\/o:p><\/span><\/p>\r\n<p class=\"p0\" style=\"margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;\"><span style=\"mso-spacerun:'yes';font-size:10.5000pt;font-family:'Times New Roman';\">#&nbsp;unzip&nbsp;-t&nbsp;large.zip<\/span><span style=\"mso-spacerun:'yes';font-size:10.5000pt;font-family:'Times New Roman';\"><o:p><\/o:p><\/span><\/p>\r\n<p class=\"p0\" style=\"margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;\"><span style=\"mso-spacerun:'yes';font-size:10.5000pt;font-family:'Times New Roman';\">6.<span style=\"font-family:宋体;\">我用<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';\">-v<\/span><span style=\"font-family:宋体;\">选项发现<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';\">music.zip<\/span><span style=\"font-family:宋体;\">压缩文件里面有很多目录和子目录，并且子目录中其实都是歌曲<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';\">mp3<\/span><span style=\"font-family:宋体;\">文件，我想把这些文件都下载到第一级目录，而不是一层一层建目录：<\/span><\/span><span style=\"mso-spacerun:'yes';font-size:10.5000pt;font-family:'Times New Roman';\"><o:p><\/o:p><\/span><\/p>\r\n<p class=\"p0\" style=\"margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;\"><span style=\"mso-spacerun:'yes';font-size:10.5000pt;font-family:'Times New Roman';\">#&nbsp;unzip&nbsp;-j&nbsp;music.zip<\/span><span style=\"mso-spacerun:'yes';font-size:10.5000pt;font-family:'Times New Roman';\"><o:p><\/o:p><\/span><\/p>\r\n<p class=\"p0\" style=\"margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;\"><span style=\"mso-spacerun:'yes';font-size:10.5000pt;font-family:'Times New Roman';\"><br \/>\r\n<\/span><\/p>\r\n<p class=\"p0\" style=\"margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;\"><span style=\"mso-spacerun:'yes';font-size:10.5000pt;font-family:'Times New Roman';\">转自：<\/span><a href=\"http:\/\/www.cnblogs.com\/chinareny2k\/archive\/2010\/01\/05\/1639468.html\">http:\/\/www.cnblogs.com\/chinareny2k\/archive\/2010\/01\/05\/1639468.html<\/a><\/p>\r\n<p class=\"p0\" style=\"line-height:25px;margin-top:0px;margin-right:0px;margin-bottom:10px;margin-left:0px;padding-top:0px;padding-right:0px;padding-bottom:0px;padding-left:0px;text-indent:2em;\">call_user_method_array --&nbsp; 调用一个用户方法，同时传递参数数组［已停用］<\/p>\r\n<p style=\"line-height:25px;margin-top:0px;margin-right:0px;margin-bottom:10px;margin-left:0px;padding-top:0px;padding-right:0px;padding-bottom:0px;padding-left:0px;text-indent:2em;\">call_user_method --&nbsp; 调用特定对象的用户方法［已停用］<\/p>\r\n<p style=\"line-height:25px;margin-top:0px;margin-right:0px;margin-bottom:10px;margin-left:0px;padding-top:0px;padding-right:0px;padding-bottom:0px;padding-left:0px;text-indent:2em;\">class_exists -- 检查类是否已定义<\/p>\r\n<p -- 返回由类的方法名组成的数组<\/p>\r\n<p style=\"line-height:25px;margin-top:0px;margin-right:0px;margin-bottom:10px;margin-left:0px;padding-top:0px;padding-right:0px;padding-bottom:0px;padding-left:0px;text-indent:2em;\">get_class_vars --&nbsp; 返回由类的默认属性组成的数组<\/p>\r\n<p -- 返回由已定义类的名字所组成的数组<\/p>\r\n<p --&nbsp; Returns an array of all declared interfaces.<\/p>\r\n<p 返回由对象属性组成的关联数组<\/p>\r\n<p 返回对象或类的父类名<\/p>\r\n<p 如果对象属于该类或该类是此对象的父类则返回 TRUE<\/p>\r\n<p --&nbsp; 如果此对象是该类的子类，则返回 TRUE<\/p>\r\n<p 的别名<\/p>\r\n<p
