}\r\n        },\r\n        onLoad: function() {\r\n            n.config.linkShowAdvancedTab || this.hidePage(\"advanced\");\r\n            n.config.linkShowTargetTab || this.hidePage(\"target\")\r\n        },\r\n        onFocus: function() {\r\n            var a = this.getContentElement(\"info\", \"linkType\");\r\n            if (a &amp;&amp; a.getValue() == \"url\") {\r\n                a = this.getContentElement(\"info\", \"url\");\r\n                a.select()\r\n            }\r\n        }\r\n    }\r\n});\r\n\r\n\/**获取所有文件**\/\r\nfunction getHtmlList(){\r\n try{\r\n \/\/var fnames = &nbsp; HtmlTools.allNames();\r\n var fnames=\"1.html,2.html,3.html,4.html,5.html,6.html\";\r\n qt_file_list= fnames.split(\",\");\r\n for(var i=11700;i&lt;11720;i++){\r\n qt_file_list.push(i+\".html\");\r\n }\r\n&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;return qt_file_list;\r\n&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;}catch(e) {\r\n&nbsp; &nbsp; \t alert(e);\r\n&nbsp; &nbsp; }\r\n&nbsp; &nbsp; return new Array();\r\n}\r\n\r\n<\/pre>\r\n<p>\r\n\t<br \/>\r\n<\/p>\r\n<p>\r\n\t注意getHtmlList 方法，这个是构造下拉列表内容的方法，可以借助其他平台来获取本地文件，例如：QT，Ajax 等<span><\/span> \r\n<\/p>","articleTypeId":"1378276443361","articleTitle":"CKEditor Link插件修改，手动输入变为自动下拉框","articleIsPublished":"0","articleViewCount":"75","articleAbstract":"CKEditorLink插件，支持超链接地址，页面锚点和电子邮箱类型链接地址又包括http:\/\/，https:\/\/，ftp:\/\/，news:\/\/，其他但是有一个问题，这里的URL地址都需要手动输入为了数据的完整性，如果只允许用户选择一个列表，那么就需要稍微改动一下。效果如下下面来修改ckeditor\\plugins\\link\\dialogs\\link.js修改之前，请先备份一下\/*Copyrigh...","oId":"1398046704080","articleCreateDate":"2014年04月21日 10:18:24","articleTags":"CKEditor Link 插件修改"},"1291625703645":{"articleUpdateDate":"2010年12月06日 08:56:04","articleContent":"<p><img border=\"0\" alt=\"\" src=\"http:\/\/img.cnbeta.com\/newsimg\/101205\/08493501547056762.jpg\" \/><a href=\"http:\/\/img.cnbeta.com\/newsimg\/101205\/0849351534488820.gif\"><img border=\"0\" alt=\"\" src=\"http:\/\/img.cnbeta.com\/newsimg\/101205\/0849351534488820.gif\" \/><\/a><\/p>","articleTypeId":"1291625759344","articleTitle":"Chrome Dev 隐藏的两个趣图 ","articleIsPublished":"1","articleViewCount":"153","articleAbstract":"...","oId":"1291625703645","articleCreateDate":"2010年12月06日 08:55:03","articleTags":"Chrome"},"1325294231331":{"articleUpdateDate":"","articleContent":"<p style=\"margin-top:10px;margin-bottom:15px;padding-top:0px;padding-right:0px;padding-bottom:0px;padding-left:0px;word-break:break-all;font-family:Simsun;font-size:14px;line-height:23px;text-align:left;background-color:#f6f4e9;\">这次\u201C<span style=\"color:#670e1a;\">泄密门事件<\/span>\u201D对用户影响最大的恐怕是明文保存密码的<span style=\"color:#670e1a;\">CSDN<\/span>和<span style=\"color:#670e1a;\">天涯社区<\/span>，如果当初他们使用散列算法将密码进行处理，就不会有这么大的影响，而对于散列算法，就不得不说一下MD5这个算法。<\/p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top:10px;margin-bottom:15px;padding-top:0px;padding-right:0px;padding-bottom:0px;padding-left:0px;word-break:break-all;font-family:Simsun;font-size:14px;line-height:23px;text-align:left;background-color:#f6f4e9;\">　　散列算法（Hash Function）中，最为常用的是MD5（Message-Digest Algorithm 5）算法，MD5是一个较为古老的算法，一度被广泛应用于安全领域。比如在UNIX系统中用户的密码就是以MD5（或其它类似的算法）经加密后存储在文件系统中。当用户登录的时候，系统把用户输入的密码计算成MD5值，然后再去和保存在文件系统中的MD5值进行比较，进而确定输入的密码是否正确。<\/p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top:10px;margin-bottom:15px;padding-top:0px;padding-right:0px;padding-bottom:0px;padding-left:0px;word-break:break-all;font-family:Simsun;font-size:14px;line-height:23px;text-align:left;background-color:#f6f4e9;\">　　通过这样的步骤，系统在并不知道用户密码的明码的情况下就可以确定用户登录系统的合法性。这不但可以避免用户的密码被具有系统管理员权限的用户知道，而且还在一定程度上增加了密码被破解的难度。<\/p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top:10px;margin-bottom:15px;padding-top:0px;padding-right:0px;padding-bottom:0px;padding-left:0px;word-break:break-all;font-family:Simsun;font-size:14px;line-height:23px;text-align:left;background-color:#f6f4e9;\">　　不过，由于MD5的弱点被不断发现以及计算机能力不断的提升，通过碰撞的方法有可能构造两个具有相同MD5的信息，使MD5算法在目前的安全环境下有一点落伍。从实践角度，不同信息具有相同MD5的可能性还是非常低的，通常认为是不可能的，通过碰撞的方法也很难碰撞出复杂信息的MD5数值。<\/p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top:10px;margin-bottom:15px;padding-top:0px;padding-right:0px;padding-bottom:0px;padding-left:0px;word-break:break-all;font-family:Simsun;font-size:14px;line-height:23px;text-align:left;background-color:#f6f4e9;\">　　因此，MD5算法还是被广泛的用作检验文件是否变化的散列函数，很多类似迅雷、旋风这样的下载工具，都可以通过MD5来验证，用户下载下来的文件是否被修改。<\/p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top:10px;margin-bottom:15px;padding-top:0px;padding-right:0px;padding-bottom:0px;padding-left:0px;word-break:break-all;font-family:Simsun;font-size:14px;line-height:23px;background-color:#f6f4e9;text-align:center;\"><img alt=\"MD5的安全性\" src=\"http:\/\/www.williamlong.info\/upload\/2944_1.jpg\" style=\"border-top-width:1px;border-right-width:1px;border-bottom-width:1px;border-left-width:1px;border-style:initial;border-color:initial;border-image:initial;padding-top:4px;padding-right:4px;padding-bottom:4px;padding-left:4px;border-top-style:solid;border-right-style:solid;border-bottom-style:solid;border-left-style:solid;border-top-color:#d5d4cd;border-right-color:#d5d4cd;border-bottom-color:#d5d4cd;border-left-color:#d5d4cd;clear:both;float:none;\" \/><\/p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top:10px;margin-bottom:15px;padding-top:0px;padding-right:0px;padding-bottom:0px;padding-left:0px;word-break:break-all;font-family:Simsun;font-size:14px;line-height:23px;text-align:left;background-color:#f6f4e9;\">　　在用户密码的处理方面，MD5总的来看还算是安全的，至少比明文保存密码要好的多，目前破解MD5主要依靠大型字典的方法，将常用密码进行MD5后建立数据库，然后和MD5数值进行对比，通过这样的方法来\u201C破解\u201DMD5，因此，通常直接将密码进行MD5处理的话，一些弱密码很容易可以通过这种手段\u201C破解\u201D出来。<\/p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top:10px;margin-bottom:15px;padding-top:0px;padding-right:0px;padding-bottom:0px;padding-left:0px;word-break:break-all;font-family:Simsun;font-size:14px;line-height:23px;text-align:left;background-color:#f6f4e9;\">　　不过，如果在散列的过程中，加入足够长的salt（即干扰字符串），并且salt加入一些动态信息，例如username、随机码等，这样生成的MD5还是很难被破解的，因为仅仅从数据库无法看到MD5具体的处理过程，必须同时看到处理时的源代码才可以，这就给破解MD5带来相当大的难度。<\/p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top:10px;margin-bottom:15px;padding-top:0px;padding-right:0px;padding-bottom:0px;padding-left:0px;word-break:break-all;font-family:Simsun;font-size:14px;line-height:23px;text-align:left;background-color:#f6f4e9;\">　　还有一个方法，既然简单密码的MD5是不安全的，网站的开发者只需要一个简单的技巧就能提高密码的安全度：在用户注册的时候，录入新密码后进行判断，强制密码必须8位以上，并包含字母和数字，否则不让注册，这样用户注册后使用的密码就都是不容易被破解的密码了。<\/p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top:10px;margin-bottom:15px;padding-top:0px;padding-right:0px;padding-bottom:0px;padding-left:0px;word-break:break-all;font-family:Simsun;font-size:14px;line-height:23px;text-align:left;background-color:#f6f4e9;\">　　如果需要更安全的算法，建议不用MD5，而使用SHA-256， SHA（Secure Hash Algorithm，安全散列算法）是美国国家安全局（NSA）设计，美国国家标准与技术研究院（NIST）发布的一系列密码散列函数。目前还没有出现针对SHA-256算法的有效攻击方法，该算法也是开源算法，在很多地方可以找到，是MD5的一个不错的后继者。<\/p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top:10px;margin-bottom:15px;padding-top:0px;padding-right:0px;padding-bottom:0px;padding-left:0px;word-break:break-all;font-family:Simsun;font-size:14px;line-height:23px;text-align:left;background-color:#f6f4e9;\">[转自]<a href=\"http:\/\/www.williamlong.info\/archives\/2944.html\">http:\/\/www.williamlong.info\/archives\/2944.html<\/a><\/p>","articleTypeId":"1295610713745","articleTitle":"MD5算法的安全性","articleIsPublished":"0","articleViewCount":"507","articleAbstract":"这次\u201C泄密门事件\u201D对用户影响最大的恐怕是明文保存密码的CSDN和天涯社区，如果当初他们使用散列算法将密码进行处理，就不会有这么大的影响，而对于散列算法，就不得不说一下MD5这个算法。　　散列算法（HashFunction）中，最为常用的是MD5（Message-DigestAlgorithm5）算法，MD5是一个较为古老的算法，一度被广泛应用于安全领域。比如在UNIX系统中用户的密码就是以MD5（...","oId":"1325294231331","articleCreateDate":"2011年12月31日 09:17:11","articleTags":""},"1319188554834":{"articleUpdateDate":"","articleContent":"<span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"color:#444444;font-family:Tahoma, 'Microsoft Yahei', Simsun;font-size:14px;line-height:21px;\"><i class=\"pstatus\" style=\"word-wrap:break-word;display:block;margin-bottom:-30px;font-size:12px;text-align:center;font-style:normal;line-height:32px;color:#999999;\"><br \/>\r\n<\/i><br style=\"word-wrap:break-word;\" \/>\r\n<p align=\"left\" style=\"word-wrap:break-word;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px;padding-top:0px;padding-right:0px;padding-bottom:0px;padding-left:0px;\"><strong style=\"word-wrap:break-word;font-weight:700;\">如何将不带www的根域名跳转到带www的主域名上<\/strong><\/p>\r\n<br style=\"word-wrap:break-word;\" \/>\r\n<p align=\"left\" style=\"word-wrap:break-word;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px;padding-top:0px;padding-right:0px;padding-bottom:0px;padding-left:0px;\"><span style=\"word-wrap:break-word;;color:#FF0000;\">之前一直在想如何在网址中输入wg8844.com的域名时就跳转到www.wg8844.com的根域名上，因为在中国大家都将带www开头的域名认为是主域名，其实不带www的域名才是主域名，但是为了符合中国人的认知习惯我们还是有必要将主域名跳转到根域名上的。<\/span><\/p>\r\n<p align=\"left\" style=\"word-wrap:break-word;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px;padding-top:0px;padding-right:0px;padding-bottom:0px;padding-left:0px;\"><span style=\"word-wrap:break-word;;color:#FF0000;\"><br style=\"word-wrap:break-word;\" \/>\r\n<\/span><\/p>\r\n<p align=\"left\" style=\"word-wrap:break-word;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px;padding-top:0px;padding-right:0px;padding-bottom:0px;padding-left:0px;\"><span style=\"word-wrap:break-word;;color:#FF0000;\">在网上找了很久很久才找到的这个比较详细的教程，不是我个人原创的，我觉得对许多站长而言非常有帮助的。<\/span><\/p>\r\n<br style=\"word-wrap:break-word;\" \/>\r\n<span style=\"word-wrap:break-word;;font-family:宋体;\"><strong style=\"word-wrap:break-word;font-weight:700;\"><span style=\"word-wrap:break-word;;font-family:'Tahoma, 'Microsoft Yahei', Simsun';\"><br style=\"word-wrap:break-word;\" \/>\r\n<\/span><\/strong><\/span><p align=\"left\" style=\"word-wrap:break-word;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px;padding-top:0px;padding-right:0px;padding-bottom:0px;padding-left:0px;\"><\/p>\r\n<span style=\"word-wrap:break-word;;font-family:宋体;\"><div class=\"quote\" style=\"word-wrap:break-word;overflow-x:hidden;overflow-y:hidden;margin-top:10px;margin-right:0px;margin-bottom:10px;margin-left:0px;padding-left:65px;background-image:url(http:\/\/www.discuz.net\/static\/image\/common\/icon_quote_s.gif);background-attachment:initial;background-origin:initial;background-clip:initial;background-color:#f9f9f9;color:#666666;padding-top:10px;padding-right:10px;padding-bottom:5px;zoom:1;background-position:20px 6px;background-repeat:no-repeat no-repeat;\"><blockquote style=\"word-wrap:break-word;display:inline;margin-top:0px;margin-right:0px;margin-bottom:0px;margin-left:0px;padding-right:65px;background-image:url(http:\/\/www.discuz.net\/static\/image\/common\/icon_quote_e.gif);background-attachment:initial;background-origin:initial;background-clip:initial;background-color:initial;padding-top:0px;padding-bottom:5px;padding-left:0px;line-height:1.6;zoom:1;background-position:100% 100%;background-repeat:no-repeat no-repeat;\">看到一般网站都把如：wg8844.com转发到www.wg8844.com，于是今天准备把wg8844.com转发到www.wg8844.com，在网上找了一会，发现godaddy域名转发后在国内访问不了，于是搜索godaddy域名转发方法，果然，用.htaccess可以实现转发，方法如下：<\/blockquote>\r\n<\/div>\r\n<br style=\"word-wrap:break-word;\" \/>\r\n<\/span><br style=\"word-wrap:break-word;\" \/>\r\n<p align=\"left\" style=\"word-wrap:break-word;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px;padding-top:0px;padding-right:0px;padding-bottom:0px;padding-left:0px;\"><span style=\"word-wrap:break-word;;color:#444444;\"><span style=\"word-wrap:break-word;;font-family:宋体;\"><span style=\"word-wrap:break-word;font-size:10.5pt; ;\"><br style=\"word-wrap:break-word;\" \/>\r\n<\/span><\/span><\/span><\/p>\r\n<p align=\"left\" 6px;background-repeat:no-repeat no-repeat;\"><blockquote 100%;background-repeat:no-repeat no-repeat;\">1、将wg8844.com解析到与www.wg8844.com相同的ip；（godaddy的NS默认wg8844.com与www.wg8844.com解析的ip相同）<br style=\"word-wrap:break-word;\" \/>\r\n2、新建.htaccess 文件，加入如下代码，保存后上传到网站上面；<\/blockquote>\r\n<\/div>\r\n<br style=\"word-wrap:break-word;\" \/>\r\n<\/span><\/span><br style=\"word-wrap:break-word;\" \/>\r\n<p align=\"left\" class=\"blockcode\" style=\"word-wrap:break-word;overflow-x:hidden;overflow-y:hidden;margin-top:10px;margin-right:0px;margin-bottom:10px;margin-left:0px;padding-top:10px;padding-right:0px;padding-bottom:5px;padding-left:10px;background-image:url(http:\/\/www.discuz.net\/static\/image\/common\/codebg.gif);background-attachment:initial;background-origin:initial;background-clip:initial;background-color:#f7f7f7;color:#666666;zoom:1;border-top-width:1px;border-right-width:1px;border-bottom-width:1px;border-left-width:1px;border-top-style:solid;border-right-style:solid;border-bottom-style:solid;border-left-style:solid;border-top-color:#cccccc;border-right-color:#cccccc;border-bottom-color:#cccccc;border-left-color:#cccccc;background-position:0px style=\"word-wrap:break-word;margin-top:0px;margin-right:0px;margin-bottom:0px;margin-left:2em;padding-top:0px;padding-right:0px;padding-bottom:0px;padding-left:10px;list-style-type:decimal-leading-zero;font-family:Monaco, \/>\r\n<\/li>\r\n<li style=\"word-wrap:break-word;margin-top:0px;margin-right:0px;margin-bottom:0px;margin-left:2em;padding-top:0px;padding-right:0px;padding-bottom:0px;padding-left:10px;list-style-type:decimal-leading-zero;font-family:Monaco, Consolas, '&quot;Lucida Console&quot;', '&quot;Couriernew&quot;',serif;font-size:12px;line-height:1.8em;\">RewriteRule ^(.*)$ http:\/\/www.wg8844.com\/$1 [L,R=301]<\/li>\r\n<\/ol>\r\n<\/div>\r\n<em style=\"word-wrap:break-word;font-style:normal;color:#336699 !important;margin-left:43px;font-size:12px;cursor:pointer;\">复制代码<\/em><\/div>\r\n<div class=\"quote\" style=\"word-wrap:break-word;;color:#444444;\"><span style=\"word-wrap:break-word;;font-family:Tahoma;\"><span style=\"word-wrap:break-word;font-size:10.5pt; ;\">www.wg8844.com<\/span><\/span><\/span><span style=\"word-wrap:break-word;;color:#444444;\"><span style=\"word-wrap:break-word;;font-family:宋体;\"><span style=\"word-wrap:break-word;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px;padding-top:0px;padding-right:0px;padding-bottom:0px;padding-left:0px;\"><span style=\"word-wrap:break-word;;color:#444444;\"><span style=\"word-wrap:break-word;;font-family:宋体;\"><span style=\"word-wrap:break-word;font-size:10.5pt; ;\">你的网站在做域名解析时，有没有设置不带<\/span><\/span><\/span><span style=\"word-wrap:break-word;;color:#444444;\"><span style=\"word-wrap:break-word;;font-family:Tahoma;\"><span style=\"word-wrap:break-word;font-size:10.5pt; ;\">www<\/span><\/span><\/span><span style=\"word-wrap:break-word;;color:#444444;\"><span style=\"word-wrap:break-word;;font-family:宋体;\"><span style=\"word-wrap:break-word;font-size:10.5pt; ;\">的域名？应该设置一个不带<\/span><\/span><\/span><span style=\"word-wrap:break-word;;color:#444444;\"><span style=\"word-wrap:break-word;;font-family:Tahoma;\"><span style=\"word-wrap:break-word;font-size:10.5pt; ;\">www<\/span><\/span><\/span><span style=\"word-wrap:break-word;;color:#444444;\"><span style=\"word-wrap:break-word;;font-family:宋体;\"><span style=\"word-wrap:break-word;font-size:10.5pt; ;\">的域名。这样，当用户使用不带<\/span><\/span><\/span><span style=\"word-wrap:break-word;;color:#444444;\"><span style=\"word-wrap:break-word;;font-family:Tahoma;\"><span style=\"word-wrap:break-word;font-size:10.5pt; ;\">www<\/span><\/span><\/span><span style=\"word-wrap:break-word;;color:#444444;\"><span style=\"word-wrap:break-word;;font-family:宋体;\"><span style=\"word-wrap:break-word;font-size:10.5pt; ;\">的域名时，可以正常访问你的网站。<\/span><\/span><\/span><\/p>\r\n<p align=\"left\" style=\"word-wrap:break-word;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px;padding-top:0px;padding-right:0px;padding-bottom:0px;padding-left:0px;\"><span style=\"word-wrap:break-word;;color:#444444;\"><span style=\"word-wrap:break-word;;font-family:Tahoma;\"><span style=\"word-wrap:break-word;font-size:10.5pt; ;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;<\/span><\/span><\/span><\/p>\r\n<p align=\"left\" style=\"word-wrap:break-word;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px;padding-top:0px;padding-right:0px;padding-bottom:0px;padding-left:0px;\"><span style=\"word-wrap:break-word;;color:#444444;\"><span style=\"word-wrap:break-word;;font-family:宋体;\"><span style=\"word-wrap:break-word;font-size:10.5pt; ;\">但是我们经常碰到这样的情况，其他网站链接你的站点时，会用下面的链接：<\/span><\/span><\/span><\/p>\r\n<p align=\"left\" style=\"word-wrap:break-word;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px;padding-top:0px;padding-right:0px;padding-bottom:0px;padding-left:0px;\"><span style=\"word-wrap:break-word;;color:#444444;\"><span style=\"word-wrap:break-word;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px;padding-top:0px;padding-right:0px;padding-bottom:0px;padding-left:0px;\"><\/p>\r\n<p align=\"left\" style=\"word-wrap:break-word;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px;padding-top:0px;padding-right:0px;padding-bottom:0px;padding-left:0px;\"><strong style=\"word-wrap:break-word;font-weight:700;\"><span style=\"word-wrap:break-word;;color:red;\"><span style=\"word-wrap:break-word;;font-family:宋体;\">而这样导致：你站点主域名的<\/span><\/span><\/strong><strong style=\"word-wrap:break-word;font-weight:700;\"><span style=\"word-wrap:break-word;;color:red;\"><span style=\"word-wrap:break-word;;font-family:Tahoma;\">pr<\/span><\/span><\/strong><strong style=\"word-wrap:break-word;font-weight:700;\"><span style=\"word-wrap:break-word;;color:red;\"><span style=\"word-wrap:break-word;;font-family:宋体;\">值分散到其他几个<\/span><\/span><\/strong><strong style=\"word-wrap:break-word;font-weight:700;\"><span style=\"word-wrap:break-word;;color:red;\"><span style=\"word-wrap:break-word;;font-family:Tahoma;\">URLs<\/span><\/span><\/strong><strong style=\"word-wrap:break-word;font-weight:700;\"><span style=\"word-wrap:break-word;;color:red;\"><span style=\"word-wrap:break-word;;font-family:宋体;\">了。因为在<a href=\"http:\/\/www.discuz.net\/search.php?mod=my&amp;source=adlink&amp;q=%CB%D1%CB%F7%D2%FD%C7%E6\" target=\"_blank\" style=\"word-wrap:break-word;color:#336699;text-decoration:none;border-bottom-width:1px;border-bottom-style:dotted;border-bottom-color:blue;\">搜索引擎<\/a>看来，带<\/span><\/span><\/strong><strong style=\"word-wrap:break-word;font-weight:700;\"><span style=\"word-wrap:break-word;;color:red;\"><span style=\"word-wrap:break-word;;font-family:Tahoma;\">www<\/span><\/span><\/strong><strong style=\"word-wrap:break-word;font-weight:700;\"><span style=\"word-wrap:break-word;;color:red;\"><span style=\"word-wrap:break-word;;font-family:宋体;\">和不带<\/span><\/span><\/strong><strong style=\"word-wrap:break-word;font-weight:700;\"><span style=\"word-wrap:break-word;;color:red;\"><span style=\"word-wrap:break-word;;font-family:Tahoma;\">www<\/span><\/span><\/strong><strong style=\"word-wrap:break-word;font-weight:700;\"><span style=\"word-wrap:break-word;;color:red;\"><span style=\"word-wrap:break-word;;font-family:宋体;\">的<\/span><\/span><\/strong><strong style=\"word-wrap:break-word;font-weight:700;\"><span style=\"word-wrap:break-word;;color:red;\"><span style=\"word-wrap:break-word;;font-family:Tahoma;\">URL<\/span><\/span><\/strong><strong style=\"word-wrap:break-word;font-weight:700;\"><span style=\"word-wrap:break-word;;color:red;\"><span style=\"word-wrap:break-word;;font-family:宋体;\">是不同的两个<\/span><\/span><\/strong><strong style=\"word-wrap:break-word;font-weight:700;\"><span style=\"word-wrap:break-word;;color:red;\"><span style=\"word-wrap:break-word;;font-family:Tahoma;\">URL<\/span><\/span><\/strong><strong style=\"word-wrap:break-word;font-weight:700;\"><span style=\"word-wrap:break-word;;color:red;\"><span style=\"word-wrap:break-word;;font-family:宋体;\">，当它们指向同一个网站时，会让搜索引擎不懂应该选择哪一个<\/span><\/span><\/strong><strong style=\"word-wrap:break-word;font-weight:700;\"><span style=\"word-wrap:break-word;;color:red;\"><span style=\"word-wrap:break-word;;font-family:Tahoma;\">URL<\/span><\/span><\/strong><strong style=\"word-wrap:break-word;font-weight:700;\"><span style=\"word-wrap:break-word;;color:red;\"><span style=\"word-wrap:break-word;;font-family:宋体;\">作为主要的。<\/span><\/span><\/strong><\/p>\r\n<p align=\"left\" style=\"word-wrap:break-word;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px;padding-top:0px;padding-right:0px;padding-bottom:0px;padding-left:0px;\"><span style=\"word-wrap:break-word;;color:#444444;\"><span style=\"word-wrap:break-word;;font-family:Tahoma;\"><span style=\"word-wrap:break-word;font-size:10.5pt; ;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;<\/span><\/span><\/span><\/p>\r\n<p align=\"left\" style=\"word-wrap:break-word;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px;padding-top:0px;padding-right:0px;padding-bottom:0px;padding-left:0px;\"><\/p>\r\n<span style=\"word-wrap:break-word;;font-family:宋体;\"><div class=\"quote\" style=\"word-wrap:break-word;overflow-x:hidden;overflow-y:hidden;margin-top:10px;margin-right:0px;margin-bottom:10px;margin-left:0px;padding-left:65px;background-image:url(http:\/\/www.discuz.net\/static\/image\/common\/icon_quote_s.gif);background-attachment:initial;background-origin:initial;background-clip:initial;background-color:#f9f9f9;color:#666666;padding-top:10px;padding-right:10px;padding-bottom:5px;zoom:1;background-position:20px 6px;background-repeat:no-repeat no-repeat;\"><blockquote style=\"word-wrap:break-word;display:inline;margin-top:0px;margin-right:0px;margin-bottom:0px;margin-left:0px;padding-right:65px;background-image:url(http:\/\/www.discuz.net\/static\/image\/common\/icon_quote_e.gif);background-attachment:initial;background-origin:initial;background-clip:initial;background-color:initial;padding-top:0px;padding-bottom:5px;padding-left:0px;line-height:1.6;zoom:1;background-position:100% 100%;background-repeat:no-repeat no-repeat;\">如果你用301<a href=\"http:\/\/www.discuz.net\/search.php?mod=my&amp;source=adlink&amp;q=%D6%D8%B6%A8%CF%F2\" target=\"_blank\" style=\"word-wrap:break-word;color:#336699;text-decoration:none;border-bottom-width:1px;border-bottom-style:dotted;border-bottom-color:blue;\">重定向<\/a>把其他几个URL如example.com转到<br style=\"word-wrap:break-word;\" \/>\r\nwww.example.com<br style=\"word-wrap:break-word;\" \/>\r\nPR也就集中在主域名：www.example.com 了。<br style=\"word-wrap:break-word;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;<br style=\"word-wrap:break-word;\" \/>\r\n虽然在google网站管理员中心中，可以google设定首选域名，而这个设置就是为一些人设置不了301的问题而准备的，设定首选域名和301是一样的效果，不过这仅仅对google有效。该设置301还是要设置的，毕竟是要对所有搜索引擎的。<\/blockquote>\r\n<\/div>\r\n<br style=\"word-wrap:break-word;\" \/>\r\n<\/span><br style=\"word-wrap:break-word;\" \/>\r\n<p align=\"left\" style=\"word-wrap:break-word;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px;padding-top:0px;padding-right:0px;padding-bottom:0px;padding-left:0px;\"><\/p>\r\n<p align=\"left\" style=\"word-wrap:break-word;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px;padding-top:0px;padding-right:0px;padding-bottom:0px;padding-left:0px;\"><\/p>\r\n<p align=\"left\" style=\"word-wrap:break-word;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px;padding-top:0px;padding-right:0px;padding-bottom:0px;padding-left:0px;\"><\/p>\r\n<span style=\"word-wrap:break-word;;font-family:Tahoma;\"><span style=\"word-wrap:break-word;;color:#336699;\"><span style=\"word-wrap:break-word;;font-size:x-large;\"><div class=\"quote\" style=\"word-wrap:break-word;overflow-x:hidden;overflow-y:hidden;margin-top:10px;margin-right:0px;margin-bottom:10px;margin-left:0px;padding-left:65px;background-image:url(http:\/\/www.discuz.net\/static\/image\/common\/icon_quote_s.gif);background-attachment:initial;background-origin:initial;background-clip:initial;background-color:#f9f9f9;color:#666666;padding-top:10px;padding-right:10px;padding-bottom:5px;zoom:1;background-position:20px 6px;background-repeat:no-repeat no-repeat;\"><blockquote style=\"word-wrap:break-word;;font-family:宋体;\"><span style=\"word-wrap:break-word;font-size:10.5pt; ;\">&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;经过测试以后，发现<\/span><\/span><\/span><span ;\">meta&nbsp;<\/span><\/span><\/span><span style=\"word-wrap:break-word;;color:#444444;\"><span style=\"word-wrap:break-word;;font-family:宋体;\"><span style=\"word-wrap:break-word;font-size:10.5pt; ;\">转发之间有不同的概念。<\/span><\/span><\/span><\/p>\r\n<p align=\"left\" ;\">转发：分显性转发，隐性转发，如果做<\/span><\/span><\/span><span style=\"word-wrap:break-word;;color:#444444;\"><span style=\"word-wrap:break-word;;font-family:Tahoma;\"><span style=\"word-wrap:break-word;font-size:10.5pt; ;\">K<\/span><\/span><\/span><span style=\"word-wrap:break-word;;color:#444444;\"><span style=\"word-wrap:break-word;;font-family:宋体;\"><span style=\"word-wrap:break-word;font-size:10.5pt; ;\">URL<\/span><\/span><\/span><span style=\"word-wrap:break-word;;color:#444444;\"><span style=\"word-wrap:break-word;;font-family:宋体;\"><span ;\">转发对已经存在网址统一重新转向新域名。而<\/span><\/span><\/span><span style=\"word-wrap:break-word;;color:#444444;\"><span style=\"word-wrap:break-word;;font-family:Tahoma;\"><span \/>\r\nPR也就集中在主域名：www.example.com 了。<br style=\"word-wrap:break-word;\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;<br style=\"word-wrap:break-word;\" \/>\r\n<p>虽然在google网站管理员中心中，可以google设定首选域名，而这个设置就是为一些人设置不了301的问题而准备的，设定首选域名和301是一样的效果，不过这仅仅对google有效。该设置301还是要设置的，毕竟是要对所有搜索引擎的。<\/p>\r\n<\/blockquote>\r\n<\/div>\r\n<\/span>","articleTypeId":"1291207692656","articleTitle":"如何将不带www的主域名跳转到带www的根域名上【教程】","articleIsPublished":"0","articleViewCount":"721","articleAbstract":"如何将不带www的根域名跳转到带www的主域名上之前一直在想如何在网址中输入wg8844.com的域名时就跳转到www.wg8844.com的根域名上，因为在中国大家都将带www开头的域名认为是主域名，其实不带www的域名才是主域名，但是为了符合中国人的认知习惯我们还是有必要将主域名跳转到根域名上的。在网上找了很久很久才找到的这个比较详细的教程，不是我个人原创的，我觉得对许多站长而言非常有帮助的。...","oId":"1319188554834","articleCreateDate":"2011年10月21日 跟着一起滚动吧","articleIsPublished":"0","articleViewCount":"365","articleAbstract":"前几天看到美丽说那个导航，觉得不错，所以也琢磨着修改一下本站右边的效果。首先简单介绍一下，这些代码的效果，当滚动条滚动到.scrolls处，就让这个层不在跟着滚动当滚动条滚到.scrolls之上，这个层就变回原来的排版。代码附上：&lt;!DOCTYPEhtmlPUBLIC-\/\/WAPFORUM\/\/DTDXHTMLMobile1.0\/\/ENhttp:\/\/www.wapforum.org\/DTD\/x...","oId":"1348554360936","articleCreateDate":"2012年09月25日 \/>","articleTypeId":"1320371170537","articleTitle":"很漂亮的统计报表","articleIsPublished":"1","articleViewCount":"3","articleAbstract":"...","oId":"1394270275975","articleCreateDate":"2014年03月08日 17:17:55","articleTags":""},"1328369829717":{"articleUpdateDate":"","articleContent":"<p>爱记帐是好事，可以知道自己一个月花了多少钱，回头想下，哪些该花，哪些又浪费掉了，从而提高自己的理财意识。<br \/>\r\n为什么这个帐本叫伤心帐本呢？原因只有一个，那就是我们这些小白领，每个月工资有限，但是生活水平已经被提高，每个月都入不负出，从而带来了许多烦恼，也就令人伤心。<br \/>\r\n据我不完全统计，许多80年后就有这个烦恼，例如王刚，他现在在某政府上班，月薪9000，虽然经常出差，但是所有费用都报帐，可到年底回家，口袋里只有工资+年终奖，朋友问怎么这样，他也不知道，反正就是花光了。<br \/>\r\n也许我们身边的例子还有很多，我们不要伤心，也不要幸栽乐祸，我们应该时刻提醒自己，掏出手机，记下今天的每一笔。<br \/>\r\n<br sans-serif;line-height:20px;\"><span style=\"font-family:宋体;font-size:10.5pt;color:#000000;\">很多人在处理页面的<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.5pt;color:#000000;\">path<\/span><span style=\"font-family:宋体;font-size:10.5pt;color:#000000;\">时遇到了一些恼人的问题，今天来探讨一下：<\/span><\/span>\r\n<\/p>\r\n<span style=\"line-height:20px;\"><span><span style=\"font-family:''Times New Roman'';\"><span style=\"font-size:10.5pt;\">Javax.servlet.RequestDispatcher.forward(ServletRequest request, ServletResponse response)<\/span><\/span><br \/>\r\n<span style=\"font-family:''Times New Roman'';\"><span style=\"font-size:10.5pt;\">Javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse.sendRedirect(String location)<\/span><\/span><br \/>\r\n<\/span><b><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.5pt;color:#000000;\">forward<\/span><\/b><span style=\"color:#c1c1c1;font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.5pt;\"><br \/>\r\n<\/span><span style=\"font-family:宋体;font-size:10.5pt;color:#000000;\">作用于服务器端，重定向后客户端浏览器地址栏的<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.5pt;color:#000000;\">URL<\/span><span style=\"font-family:宋体;font-size:10.5pt;color:#000000;\">不变，无法通过<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.5pt;color:#000000;\">get<\/span><span style=\"font-family:宋体;font-size:10.5pt;color:#000000;\">方式传递参数，不过可以通过<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.5pt;color:#000000;\">HttpServletResponse. setAttribute(key, values)<\/span><span style=\"font-family:宋体;font-size:10.5pt;color:#000000;\">来做：<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.5pt;color:#000000;\"><br \/>\r\nJDK<\/span><span style=\"font-family:宋体;font-size:10.5pt;color:#000000;\">的<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.5pt;color:#000000;\">DOC<\/span><span style=\"font-family:宋体;font-size:10.5pt;color:#000000;\">中的描述：<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.5pt;color:#000000;\"><br \/>\r\nForwards a request from a servlet to another resource (servlet, JSP file, or HTML file) on the server. This method allows one servlet to do preliminary processing of a request and another resource to generate the response.<br \/>\r\nforward should be called before the response has been committed to the client (before response body output has been flushed). If the response already has been committed, this method throws an IllegalStateException. Uncommitted output in the response buffer is automatically cleared before the forward.<br \/>\r\n<\/span><span style=\"font-family:宋体;font-size:10.5pt;color:#000000;\">这个方法允许一个<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.5pt;color:#000000;\">servlet<\/span><span style=\"font-family:宋体;font-size:10.5pt;color:#000000;\">对一个请求作完处理后，并使用另一个资源作响应。<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.5pt;color:#000000;\"><br \/>\r\nforward<\/span><span style=\"font-family:宋体;font-size:10.5pt;color:#000000;\">应该在向客户端发出响应之前被调用（<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.5pt;color:#000000;\">response<\/span><span style=\"font-family:宋体;font-size:10.5pt;color:#000000;\">的输出流被刷新之前），如果已经向客户端发出了响应，这个方法将抛出一个<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.5pt;color:#000000;\">\u201CIllegalStateException\u201D<\/span><span style=\"font-family:宋体;font-size:10.5pt;color:#000000;\">的异常。未发出响应<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.5pt;color:#000000;\">response<\/span><span style=\"font-family:宋体;font-size:10.5pt;color:#000000;\">的输出缓冲区在调用<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.5pt;color:#000000;\">forward<\/span><span style=\"font-family:宋体;font-size:10.5pt;color:#000000;\">会被自动的清空。<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';color:white;font-size:10.5pt;\"><br \/>\r\n<\/span><span style=\"font-family:宋体;font-size:10.5pt;color:#000000;\">得到<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.5pt;color:#000000;\">RequestDispatcher<\/span><span style=\"font-family:宋体;font-size:10.5pt;color:#000000;\">引用的方法：<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.5pt;color:#000000;\"><br \/>\r\n1<\/span><span style=\"font-family:宋体;font-size:10.5pt;color:#000000;\">、<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.5pt;color:#000000;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;javax.servlet.ServletContext.getRequestDispatcher(String path)<br \/>\r\nJDK<\/span><span style=\"font-family:宋体;font-size:10.5pt;color:#000000;\">的<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.5pt;color:#000000;\">DOC<\/span><span style=\"font-family:宋体;font-size:10.5pt;color:#000000;\">中的描述：<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.5pt;color:#000000;\"><br \/>\r\nThe pathname must begin with a \"\/\" and is interpreted as relative to the current context root. Use getContext to obtain a RequestDispatcher for resources in foreign contexts. This method returns null if the ServletContext cannot return a RequestDispatcher.<br \/>\r\n<\/span><span style=\"font-family:宋体;font-size:10.5pt;color:#000000;\">用的最多，最容易理解的方法，<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.5pt;color:#000000;\">path<\/span><span style=\"font-family:宋体;font-size:10.5pt;color:#000000;\">必须是以<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.5pt;color:#000000;\">\u201C\/\u201D<\/span><span style=\"font-family:宋体;font-size:10.5pt;color:#000000;\">开头，路径是相对于全局上下文路径，对应于<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.5pt;color:#000000;\">web<\/span><span style=\"font-family:宋体;font-size:10.5pt;color:#000000;\">应用的根目录<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.5pt;color:#000000;\"><br \/>\r\n2<\/span><span style=\"font-family:宋体;font-size:10.5pt;color:#000000;\">、<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.5pt;color:#000000;\">javax.servlet.ServletRequest.getRequestDispatcher(String path)<br \/>\r\nJDK<\/span><span style=\"font-family:宋体;font-size:10.5pt;color:#000000;\">的<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.5pt;color:#000000;\">DOC<\/span><span style=\"font-family:宋体;font-size:10.5pt;color:#000000;\">中的描述：<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.5pt;color:#000000;\"><br \/>\r\nThe pathname specified may be relative, although it cannot extend outside the current servlet context. If the path begins with a \"\/\" it is interpreted as relative to the current context root. This method returns null if the servlet container cannot return a RequestDispatcher.<br \/>\r\n<\/span><span style=\"font-family:宋体;font-size:10.5pt;color:#000000;\">可以是相对地址，以当前资源的根目录，但不能超出当前资源根目录。<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';color:white;font-size:10.5pt;\"><br \/>\r\n<\/span><span style=\"font-family:宋体;font-size:10.5pt;color:#000000;\">可以是以<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.5pt;color:#000000;\">\u201C\/\u201D<\/span><span style=\"font-family:宋体;font-size:10.5pt;color:#000000;\">作为根目录环境。<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.5pt;color:#000000;\"><br \/>\r\n2<\/span><span given names via server administration or via a web application deployment descriptor.<br \/>\r\n<\/span><span style=\"font-family:宋体;font-size:10.5pt;color:#000000;\">得到名为<\/span><span Roman';font-size:10.5pt;color:#000000;\">web<\/span><span style=\"font-family:宋体;font-size:10.5pt;color:#000000;\">应用的部署描述<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.5pt;color:#000000;\">web.xml<\/span><span style=\"font-family:宋体;font-size:10.5pt;color:#000000;\">提供的。<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';color:white;font-size:10.5pt;\"><br \/>\r\n<\/span><b><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.5pt;color:#000000;\">sendRedirect<\/span><\/b><span style=\"color:#c1c1c1;font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.5pt;\"><br \/>\r\n<\/span><span style=\"font-family:宋体;font-size:10.5pt;color:#000000;\">工作在客户端，重定向后客户端浏览器地址栏的<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.5pt;color:#000000;\">URL<\/span><span style=\"font-family:宋体;font-size:10.5pt;color:#000000;\">变为新的资源<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.5pt;color:#000000;\">URL<\/span><span style=\"font-family:宋体;font-size:10.5pt;color:#000000;\">，可以通过<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.5pt;color:#000000;\">get<\/span><span style=\"font-family:宋体;font-size:10.5pt;color:#000000;\">方式传递参数。<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.5pt;color:#000000;\"><br \/>\r\nJDK<\/span><span style=\"font-family:宋体;font-size:10.5pt;color:#000000;\">的<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.5pt;color:#000000;\">DOC<\/span><span style=\"font-family:宋体;font-size:10.5pt;color:#000000;\">的描述：<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.5pt;color:#000000;\"><br \/>\r\nSends a temporary redirect response to the client using the specified redirect location URL. This method can accept relative URLs; the servlet container must convert the relative URL to an absolute URL before sending the response to the client. If the location is relative without a leading '\/' the container interprets it as relative to the current request URI. If the location is relative with a leading '\/' the container interprets it as relative to the servlet container root.<br \/>\r\nIf the response has already been committed, this method throws an IllegalStateException. After using this method, the response should be considered to be committed and should not be written to.<br \/>\r\n<\/span><span style=\"font-family:宋体;font-size:10.5pt;color:#000000;\">这个方法可以接受相对的<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.5pt;color:#000000;\">URL<\/span><span style=\"font-family:宋体;font-size:10.5pt;color:#000000;\">，在发送响应之前<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.5pt;color:#000000;\">servlet<\/span><span style=\"font-family:宋体;font-size:10.5pt;color:#000000;\">容器会将其转化为绝对的<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.5pt;color:#000000;\">URL<\/span><span style=\"font-family:宋体;font-size:10.5pt;color:#000000;\">。如果相对的<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.5pt;color:#000000;\">URL<\/span><span style=\"font-family:宋体;font-size:10.5pt;color:#000000;\">不以<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.5pt;color:#000000;\">\u201C\/\u201D<\/span><span style=\"font-family:宋体;font-size:10.5pt;color:#000000;\">开头，容器将解释为是相对当前请求的路径<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.5pt;color:#000000;\">URI<\/span><span style=\"font-family:宋体;font-size:10.5pt;color:#000000;\">，如果是以<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.5pt;color:#000000;\">\u201C\/\u201D<\/span><span style=\"font-family:宋体;font-size:10.5pt;color:#000000;\">开头，则解释为是相对于<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.5pt;color:#000000;\">servlet<\/span><span style=\"font-family:宋体;font-size:10.5pt;color:#000000;\">容器的更目录环境。<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';color:white;font-size:10.5pt;\"><br \/>\r\n<\/span><span style=\"font-family:宋体;font-size:10.5pt;color:#000000;\">注意：如果已经向客户端响应了请求，这个方法将抛出一个<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.5pt;color:#000000;\">\u201CIllegalStateException\u201D<\/span><span style=\"font-family:宋体;font-size:10.5pt;color:#000000;\">的异常。调用了这个方法后，这个响应是否被提交或是否提交完毕。<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.5pt;color:#000000;\"><br \/>\r\nsendRedirect<\/span><span style=\"font-family:宋体;font-size:10.5pt;color:#000000;\">比较简单，参数<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.5pt;color:#000000;\">location<\/span><span style=\"font-family:宋体;font-size:10.5pt;color:#000000;\">就是代表重定向目标新资源。<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.5pt;color:#000000;\"><br \/>\r\nlocaltion<\/span><span style=\"font-family:宋体;font-size:10.5pt;color:#000000;\">可以有以下几种情况：<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';color:white;font-size:10.5pt;\"><br \/>\r\n<\/span><span style=\"font-family:宋体;font-size:10.5pt;color:#000000;\">可以是绝对地址，如<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.5pt;color:#000000;\">:http<\/span><span style=\"font-family:宋体;font-size:10.5pt;color:#000000;\">：<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.5pt;color:#000000;\">\/\/localhost:8080\/servlet\/a.jsp<br \/>\r\n<\/span><span style=\"font-family:宋体;font-size:10.5pt;color:#000000;\">可以是相对地址，相对于当前访问资源的根目录，如：<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.5pt;color:#000000;\">a.jsp<br \/>\r\n<\/span><span style=\"font-family:宋体;font-size:10.5pt;color:#000000;\">可以是以<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.5pt;color:#000000;\">\u201C\/\u201D<\/span><span style=\"font-family:宋体;font-size:10.5pt;color:#000000;\">开头的地址，则认为是先对该<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.5pt;color:#000000;\">web<\/span><span style=\"font-family:宋体;font-size:10.5pt;color:#000000;\">应用的根目录，如：<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.5pt;color:#000000;\">\/a.jsp<br \/>\r\n<\/span><\/span>\r\n<p>\r\n\t<span style=\"color:#c1c1c1;font-family:微软雅黑, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;line-height:20px;\"><span style=\"font-family:宋体;font-size:10.5pt;color:#000000;\">在工程中<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.5pt;color:#000000;\">yoyo<\/span><span style=\"font-family:宋体;font-size:10.5pt;color:#000000;\">喜欢使用从工程根目录开始的路径跳转，因为不用去考虑路径层次的问题。有了以上知识之后，我们再次总结出一个经验，如果是使用<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.5pt;color:#000000;\">forward<\/span><span style=\"font-family:宋体;font-size:10.5pt;color:#000000;\">进行内部跳转，那么我们推荐在填写路径的时候用<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.5pt;color:#000000;\">\u201D\/\u201D<\/span><span style=\"font-family:宋体;font-size:10.5pt;color:#000000;\">开头，因为这表示的是从工程根目录开始去寻找跳转资源，而使用<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.5pt;color:#000000;\">sendRedirect<\/span><span style=\"font-family:宋体;font-size:10.5pt;color:#000000;\">进行外部跳转的时候，我们推荐使用<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.5pt;color:#000000;\">request.getContextPath()+\u201D<\/span><span style=\"font-family:宋体;font-size:10.5pt;color:#000000;\">请求路径<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.5pt;color:#000000;\">\u201D<\/span><span style=\"font-family:宋体;font-size:10.5pt;color:#000000;\">作为路径，这里在前面加上上下文路径才能达到从根目录开始寻找资源的目的。<\/span><\/span>\r\n<\/p>\r\n<p>\r\n\t<span style=\"color:#c1c1c1;font-family:微软雅黑, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;line-height:20px;\"><span style=\"font-family:宋体;font-size:10.5pt;color:#000000;\">[转自]<\/span><\/span><a href=\"http:\/\/www.yoyolg.com\/blog_initBlogInfo.action?article.articleId=112\"><span style=\"color:#000000;\">http:\/\/www.yoyolg.com\/blog_initBlogInfo.action?article.articleId=112<\/span><\/a>\r\n<\/p>","articleTypeId":"1295610713745","articleTitle":"全解forward()和sendRedirect()","articleIsPublished":"0","articleViewCount":"698","articleAbstract":"很多人在处理页面的path时遇到了一些恼人的问题，今天来探讨一下：Javax.servlet.RequestDispatcher.forward(ServletRequestrequest,ServletResponseresponse)Javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse.sendRedirect(Stringlocation)forward作用于服务器端...","oId":"1319188813403","articleCreateDate":"2011年10月21日 sans-serif;font-size:14px;text-align:justify;background-color:#fee7f1;\">new Marquee(\"marquee\",\"top\",1,760,52,50,5000)<\/span><br style=\"color:#444444;font-family:Tahoma, Helvetica, SimSun, sans-serif;font-size:14px;text-align:justify;background-color:#fee7f1;word-wrap:break-word;\" \/>\r\n<span style=\"color:#444444;font-family:Tahoma, Helvetica, SimSun, sans-serif;font-size:14px;text-align:justify;background-color:#fee7f1;\">......<\/span><br style=\"color:#444444;font-family:Tahoma, Helvetica, SimSun, sans-serif;font-size:14px;text-align:justify;background-color:#fee7f1;word-wrap:break-word;\" \/>\r\n<span style=\"color:#444444;font-family:Tahoma, Helvetica, SimSun, sans-serif;font-size:14px;text-align:justify;background-color:#fee7f1;\">new Marquee(\"marquee\",0,1,760,104,50,5000,3000,52)<\/span><br style=\"color:#444444;font-family:Tahoma, Helvetica, SimSun, sans-serif;font-size:14px;text-align:justify;background-color:#fee7f1;word-wrap:break-word;\" \/>\r\n<span style=\"color:#444444;font-family:Tahoma, Helvetica, SimSun, sans-serif;font-size:14px;text-align:justify;background-color:#fee7f1;\">new Marquee(\"marquee\",null,null,760,104,null,5000,null,-1)<\/span><br style=\"color:#444444;font-family:Tahoma, Helvetica, sans-serif;font-size:14px;text-align:justify;background-color:#fee7f1;\">var marquee1 = new Marquee(\"marquee\") *此参数必选<\/span><br style=\"color:#444444;font-family:Tahoma, Helvetica, SimSun,
