style=\"padding-bottom:8px;padding-left:5px;padding-right:5px;font-family:arial, nsimsun, sans-serif;font-size:0.7em;vertical-align:top;border-top:#cccccc 1px solid;padding-top:8px;\"><code style=\"font-family:monospace;font-size:small !important;\"><span style=\"color:#e56600;\">create(type, name, params)<\/span><\/code><\/td>\r\n<span style=\"color:#e56600;\"> <\/span><td style=\"padding-bottom:8px;padding-left:5px;padding-right:5px;font-family:arial, nsimsun, sans-serif;font-size:0.7em;vertical-align:top;border-top:#cccccc 1px solid;padding-top:8px;\"><span style=\"color:#e56600;\">用来创建领域对象类的一个实例。参数<\/span><span class=\"Apple-converted-space\" style=\"color:#e56600;\">&nbsp;<\/span><code style=\"font-family:monospace;font-size:small !important;\"><span style=\"color:#e56600;\">type<\/span><\/code><span class=\"Apple-converted-space\" style=\"color:#e56600;\">&nbsp;<\/span><span style=\"color:#e56600;\">表示的是领域对象类，类型是<\/span><span class=\"Apple-converted-space\" style=\"color:#e56600;\">&nbsp;<\/span><code style=\"font-family:monospace;font-size:small !important;\"><span style=\"color:#e56600;\">java.lang.Class<\/span><\/code><span style=\"color:#e56600;\">；<\/span><code style=\"font-family:monospace;font-size:small !important;\"><span style=\"color:#e56600;\">name<\/span><\/code><span class=\"Apple-converted-space\" style=\"color:#e56600;\">&nbsp;<\/span><span style=\"color:#e56600;\">表示的是领域对象类的名称；<\/span><code style=\"font-family:monospace;font-size:small !important;\"><span style=\"color:#e56600;\">params<\/span><\/code><span style=\"color:#e56600;\">表示的是一个包含了实例中属性值的类型为<\/span><code style=\"font-family:monospace;font-size:small !important;\"><span style=\"color:#e56600;\">java.util.Map<\/span><java.lang.string,java.lang.string[]><\/java.lang.string,java.lang.string[]><\/code><span class=\"Apple-converted-space\" style=\"color:#e56600;\">&nbsp;<\/span><span style=\"color:#e56600;\">的哈希表。<\/span><\/td>\r\n<span style=\"color:#e56600;\"> <\/span><\/tr>\r\n<span style=\"color:#e56600;\"> <\/span><tr><span style=\"color:#e56600;\"> <\/span><td style=\"padding-bottom:8px;padding-left:5px;padding-right:5px;font-family:arial, nsimsun, sans-serif;font-size:0.7em;vertical-align:top;border-top:#cccccc 1px solid;padding-top:8px;\"><code style=\"font-family:monospace;font-size:small !important;\"><span style=\"color:#e56600;\">edit(obj, name, params)<\/span><\/code><\/td>\r\n<span style=\"color:#e56600;\"> <\/span><td style=\"padding-bottom:8px;padding-left:5px;padding-right:5px;font-family:arial, nsimsun, sans-serif;font-size:0.7em;vertical-align:top;border-top:#cccccc 1px solid;padding-top:8px;\"><span style=\"color:#e56600;\">用来编辑领域对象类的一个实例。参数<\/span><span class=\"Apple-converted-space\" style=\"color:#e56600;\">&nbsp;<\/span><code style=\"font-family:monospace;font-size:small !important;\"><span style=\"color:#e56600;\">obj<\/span><\/code><span class=\"Apple-converted-space\" style=\"color:#e56600;\">&nbsp;<\/span><span style=\"color:#e56600;\">表示的是领域对象实例；参数<\/span><span class=\"Apple-converted-space\" style=\"color:#e56600;\">&nbsp;<\/span><code style=\"font-family:monospace;font-size:small !important;\"><span style=\"color:#e56600;\">name<\/span><\/code><span class=\"Apple-converted-space\" style=\"color:#e56600;\">&nbsp;<\/span><span style=\"color:#e56600;\">和<\/span><span class=\"Apple-converted-space\" style=\"color:#e56600;\">&nbsp;<\/span><code style=\"font-family:monospace;font-size:small !important;\"><span style=\"color:#e56600;\">params<\/span><\/code><span class=\"Apple-converted-space\" style=\"color:#e56600;\">&nbsp;<\/span><span style=\"color:#e56600;\">的含义与<\/span><span class=\"Apple-converted-space\" style=\"color:#e56600;\">&nbsp;<\/span><code style=\"font-family:monospace;font-size:small !important;\"><span style=\"color:#e56600;\">create()<\/span><\/code><span class=\"Apple-converted-space\" style=\"color:#e56600;\">&nbsp;<\/span><span style=\"color:#e56600;\">方法的相同。<\/span><\/td>\r\n<span style=\"color:#e56600;\"> <\/span><\/tr>\r\n<span style=\"color:#e56600;\"> <\/span><tr><span style=\"color:#e56600;\"> <\/span><td style=\"padding-bottom:8px;padding-left:5px;padding-right:5px;font-family:arial, nsimsun, sans-serif;font-size:0.7em;vertical-align:top;border-top:#cccccc 1px solid;padding-top:8px;\"><code style=\"font-family:monospace;font-size:small !important;\"><span style=\"color:#e56600;\">delete()<\/span><\/code><\/td>\r\n<span style=\"color:#e56600;\"> <\/span><td style=\"padding-bottom:8px;padding-left:5px;padding-right:5px;font-family:arial, nsimsun, sans-serif;font-size:0.7em;vertical-align:top;border-top:#cccccc 1px solid;padding-top:8px;\"><span style=\"color:#e56600;\">用来删除单个领域对象类的实例。<\/span><\/td>\r\n<span style=\"color:#e56600;\"> <\/span><\/tr>\r\n<span style=\"color:#e56600;\"> <\/span><tr><span style=\"color:#e56600;\"> <\/span><td style=\"padding-bottom:8px;padding-left:5px;padding-right:5px;font-family:arial, nsimsun, sans-serif;font-size:0.7em;vertical-align:top;border-top:#cccccc 1px solid;padding-top:8px;\"><code style=\"font-family:monospace;font-size:small !important;\"><span style=\"color:#e56600;\">delete(query, params)<\/span><\/code><\/td>\r\n<span style=\"color:#e56600;\"> <\/span><td style=\"padding-bottom:8px;padding-left:5px;padding-right:5px;font-family:arial, nsimsun, sans-serif;font-size:0.7em;vertical-align:top;border-top:#cccccc 1px solid;padding-top:8px;\"><span style=\"color:#e56600;\">用来删除多个领域对象类的实例。参数<\/span><span class=\"Apple-converted-space\" style=\"color:#e56600;\">&nbsp;<\/span><code style=\"font-family:monospace;font-size:small !important;\"><span style=\"color:#e56600;\">query<\/span><\/code><span class=\"Apple-converted-space\" style=\"color:#e56600;\">&nbsp;<\/span><span style=\"color:#e56600;\">表示的是检索待删除实例的查询，而<\/span><span class=\"Apple-converted-space\" style=\"color:#e56600;\">&nbsp;<\/span><code style=\"font-family:monospace;font-size:small !important;\"><span style=\"color:#e56600;\">params<\/span><\/code><span class=\"Apple-converted-space\" style=\"color:#e56600;\">&nbsp;<\/span><span style=\"color:#e56600;\">表示的是查询所使用的参数。<\/span><\/td>\r\n<span style=\"color:#e56600;\"> <\/span><\/tr>\r\n<span style=\"color:#e56600;\"> <\/span><tr><span style=\"color:#e56600;\"> <\/span><td style=\"padding-bottom:8px;padding-left:5px;padding-right:5px;font-family:arial, nsimsun, sans-serif;font-size:0.7em;vertical-align:top;border-top:#cccccc 1px solid;padding-top:8px;\"><code style=\"font-family:monospace;font-size:small !important;\"><span style=\"color:#e56600;\">deleteAll()<\/span><\/code><\/td>\r\n<span style=\"color:#e56600;\"> <\/span><td style=\"padding-bottom:8px;padding-left:5px;padding-right:5px;font-family:arial, nsimsun, sans-serif;font-size:0.7em;vertical-align:top;border-top:#cccccc 1px solid;padding-top:8px;\"><span style=\"color:#e56600;\">用来删除领域对象类的所有实例。<\/span><\/td>\r\n<span style=\"color:#e56600;\"> <\/span><\/tr>\r\n<span style=\"color:#e56600;\"> <\/span><tr><span style=\"color:#e56600;\"> <\/span><td style=\"padding-bottom:8px;padding-left:5px;padding-right:5px;font-family:arial, nsimsun, sans-serif;font-size:0.7em;vertical-align:top;border-top:#cccccc 1px solid;padding-top:8px;\"><code style=\"font-family:monospace;font-size:small !important;\"><span style=\"color:#e56600;\">find(query, params)<\/span><\/code><\/td>\r\n<span style=\"color:#e56600;\"> <\/span><td style=\"padding-bottom:8px;padding-left:5px;padding-right:5px;font-family:arial, nsimsun, sans-serif;font-size:0.7em;vertical-align:top;border-top:#cccccc 1px solid;padding-top:8px;\"><span style=\"color:#e56600;\">用来查找领域对象类的实例。参数<\/span><span class=\"Apple-converted-space\" style=\"color:#e56600;\">&nbsp;<\/span><code style=\"font-family:monospace;font-size:small !important;\"><span style=\"color:#e56600;\">query<\/span><\/code><span class=\"Apple-converted-space\" style=\"color:#e56600;\">&nbsp;<\/span><span style=\"color:#e56600;\">表示的是查找时所用的查询，而<\/span><span class=\"Apple-converted-space\" style=\"color:#e56600;\">&nbsp;<\/span><code style=\"font-family:monospace;font-size:small !important;\"><span style=\"color:#e56600;\">params<\/span><\/code><span class=\"Apple-converted-space\" style=\"color:#e56600;\">&nbsp;<\/span><span style=\"color:#e56600;\">表示的是查询所使用的参数。<\/span><\/td>\r\n<span style=\"color:#e56600;\"> <\/span><\/tr>\r\n<span style=\"color:#e56600;\"> <\/span><tr><span style=\"color:#e56600;\"> <\/span><td style=\"padding-bottom:8px;padding-left:5px;padding-right:5px;font-family:arial, nsimsun, sans-serif;font-size:0.7em;vertical-align:top;border-top:#cccccc 1px solid;padding-top:8px;\"><code style=\"font-family:monospace;font-size:small !important;\"><span style=\"color:#e56600;\">findAll()<\/span><\/code><\/td>\r\n<span style=\"color:#e56600;\"> <\/span><td style=\"padding-bottom:8px;padding-left:5px;padding-right:5px;font-family:arial, nsimsun, sans-serif;font-size:0.7em;vertical-align:top;border-top:#cccccc 1px solid;padding-top:8px;\"><span style=\"color:#e56600;\">用来查找领域对象的所有实例。<\/span><\/td>\r\n<span style=\"color:#e56600;\"> <\/span><\/tr>\r\n<span style=\"color:#e56600;\"> <\/span><tr><span style=\"color:#e56600;\"> <\/span><td style=\"padding-bottom:8px;padding-left:5px;padding-right:5px;font-family:arial, nsimsun, sans-serif;font-size:0.7em;vertical-align:top;border-top:#cccccc 1px solid;padding-top:8px;\"><code style=\"font-family:monospace;font-size:small !important;\"><span style=\"color:#e56600;\">findById(id)<\/span><\/code><\/td>\r\n<span style=\"color:#e56600;\"> <\/span><td style=\"padding-bottom:8px;padding-left:5px;padding-right:5px;font-family:arial, nsimsun, sans-serif;font-size:0.7em;vertical-align:top;border-top:#cccccc 1px solid;padding-top:8px;\"><span style=\"color:#e56600;\">用来根据标识符查找领域对象的实例。<\/span><\/td>\r\n<span style=\"color:#e56600;\"> <\/span><\/tr>\r\n<span style=\"color:#e56600;\"> <\/span><tr><span style=\"color:#e56600;\"> <\/span><td style=\"padding-bottom:8px;padding-left:5px;padding-right:5px;font-family:arial, nsimsun, sans-serif;font-size:0.7em;vertical-align:top;border-top:#cccccc 1px solid;padding-top:8px;\"><code style=\"font-family:monospace;font-size:small !important;\"><span style=\"color:#e56600;\">count(query, params)<\/span><\/code><\/td>\r\n<span style=\"color:#e56600;\"> <\/span><td style=\"padding-bottom:8px;padding-left:5px;padding-right:5px;font-family:arial, nsimsun, sans-serif;font-size:0.7em;vertical-align:top;border-top:#cccccc 1px solid;padding-top:8px;\"><span style=\"color:#e56600;\">用来计算某个查询结果中包含的领域对象的实例数。参数<\/span><span class=\"Apple-converted-space\" style=\"color:#e56600;\">&nbsp;<\/span><code style=\"font-family:monospace;font-size:small !important;\"><span style=\"color:#e56600;\">query<\/span><\/code><span class=\"Apple-converted-space\" style=\"color:#e56600;\">&nbsp;<\/span><span style=\"color:#e56600;\">和<\/span><span class=\"Apple-converted-space\" style=\"color:#e56600;\">&nbsp;<\/span><code style=\"font-family:monospace;font-size:small !important;\"><span style=\"color:#e56600;\">params<\/span><\/code><span class=\"Apple-converted-space\" style=\"color:#e56600;\">&nbsp;<\/span><span style=\"color:#e56600;\">的含义与<\/span><span class=\"Apple-converted-space\" style=\"color:#e56600;\">&nbsp;<\/span><code style=\"font-family:monospace;font-size:small !important;\"><span style=\"color:#e56600;\">find()<\/span><\/code><span class=\"Apple-converted-space\" style=\"color:#e56600;\">&nbsp;<\/span><span style=\"color:#e56600;\">方法相同。<\/span><\/td>\r\n<span style=\"color:#e56600;\"> <\/span><\/tr>\r\n<span style=\"color:#e56600;\"> <\/span><tr><span style=\"color:#e56600;\"> <\/span><td style=\"padding-bottom:8px;padding-left:5px;padding-right:5px;font-family:arial, nsimsun, sans-serif;font-size:0.7em;vertical-align:top;border-top:#cccccc 1px solid;padding-top:8px;\"><code style=\"font-family:monospace;font-size:small !important;\"><span style=\"color:#e56600;\">save()<\/span><\/code><\/td>\r\n<span style=\"color:#e56600;\"> <\/span><td style=\"padding-bottom:8px;padding-left:5px;padding-right:5px;font-family:arial, nsimsun, sans-serif;font-size:0.7em;vertical-align:top;border-top:#cccccc 1px solid;padding-top:8px;\"><span style=\"color:#e56600;\">用来保存该领域对象实例到数据库中。<\/span><\/td>\r\n<span style=\"color:#e56600;\"> <\/span><\/tr>\r\n<span style=\"color:#e56600;\"> <\/span><tr><span style=\"color:#e56600;\"> <\/span><td style=\"padding-bottom:8px;padding-left:5px;padding-right:5px;font-family:arial, nsimsun, sans-serif;font-size:0.7em;vertical-align:top;border-top:#cccccc 1px solid;padding-top:8px;\"><code style=\"font-family:monospace;font-size:small !important;\"><span style=\"color:#e56600;\">all()<\/span><\/code><\/td>\r\n<span style=\"color:#e56600;\"> <\/span><td style=\"padding-bottom:8px;padding-left:5px;padding-right:5px;font-family:arial, nsimsun, sans-serif;font-size:0.7em;vertical-align:top;border-top:#cccccc 1px solid;padding-top:8px;\"><span style=\"color:#e56600;\">用来查找系统中的全部领域对象的实例。<\/span><\/td>\r\n<span style=\"color:#e56600;\"> <\/span><\/tr>\r\n<span style=\"color:#e56600;\"> <\/span><\/tbody>\r\n<span style=\"color:#e56600;\"> <\/span><\/table>\r\n<span style=\"color:#e56600;\"> <\/span><\/p>\r\n<span style=\"color:#e56600;\"> <\/span><p style=\"padding-bottom:0.7em;margin:0px;padding-left:5px;padding-right:5px;font-family:arial, nsimsun, sans-serif;font-size:0.76em;padding-top:0.3em;\"><a style=\"color:#4c6e94;\" href=\"http:\/\/www.ibm.com\/developerworks\/cn\/java\/j-lo-play\/index.html?ca=drs-#table1\"><span style=\"color:#e56600;\">表 1<\/span><\/a><span class=\"Apple-converted-space\" style=\"color:#e56600;\">&nbsp;<\/span><span style=\"color:#e56600;\">中列出的方法中，<\/span><code style=\"font-family:monospace;font-size:small !important;\"><span style=\"color:#e56600;\">find()<\/span><\/code><span class=\"Apple-converted-space\" style=\"color:#e56600;\">&nbsp;<\/span><span style=\"color:#e56600;\">和<\/span><span class=\"Apple-converted-space\" style=\"color:#e56600;\">&nbsp;<\/span><code style=\"font-family:monospace;font-size:small !important;\"><span style=\"color:#e56600;\">all()<\/span><\/code><span class=\"Apple-converted-space\" style=\"color:#e56600;\">&nbsp;<\/span><span style=\"color:#e56600;\">方法的返回值是<\/span><span class=\"Apple-converted-space\" style=\"color:#e56600;\">&nbsp;<\/span><code style=\"font-family:monospace;font-size:small !important;\"><span style=\"color:#e56600;\">play.db.jpa.JPASupport.JPAQuery<\/span><\/code><span class=\"Apple-converted-space\" style=\"color:#e56600;\">&nbsp;<\/span><span style=\"color:#e56600;\">类的实例，表示一个领域对象实例的查询结果。对于此查询结果，可以进行进一步的操作。具体的操作，如<\/span><span class=\"Apple-converted-space\" style=\"color:#e56600;\">&nbsp;<\/span><a style=\"color:#4c6e94;\" href=\"http:\/\/www.ibm.com\/developerworks\/cn\/java\/j-lo-play\/index.html?ca=drs-#table2\"><span style=\"color:#e56600;\">表 2<\/span><\/a><span class=\"Apple-converted-space\" style=\"color:#e56600;\">&nbsp;<\/span><span style=\"color:#e56600;\">所示。<\/span><\/p>\r\n<span style=\"color:#e56600;\"> <\/span><p><br \/>\r\n<span style=\"color:#e56600;\"> <\/span><a name=\"minor2.1\"><b style=\"padding-bottom:0.7em;padding-left:5px;padding-right:5px;font-family:arial, sans-serif;font-size:0.76em;font-weight:bold;padding-top:0.3em;\"><span style=\"color:#e56600;\">表 2. play.db.jpa.JPASupport.JPAQuery API 说明<\/span><\/b><\/a><br \/>\r\n<span style=\"color:#e56600;\"> <\/span><table style=\"border-bottom:#cccccc 1px solid;border-left:#cccccc 1px solid;width:708px;margin-bottom:8px;border-top-width:0px;font-size:0.8em;border-right:#cccccc 1px solid;\" class=\"data-table-1 ke-zeroborder\" border=\"0\" cellspacing=\"0\" summary=\"play.db.jpa.JPASupport.JPAQuery API 说明\" cellpadding=\"0\" width=\"100%\"><span style=\"color:#e56600;\"> <\/span><tbody><span style=\"color:#e56600;\"> <\/span><tr><span style=\"color:#e56600;\"> <\/span><th style=\"background-image:url(http:\/\/www.ibm.com\/i\/v16\/t\/text-tabs-bg.gif);text-align:left;padding-bottom:8px;background-color:#f7f8fc;padding-left:5px;padding-right:5px;font-family:arial, nsimsun, sans-serif;font-size:0.7em;vertical-align:top;border-top:#cccccc 1px solid;padding-top:8px;background-origin:initial;background-clip:initial;\" scope=\"col\"><span style=\"color:#e56600;\">方法<\/span><\/th>\r\n<span style=\"color:#e56600;\"> <\/span><th style=\"background-image:url(http:\/\/www.ibm.com\/i\/v16\/t\/text-tabs-bg.gif);text-align:left;padding-bottom:8px;background-color:#f7f8fc;padding-left:5px;padding-right:5px;font-family:arial, nsimsun, sans-serif;font-size:0.7em;vertical-align:top;border-top:#cccccc 1px solid;padding-top:8px;background-origin:initial;background-clip:initial;\" scope=\"col\"><span style=\"color:#e56600;\">说明<\/span><\/th>\r\n<span style=\"color:#e56600;\"> <\/span><\/tr>\r\n<span style=\"color:#e56600;\"> <\/span><tr><span style=\"color:#e56600;\"> <\/span><td style=\"padding-bottom:8px;padding-left:5px;padding-right:5px;font-family:arial, nsimsun, sans-serif;font-size:0.7em;vertical-align:top;border-top:#cccccc 1px solid;padding-top:8px;\"><code style=\"font-family:monospace;font-size:small !important;\"><span style=\"color:#e56600;\">bind(name, param)<\/span><\/code><\/td>\r\n<span style=\"color:#e56600;\"> <\/span><td style=\"padding-bottom:8px;padding-left:5px;padding-right:5px;font-family:arial, nsimsun, sans-serif;font-size:0.7em;vertical-align:top;border-top:#cccccc 1px solid;padding-top:8px;\"><span style=\"color:#e56600;\">用来绑定一个参数的实际值到查询上。在查询语句中可以使用形式参数作为占位符，参数的实际值可以通过此方法来指定。<\/span><\/td>\r\n<span style=\"color:#e56600;\"> <\/span><\/tr>\r\n<span style=\"color:#e56600;\"> <\/span><tr><span style=\"color:#e56600;\"> <\/span><td style=\"padding-bottom:8px;padding-left:5px;padding-right:5px;font-family:arial, nsimsun, sans-serif;font-size:0.7em;vertical-align:top;border-top:#cccccc 1px solid;padding-top:8px;\"><code style=\"font-family:monospace;font-size:small !important;\"><span style=\"color:#e56600;\">fetch()<\/span><\/code><\/td>\r\n<span style=\"color:#e56600;\"> <\/span><td style=\"padding-bottom:8px;padding-left:5px;padding-right:5px;font-family:arial, nsimsun, sans-serif;font-size:0.7em;vertical-align:top;border-top:#cccccc 1px solid;padding-top:8px;\"><span style=\"color:#e56600;\">用来获取此查询的所有记录。<\/span><\/td>\r\n<span style=\"color:#e56600;\"> <\/span><\/tr>\r\n<span style=\"color:#e56600;\"> <\/span><tr><span style=\"color:#e56600;\"> <\/span><td style=\"padding-bottom:8px;padding-left:5px;padding-right:5px;font-family:arial, nsimsun, sans-serif;font-size:0.7em;vertical-align:top;border-top:#cccccc 1px solid;padding-top:8px;\"><code style=\"font-family:monospace;font-size:small !important;\"><span style=\"color:#e56600;\">fetch(max)<\/span><\/code><\/td>\r\n<span style=\"color:#e56600;\"> <\/span><td style=\"padding-bottom:8px;padding-left:5px;padding-right:5px;font-family:arial, nsimsun, sans-serif;font-size:0.7em;vertical-align:top;border-top:#cccccc 1px solid;padding-top:8px;\"><span style=\"color:#e56600;\">用来获取此查询的前面<\/span><span class=\"Apple-converted-space\" style=\"color:#e56600;\">&nbsp;<\/span><code style=\"font-family:monospace;font-size:small !important;\"><span style=\"color:#e56600;\">max<\/span><\/code><span class=\"Apple-converted-space\" style=\"color:#e56600;\">&nbsp;<\/span><span style=\"color:#e56600;\">条记录。<\/span><\/td>\r\n<span style=\"color:#e56600;\"> <\/span><\/tr>\r\n<span style=\"color:#e56600;\"> <\/span><tr><span style=\"color:#e56600;\"> <\/span><td style=\"padding-bottom:8px;padding-left:5px;padding-right:5px;font-family:arial, nsimsun, sans-serif;font-size:0.7em;vertical-align:top;border-top:#cccccc 1px solid;padding-top:8px;\"><code style=\"font-family:monospace;font-size:small !important;\"><span style=\"color:#e56600;\">fetch(page, length)<\/span><\/code><\/td>\r\n<span style=\"color:#e56600;\"> <\/span><td style=\"padding-bottom:8px;padding-left:5px;padding-right:5px;font-family:arial, nsimsun, sans-serif;font-size:0.7em;vertical-align:top;border-top:#cccccc 1px solid;padding-top:8px;\"><span style=\"color:#e56600;\">用来对查询结果进行分页。参数<\/span><span class=\"Apple-converted-space\" style=\"color:#e56600;\">&nbsp;<\/span><code style=\"font-family:monospace;font-size:small !important;\"><span style=\"color:#e56600;\">page<\/span><\/code><span class=\"Apple-converted-space\" style=\"color:#e56600;\">&nbsp;<\/span><span style=\"color:#e56600;\">表示当前的页数，从 1 开始；<\/span><code style=\"font-family:monospace;font-size:small !important;\"><span style=\"color:#e56600;\">length<\/span><\/code><span class=\"Apple-converted-space\" style=\"color:#e56600;\">&nbsp;<\/span><span style=\"color:#e56600;\">表示每页的记录数。<\/span><\/td>\r\n<span style=\"color:#e56600;\"> <\/span><\/tr>\r\n<span style=\"color:#e56600;\"> <\/span><tr><span style=\"color:#e56600;\"> <\/span><td style=\"padding-bottom:8px;padding-left:5px;padding-right:5px;font-family:arial, nsimsun, sans-serif;font-size:0.7em;vertical-align:top;border-top:#cccccc 1px solid;padding-top:8px;\"><code style=\"font-family:monospace;font-size:small !important;\"><span style=\"color:#e56600;\">first()<\/span><\/code><\/td>\r\n<span style=\"color:#e56600;\"> <\/span><td style=\"padding-bottom:8px;padding-left:5px;padding-right:5px;font-family:arial, nsimsun, sans-serif;font-size:0.7em;vertical-align:top;border-top:#cccccc 1px solid;padding-top:8px;\"><span style=\"color:#e56600;\">用来返回查询结果中的第一条记录<\/span><\/td>\r\n<span style=\"color:#e56600;\"> <\/span><\/tr>\r\n<span style=\"color:#e56600;\"> <\/span><tr><span style=\"color:#e56600;\"> <\/span><td style=\"padding-bottom:8px;padding-left:5px;padding-right:5px;font-family:arial, nsimsun, sans-serif;font-size:0.7em;vertical-align:top;border-top:#cccccc 1px solid;padding-top:8px;\"><code style=\"font-family:monospace;font-size:small !important;\"><span style=\"color:#e56600;\">from(position)<\/span><\/code><\/td>\r\n<span style=\"color:#e56600;\"> <\/span><td style=\"padding-bottom:8px;padding-left:5px;padding-right:5px;font-family:arial, nsimsun, sans-serif;font-size:0.7em;vertical-align:top;border-top:#cccccc 1px solid;padding-top:8px;\"><span style=\"color:#e56600;\">用来设置查询结果中处理的起始位置。参数<\/span><span class=\"Apple-converted-space\" style=\"color:#e56600;\">&nbsp;<\/span><code style=\"font-family:monospace;font-size:small !important;\"><span style=\"color:#e56600;\">position<\/span><\/code><span class=\"Apple-converted-space\" style=\"color:#e56600;\">&nbsp;<\/span><span style=\"color:#e56600;\">表示起始位置的序号。该方法的返回结果是一个新的<\/span><code style=\"font-family:monospace;font-size:small !important;\"><span style=\"color:#e56600;\">play.db.jpa.JPASupport.JPAQuery<\/span><\/code><span class=\"Apple-converted-space\" style=\"color:#e56600;\">&nbsp;<\/span><span style=\"color:#e56600;\">对象。<\/span><\/td>\r\n<span style=\"color:#e56600;\"> <\/span><\/tr>\r\n<span style=\"color:#e56600;\"> <\/span><\/tbody>\r\n<span style=\"color:#e56600;\"> <\/span><\/table>\r\n<span style=\"color:#e56600;\"> <\/span><\/p>\r\n<span style=\"color:#e56600;\"> <\/span><p style=\"padding-bottom:0.7em;margin:0px;padding-left:5px;padding-right:5px;font-family:arial, nsimsun, sans-serif;font-size:0.76em;padding-top:0.3em;\"><span style=\"color:#e56600;\">使用<\/span><span class=\"Apple-converted-space\" style=\"color:#e56600;\">&nbsp;<\/span><a style=\"color:#4c6e94;\" href=\"http:\/\/www.ibm.com\/developerworks\/cn\/java\/j-lo-play\/index.html?ca=drs-#table2\"><span style=\"color:#e56600;\">表 2<\/span><\/a><span class=\"Apple-converted-space\" style=\"color:#e56600;\">&nbsp;<\/span><span style=\"color:#e56600;\">中给出的方法，就可以在领域对象类中添加一些非常实用的方法，而不需要把这些方法添加到额外的服务层中。在示例应用中，<\/span><code style=\"font-family:monospace;font-size:small !important;\"><span style=\"color:#e56600;\">Note<\/span><\/code><span class=\"Apple-converted-space\" style=\"color:#e56600;\">&nbsp;<\/span><span style=\"color:#e56600;\">这个领域对象类表示的是用户添加的记录。<\/span><a style=\"color:#4c6e94;\" href=\"http:\/\/www.ibm.com\/developerworks\/cn\/java\/j-lo-play\/index.html?ca=drs-#code1\"><span style=\"color:#e56600;\">代码清单 1<\/span><\/a><span class=\"Apple-converted-space\" style=\"color:#e56600;\">&nbsp;<\/span><span style=\"color:#e56600;\">中给出了<\/span><span class=\"Apple-converted-space\" style=\"color:#e56600;\">&nbsp;<\/span><code style=\"font-family:monospace;font-size:small !important;\"><span style=\"color:#e56600;\">Note<\/span><\/code><span class=\"Apple-converted-space\" style=\"color:#e56600;\">&nbsp;<\/span><span style=\"color:#e56600;\">类中的一些实用方法。<\/span><\/p>\r\n<span style=\"color:#e56600;\"> <\/span><p><br \/>\r\n<span style=\"color:#e56600;\"> <\/span><a name=\"listing1\"><b style=\"padding-bottom:0.7em;padding-left:5px;padding-right:5px;font-family:arial, sans-serif;font-size:0.76em;font-weight:bold;padding-top:0.3em;\"><span style=\"color:#e56600;\">清单 1. 领域对象类中的实用方法<\/span><\/b><\/a><br \/>\r\n<span style=\"color:#e56600;\"> <\/span><table style=\"font-size:0.8em;\" class=\"ke-zeroborder\" border=\"0\" cellspacing=\"0\" cellpadding=\"0\" width=\"100%\"><span style=\"color:#e56600;\"> <\/span><tbody><span style=\"color:#e56600;\"> <\/span><tr><span style=\"color:#e56600;\"> <\/span><td style=\"border-bottom:#cccccc 1px solid;border-left:#cccccc 1px solid;padding-bottom:5px;background-color:#f7f7f7 !important;padding-left:2px;padding-right:2px;font-family:arial, nsimsun, sans-serif;border-top:#cccccc 1px solid;border-right:#cccccc 1px solid;padding-top:2px;\" class=\"code-outline\"><pre style=\"overflow-x:auto;overflow-y:auto;background-color:#f7f7f7 !important;margin-top:0px;width:694px;font-family:'Andale Mono', 'Lucida Console', Monaco, Liberation, fixed, monospace;margin-bottom:0px;color:#000000;font-size:11px;background-origin:initial;background-clip:initial;\" class=\"displaycode\"><span style=\"color:#e56600;\">\t\t\t\t\r\n\/\/ 创建新的领域对象 Note 的实例，edit() 方法的使用与 create() 类似\r\nMap<\/span><string, string[]=\"\"><span style=\"color:#e56600;\"> params = new HashMap<\/span><string, string[]=\"\"><span style=\"color:#e56600;\">(); \r\nparams.put(\"note.title\", new String[] {\"My note\"}); \r\nparams.put(\"note.content\", new String[] {\"My note's content\"}); \r\nNote.create(Note.class, \"note\", params).save(); \r\n\r\n\/\/ 使用 find() 来进行查找\r\nList<\/span><note><span style=\"color:#e56600;\"> notes = Note.find(\"byTitle\", \"My note\").fetch(); \r\n\r\n\/\/ 使用 findById() 来查找单个实例\r\nNote note1 = Note.findById(1); \r\n\r\n\/\/ 使用 delete() 来删除对象实例\r\nNote.delete(\"byTitle\", \"My note\"); \r\n\r\n\/\/ 返回查询结果中的第 2 到第 11 条记录。\r\nNote.find(\"byTitle\", \"My note\").from(1).fetch(10); <\/span><\/note><\/string,><\/string,><\/pre><\/td>\r\n<span style=\"color:#e56600;\"> <\/span><\/tr>\r\n<span style=\"color:#e56600;\"> <\/span><\/tbody>\r\n<span style=\"color:#e56600;\"> <\/span><\/table>\r\n<span style=\"color:#e56600;\"> <\/span><\/p>\r\n<span style=\"color:#e56600;\"> <\/span><p style=\"padding-bottom:0.7em;margin:0px;padding-left:5px;padding-right:5px;font-family:arial, nsimsun, sans-serif;font-size:0.76em;padding-top:0.3em;\"><span style=\"color:#e56600;\">在介绍完 Play 框架的模型层之后，下面介绍控制层。<\/span><\/p>\r\n<span style=\"color:#e56600;\"> <\/span><div style=\"background-image:url(http:\/\/www.ibm.com\/i\/solid.gif);background-color:#ffffff;height:1px;clear:both;background-origin:initial;background-clip:initial;\" class=\"ibm-alternate-rule\"><\/div>\r\n<span style=\"color:#e56600;\"> <\/span><p style=\"text-align:right;padding-bottom:5px;margin:0px;padding-left:5px;padding-right:5px;font-family:arial, nsimsun, sans-serif;height:15px;clear:both;font-size:0.76em;padding-top:5px;\" class=\"ibm-ind-link ibm-back-to-top\"><a style=\"background-image:url(http:\/\/www.ibm.com\/i\/v16\/icons\/u_bold.gif);padding-bottom:0px;margin:0px;padding-left:18px;padding-right:0px;display:inline;background-position:0px -1px;color:#4c6e94;font-weight:bold;text-decoration:none;padding-top:0px;background-origin:initial;background-clip:initial;\" class=\"ibm-anchor-up-link\" href=\"http:\/\/www.ibm.com\/developerworks\/cn\/java\/j-lo-play\/index.html?ca=drs-#ibm-pcon\"><span style=\"color:#e56600;\">回页首<\/span><\/a><\/p>\r\n<span style=\"color:#e56600;\"> <\/span><p style=\"padding-bottom:0.7em;margin:0px;padding-left:5px;padding-right:5px;font-family:arial, nsimsun, sans-serif;font-size:0.76em;padding-top:0.3em;\"><a name=\"major3\"><span style=\"font-size:1.5em;font-weight:bold;color:#e56600;\" class=\"atitle\">控制层<\/span><\/a><\/p>\r\n<span style=\"color:#e56600;\"> <\/span><p style=\"padding-bottom:0.7em;margin:0px;padding-left:5px;padding-right:5px;font-family:arial, nsimsun, sans-serif;font-size:0.76em;padding-top:0.3em;\"><span style=\"color:#e56600;\">Play 框架中的控制层是模型层和视图层之间的桥梁。控制层负责接收 HTTP 请求并返回相应的响应。一般来说，控制层的典型实现是接收到 HTTP 请求之后，从请求中获取一些参数，再调用服务层对应的处理方法。服务层的方法会对领域对象进行操作，完成具体的业务逻辑。最后，某种格式的响应被返回给请求者，如 HTML 页面、JSON 数据和 XML 数据等。Play 框架的控制层实现使得完成这样的典型场景变得非常简单。<\/span><\/p>\r\n<span style=\"color:#e56600;\"> <\/span><p style=\"padding-bottom:0.7em;margin:0px;padding-left:5px;padding-right:5px;font-family:arial, nsimsun, sans-serif;font-size:0.76em;padding-top:0.3em;\"><span style=\"color:#e56600;\">Play 框架中的每个控制器都是一个普通的 Java 类，继承自<\/span><span class=\"Apple-converted-space\" style=\"color:#e56600;\">&nbsp;<\/span><code style=\"font-family:monospace;font-size:small !important;\"><span style=\"color:#e56600;\">play.mvc.Controller<\/span><\/code><span class=\"Apple-converted-space\" style=\"color:#e56600;\">&nbsp;<\/span><span style=\"color:#e56600;\">类，在包<\/span><span class=\"Apple-converted-space\" style=\"color:#e56600;\">&nbsp;<\/span><code style=\"font-family:monospace;font-size:small !important;\"><span style=\"color:#e56600;\">controllers<\/span><\/code><span class=\"Apple-converted-space\" style=\"color:#e56600;\">&nbsp;<\/span><span style=\"color:#e56600;\">中。控制器类中的每个公开的静态方法都表示一个动作。每个动作负责完整的请求 \/ 响应的流程，也就是说，所有前面提到的所有请求\/响应的过程都需要在每个动作中来完成。<\/span><\/p>\r\n<span style=\"color:#e56600;\"> <\/span><p style=\"padding-bottom:0.7em;margin:0px;padding-left:5px;padding-right:5px;font-family:arial, nsimsun, sans-serif;font-size:0.76em;padding-top:0.3em;\"><a name=\"minor3.1\"><span style=\"font-size:1.2em;font-weight:bold;color:#e56600;\" class=\"smalltitle\">参数绑定<\/span><\/a><\/p>\r\n<span style=\"color:#e56600;\"> <\/span><p style=\"padding-bottom:0.7em;margin:0px;padding-left:5px;padding-right:5px;font-family:arial, nsimsun, sans-serif;font-size:0.76em;padding-top:0.3em;\"><span style=\"color:#e56600;\">在控制层实现中很繁琐但是必不可少的操作就是解析 HTTP 请求中的参数。不同的 Web 开发框架会提供自己的参数解析方式。Play 框架也提供了相应的支持。Play 框架可以解析 HTTP 请求中查询字符串和 URI 路径中包含的以及请求体中以格式编码的参数。所有这些参数都放在<\/span><span class=\"Apple-converted-space\" style=\"color:#e56600;\">&nbsp;<\/span><code style=\"font-family:monospace;font-size:small !important;\"><span style=\"color:#e56600;\">params<\/span><\/code><span class=\"Apple-converted-space\" style=\"color:#e56600;\">&nbsp;<\/span><span style=\"color:#e56600;\">对象中，其中包含<\/span><span class=\"Apple-converted-space\" style=\"color:#e56600;\">&nbsp;<\/span><code style=\"font-family:monospace;font-size:small !important;\"><span style=\"color:#e56600;\">get()<\/span><\/code><span style=\"color:#e56600;\">、<\/span><code style=\"font-family:monospace;font-size:small !important;\"><span style=\"color:#e56600;\">getAll()<\/span><\/code><span class=\"Apple-converted-space\" style=\"color:#e56600;\">&nbsp;<\/span><span style=\"color:#e56600;\">和<\/span><span class=\"Apple-converted-space\" style=\"color:#e56600;\">&nbsp;<\/span><code style=\"font-family:monospace;font-size:small !important;\"><span style=\"color:#e56600;\">put()<\/span><\/code><span class=\"Apple-converted-space\" style=\"color:#e56600;\">&nbsp;<\/span><span style=\"color:#e56600;\">等方法用来获取和设置参数的值。除了这种传统的使用方式之外，Play 框架还支持直接把参数的值绑定到动作方法的参数上面。比如一个动作方法的声明是<\/span><span class=\"Apple-converted-space\" style=\"color:#e56600;\">&nbsp;<\/span><code style=\"font-family:monospace;font-size:small !important;\"><span style=\"color:#e56600;\">show(String username)<\/span><\/code><span style=\"color:#e56600;\">，那么请求中的参数<\/span><span class=\"Apple-converted-space\" style=\"color:#e56600;\">&nbsp;<\/span><code style=\"font-family:monospace;font-size:small !important;\"><span style=\"color:#e56600;\">username<\/span><\/code><span class=\"Apple-converted-space\" style=\"color:#e56600;\">&nbsp;<\/span><span style=\"color:#e56600;\">的值会在<\/span><span class=\"Apple-converted-space\" style=\"color:#e56600;\">&nbsp;<\/span><code style=\"font-family:monospace;font-size:small !important;\"><span style=\"color:#e56600;\">show()<\/span><\/code><span class=\"Apple-converted-space\" style=\"color:#e56600;\">&nbsp;<\/span><span style=\"color:#e56600;\">方法被调用时作为实际参数传递进去。Play 框架会负责完成相应的类型转换。值得一提的是对于日期类型（<\/span><code style=\"font-family:monospace;font-size:small !important;\"><span style=\"color:#e56600;\">java.util.Date<\/span><\/code><span style=\"color:#e56600;\">）的参数，Play 框架支持多种类型的日期格式的转换。比如动作方法的声明是<\/span><span class=\"Apple-converted-space\" style=\"color:#e56600;\">&nbsp;<\/span><code style=\"font-family:monospace;font-size:small !important;\"><span style=\"color:#e56600;\">display(Date postedAt)<\/span><\/code><span style=\"color:#e56600;\">，而请求的格式可能是<\/span><span class=\"Apple-converted-space\" style=\"color:#e56600;\">&nbsp;<\/span><code style=\"font-family:monospace;font-size:small !important;\"><span style=\"color:#e56600;\">\/display?postedAt=2010-09-22<\/span><\/code><span style=\"color:#e56600;\">，Play 框架会自动完成相应的类型转换。<\/span><\/p>\r\n<span style=\"color:#e56600;\"> <\/span><p style=\"padding-bottom:0.7em;margin:0px;padding-left:5px;padding-right:5px;font-family:arial, nsimsun, sans-serif;font-size:0.76em;padding-top:0.3em;\"><span style=\"color:#e56600;\">除了常见的基本数据类型之外，Play 框架还支持直接绑定领域对象的实例。比如动作方法的声明是<\/span><span class=\"Apple-converted-space\" style=\"color:#e56600;\">&nbsp;<\/span><code style=\"font-family:monospace;font-size:small !important;\"><span style=\"color:#e56600;\">create(Note note)<\/span><\/code><span style=\"color:#e56600;\">，可以在参数中直接指定对象实例的属性的值。请求的格式可能是<\/span><span class=\"Apple-converted-space\" style=\"color:#e56600;\">&nbsp;<\/span><code style=\"font-family:monospace;font-size:small !important;\"><span style=\"color:#e56600;\">\/create?title=Note123&amp;content=Good<\/span><\/code><span style=\"color:#e56600;\">。Play 框架会负责创建一个<\/span><span class=\"Apple-converted-space\" style=\"color:#e56600;\">&nbsp;<\/span><code style=\"font-family:monospace;font-size:small !important;\"><span style=\"color:#e56600;\">Note<\/span><\/code><span class=\"Apple-converted-space\" style=\"color:#e56600;\">&nbsp;<\/span><span style=\"color:#e56600;\">类的实例，并根据参数的值设置该实例的属性<\/span><span class=\"Apple-converted-space\" style=\"color:#e56600;\">&nbsp;<\/span><code style=\"font-family:monospace;font-size:small !important;\"><span style=\"color:#e56600;\">title<\/span><\/code><span class=\"Apple-converted-space\" style=\"color:#e56600;\">&nbsp;<\/span><span style=\"color:#e56600;\">和<\/span><span class=\"Apple-converted-space\" style=\"color:#e56600;\">&nbsp;<\/span><code style=\"font-family:monospace;font-size:small !important;\"><span style=\"color:#e56600;\">content<\/span><\/code><span class=\"Apple-converted-space\" style=\"color:#e56600;\">&nbsp;<\/span><span style=\"color:#e56600;\">的值。这种绑定方式不仅支持简单对象，还支持嵌套对象和列表。比如<\/span><code style=\"font-family:monospace;font-size:small !important;\"><span style=\"color:#e56600;\">\/create?tags[0]=ajax&amp;tags[1]=web<\/span><\/code><span class=\"Apple-converted-space\" style=\"color:#e56600;\">&nbsp;<\/span><span style=\"color:#e56600;\">可以设置列表类型属性<\/span><span class=\"Apple-converted-space\" style=\"color:#e56600;\">&nbsp;<\/span><code style=\"font-family:monospace;font-size:small !important;\"><span style=\"color:#e56600;\">tags<\/span><\/code><span class=\"Apple-converted-space\" style=\"color:#e56600;\">&nbsp;<\/span><span style=\"color:#e56600;\">的值。<\/span><\/p>\r\n<span style=\"color:#e56600;\"> <\/span><p style=\"padding-bottom:0.7em;margin:0px;padding-left:5px;padding-right:5px;font-family:arial, nsimsun, sans-serif;font-size:0.76em;padding-top:0.3em;\"><span style=\"color:#e56600;\">Play 框架的这种绑定方式还支持文件对象，使得上传文件变得非常简单。只需要在表单中添加文件上传的控件（<\/span><code style=\"font-family:monospace;font-size:small !important;\"><input type=\"file\" \/><\/code><span style=\"color:#e56600;\">）并使用<\/span><span class=\"Apple-converted-space\" style=\"color:#e56600;\">&nbsp;<\/span><code style=\"font-family:monospace;font-size:small !important;\"><span style=\"color:#e56600;\">multipart\/form-data<\/span><\/code><span style=\"color:#e56600;\">编码来提交请求，在动作方法的参数中就可以获取到上传文件对应的<\/span><span class=\"Apple-converted-space\" style=\"color:#e56600;\">&nbsp;<\/span><code style=\"font-family:monospace;font-size:small !important;\"><span style=\"color:#e56600;\">java.io.File<\/span><\/code><span class=\"Apple-converted-space\" style=\"color:#e56600;\">&nbsp;<\/span><span style=\"color:#e56600;\">对象。比如动作方法的声明可能是<\/span><span class=\"Apple-converted-space\" style=\"color:#e56600;\">&nbsp;<\/span><code style=\"font-family:monospace;font-size:small !important;\"><span style=\"color:#e56600;\">upload(File picture)<\/span><\/code><span style=\"color:#e56600;\">。上传的文件被保存在临时目录中，在请求完成之后会被自动删除。可以在动作方法中完成对上传文件的操作。<\/span><\/p>\r\n<span style=\"color:#e56600;\"> <\/span><p style=\"padding-bottom:0.7em;margin:0px;padding-left:5px;padding-right:5px;font-family:arial, nsimsun, sans-serif;font-size:0.76em;padding-top:0.3em;\"><a name=\"minor3.2\"><span style=\"font-size:1.2em;font-weight:bold;color:#e56600;\" class=\"smalltitle\">返回响应结果<\/span><\/a><\/p>\r\n<span style=\"color:#e56600;\"> <\/span><p style=\"padding-bottom:0.7em;margin:0px;padding-left:5px;padding-right:5px;font-family:arial, nsimsun, sans-serif;font-size:0.76em;padding-top:0.3em;\"><span style=\"color:#e56600;\">在控制层的动作方法完成了与业务逻辑相关的处理之后，需要把响应返回给客户端。响应的结果可能是正确完成，也可能是出现错误。Play 框架提供了方便的实现用来返回不同类型的响应。使用<\/span><span class=\"Apple-converted-space\" style=\"color:#e56600;\">&nbsp;<\/span><code style=\"font-family:monospace;font-size:small !important;\"><span style=\"color:#e56600;\">play.mvc.Controller<\/span><\/code><span class=\"Apple-converted-space\" style=\"color:#e56600;\">&nbsp;<\/span><span style=\"color:#e56600;\">类提供的不同方法就可以生成这些响应内容。<\/span><\/p>\r\n<span style=\"color:#e56600;\"> <\/span><ul style=\"padding-bottom:5px;margin-top:0px;padding-right:5px;margin-bottom:0px;font-size:0.76em;padding-top:0px;\"><span style=\"color:#e56600;\"> <\/span><li style=\"padding-bottom:3px;margin-top:0px;padding-right:5px;font-family:arial, nsimsun, sans-serif;margin-bottom:0px;padding-top:0px;\"><span style=\"color:#e56600;\">请求正确完成，HTTP 状态代码为 200。使用<\/span><span class=\"Apple-converted-space\" style=\"color:#e56600;\">&nbsp;<\/span><code style=\"font-family:monospace;font-size:small !important;\"><span style=\"color:#e56600;\">ok()<\/span><\/code><span class=\"Apple-converted-space\" style=\"color:#e56600;\">&nbsp;<\/span><span style=\"color:#e56600;\">方法生成不带内容的响应。使用<\/span><span class=\"Apple-converted-space\" style=\"color:#e56600;\">&nbsp;<\/span><code style=\"font-family:monospace;font-size:small !important;\"><span style=\"color:#e56600;\">render()<\/span><\/code><span class=\"Apple-converted-space\" style=\"color:#e56600;\">&nbsp;<\/span><span style=\"color:#e56600;\">方法来生成使用模板的响应。使用<\/span><span class=\"Apple-converted-space\" style=\"color:#e56600;\">&nbsp;<\/span><code style=\"font-family:monospace;font-size:small !important;\"><span style=\"color:#e56600;\">renderText()<\/span><\/code><span class=\"Apple-converted-space\" style=\"color:#e56600;\">&nbsp;<\/span><span style=\"color:#e56600;\">方法生成<\/span><span class=\"Apple-converted-space\" style=\"color:#e56600;\">&nbsp;<\/span><code style=\"font-family:monospace;font-size:small !important;\"><span style=\"color:#e56600;\">text\/plain<\/span><\/code><span class=\"Apple-converted-space\" style=\"color:#e56600;\">&nbsp;<\/span><span style=\"color:#e56600;\">类型的纯文本响应。使用<\/span><span class=\"Apple-converted-space\" style=\"color:#e56600;\">&nbsp;<\/span><code style=\"font-family:monospace;font-size:small !important;\"><span style=\"color:#e56600;\">renderXml()<\/span><\/code><span class=\"Apple-converted-space\" style=\"color:#e56600;\">&nbsp;<\/span><span style=\"color:#e56600;\">方法生成<\/span><span class=\"Apple-converted-space\" style=\"color:#e56600;\">&nbsp;<\/span><code style=\"font-family:monospace;font-size:small !important;\"><span style=\"color:#e56600;\">text\/xml<\/span><\/code><span class=\"Apple-converted-space\" style=\"color:#e56600;\">&nbsp;<\/span><span style=\"color:#e56600;\">类型的 XML 格式的响应。使用<\/span><span class=\"Apple-converted-space\" style=\"color:#e56600;\">&nbsp;<\/span><code style=\"font-family:monospace;font-size:small !important;\"><span style=\"color:#e56600;\">renderJSON()<\/span><\/code><span class=\"Apple-converted-space\" style=\"color:#e56600;\">&nbsp;<\/span><span style=\"color:#e56600;\">方法生成<\/span><span class=\"Apple-converted-space\" style=\"color:#e56600;\">&nbsp;<\/span><code style=\"font-family:monospace;font-size:small !important;\"><span style=\"color:#e56600;\">application\/json<\/span><\/code><span class=\"Apple-converted-space\" style=\"color:#e56600;\">&nbsp;<\/span><span style=\"color:#e56600;\">类型的 JSON 格式的响应。使用<\/span><span class=\"Apple-converted-space\" style=\"color:#e56600;\">&nbsp;<\/span><code style=\"font-family:monospace;font-size:small !important;\"><span style=\"color:#e56600;\">renderBinary()<\/span><\/code><span class=\"Apple-converted-space\" style=\"color:#e56600;\">&nbsp;<\/span><span style=\"color:#e56600;\">方法生成二进制内容的响应。<\/span><\/li>\r\n<span style=\"color:#e56600;\"> <\/span><li style=\"padding-bottom:3px;margin-top:0px;padding-right:5px;font-family:arial, nsimsun, sans-serif;margin-bottom:0px;padding-top:0px;\"><span style=\"color:#e56600;\">跳转到新的页面，HTTP 状态代码为 3XX。使用<\/span><span class=\"Apple-converted-space\" style=\"color:#e56600;\">&nbsp;<\/span><code style=\"font-family:monospace;font-size:small !important;\"><span style=\"color:#e56600;\">redirect()<\/span><\/code><span class=\"Apple-converted-space\" style=\"color:#e56600;\">&nbsp;<\/span><span style=\"color:#e56600;\">方法来跳转到新的 URL。使用<\/span><span class=\"Apple-converted-space\" style=\"color:#e56600;\">&nbsp;<\/span><code style=\"font-family:monospace;font-size:small !important;\"><span style=\"color:#e56600;\">notModified()<\/span><\/code><span class=\"Apple-converted-space\" style=\"color:#e56600;\">&nbsp;<\/span><span style=\"color:#e56600;\">方法来返回状态代码 304。<\/span><\/li>\r\n<span style=\"color:#e56600;\"> <\/span><li style=\"padding-bottom:3px;margin-top:0px;padding-right:5px;font-family:arial, nsimsun, sans-serif;margin-bottom:0px;padding-top:0px;\"><span style=\"color:#e56600;\">HTTP 状态代码 4XX。使用<\/span><span class=\"Apple-converted-space\" style=\"color:#e56600;\">&nbsp;<\/span><code style=\"font-family:monospace;font-size:small !important;\"><span style=\"color:#e56600;\">unauthorized()<\/span><\/code><span class=\"Apple-converted-space\" style=\"color:#e56600;\">&nbsp;<\/span><span style=\"color:#e56600;\">方法返回状态代码 401。使用<\/span><span class=\"Apple-converted-space\" style=\"color:#e56600;\">&nbsp;<\/span><code style=\"font-family:monospace;font-size:small !important;\"><span style=\"color:#e56600;\">forbidden()<\/span><\/code><span class=\"Apple-converted-space\" style=\"color:#e56600;\">&nbsp;<\/span><span style=\"color:#e56600;\">方法返回状态代码 403。使用<\/span><code style=\"font-family:monospace;font-size:small !important;\"><span style=\"color:#e56600;\">notFound()<\/span><\/code><span class=\"Apple-converted-space\" style=\"color:#e56600;\">&nbsp;<\/span><span style=\"color:#e56600;\">方法返回状态代码 404。<\/span><\/li>\r\n<span style=\"color:#e56600;\"> <\/span><li style=\"padding-bottom:3px;margin-top:0px;padding-right:5px;font-family:arial, nsimsun, sans-serif;margin-bottom:0px;padding-top:0px;\"><span style=\"color:#e56600;\">服务器内部错误，HTTP 状态代码 5XX。使用<\/span><span class=\"Apple-converted-space\" style=\"color:#e56600;\">&nbsp;<\/span><code style=\"font-family:monospace;font-size:small !important;\"><span style=\"color:#e56600;\">error()<\/span><\/code><span class=\"Apple-converted-space\" style=\"color:#e56600;\">&nbsp;<\/span><span style=\"color:#e56600;\">方法返回状态代码 500。<\/span><\/li>\r\n<span style=\"color:#e56600;\"> <\/span><\/ul>\r\n<span style=\"color:#e56600;\"> <\/span><p style=\"padding-bottom:0.7em;margin:0px;padding-left:5px;padding-right:5px;font-family:arial, nsimsun, sans-serif;font-size:0.76em;padding-top:0.3em;\"><span style=\"color:#e56600;\">从上面列出的方法可以看出，Play 框架使用一些有意义的方法名称替换掉了难以记忆的 HTTP 状态代码，使用起来更加方便。同时，对于常见的响应格式，包括 HTML、XML、JSON 和二进制内容，都提供了相应的方法，使得开发人员不会遗漏掉响应中<\/span><span class=\"Apple-converted-space\" style=\"color:#e56600;\">&nbsp;<\/span><code style=\"font-family:monospace;font-size:small !important;\"><span style=\"color:#e56600;\">Content-Type<\/span><\/code><span class=\"Apple-converted-space\" style=\"color:#e56600;\">&nbsp;<\/span><span style=\"color:#e56600;\">的声明。<\/span><\/p>\r\n<span style=\"color:#e56600;\"> <\/span><p style=\"padding-bottom:0.7em;margin:0px;padding-left:5px;padding-right:5px;font-family:arial, nsimsun, sans-serif;font-size:0.76em;padding-top:0.3em;\"><a name=\"minor3.3\"><span style=\"font-size:1.2em;font-weight:bold;color:#e56600;\" class=\"smalltitle\">方法拦截<\/span><\/a><\/p>\r\n<span style=\"color:#e56600;\"> <\/span><p style=\"padding-bottom:0.7em;margin:0px;padding-left:5px;padding-right:5px;font-family:arial, nsimsun, sans-serif;font-size:0.76em;padding-top:0.3em;\"><span style=\"color:#e56600;\">控制层的方法通常需要执行一些横切的逻辑，比如用户认证、加载通用信息和记录日志等。在 Spring 框架中，这些横切的逻辑是通过面向方面编程（AOP）的支持来实现的。Play 框架提供了更加简单易用的方法拦截支持，通过简单的标注就可以定义一些执行拦截操作的方法。这些方法必须非公开的静态方法。Play 框架支持的方法拦截标注有<\/span><span class=\"Apple-converted-space\" style=\"color:#e56600;\">&nbsp;<\/span><code style=\"font-family:monospace;font-size:small !important;\"><span style=\"color:#e56600;\">@Before<\/span><\/code><span style=\"color:#e56600;\">、<\/span><code style=\"font-family:monospace;font-size:small !important;\"><span style=\"color:#e56600;\">@After<\/span><\/code><span style=\"color:#e56600;\">、<\/span><code style=\"font-family:monospace;font-size:small !important;\"><span style=\"color:#e56600;\">@Finally<\/span><\/code><span class=\"Apple-converted-space\" style=\"color:#e56600;\">&nbsp;<\/span><span style=\"color:#e56600;\">和<\/span><span class=\"Apple-converted-space\" style=\"color:#e56600;\">&nbsp;<\/span><code style=\"font-family:monospace;font-size:small !important;\"><span style=\"color:#e56600;\">@With<\/span><\/code><span class=\"Apple-converted-space\" style=\"color:#e56600;\">&nbsp;<\/span><span style=\"color:#e56600;\">等四种。<\/span><\/p>\r\n<span style=\"color:#e56600;\"> <\/span><p style=\"padding-bottom:0.7em;margin:0px;padding-left:5px;padding-right:5px;font-family:arial, nsimsun, sans-serif;font-size:0.76em;padding-top:0.3em;\"><span style=\"color:#e56600;\">用<\/span><span class=\"Apple-converted-space\" style=\"color:#e56600;\">&nbsp;<\/span><code style=\"font-family:monospace;font-size:small !important;\"><span style=\"color:#e56600;\">@Before<\/span><\/code><span class=\"Apple-converted-space\" style=\"color:#e56600;\">&nbsp;<\/span><span style=\"color:#e56600;\">标注的方法在动作方法执行之前被调用。<\/span><code style=\"font-family:monospace;font-size:small !important;\"><span style=\"color:#e56600;\">@After<\/span><\/code><span class=\"Apple-converted-space\" style=\"color:#e56600;\">&nbsp;<\/span><span style=\"color:#e56600;\">标注的方法在动作方法执行之后被调用。<\/span><code style=\"font-family:monospace;font-size:small !important;\"><span style=\"color:#e56600;\">@Finally<\/span><\/code><span class=\"Apple-converted-space\" style=\"color:#e56600;\">&nbsp;<\/span><span style=\"color:#e56600;\">标注的方法在动作方法的响应结果已经成功生成之后被调用。这三个标注都支持额外的两个属性：<\/span><code style=\"font-family:monospace;font-size:small !important;\"><span style=\"color:#e56600;\">priority<\/span><\/code><span class=\"Apple-converted-space\" style=\"color:#e56600;\">&nbsp;<\/span><span style=\"color:#e56600;\">表示标注的方法的优先级，0 为最高；<\/span><code style=\"font-family:monospace;font-size:small !important;\"><span style=\"color:#e56600;\">unless<\/span><\/code><span style=\"color:#e56600;\">是一个字符串数组，表示不适用此拦截方法的动作方法的名称。如<\/span><span class=\"Apple-converted-space\" style=\"color:#e56600;\">&nbsp;<\/span><code style=\"font-family:monospace;font-size:small !important;\"><span style=\"color:#e56600;\">@Before(unless=\"index\")<\/span><\/code><span class=\"Apple-converted-space\" style=\"color:#e56600;\">&nbsp;<\/span><span style=\"color:#e56600;\">表示此拦截方法不会应用在动作方法<\/span><code style=\"font-family:monospace;font-size:small !important;\"><span style=\"color:#e56600;\">index()<\/span><\/code><span class=\"Apple-converted-space\" style=\"color:#e56600;\">&nbsp;<\/span><span style=\"color:#e56600;\">上。<\/span><\/p>\r\n<span style=\"color:#e56600;\"> <\/span><p style=\"padding-bottom:0.7em;margin:0px;padding-left:5px;padding-right:5px;font-family:arial, nsimsun, sans-serif;font-size:0.76em;padding-top:0.3em;\"><span style=\"color:#e56600;\">如果控制器类中存在继承体系结构的话，父类中声明的拦截方法对于所有子类的动作方法都是适用的。在有些情况下，开发人员可能希望把拦截方法定义在不同的类体系结构中。由于 Java 不支持多继承，无法通过继承的方式来应用来自不同类体系结构上的拦截方法。针对这种情况，Play 框架提供了<\/span><span class=\"Apple-converted-space\" style=\"color:#e56600;\">&nbsp;<\/span><code style=\"font-family:monospace;font-size:small !important;\"><span style=\"color:#e56600;\">@With<\/span><\/code><span class=\"Apple-converted-space\" style=\"color:#e56600;\">&nbsp;<\/span><span style=\"color:#e56600;\">标注。在控制器类<\/span><span class=\"Apple-converted-space\" style=\"color:#e56600;\">&nbsp;<\/span><code style=\"font-family:monospace;font-size:small !important;\"><span style=\"color:#e56600;\">ControllerA<\/span><\/code><span class=\"Apple-converted-space\" style=\"color:#e56600;\">&nbsp;<\/span><span style=\"color:#e56600;\">中定义的拦截方法可以通过<\/span><span class=\"Apple-converted-space\" style=\"color:#e56600;\">&nbsp;<\/span><code style=\"font-family:monospace;font-size:small !important;\"><span style=\"color:#e56600;\">@With<\/span><\/code><span class=\"Apple-converted-space\" style=\"color:#e56600;\">&nbsp;<\/span><span style=\"color:#e56600;\">标注来应用到另外一个控制器类<\/span><span class=\"Apple-converted-space\" style=\"color:#e56600;\">&nbsp;<\/span><code style=\"font-family:monospace;font-size:small !important;\"><span style=\"color:#e56600;\">ControllerB<\/span><\/code><span class=\"Apple-converted-space\" style=\"color:#e56600;\">&nbsp;<\/span><span style=\"color:#e56600;\">上，而且不通过继承方式来实现。只需要在<\/span><span class=\"Apple-converted-space\" style=\"color:#e56600;\">&nbsp;<\/span><code style=\"font-family:monospace;font-size:small !important;\"><span style=\"color:#e56600;\">ControllerB<\/span><\/code><span class=\"Apple-converted-space\" style=\"color:#e56600;\">&nbsp;<\/span><span style=\"color:#e56600;\">中声明<\/span><span class=\"Apple-converted-space\" style=\"color:#e56600;\">&nbsp;<\/span><code style=\"font-family:monospace;font-size:small !important;\"><span style=\"color:#e56600;\">@With(ControllerA.class)<\/span><\/code><span class=\"Apple-converted-space\" style=\"color:#e56600;\">&nbsp;<\/span><span style=\"color:#e56600;\">即可。<\/span><\/p>\r\n<span style=\"color:#e56600;\"> <\/span><p style=\"padding-bottom:0.7em;margin:0px;padding-left:5px;padding-right:5px;font-family:arial, nsimsun, sans-serif;font-size:0.76em;padding-top:0.3em;\"><span style=\"color:#e56600;\">在介绍完 Play 框架的控制层之后，下面介绍视图层。<\/span><\/p>\r\n<span style=\"color:#e56600;\"> <\/span><div style=\"background-image:url(http:\/\/www.ibm.com\/i\/solid.gif);background-color:#ffffff;height:1px;clear:both;background-origin:initial;background-clip:initial;\" class=\"ibm-alternate-rule\"><\/div>\r\n<span style=\"color:#e56600;\"> <\/span><p style=\"text-align:right;padding-bottom:5px;margin:0px;padding-left:5px;padding-right:5px;font-family:arial, nsimsun, sans-serif;height:15px;clear:both;font-size:0.76em;padding-top:5px;\" class=\"ibm-ind-link ibm-back-to-top\"><a style=\"background-image:url(http:\/\/www.ibm.com\/i\/v16\/icons\/u_bold.gif);padding-bottom:0px;margin:0px;padding-left:18px;padding-right:0px;display:inline;background-position:0px -1px;color:#4c6e94;font-weight:bold;text-decoration:none;padding-top:0px;background-origin:initial;background-clip:initial;\" class=\"ibm-anchor-up-link\" href=\"http:\/\/www.ibm.com\/developerworks\/cn\/java\/j-lo-play\/index.html?ca=drs-#ibm-pcon\"><span style=\"color:#e56600;\">回页首<\/span><\/a><\/p>\r\n<span style=\"color:#e56600;\"> <\/span><p style=\"padding-bottom:0.7em;margin:0px;padding-left:5px;padding-right:5px;font-family:arial, nsimsun, sans-serif;font-size:0.76em;padding-top:0.3em;\"><a name=\"major4\"><span style=\"font-size:1.5em;font-weight:bold;color:#e56600;\" class=\"atitle\">视图层<\/span><\/a><\/p>\r\n<span style=\"color:#e56600;\"> <\/span><p style=\"padding-bottom:0.7em;margin:0px;padding-left:5px;padding-right:5px;font-family:arial, nsimsun, sans-serif;font-size:0.76em;padding-top:0.3em;\"><span style=\"color:#e56600;\">Web 开发框架的使用者都习惯于使用某种模板技术来生成 HTML 页面，这些技术包括常见的 JSP、ASP 和 PHP 等。Play 框架也提供了自己的模板技术，可以用来动态的创建 HTML、XML、JSON 以及其它文本类型的内容。Play 框架的模板技术使用的是 Groovy 语言。Groovy 语言的灵活性和简洁性使得 Play 框架的模板简单而且易用。在模板中可以混用静态内容和生成动态内容的各种元素。在模板中可以使用的动态元素如<\/span><span class=\"Apple-converted-space\" style=\"color:#e56600;\">&nbsp;<\/span><a style=\"color:#4c6e94;\" href=\"http:\/\/www.ibm.com\/developerworks\/cn\/java\/j-lo-play\/index.html?ca=drs-#table3\"><span style=\"color:#e56600;\">表 3<\/span><\/a><span class=\"Apple-converted-space\" style=\"color:#e56600;\">&nbsp;<\/span><span style=\"color:#e56600;\">所示。<\/span><\/p>\r\n<span style=\"color:#e56600;\"> <\/span><p><br \/>\r\n<span style=\"color:#e56600;\"> <\/span><a name=\"major4\"><b style=\"padding-bottom:0.7em;padding-left:5px;padding-right:5px;font-family:arial, sans-serif;font-size:0.76em;font-weight:bold;padding-top:0.3em;\"><span style=\"color:#e56600;\">表 3. 模板中可用的动态元素<\/span><\/b><\/a><br \/>\r\n<span style=\"color:#e56600;\"> <\/span><table style=\"border-bottom:#cccccc 1px solid;border-left:#cccccc 1px solid;width:708px;margin-bottom:8px;border-top-width:0px;font-size:0.8em;border-right:#cccccc 1px solid;\" class=\"data-table-1 ke-zeroborder\" border=\"0\" cellspacing=\"0\" summary=\"模板中可用的动态元素\" cellpadding=\"0\" width=\"100%\"><span style=\"color:#e56600;\"> <\/span><tbody><span style=\"color:#e56600;\"> <\/span><tr><span style=\"color:#e56600;\"> <\/span><th style=\"background-image:url(http:\/\/www.ibm.com\/i\/v16\/t\/text-tabs-bg.gif);text-align:left;padding-bottom:8px;background-color:#f7f8fc;padding-left:5px;padding-right:5px;font-family:arial, nsimsun, sans-serif;font-size:0.7em;vertical-align:top;border-top:#cccccc 1px solid;padding-top:8px;background-origin:initial;background-clip:initial;\" scope=\"col\"><span style=\"color:#e56600;\">动态元素<\/span><\/th>\r\n<span style=\"color:#e56600;\"> <\/span><th style=\"background-image:url(http:\/\/www.ibm.com\/i\/v16\/t\/text-tabs-bg.gif);text-align:left;padding-bottom:8px;background-color:#f7f8fc;padding-left:5px;padding-right:5px;font-family:arial, nsimsun, sans-serif;font-size:0.7em;vertical-align:top;border-top:#cccccc 1px solid;padding-top:8px;background-origin:initial;background-clip:initial;\" scope=\"col\"><span style=\"color:#e56600;\">说明<\/span><\/th>\r\n<span style=\"color:#e56600;\"> <\/span><\/tr>\r\n<span style=\"color:#e56600;\"> <\/span><tr><span style=\"color:#e56600;\"> <\/span><td style=\"padding-bottom:8px;padding-left:5px;padding-right:5px;font-family:arial, nsimsun, sans-serif;font-size:0.7em;vertical-align:top;border-top:#cccccc 1px solid;padding-top:8px;\"><code style=\"font-family:monospace;font-size:small !important;\"><span style=\"color:#e56600;\">${...}<\/span><\/code><\/td>\r\n<span style=\"color:#e56600;\"> <\/span><td style=\"padding-bottom:8px;padding-left:5px;padding-right:5px;font-family:arial, nsimsun, sans-serif;font-size:0.7em;vertical-align:top;border-top:#cccccc 1px solid;padding-top:8px;\"><span style=\"color:#e56600;\">用来对一个表达式进行求值。如<\/span><span class=\"Apple-converted-space\" style=\"color:#e56600;\">&nbsp;<\/span><code style=\"font-family:monospace;font-size:small !important;\"><span style=\"color:#e56600;\">${note.title}<\/span><\/code><span class=\"Apple-converted-space\" style=\"color:#e56600;\">&nbsp;<\/span><span style=\"color:#e56600;\">的值是领域对象<\/span><span class=\"Apple-converted-space\" style=\"color:#e56600;\">&nbsp;<\/span><code style=\"font-family:monospace;font-size:small !important;\"><span style=\"color:#e56600;\">note<\/span><\/code><span class=\"Apple-converted-space\" style=\"color:#e56600;\">&nbsp;<\/span><span style=\"color:#e56600;\">的属性<\/span><span class=\"Apple-converted-space\" style=\"color:#e56600;\">&nbsp;<\/span><code style=\"font-family:monospace;font-size:small !important;\"><span style=\"color:#e56600;\">title<\/span><\/code><span class=\"Apple-converted-space\" style=\"color:#e56600;\">&nbsp;<\/span><span style=\"color:#e56600;\">的值。<\/span><\/td>\r\n<span style=\"color:#e56600;\"> <\/span><\/tr>\r\n<span style=\"color:#e56600;\"> <\/span><tr><span style=\"color:#e56600;\"> <\/span><td style=\"padding-bottom:8px;padding-left:5px;padding-right:5px;font-family:arial, nsimsun, sans-serif;font-size:0.7em;vertical-align:top;border-top:#cccccc 1px solid;padding-top:8px;\"><code style=\"font-family:monospace;font-size:small !important;\"><span style=\"color:#e56600;\">@{...}<\/span><\/code><span class=\"Apple-converted-space\" style=\"color:#e56600;\">&nbsp;<\/span><span style=\"color:#e56600;\">和<\/span><code style=\"font-family:monospace;font-size:small !important;\"><span style=\"color:#e56600;\">@@{...}<\/span><\/code><\/td>\r\n<span style=\"color:#e56600;\"> <\/span><td style=\"padding-bottom:8px;padding-left:5px;padding-right:5px;font-family:arial, nsimsun, sans-serif;font-size:0.7em;vertical-align:top;border-top:#cccccc 1px solid;padding-top:8px;\"><span style=\"color:#e56600;\">用来生成调用控制器中动作方法的 URL，可以用在页面的链接中。<\/span><code style=\"font-family:monospace;font-size:small !important;\"><span style=\"color:#e56600;\">@{...}<\/span><\/code><span class=\"Apple-converted-space\" style=\"color:#e56600;\">&nbsp;<\/span><span style=\"color:#e56600;\">和<\/span><span class=\"Apple-converted-space\" style=\"color:#e56600;\">&nbsp;<\/span><code style=\"font-family:monospace;font-size:small !important;\"><span style=\"color:#e56600;\">@@{...}<\/span><\/code><span class=\"Apple-converted-space\" style=\"color:#e56600;\">&nbsp;<\/span><span style=\"color:#e56600;\">生成的分别是相对 URL 和绝对 URL。如<\/span><span class=\"Apple-converted-space\" style=\"color:#e56600;\">&nbsp;<\/span><code style=\"font-family:monospace;font-size:small !important;\"><a href=\"@{Application.index()}\"><span style=\"color:#e56600;\"> 首页 <\/span><\/a><\/code><a href=\"@{Application.index()}\"><span class=\"Apple-converted-space\" style=\"color:#e56600;\">&nbsp;<\/span><span style=\"color:#e56600;\">生成一个指向首页的链接。<\/span><\/a><\/td>\r\n<span style=\"color:#e56600;\"> <\/span><\/tr>\r\n<span style=\"color:#e56600;\"> <\/span><tr><span style=\"color:#e56600;\"> <\/span><td style=\"padding-bottom:8px;padding-left:5px;padding-right:5px;font-family:arial, nsimsun, sans-serif;font-size:0.7em;vertical-align:top;border-top:#cccccc 1px solid;padding-top:8px;\"><code style=\"font-family:monospace;font-size:small !important;\"><span style=\"color:#e56600;\">&amp;{...}<\/span><\/code><\/td>\r\n<span style=\"color:#e56600;\"> <\/span><td style=\"padding-bottom:8px;padding-left:5px;padding-right:5px;font-family:arial, nsimsun, sans-serif;font-size:0.7em;vertical-align:top;border-top:#cccccc 1px solid;padding-top:8px;\"><span style=\"color:#e56600;\">用来显示经过国际化之后的消息内容。<\/span><\/td>\r\n<span style=\"color:#e56600;\"> <\/span><\/tr>\r\n<span style=\"color:#e56600;\"> <\/span><tr><span style=\"color:#e56600;\"> <\/span><td style=\"padding-bottom:8px;padding-left:5px;padding-right:5px;font-family:arial, nsimsun, sans-serif;font-size:0.7em;vertical-align:top;border-top:#cccccc 1px solid;padding-top:8px;\"><code style=\"font-family:monospace;font-size:small !important;\"><span style=\"color:#e56600;\">*{...}*<\/span><\/code><\/td>\r\n<span style=\"color:#e56600;\"> <\/span><td style=\"padding-bottom:8px;padding-left:5px;padding-right:5px;font-family:arial, nsimsun, sans-serif;font-size:0.7em;vertical-align:top;border-top:#cccccc 1px solid;padding-top:8px;\"><span style=\"color:#e56600;\">用来添加注释。如<\/span><span class=\"Apple-converted-space\" style=\"color:#e56600;\">&nbsp;<\/span><code style=\"font-family:monospace;font-size:small !important;\"><span style=\"color:#e56600;\">*{ 这是注释 }*<\/span><\/code><span style=\"color:#e56600;\">。<\/span><\/td>\r\n<span style=\"color:#e56600;\"> <\/span><\/tr>\r\n<span style=\"color:#e56600;\"> <\/span><tr><span style=\"color:#e56600;\"> <\/span><td style=\"padding-bottom:8px;padding-left:5px;padding-right:5px;font-family:arial, nsimsun, sans-serif;font-size:0.7em;vertical-align:top;border-top:#cccccc 1px solid;padding-top:8px;\"><code style=\"font-family:monospace;font-size:small !important;\"><span style=\"color:#e56600;\">%{...}%<\/span><\/code><\/td>\r\n<span style=\"color:#e56600;\"> <\/span><td style=\"padding-bottom:8px;padding-left:5px;padding-right:5px;font-family:arial, nsimsun, sans-serif;font-size:0.7em;vertical-align:top;border-top:#cccccc 1px solid;padding-top:8px;\"><span style=\"color:#e56600;\">用来添加复杂的 Groovy 脚本，可以声明变量和添加语句。<\/span><\/td>\r\n<span style=\"color:#e56600;\"> <\/span><\/tr>\r\n<span style=\"color:#e56600;\"> <\/span><tr><span style=\"color:#e56600;\"> <\/span><td style=\"padding-bottom:8px;padding-left:5px;padding-right:5px;font-family:arial, nsimsun, sans-serif;font-size:0.7em;vertical-align:top;border-top:#cccccc 1px solid;padding-top:8px;\"><code style=\"font-family:monospace;font-size:small !important;\"><span style=\"color:#e56600;\">#{...}<\/span><\/code><\/td>\r\n<span style=\"color:#e56600;\"> <\/span><td style=\"padding-bottom:8px;padding-left:5px;padding-right:5px;font-family:arial, nsimsun, sans-serif;font-size:0.7em;vertical-align:top;border-top:#cccccc 1px solid;padding-top:8px;\"><span style=\"color:#e56600;\">用来调用 Play 框架的或是开发人员自定义的标签。<\/span><\/td>\r\n<span style=\"color:#e56600;\"> <\/span><\/tr>\r\n<span style=\"color:#e56600;\"> <\/span><\/tbody>\r\n<span style=\"color:#e56600;\"> <\/span><\/table>\r\n<span style=\"color:#e56600;\"> <\/span><\/p>\r\n<span style=\"color:#e56600;\"> <\/span><p style=\"padding-bottom:0.7em;margin:0px;padding-left:5px;padding-right:5px;font-family:arial, nsimsun, sans-serif;font-size:0.76em;padding-top:0.3em;\"><span style=\"color:#e56600;\">Play 框架中的标签的作用相当于 JSP 中的标签。Play 框架本身提供一些常用的标签，开发人员也可以根据需要开发自己的标签。Play 框架内置提供的标签说明如<\/span><span class=\"Apple-converted-space\" style=\"color:#e56600;\">&nbsp;<\/span><a style=\"color:#4c6e94;\" href=\"http:\/\/www.ibm.com\/developerworks\/cn\/java\/j-lo-play\/index.html?ca=drs-#table4\"><span style=\"color:#e56600;\">表 4<\/span><\/a><span class=\"Apple-converted-space\" style=\"color:#e56600;\">&nbsp;<\/span><span style=\"color:#e56600;\">所示。<\/span><\/p>\r\n<span style=\"color:#e56600;\"> <\/span><p><br \/>\r\n<span style=\"color:#e56600;\"> <\/span><a name=\"major4\"><b style=\"padding-bottom:0.7em;padding-left:5px;padding-right:5px;font-family:arial, sans-serif;font-size:0.76em;font-weight:bold;padding-top:0.3em;\"><span style=\"color:#e56600;\">表 4. Play 框架提供的标签<\/span><\/b><\/a><\/p>\r\n<span style=\"color:#e56600;\"> <\/span><p><\/p>\r\n<span style=\"color:#e56600;\"> <\/span><p><\/p>\r\n<span style=\"color:#e56600;\"> <\/span><table style=\"border-bottom:#cccccc 1px solid;border-left:#cccccc 1px solid;width:708px;margin-bottom:8px;border-top-width:0px;font-size:0.8em;border-right:#cccccc 1px solid;\" class=\"data-table-1 ke-zeroborder\" border=\"0\" cellspacing=\"0\" summary=\"Play 框架提供的标签\" cellpadding=\"0\" width=\"100%\"><span style=\"color:#e56600;\"> <\/span><tbody><span style=\"color:#e56600;\"> <\/span><tr><span style=\"color:#e56600;\"> <\/span><th style=\"background-image:url(http:\/\/www.ibm.com\/i\/v16\/t\/text-tabs-bg.gif);text-align:left;padding-bottom:8px;background-color:#f7f8fc;padding-left:5px;padding-right:5px;font-family:arial, nsimsun, sans-serif;font-size:0.7em;vertical-align:top;border-top:#cccccc 1px solid;padding-top:8px;background-origin:initial;background-clip:initial;\" scope=\"col\"><span style=\"color:#e56600;\">标签<\/span><\/th>\r\n<span style=\"color:#e56600;\"> <\/span><th style=\"background-image:url(http:\/\/www.ibm.com\/i\/v16\/t\/text-tabs-bg.gif);text-align:left;padding-bottom:8px;background-color:#f7f8fc;padding-left:5px;padding-right:5px;font-family:arial, nsimsun, sans-serif;font-size:0.7em;vertical-align:top;border-top:#cccccc 1px solid;padding-top:8px;background-origin:initial;background-clip:initial;\" scope=\"col\"><span style=\"color:#e56600;\">说明<\/span><\/th>\r\n<span style=\"color:#e56600;\"> <\/span><\/tr>\r\n<span style=\"color:#e56600;\"> <\/span><tr><span style=\"color:#e56600;\"> <\/span><td style=\"padding-bottom:8px;padding-left:5px;padding-right:5px;font-family:arial, nsimsun, sans-serif;font-size:0.7em;vertical-align:top;border-top:#cccccc 1px solid;padding-top:8px;\"><code style=\"font-family:monospace;font-size:small !important;\"><span style=\"color:#e56600;\">a<\/span><\/code><\/td>\r\n<span style=\"color:#e56600;\"> <\/span><td style=\"padding-bottom:8px;padding-left:5px;padding-right:5px;font-family:arial, nsimsun, sans-serif;font-size:0.7em;vertical-align:top;border-top:#cccccc 1px solid;padding-top:8px;\"><span style=\"color:#e56600;\">用来生成指向控制器中动作方法的 HTML 链接元素。如<\/span><span class=\"Apple-converted-space\" style=\"color:#e56600;\">&nbsp;<\/span><code style=\"font-family:monospace;font-size:small !important;\"><span style=\"color:#e56600;\">#{a @Application.index()} 首页 #{\/a}<\/span><\/code><span style=\"color:#e56600;\">。<\/span><\/td>\r\n<span style=\"color:#e56600;\"> <\/span><\/tr>\r\n<span style=\"color:#e56600;\"> <\/span><tr><span style=\"color:#e56600;\"> <\/span><td style=\"padding-bottom:8px;padding-left:5px;padding-right:5px;font-family:arial, nsimsun, sans-serif;font-size:0.7em;vertical-align:top;border-top:#cccccc 1px solid;padding-top:8px;\"><code style=\"font-family:monospace;font-size:small !important;\"><span style=\"color:#e56600;\">if<\/span><\/code><span style=\"color:#e56600;\">、<\/span><code style=\"font-family:monospace;font-size:small !important;\"><span style=\"color:#e56600;\">ifnot<\/span><\/code><span style=\"color:#e56600;\">、<\/span><code style=\"font-family:monospace;font-size:small !important;\"><span style=\"color:#e56600;\">elseif<\/span><\/code><span style=\"color:#e56600;\">和<\/span><span class=\"Apple-converted-space\" style=\"color:#e56600;\">&nbsp;<\/span><code style=\"font-family:monospace;font-size:small !important;\"><span style=\"color:#e56600;\">else<\/span><\/code><\/td>\r\n<span style=\"color:#e56600;\"> <\/span><td style=\"padding-bottom:8px;padding-left:5px;padding-right:5px;font-family:arial, nsimsun, sans-serif;font-size:0.7em;vertical-align:top;border-top:#cccccc 1px solid;padding-top:8px;\"><span style=\"color:#e56600;\">用来进行条件判断。<\/span><\/td>\r\n<span style=\"color:#e56600;\"> <\/span><\/tr>\r\n<span style=\"color:#e56600;\"> <\/span><tr><span style=\"color:#e56600;\"> <\/span><td style=\"padding-bottom:8px;padding-left:5px;padding-right:5px;font-family:arial, nsimsun, sans-serif;font-size:0.7em;vertical-align:top;border-top:#cccccc 1px solid;padding-top:8px;\"><code style=\"font-family:monospace;font-size:small !important;\"><span style=\"color:#e56600;\">set<\/span><\/code><span class=\"Apple-converted-space\" style=\"color:#e56600;\">&nbsp;<\/span><span style=\"color:#e56600;\">和<\/span><span class=\"Apple-converted-space\" style=\"color:#e56600;\">&nbsp;<\/span><code style=\"font-family:monospace;font-size:small !important;\"><span style=\"color:#e56600;\">get<\/span><\/code><\/td>\r\n<span style=\"color:#e56600;\"> <\/span><td style=\"padding-bottom:8px;padding-left:5px;padding-right:5px;font-family:arial, nsimsun, sans-serif;font-size:0.7em;vertical-align:top;border-top:#cccccc 1px solid;padding-top:8px;\"><span style=\"color:#e56600;\">用来设置和获取可以在模板中使用的变量。如<\/span><span class=\"Apple-converted-space\" style=\"color:#e56600;\">&nbsp;<\/span><code style=\"font-family:monospace;font-size:small !important;\"><span style=\"color:#e56600;\">#{set email:'alex@example.org'}<\/span><\/code><span class=\"Apple-converted-space\" style=\"color:#e56600;\">&nbsp;<\/span><span style=\"color:#e56600;\">设置了变量<\/span><span class=\"Apple-converted-space\" style=\"color:#e56600;\">&nbsp;<\/span><code style=\"font-family:monospace;font-size:small !important;\"><span style=\"color:#e56600;\">email<\/span><\/code><span class=\"Apple-converted-space\" style=\"color:#e56600;\">&nbsp;<\/span><span style=\"color:#e56600;\">的值，可以通过<\/span><span class=\"Apple-converted-space\" style=\"color:#e56600;\">&nbsp;<\/span><code style=\"font-family:monospace;font-size:small !important;\"><span style=\"color:#e56600;\">#{get 'email'}<\/span><\/code><span class=\"Apple-converted-space\" style=\"color:#e56600;\">&nbsp;<\/span><span style=\"color:#e56600;\">来获取。<\/span><\/td>\r\n<span style=\"color:#e56600;\"> <\/span><\/tr>\r\n<span style=\"color:#e56600;\"> <\/span><tr><span style=\"color:#e56600;\"> <\/span><td style=\"padding-bottom:8px;padding-left:5px;padding-right:5px;font-family:arial, nsimsun, sans-serif;font-size:0.7em;vertical-align:top;border-top:#cccccc 1px solid;padding-top:8px;\"><code style=\"font-family:monospace;font-size:small !important;\"><span style=\"color:#e56600;\">script<\/span><\/code><\/td>\r\n<span style=\"color:#e56600;\"> <\/span><td style=\"padding-bottom:8px;padding-left:5px;padding-right:5px;font-family:arial, nsimsun, sans-serif;font-size:0.7em;vertical-align:top;border-top:#cccccc 1px solid;padding-top:8px;\"><span style=\"color:#e56600;\">用来生成一个<\/span><span class=\"Apple-converted-space\" style=\"color:#e56600;\">&nbsp;<\/span><code style=\"font-family:monospace;font-size:small !important;\"><span style=\"color:#e56600;\"> <\/span><script><span style=\"color:#e56600;\">&lt;\/code&gt;&lt;span class=\"Apple-converted-space\"&gt;&nbsp;&lt;\/span&gt;元素引用&lt;span class=\"Apple-converted-space\"&gt;&nbsp;&lt;\/span&gt;&lt;code style=\"font-family:monospace;font-size:small !important;\"&gt;\/public\/javascripts&lt;\/code&gt;&lt;span class=\"Apple-converted-space\"&gt;&nbsp;&lt;\/span&gt;目录下的 JavaScript 文件。如&lt;span class=\"Apple-converted-space\"&gt;&nbsp;&lt;\/span&gt;&lt;code style=\"font-family:monospace;font-size:small !important;\"&gt;#{script 'dojo.js'}&lt;\/code&gt;&lt;span class=\"Apple-converted-space\"&gt;&nbsp;&lt;\/span&gt;引用&lt;span class=\"Apple-converted-space\"&gt;&nbsp;&lt;\/span&gt;&lt;code style=\"font-family:monospace;font-size:small !important;\"&gt;\/public\/javascripts\/dojo.js&lt;\/code&gt;&lt;span class=\"Apple-converted-space\"&gt;&nbsp;&lt;\/span&gt;文件。&lt;\/td&gt;\r\n&lt;\/tr&gt;\r\n&lt;tr&gt;\r\n&lt;td style=\"padding-bottom:8px;padding-left:5px;padding-right:5px;font-family:arial, nsimsun, sans-serif;font-size:0.7em;vertical-align:top;border-top:#cccccc 1px solid;padding-top:8px;\"&gt;&lt;code style=\"font-family:monospace;font-size:small !important;\"&gt;stylesheet&lt;\/code&gt;&lt;\/td&gt;\r\n&lt;td style=\"padding-bottom:8px;padding-left:5px;padding-right:5px;font-family:arial, nsimsun, sans-serif;font-size:0.7em;vertical-align:top;border-top:#cccccc 1px solid;padding-top:8px;\"&gt;作用与&lt;span class=\"Apple-converted-space\"&gt;&nbsp;&lt;\/span&gt;&lt;code style=\"font-family:monospace;font-size:small !important;\"&gt;script&lt;\/code&gt;&lt;span class=\"Apple-converted-space\"&gt;&nbsp;&lt;\/span&gt;类似，不同的是使用&lt;span class=\"Apple-converted-space\"&gt;&nbsp;&lt;\/span&gt;&lt;code style=\"font-family:monospace;font-size:small !important;\"&gt;&lt;link&gt;&lt;\/code&gt;&lt;span class=\"Apple-converted-space\"&gt;&nbsp;&lt;\/span&gt;元素来引用&lt;span class=\"Apple-converted-space\"&gt;&nbsp;&lt;\/span&gt;&lt;code style=\"font-family:monospace;font-size:small !important;\"&gt;\/public\/stylesheets&lt;\/code&gt;&lt;span class=\"Apple-converted-space\"&gt;&nbsp;&lt;\/span&gt;目录下的 CSS 文件。&lt;\/td&gt;\r\n&lt;\/tr&gt;\r\n&lt;tr&gt;\r\n&lt;td style=\"padding-bottom:8px;padding-left:5px;padding-right:5px;font-family:arial, nsimsun, sans-serif;font-size:0.7em;vertical-align:top;border-top:#cccccc 1px solid;padding-top:8px;\"&gt;&lt;code style=\"font-family:monospace;font-size:small !important;\"&gt;list&lt;\/code&gt;&lt;\/td&gt;\r\n&lt;td style=\"padding-bottom:8px;padding-left:5px;padding-right:5px;font-family:arial, nsimsun, sans-serif;font-size:0.7em;vertical-align:top;border-top:#cccccc 1px solid;padding-top:8px;\"&gt;用来遍历一个对象集合。如&lt;span class=\"Apple-converted-space\"&gt;&nbsp;&lt;\/span&gt;&lt;code style=\"font-family:monospace;font-size:small !important;\"&gt;#{list items:notes, as:'note'}&lt;\/code&gt;&lt;span class=\"Apple-converted-space\"&gt;&nbsp;&lt;\/span&gt;用来遍历对象集合&lt;span class=\"Apple-converted-space\"&gt;&nbsp;&lt;\/span&gt;&lt;code style=\"font-family:monospace;font-size:small !important;\"&gt;notes&lt;\/code&gt;。循环体中的每个对象用变量&lt;span class=\"Apple-converted-space\"&gt;&nbsp;&lt;\/span&gt;&lt;code style=\"font-family:monospace;font-size:small !important;\"&gt;note&lt;\/code&gt;来引用。在循环体的代码中可以引用一些预定义的变量。这些变量有固定的名称，但是会以循环体中的对象变量名作为前缀。在上面的例子中是&lt;span class=\"Apple-converted-space\"&gt;&nbsp;&lt;\/span&gt;&lt;code style=\"font-family:monospace;font-size:small !important;\"&gt;note_&lt;\/code&gt;。如&lt;span class=\"Apple-converted-space\"&gt;&nbsp;&lt;\/span&gt;&lt;code style=\"font-family:monospace;font-size:small !important;\"&gt;note_index&lt;\/code&gt;&lt;span class=\"Apple-converted-space\"&gt;&nbsp;&lt;\/span&gt;表示当前对象在集合中的序号；&lt;code style=\"font-family:monospace;font-size:small !important;\"&gt;note_isFirst&lt;\/code&gt;&lt;span class=\"Apple-converted-space\"&gt;&nbsp;&lt;\/span&gt;表示是否是集合中的第一个对象；&lt;code style=\"font-family:monospace;font-size:small !important;\"&gt;note_isLast&lt;\/code&gt;&lt;span class=\"Apple-converted-space\"&gt;&nbsp;&lt;\/span&gt;表示是否是集合中的最后一个对象；&lt;code style=\"font-family:monospace;font-size:small !important;\"&gt;note_parity&lt;\/code&gt;&lt;span class=\"Apple-converted-space\"&gt;&nbsp;&lt;\/span&gt;表示当前对象在集合中序号的奇偶值，可能是&lt;span class=\"Apple-converted-space\"&gt;&nbsp;&lt;\/span&gt;&lt;code style=\"font-family:monospace;font-size:small !important;\"&gt;even&lt;\/code&gt;&lt;span class=\"Apple-converted-space\"&gt;&nbsp;&lt;\/span&gt;和&lt;span class=\"Apple-converted-space\"&gt;&nbsp;&lt;\/span&gt;&lt;code style=\"font-family:monospace;font-size:small !important;\"&gt;odd&lt;\/code&gt;。&lt;\/td&gt;\r\n&lt;\/tr&gt;\r\n&lt;tr&gt;\r\n&lt;td style=\"padding-bottom:8px;padding-left:5px;padding-right:5px;font-family:arial, nsimsun, sans-serif;font-size:0.7em;vertical-align:top;border-top:#cccccc 1px solid;padding-top:8px;\"&gt;&lt;code style=\"font-family:monospace;font-size:small !important;\"&gt;i18n&lt;\/code&gt;&lt;\/td&gt;\r\n&lt;td style=\"padding-bottom:8px;padding-left:5px;padding-right:5px;font-family:arial, nsimsun, sans-serif;font-size:0.7em;vertical-align:top;border-top:#cccccc 1px solid;padding-top:8px;\"&gt;用来使得支持国际化的消息文件可以用 JavaScript 来访问。在 JavaScript 代码中可以&lt;span class=\"Apple-converted-space\"&gt;&nbsp;&lt;\/span&gt;&lt;code style=\"font-family:monospace;font-size:small !important;\"&gt;i18n()&lt;\/code&gt;&lt;span class=\"Apple-converted-space\"&gt;&nbsp;&lt;\/span&gt;方法来访问。如&lt;code style=\"font-family:monospace;font-size:small !important;\"&gt;i18n('app_title')&lt;\/code&gt;。&lt;\/td&gt;\r\n&lt;\/tr&gt;\r\n&lt;tr&gt;\r\n&lt;td style=\"padding-bottom:8px;padding-left:5px;padding-right:5px;font-family:arial, nsimsun, sans-serif;font-size:0.7em;vertical-align:top;border-top:#cccccc 1px solid;padding-top:8px;\"&gt;&lt;code style=\"font-family:monospace;font-size:small !important;\"&gt;errors&lt;\/code&gt;&lt;\/td&gt;\r\n&lt;td style=\"padding-bottom:8px;padding-left:5px;padding-right:5px;font-family:arial, nsimsun, sans-serif;font-size:0.7em;vertical-align:top;border-top:#cccccc 1px solid;padding-top:8px;\"&gt;用来遍历验证错误的集合。使用方式与&lt;span class=\"Apple-converted-space\"&gt;&nbsp;&lt;\/span&gt;&lt;code style=\"font-family:monospace;font-size:small !important;\"&gt;list&lt;\/code&gt;&lt;span class=\"Apple-converted-space\"&gt;&nbsp;&lt;\/span&gt;类似，循环体中使用的对象变量名称是&lt;span class=\"Apple-converted-space\"&gt;&nbsp;&lt;\/span&gt;&lt;code style=\"font-family:monospace;font-size:small !important;\"&gt;error&lt;\/code&gt;。&lt;\/td&gt;\r\n&lt;\/tr&gt;\r\n&lt;tr&gt;\r\n&lt;td style=\"padding-bottom:8px;padding-left:5px;padding-right:5px;font-family:arial, nsimsun, sans-serif;font-size:0.7em;vertical-align:top;border-top:#cccccc 1px solid;padding-top:8px;\"&gt;&lt;code style=\"font-family:monospace;font-size:small !important;\"&gt;form&lt;\/code&gt;&lt;\/td&gt;\r\n&lt;td style=\"padding-bottom:8px;padding-left:5px;padding-right:5px;font-family:arial, nsimsun, sans-serif;font-size:0.7em;vertical-align:top;border-top:#cccccc 1px solid;padding-top:8px;\"&gt;用来生成 HTML&lt;span class=\"Apple-converted-space\"&gt;&nbsp;&lt;\/span&gt;&lt;code style=\"font-family:monospace;font-size:small !important;\"&gt;&lt;form&gt;&lt;\/code&gt;&lt;span class=\"Apple-converted-space\"&gt;&nbsp;&lt;\/span&gt;元素。&lt;\/td&gt;\r\n&lt;\/tr&gt;\r\n&lt;tr&gt;\r\n&lt;td style=\"padding-bottom:8px;padding-left:5px;padding-right:5px;font-family:arial, nsimsun, sans-serif;font-size:0.7em;vertical-align:top;border-top:#cccccc 1px solid;padding-top:8px;\"&gt;&lt;code style=\"font-family:monospace;font-size:small !important;\"&gt;verbatim&lt;\/code&gt;&lt;\/td&gt;\r\n&lt;td style=\"padding-bottom:8px;padding-left:5px;padding-right:5px;font-family:arial, nsimsun, sans-serif;font-size:0.7em;vertical-align:top;border-top:#cccccc 1px solid;padding-top:8px;\"&gt;禁用模板中的 HTML 转义功能。&lt;\/td&gt;\r\n&lt;\/tr&gt;\r\n&lt;tr&gt;\r\n&lt;td style=\"padding-bottom:8px;padding-left:5px;padding-right:5px;font-family:arial, nsimsun, sans-serif;font-size:0.7em;vertical-align:top;border-top:#cccccc 1px solid;padding-top:8px;\"&gt;&lt;code style=\"font-family:monospace;font-size:small !important;\"&gt;include&lt;\/code&gt;&lt;\/td&gt;\r\n&lt;td style=\"padding-bottom:8px;padding-left:5px;padding-right:5px;font-family:arial, nsimsun, sans-serif;font-size:0.7em;vertical-align:top;border-top:#cccccc 1px solid;padding-top:8px;\"&gt;在当前模板中引入另一个模板。如&lt;span class=\"Apple-converted-space\"&gt;&nbsp;&lt;\/span&gt;&lt;code style=\"font-family:monospace;font-size:small !important;\"&gt;#{include 'test.html'}&lt;\/code&gt;。&lt;\/td&gt;\r\n&lt;\/tr&gt;\r\n&lt;tr&gt;\r\n&lt;td style=\"padding-bottom:8px;padding-left:5px;padding-right:5px;font-family:arial, nsimsun, sans-serif;font-size:0.7em;vertical-align:top;border-top:#cccccc 1px solid;padding-top:8px;\"&gt;&lt;code style=\"font-family:monospace;font-size:small !important;\"&gt;extends&lt;\/code&gt;和&lt;code style=\"font-family:monospace;font-size:small !important;\"&gt;doLayout&lt;\/code&gt;&lt;\/td&gt;\r\n&lt;td style=\"padding-bottom:8px;padding-left:5px;padding-right:5px;font-family:arial, nsimsun, sans-serif;font-size:0.7em;vertical-align:top;border-top:#cccccc 1px solid;padding-top:8px;\"&gt;&lt;code style=\"font-family:monospace;font-size:small !important;\"&gt;extends&lt;\/code&gt;使得当前的模板继承自另外一个模板。&lt;code style=\"font-family:monospace;font-size:small !important;\"&gt;doLayout&lt;\/code&gt;&lt;span class=\"Apple-converted-space\"&gt;&nbsp;&lt;\/span&gt;用来在父模板中调用子模板。&lt;\/td&gt;\r\n&lt;\/tr&gt;\r\n&lt;\/tbody&gt;\r\n&lt;\/table&gt;\r\n&lt;\/p&gt;\r\n&lt;p style=\"padding-bottom:0.7em;margin:0px;padding-left:5px;padding-right:5px;font-family:arial, nsimsun, sans-serif;font-size:0.76em;padding-top:0.3em;\"&gt;在模板中可以使用来自不同地方的变量。首先是在模板生成的时候，由控制器中的动作方法通过&lt;span class=\"Apple-converted-space\"&gt;&nbsp;&lt;\/span&gt;&lt;code
