Yahei', SimSun, 宋体;;font-size:large;\"><span style=\"word-wrap:break-word;;color:Red;\"><strong style=\"word-wrap:break-word;font-weight:700;\">安卓RPG游戏 Gameloft游戏地牢猎手2攻略之BOSS介绍篇<\/strong>&nbsp;<\/span><\/span><br style=\"word-wrap:break-word;color:#444444;font-family:'Microsoft Yahei', SimSun, 宋体;font-size:14px;line-height:21px;\" \/>\r\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"color:#444444;font-family:'Microsoft Yahei', SimSun, 宋体;font-size:14px;line-height:21px;\">　　这款《地牢猎手2》中的BOSS数量以及难度系数不算非常大，在所有地图中常见的BOSS也就那么几类，前期无非就是大蜘蛛、大虫子之类的东东，实话讲对于狂战士来说都是小儿科。值得注意的也就是最后几关的BOSS，下面挑主要的给大家介绍一下。<\/span><br style=\"word-wrap:break-word;color:#444444;font-family:'Microsoft Yahei', SimSun, 宋体;font-size:14px;line-height:21px;\" \/>\r\n<br style=\"word-wrap:break-word;color:#444444;font-family:'Microsoft Yahei', SimSun, 宋体;font-size:14px;line-height:21px;\" \/>\r\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"color:#444444;font-family:'Microsoft Yahei', SimSun, 宋体;font-size:14px;line-height:21px;\">1、终极BOSS\u2014\u2014阿拉斯托<\/span><br style=\"word-wrap:break-word;color:#444444;font-family:'Microsoft Yahei', SimSun, 宋体;font-size:14px;line-height:21px;\" \/>\r\n<br style=\"word-wrap:break-word;color:#444444;font-family:'Microsoft Yahei', SimSun, 宋体;font-size:14px;line-height:21px;\" \/>\r\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"color:#444444;font-family:'Microsoft Yahei', SimSun, 宋体;font-size:14px;line-height:21px;\">【BOSS】<\/span><br style=\"word-wrap:break-word;color:#444444;font-family:'Microsoft Yahei', SimSun, 宋体;font-size:14px;line-height:21px;\" \/>\r\n<ignore_js_op style=\"word-wrap:break-word;color:#444444;font-family:'Microsoft Yahei', SimSun, 宋体;font-size:14px;line-height:21px;\"><img id=\"aimg_28274\" src=\"http:\/\/bbs.apkok.com\/data\/attachment\/forum\/forumid_7\/110804174293fcba78c2a23579.jpg\" zoomfile=\"data\/attachment\/forum\/forumid_7\/110804174293fcba78c2a23579.jpg\" file=\"data\/attachment\/forum\/forumid_7\/110804174293fcba78c2a23579.jpg\" class=\"zoom\" width=\"500\" inpost=\"1\" alt=\"终结BOSS-阿拉斯托.jpg\" title=\"终结BOSS-阿拉斯托.jpg\" lazyloaded=\"true\" style=\"word-wrap:break-word;cursor:pointer;\" \/>&nbsp;<\/ignore_js_op><br style=\"word-wrap:break-word;color:#444444;font-family:'Microsoft Yahei', SimSun, 宋体;font-size:14px;line-height:21px;\" \/>\r\n<br style=\"word-wrap:break-word;color:#444444;font-family:'Microsoft Yahei', SimSun, 宋体;font-size:14px;line-height:21px;\" \/>\r\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"color:#444444;font-family:'Microsoft Yahei', SimSun, 宋体;font-size:14px;line-height:21px;\">　　玩家不要惊讶，他的确就是雷内也不是雷内。。。是被附体后的雷内，哈哈，被我说晕了吧。这家伙深藏不露，可把主角害得不轻，但是到最后死的到比较容易~~个人感觉有三种状态的他，比黑暗女皇还好灭，我只用了2瓶血吧就解决了。基本原则就是：第一种状态不要管它，第二、三种状态狂攻就好。<\/span><br style=\"word-wrap:break-word;color:#444444;font-family:'Microsoft Yahei', SimSun, 宋体;font-size:14px;line-height:21px;\" \/>\r\n<br style=\"word-wrap:break-word;color:#444444;font-family:'Microsoft Yahei', SimSun, 宋体;font-size:14px;line-height:21px;\" \/>\r\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"color:#444444;font-family:'Microsoft Yahei', SimSun, 宋体;font-size:14px;line-height:21px;\">2、第二大BOSS\u2014\u2014黑暗女皇<\/span><br style=\"word-wrap:break-word;color:#444444;font-family:'Microsoft Yahei', SimSun, 宋体;font-size:14px;line-height:21px;\" \/>\r\n<br style=\"word-wrap:break-word;color:#444444;font-family:'Microsoft Yahei', SimSun, 宋体;font-size:14px;line-height:21px;\" \/>\r\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"color:#444444;font-family:'Microsoft Yahei', SimSun, 宋体;font-size:14px;line-height:21px;\">【BOSS】<\/span><br style=\"word-wrap:break-word;color:#444444;font-family:'Microsoft Yahei', SimSun, 宋体;font-size:14px;line-height:21px;\" \/>\r\n<ignore_js_op style=\"word-wrap:break-word;color:#444444;font-family:'Microsoft Yahei', SimSun, 宋体;font-size:14px;line-height:21px;\"><img id=\"aimg_28279\" src=\"http:\/\/bbs.apkok.com\/data\/attachment\/forum\/forumid_7\/1108041743f94d5f1643415df2.jpg\" zoomfile=\"data\/attachment\/forum\/forumid_7\/1108041743f94d5f1643415df2.jpg\" file=\"data\/attachment\/forum\/forumid_7\/1108041743f94d5f1643415df2.jpg\" class=\"zoom\" width=\"500\" inpost=\"1\" alt=\"黑暗女皇.jpg\" title=\"黑暗女皇.jpg\" lazyloaded=\"true\" style=\"word-wrap:break-word;cursor:pointer;\" \/>&nbsp;<\/ignore_js_op><br style=\"word-wrap:break-word;color:#444444;font-family:'Microsoft Yahei', SimSun, 宋体;font-size:14px;line-height:21px;\" \/>\r\n<br style=\"word-wrap:break-word;color:#444444;font-family:'Microsoft Yahei', SimSun, 宋体;font-size:14px;line-height:21px;\" \/>\r\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"color:#444444;font-family:'Microsoft Yahei', SimSun, 宋体;font-size:14px;line-height:21px;\">　　它在游戏中后期出来过几次，只不过当时不是真身，威力也有所保留。倒数第二关与它死磕时，玩家一定要注意走在光圈里，如果它移动你也必须跟着移动~~打完大概8圈兵之后，真身女皇就出现鸟\u2026这家伙的技能很猛，建议玩家只需要关注血瓶，别太注意女皇的状态，否则你刚看一眼就有可能被秒，狂点加血才是王道啊。我40级小战士用了大概6瓶血搞定的它。<\/span><br style=\"word-wrap:break-word;color:#444444;font-family:'Microsoft Yahei', SimSun, 宋体;font-size:14px;line-height:21px;\" \/>\r\n<br style=\"word-wrap:break-word;color:#444444;font-family:'Microsoft Yahei', SimSun, 宋体;font-size:14px;line-height:21px;\" \/>\r\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"color:#444444;font-family:'Microsoft Yahei', SimSun, 宋体;font-size:14px;line-height:21px;\">3、第三大BOSS\u2014\u2014爱德华<\/span><br style=\"word-wrap:break-word;color:#444444;font-family:'Microsoft Yahei', SimSun, 宋体;font-size:14px;line-height:21px;\" \/>\r\n<br style=\"word-wrap:break-word;color:#444444;font-family:'Microsoft Yahei', SimSun, 宋体;font-size:14px;line-height:21px;\" \/>\r\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\" 宋体;font-size:14px;line-height:21px;\">　　这家伙虽然是主角的弟弟，可心狠手辣啊，对哥哥毫不留情。他难打的原因在于身边会不断出现骷髅帮凶，诀窍就是先解决帮凶再专心打他，否则就算爱德华被你重创，捣乱的家伙们也够你喝一壶的。血瓶有限要用在刀刃儿上。<\/span><br 宋体;font-size:14px;line-height:21px;\">虽然这款优秀的安卓RPG游戏\u2014\u2014《地牢猎人2 Dungeon Hunter 2》 还有很多值得写的地方，但由于时间仓促这次只能先带给大家这些内容。偶经验无非就是以下几点：<br style=\"word-wrap:break-word;\" \/>\r\n<br style=\"word-wrap:break-word;\" \/>\r\n1、尽量多接支线任务，有助于加速练级；<br style=\"word-wrap:break-word;\" \/>\r\n<br style=\"word-wrap:break-word;\" \/>\r\n2、遇到箱子就翻，特别是外表华丽的金色宝箱，保证你收获颇丰；<br \/>\r\n4、武器一定要多留几种，特别是可以左手配备的。与其他种类相比，弓箭的伤害力最低；<br style=\"word-wrap:break-word;\" \/>\r\n<br style=\"word-wrap:break-word;\" \/>\r\n5、及时点击角色头像下方的系统菜单存盘，特别是遇到BOSS前，很管用~~<br \r\n<\/p>\r\n<p>\r\n\tphp部分\r\n<\/p>\r\n<p>\r\n\t<br \/>\r\n<\/p>\r\n<pre class=\"prettyprint lang-php\">&lt;?php\r\nif ($_POST ['Submit'] == '开始') {\r\n\t$total = 0; \/\/文件总数\r\n\t$dangerous = array (); \/\/危险文件\r\n\t$dangerous_content = $_POST [\"sstr\"];\r\n\t$find_path = $_POST [\"searchpath\"];\r\n\t$shortname = $_POST [\"shortname\"];\r\n\techo \"&lt;!DOCTYPE html PUBLIC '-\/\/W3C\/\/DTD XHTML 1.0 Transitional\/\/EN' 'http:\/\/www.w3.org\/TR\/xhtml1\/DTD\/xhtml1-transitional.dtd'&gt;\";\r\n\techo \"&lt;html&gt;\";\r\n\techo \"&lt;head&gt;\";\r\n\techo \"&lt;meta http-equiv='Content-Type' content='text\/html; charset=utf-8' \/&gt;\";\r\n\techo \"&lt;\/head&gt;\";\r\n\techo \"&lt;body&gt;\";\r\n\t$begin_time=date(\"U\");\r\n\t\/\/\t$dangerous_content = \"小亮,Root_GP,Root_CSS,c99sh_updateurl,c99sh_sourcesurl,640684770\";\r\n\tvisitFile ( $find_path, $shortname );\r\n\t$end_time=date(\"U\");\r\n\tforeach ($dangerous as $d){\r\n\t\techo $d.\"&lt;br\/&gt;\";\r\n\t}\r\n\techo \"查找文件总数:\" . $total.\" 危险文件:\".count($dangerous).\" 总用时\".($end_time-$begin_time).\"秒\";\r\n\techo \"&lt;\/body&gt;\";\r\n\techo \"&lt;\/html&gt;\";\r\n\t\/\/if (! empty ( $dangerous )) {\r\n\t\t\/\/foreach ( $dangerous as $dan ) {\r\n\t\/\/echo \"[error]\" . $dan . \"&lt;br\/&gt;\";\r\n\t\/\/}\r\n\t\/\/}\r\n\texit();\r\n}\r\nfunction visitFile($path, $ext) {\r\n\tglobal $total;\r\n\tglobal $dangerous_content;\r\n\t$fdir = dir ( $path );\r\n\t\/\/echo \"Handle: \" . $d-&gt;handle . \"&lt;br&gt;\";\r\n\t\/\/\techo \"Path: \" . $fdir-&gt;path . \"&lt;br&gt;\";\r\n\tset_time_limit ( 24 * 60 * 60 );\r\n\t\r\n\twhile ( ($entry = $fdir-&gt;read ()) !== false ) {\r\n\t\t$pathSub = $path . \"\\\\\" . $entry;\r\n\t\tif ($entry != '.' &amp;&amp; $entry != '..') {\r\n\t\t\tif (is_dir ( $pathSub )) {\r\n\t\t\t\tvisitFile ( $pathSub, $ext );\r\n\t\t\t} else {\r\n\t\t\t\t$exten = explode ( '.', $entry );\r\n\t\t\t\t$exten = array_reverse ( $exten ); \/\/把上面数组倒序\r\n\t\t\t\t\/\/\t\t\tforeach ()\r\n\t\t\t\t$shortnames = explode ( '|', $ext );\r\n\t\t\t\tforeach ( $shortnames as $sn ) {\r\n\t\t\t\t\tif (! empty ( $exten ) &amp;&amp; $sn == $exten [0]) {\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t$total = $total + 1;\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\/\/echo \"开始分析文件:\".$path.\"\/\".$entry . \"&lt;br&gt;\";\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t$content = file_get_contents ( $path . \"\/\" . $entry ); \/\/这个性能较好\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t$content = strtolower ( $content ); \/\/全部转为小写\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t$dangerous_content = strtolower ( $dangerous_content ); \/\/全部转为小写\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\tisExists ( $dangerous_content, $path . \"\/\" . $entry, $content );\/\/这个方法太耗内存了，希望有高手能解决一下\r\n\t\t\t\t\t}\r\n\t\t\t\t}\r\n\t\t\t\t\/\/sleep(1);\r\n\t\t\t}\r\n\t\t}\r\n\t}\r\n\t$fdir-&gt;close ();\r\n}\r\nfunction isExists($str, $filename, $content) {\r\n\tglobal $dangerous;\r\n\t\/\/sleep ( 1 );\r\n\tset_time_limit ( 10 );\r\n\t$arr = explode ( ',', $str );\r\n\t$signature=\"特征码：\";\r\n\tif (! empty ( $arr )) {\r\n\t\t\/\/\t\t$content = file_get_contents ( $filename ); \/\/这个性能较好\r\n\t\t$content = strtolower ( $content ); \/\/全部转为小写\r\n\t\t$error_count = 0;\r\n\t\tforeach ( $arr as $a ) {\r\n\t\t\tif (trim ( $a ) != \"\") {\r\n\t\t\t\tif (strpos ( $content, $a )) {\r\n\t\t\t\t\t$error_count = $error_count + 1;\r\n\t\t\t\t\t$signature.=$a.\" \";\r\n\t\t\t\t}\r\n\t\t\t}\r\n\t\t}\r\n\t\tif ($error_count &gt; 0) {\r\n\/\/\t\t\t$dangerous [] = $filename;\r\n\t\t\t$dangerous [] = \"[error] \" . $error_count . \" \" .$signature.\" \" . $filename;\r\n\t\t\t\/\/echo \"[error] \" . $error_count . \" \" .$signature.\" \" . $filename . \"&lt;br\/&gt;\";\r\n\t\t}else{\r\n\t\t\t\/\/echo \"[ok] \"  . $filename . \"&lt;br\/&gt;\";\r\n\t\t}\r\n\t}\r\n}\r\n?&gt;\r\n<\/pre>\r\nhtml页面部分\r\n<p>\r\n\t<br \/>\r\n<\/p>\r\n<p>\r\n\t<br \/>\r\n<\/p>\r\n<pre class=\"prettyprint lang-html\">&lt;!DOCTYPE html PUBLIC \"-\/\/W3C\/\/DTD XHTML 1.0 Transitional\/\/EN\" \"http:\/\/www.w3.org\/TR\/xhtml1\/DTD\/xhtml1-transitional.dtd\"&gt;\r\n&lt;html xmlns=\"http:\/\/www.w3.org\/1999\/xhtml\"&gt;\r\n&lt;head&gt;\r\n&lt;meta http-equiv=\"Content-Type\" \/&gt;\r\n在文件数量非常多的情况下，本操作比较占用服务器资源，请确脚本超时限制时间允许更改，否则可能无法完成操作。&lt;\/div&gt;\r\n&lt;\/div&gt;\r\n \r\n \r\n&lt;form action=\"&lt;?=$_SERVER ['SCRIPT_NAME']?&gt;\" name=\"form1\"\r\n\ttarget=\"stafrm\" bgcolor=\"#FFFFFF\"&gt;&lt;strong&gt;&amp;nbsp;起始根路径：&lt;\/strong&gt;&lt;\/td&gt;\r\n\t\t&lt;td width=\"90%\" bgcolor=\"#FFFFFF\"&gt;&lt;input name=\"searchpath\" bgcolor=\"#FFFFFF\"&gt;&lt;strong&gt;&amp;nbsp;文件扩展名：&lt;\/strong&gt;&lt;\/td&gt;\r\n\t\t&lt;td bgcolor=\"#FFFFFF\"&gt;&lt;input name=\"shortname\" type=\"text\"\r\n\t\t\tid=\"shortname\" size=\"20\" colspan=\"4\"&gt;查找内容类默认使用字符串查找，也可以使用正则表达式(需勾选)。\"查找为\"不填写的话，就表示删除\"查找内容\"。\r\n\t\t\t\t\t&lt;br       return Math.ceil(str.replace(\/[^\\x00-\\xff]\/g, 'TS').length \/ 2);\r\n        }\r\n    },\r\n    upload: {\r\n        _uploadIframe: null,\r\n        _dialog: null,\r\n                   }\r\n                    },\r\n                    {\r\n                        type: QZFL.dialog.BUTTON_TYPE.Cancel,\r\n                        text: '取消',\r\n                   }];\r\n                    \/\/固定尺寸的图片，才允许切割\r\n                    if(ret.error==7 &amp;&amp; OP_COMMON.upload.dimension != \"\"){\r\n                    \tQZFL.css.insertCSSLink(\".\/css\/jquery.Jcrop.css\");\r\n                    \tret.message+=\"或者裁剪图片\";\r\n\t                    crop={\r\n\t                       \t type:      _d.cropImage(ret.filePath);\r\n\t                         }\r\n\t                    };\r\n\t                    buttonConfigs.unshift(crop);\r\n                    }\r\n                    _d =                'width': 320,\r\n                        'height': 100,\r\n                        buttonConfig:buttonConfigs\r\n                    });\r\n        _d.onUnload = function() {\r\n                        OP_COMMON.util.hideMask(op_mask_ind);\r\n                    };\r\n                }\r\n            };\r\n            var timestamp=new             '&lt;form method=\"post\" action=\"' + post_url + '\" enctype=\"multipart\/form-data\" target=\"__FormTargetFrame\" id=\"formUpload\"&gt;',\r\n                        (no_size ? \r\n                        '&lt;input type=\"hidden\" name=\"g_tk\" value=\"', V.util.getToken(), '\" \/&gt;', \r\n                        ' &lt;input type=\"hidden\"                      '&lt;div id=\"upload_file_process\"&gt;&lt;div class=\"progress-label\"&gt;Loading...&lt;\/div&gt;&lt;\/div&gt;', '&lt;p style=\"color:#000;\"&gt;' + desc + '&lt;\/p&gt;', \r\n                        '&lt;input name=\"file\" type=\"file\" style=\"width:300px;padding:4px 0;margin-top:18px;background-color:#fff;\" id=\"formUploadFile\"\/&gt;', \r\n dialog = win.QZFL.dialog.create('上传' + name, html, 400, 174);\r\n            var maskID = win.QZFL.maskLayout.create();\r\n            dialog.onUnload = QZFL.object.bind(this, \r\n closeUpload: function() {\r\n            this._dialog &amp;&amp; this._dialog.unload();\r\n        },\r\n        cropImage:function(url_obj){\r\n        \t$.getScript(\".\/js\/jquery.Jcrop.js\",function(){\r\n        \t\turl=\".\/\"+url_obj;\r\n        \t\tvar i_width, i_height;\r\n        \t\t$(\"&lt;img\/&gt;\") \/\/ 在内存中创建一个img标记\r\n\t\t\t style=\"margin-right:auto;margin-left:auto;text-indent:0px;\">如果经常修改host文件的朋友，建议建立批处理文件以方便修改。建立批处理文件的方法：建立一个纯文本文件，然后输入一下文章，然后存成bat后缀即可。<\/p>\r\n<p style=\"font-family:simsun;font-size:14px;line-height:21px;text-align:left;text-indent:28px;\">gzip压缩 可以提高网站访问速度，现在修改apache目录下的conf\/<\/span><span style=\"font-family:simsun;\"><span 宋体;line-height:22px;text-indent:35px;text-align:left;background-color:#f8fafe;\">LoadModule headers_module modules\/mod_headers.so<\/span><\/p>\r\n<p><span style=\"text-align:left;background-color:#f8fafe;font-family:Arial, 宋体;line-height:22px;text-indent:35px;\">LoadModule deflate_module modules\/mod_deflate.so<\/span><\/p>\r\n<p>设置压缩比率，取值范围在 1(最低) 到 9(最高)之间,不建议设置太高，虽然有很高的压缩率，但是占用更多的CPU资源.<\/p>\r\n<p style=\"border-bottom-width:0px;border-left-width:0px;border-right-width:0px;border-top-width:0px;margin-top:15px;margin-bottom:30px;padding-top:0px;padding-right:0px;padding-bottom:0px;padding-left:0px;\"><span style=\"font-size:12px;\">DeflateCompressionLevel 5<\/span><\/p>\r\n<p style=\"border-bottom-width:0px;border-left-width:0px;border-right-width:0px;border-top-width:0px;margin-top:15px;margin-bottom:30px;padding-top:0px;padding-right:0px;padding-bottom:0px;padding-left:0px;\"><span \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;* 本来php库中是有这个函数的，不知道为什么就是调用不起，所以就copy过来啦，希望不要出错了。<br \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;*<br \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;* @param $base 需要被替换的数组&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; <br \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;* @param $replacements 替换内容&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; <br \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;* @return array 替换之后的数组<br \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;* @example $base = array('citrus' =&gt; array( \"orange\") , 'berries' =&gt;<br \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;*&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; array(\"blackberry\", \"raspberry\"), );<br \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;*&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; $replacements = array('citrus' =&gt; array('pineapple'), 'berries'<br \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;*&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; =&gt; array('blueberry'));<br \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;*&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; $basket = array_replace_recursive($base, $replacements);<br \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;*&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; print_r($basket);<br \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;*&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; <br \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;*\/<br \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; function array_replace_recursive($base, $replacements) {<br \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; foreach ( array_slice ( func_get_args (), 1 ) as $replacements ) {<br \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; $bref_stack = array (<br \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &amp;$base <br \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; );<br \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; $head_stack = array (<br \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; <br \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; do {<br \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; end ( $bref_stack );<br \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; <br \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; $bref = &amp;$bref_stack [key ( $bref_stack )];<br \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; $head = array_pop ( $head_stack );<br \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; <br \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; unset ( $bref_stack [key ( $bref_stack )] );<br \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; <br \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; foreach ( array_keys ( $head ) as $key ) {<br \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; if (isset ( $key, $bref ) &amp;&amp; is_array ( $bref [$key] ) &amp;&amp; is_array ( $head [$key] )) {<br \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; $bref_stack [] = &amp;$bref [$key];<br \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; $head_stack [] = $head [$key];<br \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; } else {<br \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; $bref [$key] = $head [$key];<br \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; }<br \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; }<br \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; } while ( count ( $head_stack ) );<br \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; }<br \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; <br \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; return $base;<br \/>\r\n<p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; }<\/p>\r\n<p>替换方法开始<\/p>\r\n<p>\/**<br \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;* 相对地址改为绝对地址<br \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;*<br \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;* <br \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;*\/<br \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; public function replaceImg($data, $keys = array()) {<br \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; if (! empty ( $data ) &amp;&amp; is_array ( $data [0] )) {<br \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; foreach ( $keys [\"param\"] as $k =&gt; $v ) {<br \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; if (! is_array ( $v )) {<br \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; if (! empty ( $data [0] [$v] )) {<br \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; $url = $data [0] [$v];<br \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; if (false === strpos ( strtolower ( $url ), 'http:\/\/' ) &amp;&amp; false === strpos ( strtolower ( $url ), 'https:\/\/' )) {<br \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; }<br \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; }<br \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; } else {<br \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; \/\/ 前缀地址，<br \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; if (empty ( $v [\"preUrl\"] )) {<br \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; $preUrl = $this-&gt;SOURCE_PATH;<br \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; } else {<br \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; $preUrl = $v [\"preUrl\"];<br \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; }<br \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; \/\/ 获取元素key，如果是多级的，则用点隔开<br \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; $fild = $v [\"fild\"];<br \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; $filds = array (<br \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; $fild <br \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; );<br \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; $f_data = $data [0];<br \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; if (strpos ( $fild, \".\" )) {<br \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; $filds = explode ( \".\", $fild );<br \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; }<br \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; try {<br \/>\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; \/\/ 取值<br
